rationale: 贷款业通过提供信贷渠道，使个人（包括弱势群体）能够获得金融资源，用于应对生计需求或小型创收活动，有助于实现经济资源的获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 为小微企业提供贷款是支持其创立、正规化和增长的关键金融服务，直接促进生产性活动和体面就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 作为金融体系的一部分，贷款业可以扩展金融服务的覆盖面，特别是在传统银行服务不足的领域，促进普惠金融。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 如果缺乏有效监管，贷款业可能通过高利率、掠夺性贷款或不公平条款加剧借款人的债务负担，从而扩大经济不平等，凸显了加强金融监管的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations.

rationale: 左官工事業作为建筑装修的关键环节，通过改善墙体平整度、防水性和美观度，直接参与建造和升级安全、适宜的住房。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业的技能（如使用当地灰泥材料的技术）在技术援助背景下，可能有助于发展中国家建造更具韧性的建筑，但相关性较间接。
sdg_target_description: Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials

rationale: 该行业是劳动密集型行业，提供了大量的技能型就业岗位，为劳动者（包括熟练工匠）提供了生计来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 左官工作可能存在粉尘吸入、高空作业等职业健康与安全风险，如果安全措施不到位，会对工人健康产生负面影响，与提供安全工作环境的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 传统抹灰材料（如水泥）的生产是高能耗、高碳排放的过程。施工中可能产生废弃灰浆等建筑垃圾，若管理不当，会导致资源浪费和环境污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 施工现场的材料浪费（如未使用完的灰浆）和拆除产生的废弃物，如果缺乏有效的减量、回收和再利用措施，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 物品寄存服务通过促进物品的共享和重复使用（例如，多人轮流使用存储空间的物品），减少了为满足临时需求而进行的重复购买和新产品生产，从而从源头上预防和减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通过提供安全、便捷的物品寄存服务，作为一种城市基本服务，有助于优化居住空间（例如，为小户型家庭提供额外存储空间），间接支持实现适宜的居住条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services

rationale: 物品寄存业是城市物流和管理系统的一部分，通过高效利用空间（如设置公共储物柜）支持可持续的城市规划和管理，提升城市生活的便利性和包容性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management

rationale: 作为物流和供应链的辅助基础设施，物品寄存设施（尤其是现代化、网络化的系统）支持经济活动的顺畅运行，是可持续基础设施的一个组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being

rationale: 寄存设施的运营（如照明、温控、安保系统）需要消耗能源。如果设施能效低下，则会对提高能源效率的目标产生轻微的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 同能源消耗相关，如果寄存设施的能源来自化石燃料，其运营会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化行动有轻微的负面影响。但这种影响通常较小，且可通过使用可再生能源来缓解。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造高能效的空调和热泵设备，直接有助于最终用户（建筑、工业）提高能源效率，从而贡献于全球能效改善率的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 空调设备是现代建筑和工业基础设施的关键组成部分。制造更可持续、资源效率更高的空调技术是升级基础设施、采用清洁技术不可或缺的一环。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过制造符合或超越国家能效标准和制冷剂管理政策的低碳空调设备，该行业支持了将气候变化减缓措施（如逐步淘汰高GWP制冷剂）纳入实际应用。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果制造过程或产品生命周期末端管理不当，空调设备中使用的有害化学品（如某些制冷剂和发泡剂）可能对环境和健康造成危害，与无害环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程本身会产生工业废物和副产品。此外，产品报废后若未建立有效的回收再利用体系，会产生大量电子废物，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 轨道业是高质量、可靠、可持续和有韧性的交通基础设施的核心组成部分，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 轨道运输是安全、可负担、可持续公共交通系统的关键要素，特别有助于满足城市和区域的大规模出行需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 发展轨道运输是各国将气候变化减缓措施（从高碳交通模式转向低碳交通模式）纳入交通政策和规划的重要策略。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 轨道业的运营、维护和管理创造了大量直接和间接的就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 现代化的轨道系统（如电气化铁路）代表了资源使用效率高、环境友好的交通技术，是可持续基础设施升级的典范。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 新轨道线路的建设和现有线路的扩建可能导致栖息地破碎化、土地占用和生态系统干扰，对陆地生态系统构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 如果规划不当，轨道基础设施的建设和运营（如噪音、振动、屏障效应）可能加速自然栖息地的退化并影响生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 传统塑料制造业本身是高资源消耗和污染的行业，是实现可持续产业升级和采用环保技术的主要改造对象，因此其当前普遍模式对该目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 塑料制造过程可能使用和释放有害化学品，且塑料产品在整个生命周期（尤其是作为废物时）难以实现无害环境管理，对土壤、水和空气造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 大量一次性塑料制品是固体废物的重要来源，且许多塑料难以回收，导致废物产生量巨大，与该目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个分支，塑料制造业提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业有积极贡献，但需要关注工作环境的安全性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 塑料废物是海洋垃圾的主要组成部分，对海洋生态系统造成严重破坏，塑料制造业是这一问题的主要源头之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 塑料制造业严重依赖化石燃料作为原料和能源，是温室气体排放的重要来源，因此其发展模式与将气候变化措施纳入政策的努力相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 佛教组织常进行慈善布施和社区援助活动，有助于减轻社区内多维度的贫困。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions)

rationale: 佛教的冥想、正念修行和社区支持体系为信众提供重要的心理健康和福祉支持。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being)

rationale: 佛教教育传播关于和平、慈悲、因果（与可持续性相关）的价值观，并促进对文化遗产（佛教文化）的欣赏，有助于培养全球公民意识。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development)

rationale: 佛教教义倡导众生平等和慈悲，其社区活动通常面向所有信众，有助于促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status)

rationale: 佛教寺庙、典籍、艺术品是重要的文化遗产，佛教组织在保护和传承这些文化遗产方面扮演关键角色。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 佛教的核心教义之一是非暴力与和平，通过传播这些理念，有助于从根源上减少暴力和冲突。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere)

rationale: 在某些佛教传统和宗派中，女性在宗教领导层（如高级僧职）的参与机会可能受到限制或存在不平等，这与促进性别平等的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 部分宗教组织可能在财务管理和决策过程方面缺乏足够的透明度和问责制，存在潜在的治理风险。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 作为服装供应链中的关键流通环节，该行业通过批发贸易活动促进商品和服务的流动，直接支持经济和生产力增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 批发业可以通过引入更高效的物流技术（如库存管理系统）和推动产品多样化来提升经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业对其上游制造供应链的劳工条件（如服装工厂的工作环境、工资）有间接影响。如果缺乏严格的供应商行为准则，其采购行为可能助长血汗工厂等侵犯劳工权利的现象。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 如果该批发商优先采购采用可持续原材料（如有机棉、再生纤维）的服装，可以推动上游生产环节对自然资源的更可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 服装批发业，特别是服务于快时尚模式时，通过推动大量、快速更新的服装流通，间接鼓励过度消费和一次性服装文化，导致纺织品废物大量增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业依赖于并支持物流、仓储和运输等贸易基础设施的发展和完善。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 服装行业是女性就业的重要领域。作为供应链中的一环，该批发行业若能确保性别平等、提供女性领导机会，可对此目标做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 电炉炼钢是利用废钢的循环利用技术，相比传统高炉是更资源高效和环境友好的工业过程，符合产业升级和可持续改造的方向。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业的核心是回收废钢进行再冶炼，直接且显著地促进了废物的回收和再利用，大幅减少了固体废物的产生和对原生铁矿的开采需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为基础工业的一部分，电炉工业通过技术升级（如高效电炉）为提高经济生产力做出贡献，但相关性较其环境贡献为次要。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供工业领域的就业岗位，但对实现‘体面工作’的所有方面（如平等、安全）的直接影响需要具体情境分析，相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 电炉炼钢是钢铁行业脱碳战略的关键技术路径之一（相较于高炉），其推广有助于将气候变化措施纳入工业政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果电炉运行所依赖的电网电力主要来自化石燃料，则该行业会成为巨大的碳排放源，对增加可再生能源份额的目标构成间接的负面压力。其影响性质取决于能源结构。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 尽管回收废钢有利于资源效率，但炼钢过程本身消耗大量能源和水资源，并可能产生排放和废渣，若管理不善，会对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 同上述7.2的负面逻辑，如果电力碳强度高，该行业的高能耗特性会阻碍国家气候目标的实现，体现了未能有效整合气候措施的负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 神道系宗教组织是日本众多神社、仪式和传统文化实践的管理者和传承者，其核心活动直接致力于保护和传承世界文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 神社作为社区中心，通过组织节庆和活动，可以促进社区参与和凝聚力，为地方层面的包容性社会结构做出贡献。但其影响力通常限于文化和社区层面，而非广泛的政治决策。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels

rationale: 神道的教义强调与自然和谐相处（如‘森罗万象皆有灵’），并通过仪式和教育活动传播尊重自然、感恩资源的价值观，这有助于培养可持续发展所需的文化和伦理观念。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including among others through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 神道信仰将自然物（如树木、山、岩石）视为神圣（神域），这种文化观念在历史上和现实中有助于保护神社境内的森林和其他生态系统，间接支持生物多样性保护。但这不是其首要经济活动，影响是间接和局部的。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 神道某些传统和特定神社的惯例中，历史上存在限制女性参与特定仪式或担任特定神职角色的情况，这可能与消除性别歧视的目标存在潜在冲突。不过，现代日本社会和相关组织的实践正在演变，因此负面影响的程度需要具体分析，得分相对较低。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 神道组织经常与地方政府、社区团体和其他组织合作举办大型节庆活动和文化遗产保护项目，这体现了民间社会在实现可持续发展目标中的伙伴关系作用。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

rationale: 运输中介业作为现代物流服务业的关键环节，通过优化供应链和提高物流效率，直接促进了贸易和商业活动，有助于实现更高水平的经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业通过协调和优化运输网络，是构建优质、可靠、可持续的物流基础设施不可或缺的一部分，支持了区域和跨境的经济活动。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过整合货运、优化路线和减少空载，运输中介业提高了运输资源的利用效率，有助于更可持续地管理能源（燃料）等自然资源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 现代运输中介业高度依赖信息技术（如物流平台、路线优化算法），其发展间接支持和体现了技术创新的应用。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 该行业促成的运输活动整体上仍是碳排放的重要来源。如果行业实践不优先考虑低碳选择（如偏好公路运输而非更环保的铁路或水路），则与将气候变化措施纳入规划和运营的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 运输活动，特别是依赖化石燃料的公路运输，是空气污染物（如PM2.5、氮氧化物）的主要来源之一。运输中介业在组织运输时若未充分考虑环境影响，可能间接加剧空气污染相关的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 林业服务通过提供森林监测、病虫害防治、防火和可持续管理规划等专业服务，直接支持森林生态系统的保护、恢复和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 该行业的核心是提供促进森林可持续管理的专业技术和服务，包括造林、再造林规划和森林认证，直接贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为专业服务部门，林业服务通过提供高附加值的知识和技术，有助于提高林业部门的生产效率和现代化水平。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 林业服务行业本身创造专业和技术性工作岗位，并支持林业领域的中小企业发展，特别是在农村地区。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 健康的森林能增强对气候变化相关灾害（如洪水、滑坡）的抵御能力。林业服务通过维护森林健康间接贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries

rationale: 林业服务提供的专业咨询和规划，有助于将基于自然的解决方案和森林碳汇管理等气候行动纳入地方或国家的林业政策和战略。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 林业服务通过促进森林资源的可持续管理和高效利用，直接支持自然资源的可持续管理目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 森林是重要的水源涵养地。林业服务通过保护森林生态系统，间接有助于保护与水相关的生态系统，维持水质和水量。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes

rationale: 如果提供的服务（例如，为不可持续的采伐活动提供规划或评估）偏离可持续原则，可能对森林可持续管理产生潜在的消极影响。但这是低概率的次要风险，而非行业主流。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 该行业的核心业务就是提供安全、可靠的饮用水，直接且最有力地推动实现普遍和公平地获得安全饮用水。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all

rationale: 自来水公司通过减少管网漏损、推广节水技术和优化水资源调配，直接致力于提高用水效率和保障可持续的淡水供应。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 提供经过处理的清洁饮用水是预防霍乱、伤寒等水媒疾病的最有效手段之一，对消除水媒疾病的传播做出直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 水处理过程去除了水源中的有害化学物质和污染物（如重金属、病原体），减少了因饮用水污染导致的疾病和死亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 自来水供应是城市和社区最基本、最关键的服务之一，确保居民获得安全可靠的基本服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services

rationale: 供水管网和处理厂是支撑社会运行和经济发展的关键基础设施，其建设、升级和维护直接贡献于发展优质、可靠的基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 水处理过程中使用的化学品（如氯、絮凝剂）及其残留物，以及处理产生的污泥，如果管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响，与无害环境管理化学品和废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 水处理过程本身会产生固体废物（如污泥），其处理和处置可能增加废物产生量，尽管行业也在努力寻求污泥的资源化利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁制品是建设高质量、可靠、有韧性的基础设施（如建筑、桥梁、铁路）不可或缺的核心材料，直接支持该目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为基础制造业，钢铁制品制造通过技术升级和创新提升经济生产力，是国民经济的重要支柱产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了大量的制造业就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献，但需要关注工作环境是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业本身可以通过采用更清洁、资源效率更高的技术（如电弧炉、碳捕获）进行升级改造，从而对目标做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 钢铁制造是资源密集型产业，消耗大量铁矿石、煤炭和水资源，对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用化学品，并产生废渣、粉尘、废水等，若管理不当，会对环境造成污染，与该目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 虽然废钢回收是行业的一部分，但初级生产过程中仍会产生大量固体废物和副产品，增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁行业是全球主要的二氧化碳排放源之一，其高碳排放对应对气候变化的努力构成显著负面影响，是各国气候政策需要重点规制的对象。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 钢铁制造过程排放的空气污染物（如PM2.5、二氧化硫）可能对周边社区居民的健康造成负面影响，增加呼吸系统疾病风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业通过提供信贷服务，增加了个人和微小企业获得金融服务的机会，特别是那些可能被传统银行排斥在外的群体，符合‘获得金融服务’的方面。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 如果该行业的贷款实践涉及掠夺性条款（如过高利率和费用），可能导致借款人债务缠身，资产被剥夺，从而加剧或导致极端贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day.

rationale: 通过为中小企业提供贷款，该行业支持了企业的生产性活动和增长，有助于创造就业和促进经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 作为传统金融体系的补充，该行业扩大了金融服务的覆盖面，加强了整体金融生态的多样性。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 该行业的核心业务之一是向小型企业提供信贷，直接对应‘增加小型企业获得金融服务的机会’这一子目标。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 该行业如果缺乏有效监管，其潜在的掠夺性贷款行为会加剧社会经济不平等。此子目标强调加强金融监管的必要性，正是为了防范此类行业可能带来的负面社会影响。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations.

rationale: 水面木材仓库是物流基础设施的一种特殊形式，通过提供储存空间支持木材供应链的运作，从而间接支持经济发展。但其专业性和相对小众的特点限制了其广泛相关性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业为仓库管理、水上作业等岗位提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业有微小贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 专业的木材仓储有助于减少木材在储存环节的腐烂和浪费，促进木材资源的更有效利用，间接支持自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业本身不直接管理森林，但作为木材供应链的一环，其存在依赖于木材生产。如果储存的木材来自可持续管理的森林，则间接支持该目标。相关性较弱且间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 水上木材仓库存在污染水体的风险，例如木材防腐化学品的渗漏或木材分解产物进入水体，可能对改善水质的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 如果仓库位于沿海或河口地区，其潜在的污染风险（化学物质、碎屑）可能构成海洋污染源，与减少海洋污染的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 电信网络是现代社会质量和可靠性的核心基础设施，支持经济发展和人类福祉，并致力于普惠接入。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 国内和国际电信服务直接扩大了ICT和互联网的接入范围，特别是在连接偏远和发展中地区方面。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 电信行业是技术升级和创新密集型产业，其发展直接提高经济生产力，并作为基础服务赋能其他行业的多元化与创新。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 电信网络是移动支付、网上银行等普惠金融服务得以实现和扩展的技术基础。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 电信服务（尤其是互联网）为远程教育、在线技能培训提供了关键平台，帮助人们获得就业和创业所需技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 电信服务支持远程医疗、健康信息传播和医疗数据管理，有助于扩大优质医疗服务的可及性。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 普及电信服务可以减少数字鸿沟，促进不同地域、社会经济背景人群的社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 电信网络是传播气候变化信息、进行预警和提升公众意识的重要渠道。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

rationale: 电信行业涉及大量网络设备和用户终端的生产、更新和淘汰，可能产生显著的电子废物，对废物减量目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 数据中心和通信网络是能源消耗大户，如果其能效提升速度跟不上需求增长，则可能对全球能效改善目标产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为食品零售渠道，该行业提供了食物获取途径。但其作为'其他'或'专门'零售的性质，可能主要服务于特定消费群体，而非最脆弱的群体，因此对解决普遍饥饿的直接贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 如果该行业专注于销售健康、营养、有机或特定膳食需求的食品，可以通过促进健康饮食来帮助预防非传染性疾病。但其影响取决于具体销售的产品组合，相关性是潜在的而非绝对的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 如果该行业包含酒类专卖店或大量销售含酒精饮料，则可能通过增加酒精的可及性而对'有害使用酒精'产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol.

rationale: 许多'其他食品饮料零售'店属于中小微企业或个体经营，该行业的存在本身就在创造就业和支持本地 entrepreneurship。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 该行业提供零售就业岗位。但'体面工作'方面（如工资、工作条件）取决于具体企业的实践，存在不确定性，因此给予中等评分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 如果该行业优先采购来自可持续农业或渔业的产品，则贡献于自然资源的可持续管理。但这依赖于其采购政策，并非行业固有特性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 零售端是减少粮食浪费的关键环节。有效的库存管理、临近保质期食品的处理方式（如捐赠、折扣）可以直接贡献于此目标。小型专卖店可能在管理上更灵活。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 零售业通常会产生包装废弃物。如果该行业大量使用一次性塑料或不必要的包装，则对减少废物产生有负面影响。积极影响（如推广散装销售）也是可能的，但负面影响是常见风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 专卖店（如有机食品店、本地农产品店）通常更有可能向消费者提供关于产品来源、可持续性认证或健康益处的信息，从而促进可持续消费意识。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature.

rationale: 如果该行业积极采购来自边缘化群体（如小农、少数民族社区）的产品，可以帮助促进经济包容。但这是一种特定商业模式的选择，并非行业普遍特征。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 乐器零售通过提供音乐教育的工具，间接支持文化素养和艺术教育的发展，这是可持续发展教育中'欣赏文化多样性及文化对可持续发展的贡献'的一部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development)

rationale: 乐器零售业通常由中小型企业构成，它创造了零售业的就业机会，并支持了与文化、创意和创新相关的经济活动。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services)

rationale: 乐器零售作为文化产业的一部分，可以促进本地文化产品的销售，并可能间接支持与文化相关的可持续旅游业（如音乐节、文化体验）。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 零售网络是社会和经济基础设施的一部分。乐器零售店提供了获取文化资源的渠道，间接支持了社会文化基础设施的发展。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 通过销售乐器，该行业有助于传播音乐文化，间接支持和保护非物质文化遗产（如传统音乐技艺）。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 许多乐器（如木制乐器）的制造和最终销售可能涉及不可持续来源的自然资源（如特定木材），从而对自然资源的可持续管理构成潜在压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 该行业本身促进消费。如果销售的乐器寿命短、不可维修或包装过度，可能会增加废物产生。但若能推广耐用、可维修产品或二手乐器，则可转化为积极影响。此条目评估其潜在的普遍负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业为本地经济提供就业机会（如销售员、物流人员），并支持中小微企业（尤其是如果销售本地或手工制品）的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 陶瓷、瓷器和玻璃器皿在运输和零售过程中易碎，可能导致较高的破损率和废物产生。此外，这些产品的初始制造通常是资源密集型的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 零售商有机会通过推广耐用、可重复使用的产品（如陶瓷餐具替代一次性餐具）来教育消费者关于可持续生活方式的选择，但实际影响取决于具体的营销和沟通策略。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 该行业所售商品的供应链（原材料提取、制造）可能涉及不可持续的资源管理，例如高能耗的窑炉和矿产开采，除非特别关注可持续采购。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 社会保险事业团体是实施国家社会保护体系（包括养老金、健康保险、失业保险等）的核心机构，其直接目标就是为所有人口（特别是贫困和脆弱群体）提供覆盖，防止和减少贫困。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 健康保险是社会保険事業団体的核心业务之一，通过提供财务风险保护，确保人们能够获得高质量的基本医疗服务，是实现全民健康覆盖（UHC）的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 通过提供失业保险和工伤保险，社会保险事业团体为劳动者提供了安全网，有助于稳定就业环境，支持人们寻找和保持体面工作，并在失业或工伤时提供基本生活保障。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 社会保险是一种重要的社会保护政策，通过收入再分配（如从在职人员向退休人员、从健康者向患病者的转移支付），有助于减少经济不平等，促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 该行业是建设和运营有线通信网络的核心，直接提供可靠、可持续的信息基础设施，支持经济发展和社会福祉，并致力于实现全民公平接入。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 有线广播电话网络是提供互联网接入和ICT服务的重要方式之一，特别是在光纤到户（FTTH）等现代应用中，有助于普及和负担得起的接入。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 该行业提供的信息传播渠道（如有线电视、广播）可以用于远程教育和技能培训节目的分发，间接支持教育的普及。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: 通过提供通信服务，该行业有助于连接偏远或服务不足地区的人们，减少信息获取方面的不平等，促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 网络设备的制造、运营能耗以及生命周期结束时产生的电子废物，对该目标有轻微的负面影响，但并非该行业的核心活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 养蚕业为农村地区，特别是小规模农户提供重要的现金收入来源，有助于减少贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 养蚕业是典型的由小农和家庭农场从事的农业生产活动，能够提高其农业收入，并为农村妇女提供重要的创收机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 养蚕业及其相关的丝绸加工业支持了农村地区的生产性活动和中小企业发展，创造了就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 传统养蚕和蚕茧加工过程可能涉及水资源和能源的低效使用（如煮茧），以及对化学品（消毒剂、防腐剂）的依赖，可能对自然资源管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 桑树种植有助于保持水土，维护农业生态系统。但相关性相对间接，且若为扩大桑园而毁林则会产生负面影响。此处主要考虑其潜在的积极生态功能。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 该行业大量批发含糖软饮料，其过度消费是导致肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险因素，与减少过早死亡的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为分销供应链的关键环节，该行业通过物流效率和规模经济贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 批发业提供了仓储、物流、销售等就业岗位，对实现充分就业和体面工作有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 软饮料批发严重依赖一次性塑料瓶和包装，是塑料废弃物的主要来源之一，直接与大幅减少废物产生的目标冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业供应链消耗水资源（用于饮料生产）和能源（用于仓储和运输），若管理不善则不利于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 汽车车身制造是工业化和制造业的核心组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，符合可持续工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过采用更高效的制造技术（如自动化、轻量化材料）可以提升资源效率，但其传统工艺也可能存在高能耗和污染问题，积极贡献取决于具体技术应用水平。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为制造业，该行业提供了大量的就业机会。但其工作环境（如涂装车间）可能存在健康和安全风险，影响‘体面工作’的完全实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 汽车车身制造消耗大量钢材、铝材等金属资源以及能源和水资源，若管理不善，会导致资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中的涂装环节会使用并可能排放挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等有害化学品，焊接和冲压也会产生废料和排放，对环境造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的车身主要用于传统燃油车，这些车辆是温室气体排放的主要来源之一，因此该活动间接对气候变化产生显著的负面影响。其积极贡献取决于其产品是否用于节能或新能源汽车。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 水泥是建设高质量、可靠、有韧性的基础设施（如道路、桥梁、建筑）最基础的原材料之一，该行业直接为基础设施发展提供物质支持。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为重要的制造业部门，水泥行业通过其生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升，并提供大量就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统水泥生产过程是能源密集型和碳密集型产业，是主要的温室气体排放源，对减缓气候变化构成重大挑战，其存在和发展与国家气候行动目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 水泥制造需要大量开采石灰石、粘土等自然资源，是不可持续的资源消耗型产业，对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 水泥生产过程中会向大气排放大量粉尘、二氧化硫、氮氧化物等污染物，以及温室气体（CO2），对环境 sound management 和减少排放的目标产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 传统的水泥制造工艺资源效率低、污染排放高。如果该行业不进行技术升级和绿色转型，其现状与'使产业可持续、提高资源效率、采用清洁技术'的目标背道而驰。该目标也凸显了该行业进行可持续改造的紧迫性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该零售行业通常由中小微企业构成，支持地方经济和创业活动，创造了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises)

rationale: 该行业提供就业岗位，但通常以兼职或低薪零售工作为主，对实现'体面工作'的贡献相对有限。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业销售的非必需、可能快速过时的小商品，鼓励了冲动消费和资源消耗型的生活方式，与可持续消费模式的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 所售商品的生产通常涉及自然资源（如水、矿物、木材）的消耗，如果商品寿命短或不可回收，则导致资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 该行业销售的大量低质量、一次性或短寿命的杂货小商品，是城市固体废物的重要来源，显著增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 零售业是女性就业比例较高的行业之一，为女性提供了经济参与的机会，但在高层决策职位上的性别平等可能仍然不足。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 金属加工机械是制造业的核心装备，其制造和供应直接支撑着工业化的进程，提高工业在就业和GDP中的份额。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 先进的、高精度的金属加工机械是实现产业升级和可持续改造的关键技术基础，有助于提高资源利用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过提供现代化的生产设备，该行业有助于制造业实现技术升级和创新，从而提高整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 高效的金属加工机械可以减少原材料浪费，优化生产流程，从而促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 金属加工机械制造过程本身需要消耗能源和原材料，并可能产生工业废料和废水，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业致力于开发和生产节能型机械或用于制造可再生能源设备（如风力涡轮机部件）的机械，则可间接支持气候变化应对措施。但关联性相对间接。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 幼儿园是提供早期儿童发展、保育和学前教育服务的核心机构，直接为实现该目标做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education

rationale: 幼儿园通过提供安全的监护环境和促进儿童健康习惯，间接支持儿童福祉，但与直接降低5岁以下儿童死亡率关联较弱。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age

rationale: 幼儿园作为公共服务，通过分担家庭育儿责任，特别是解放女性从事有酬工作，有助于认可和分担无偿照料工作。
sdg_target_description: Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work through the provision of public services, infrastructure and social protection policies and the promotion of shared responsibility within the household and the family as nationally appropriate

rationale: 幼儿园行业本身提供教育工作者等就业岗位，并因其服务使家长（尤其是母亲）能更充分地参与劳动力市场。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 普及、普惠的幼儿园教育有助于减少儿童早期因家庭背景不同而产生的机会不平等，促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 如果幼儿园存在入学门槛高、费用昂贵、教育资源分配不均或教育质量低下等问题，则会阻碍所有儿童获得优质早期教育的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education

rationale: 如果幼儿园行业存在幼师薪酬过低、工作条件差、缺乏职业发展机会等问题，则对该目标产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业的核心使命就是通过提供支持和服务，直接促进残疾人的社会、经济包容和赋权，与10.2子目标高度一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 残疾人福利事业通常包含职业培训和就业支持服务，旨在帮助残疾人获得体面工作和实现充分就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业提供的康复服务、辅助器具支持和日常照料，是残疾人获得基本医疗保健和福祉服务的重要组成部分，有助于实现全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 残疾人福利事业通过提供特殊教育、技能培训和终身学习机会，确保残疾人能够获得包容和公平的优质教育。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations

rationale: 作为社会保护体系的一部分，该行业为残疾人这一脆弱群体提供基本生活保障和支持，有助于防止和减少贫困。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 普通铁路业是构建可持续、有韧性的区域和跨境交通基础设施的核心，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉，并提供相对公平的交通服务。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 铁路作为大众运输系统，提供了安全、负担得起和可持续的交通选择，特别有助于改善城市和区域连通性，并关注弱势群体的需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 铁路运营、维护和管理需要大量劳动力，为不同技能水平的男性和女性提供了体面工作和就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 高效的铁路系统通过改善物流和连通性，支持经济生产力和多样化，并可能推动相关技术创新。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 与公路和航空运输相比，铁路是单位运输量碳排放较低的交通方式，推广铁路运输是国家将气候行动纳入交通政策的重要措施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 铁路运输的事故率通常远低于公路运输，发展铁路客运和货运有助于将交通流量从更危险的道路上转移，从而间接减少道路交通伤亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 电气化铁路产生的局部空气污染物（如颗粒物、氮氧化物）远少于内燃机驱动的公路车辆，有助于改善沿线空气质量，减少相关疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 铁路线路的建设和扩建可能导致土地用途改变、栖息地碎片化，并对沿线生态系统及其服务功能造成干扰和破坏。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 铁路运营（如列车运行、维护活动）可能对野生动物造成直接伤害（碰撞），并因屏障效应和噪音污染而间接导致自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 该行业生产的金属结构件（如管道、建筑部件）是交通、建筑、能源等各类基础设施的关键组成部分，直接支持优质、可靠的基础设施建设。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过提供用于升级改造的金属部件，间接支持产业向可持续方向转型。但其自身生产过程是否采用清洁技术，决定了贡献的直接程度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 金属板金加工过程中可能使用切削液、润滑油等化学品，并产生金属废屑和废料，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中会产生金属边角料等固体废物，若未有效实施减量化、回收和再利用，将增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 金属冲压、切割、焊接等工序通常是能源密集型活动，如果设备能效低下，会阻碍整体能效提升目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 该行业涉及重型机械操作，存在工伤风险（如切割、砸伤），若工作场所安全措施不到位，会对工人安全构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 船舶租赁业通过为海运、物流和旅游等关键经济部门提供必要的资产支持，促进了经济活动的多样化和生产效率的提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 船舶是交通和贸易基础设施的核心部分。租赁模式有助于更灵活地发展和维护海运这一重要的基础设施网络。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 租赁的船舶在运营过程中可能产生油污、垃圾、废水等，是海洋污染的潜在来源，对减少海洋污染的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds...)

rationale: 如果租赁的船舶被用于非法的、未报告的和不受管制（IUU）的捕捞或过度捕捞活动，则该行业间接助长了不可持续的渔业实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing...)

rationale: 该行业有可能通过出租船舶来支持海洋科学研究、环境监测和勘探活动，从而为增加海洋科学知识做出贡献，但这并非其主要业务。
sdg_target_description: (Increase scientific knowledge, develop research capacity and transfer marine technology...)

rationale: 航运业是重要的温室气体排放源。船舶租赁业作为供应链的一环，通过提供资产支持了高碳排放的航运活动，与将气候变化措施纳入主流的努力相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 福祉事务所是日本实施国家社会保障制度（特别是生活保护）的核心基层机构，直接为贫困和弱势群体提供经济支持和福利服务，是实现该目标的关键执行单位。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 通过提供生活保护、儿童津贴等福利，福祉事务所直接致力于减少其所服务区域内人口的贫困程度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions

rationale: 福祉事务所处理的护理保险等事务，是全民健康覆盖（UHC）中非医疗护理服务的重要组成部分，为老年人等群体提供必要的福祉支持，间接支持健康目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 福祉事务所通过向残疾人、老年人、低收入家庭等弱势群体提供支持，旨在促进他们的社会和经济包容，减少因年龄、残疾或经济状况导致的不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 作为公共服务窗口，福祉事务所理论上应为所有符合条件的公民提供平等的机会和福利服务，实践上致力于减少结果不平等。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard

rationale: 福祉事务所作为基层政府机构，其规范运作是建设有效、负责的公共机构的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 潜在的负面影响：如果福祉事务所存在行政效率低下、资源不足、服务不公或官僚主义等问题，则会损害机构的有效性和公信力，对该子目标产生轻微的负面影响。这种影响是潜在的，取决于具体机构的实际运作情况。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 零售业是中小型企业的重要领域，提供就业机会并支持本地经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services)

rationale: 作为雇主，该行业通过提供销售、物流等岗位，为实现充分和生产性就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 如果零售商优先销售由可持续管理森林的木材或回收材料制成的家具，则对可持续资源管理有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果销售的家具来自不可持续的木材来源（如非法采伐），则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果推广耐用、可修复或可回收的家具，或参与以旧换新/回收计划，有助于减少废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果主要销售廉价、短寿命的家具，会鼓励一次性消费文化，导致废物产生量增加，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 零售网络是支持经济和社区生活的基础设施的一部分，但其直接影响有限。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 电线电缆是构建电网、实现可再生能源（如太阳能、风能）并网和远距离输送电力的关键基础设施，直接支持提高可再生能源在全球能源结构中的份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 高效的电线电缆可以减少电力在传输和分配过程中的能量损耗，从而有助于整体能源效率的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 电线电缆是能源、通信和交通等所有类型基础设施的基本组成部分，对建设高质量、可靠和有韧性的基础设施至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being

rationale: 该行业通过研发和提供更先进、更环保的电缆技术（如高压直流输电电缆、超导电缆），支持基础设施和产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies

rationale: 电线电缆制造业本身需要进行持续的研发和创新，以提升产品性能和可持续性，这符合加强工业技术能力的目标。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors... encouraging innovation

rationale: 电线电缆是电气化公共交通系统（如电车、地铁）和智能交通管理系统运行所必需的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all... with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations

rationale: 电缆制造过程可能涉及使用有害物质（如PVC中的塑化剂、铅稳定剂）并产生工业废水和废气，若管理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil

rationale: 废弃的电线电缆是电子废物的重要来源，其回收处理复杂，如果未得到妥善管理，会增加废物产生量并造成资源浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为可再生能源和智能电网发展的关键支撑行业，电线电缆制造间接支持将气候变化应对措施纳入国家能源和基础设施政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 钢材是建设高质量、可靠、有韧性的基础设施（如建筑、桥梁、铁路）不可或缺的核心原材料，对经济发展至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 钢铁制造业是资本和劳动密集型产业，能够提供大量的直接和间接就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 钢材是高度可回收的材料，废钢回收再利用是钢铁生产的重要组成部分，有助于减少废物产生和资源消耗。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统的钢铁制造过程消耗巨量的铁矿石、煤炭、水和能源，对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 钢铁行业是全球最主要的工业二氧化碳排放源之一，其基于化石燃料（特别是煤）的冶炼过程对气候变化有显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 钢铁制造过程会排放大量空气污染物（如硫氧化物、氮氧化物、颗粒物），可能对周边社区的健康造成负面影响，增加呼吸道疾病风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 钢铁制造业存在高温、高压、重型机械等危险因素，历史上职业安全事故风险较高，需要持续关注劳工权利和工作场所安全。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 医学实验室和检查中心提供疾病诊断和监测服务，是早期发现、预警和管理健康风险（包括传染病和非传染病）能力的关键组成部分，直接强化国家卫生系统。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 康复设施、专科诊所（如心脏病、糖尿病管理）和精神健康设施通过提供治疗、管理和促进康复的服务，直接贡献于降低非传染性疾病死亡率和促进精神健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为医疗体系的重要组成部分，'其他医疗业'通过提供多样化的专业医疗服务，有助于扩大高质量基本医疗服务的可及性，是实现全民健康覆盖的一环。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 该行业是医疗保健领域的重要雇主，为医生、技师、护士、护工等提供就业机会，贡献于实现充分的生产性就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 医疗活动，特别是实验室检测和使用一次性医疗设备，会产生有害化学废物、塑料废物和生物医疗废物。尽管有管理规范，但其运营本质上是这些废物的产生源，对环境声音管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 出于卫生和安全考虑，医疗行业大量使用一次性物品（如手套、试管、包装），这直接与通过预防、减量、回收和再利用来大幅减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济生产力，但其产品（小件非必需品）的附加值和创新驱动潜力通常有限。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但对实现'充分、生产性和体面工作'的贡献程度不确定，且在小规模生产中可能存在工作条件不佳的风险，削弱了积极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 在劳动密集型的小商品制造业中，存在工作环境不安全、劳动权利保障不足（尤其是非正规就业）的潜在风险，对该子目标构成消极影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 生产非必需的小商品可能导致自然资源的低效使用和不可持续消耗，特别是如果产品寿命短或材料不可持续。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能使用有害化学品（如染料、粘合剂），且废弃物管理不当可能对环境造成污染，与无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的核心产品（易过时、寿命短的日常小商品）是产生废物的潜在重要来源，与通过预防和减少废物产生的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它贡献于工业就业和产出，但其对'可持续工业化'的推动作用因其产品性质和生产模式而可能较弱。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs)

rationale: 非高炉炼铁本身就是对传统高炉工业的一种可持续性升级和技术改造，旨在提高资源利用效率并采用更清洁的生产工艺。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为一种低碳或低排放的炼铁技术，其推广和应用是国家或行业层面将气候变化减缓措施（如脱碳）纳入工业战略和规划的直接体现。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 尽管比高炉法清洁，但非高炉炼铁过程仍可能产生固体废物（如炉渣）和排放物。如果管理不当，会对实现化学品的环境无害化管理和减少排放的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该工艺（尤其是电炉路线）的脱碳潜力很大程度上依赖于使用可再生能源电力，因此其成功推广有助于增加可再生能源在工业能源结构中的份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 作为一种技术升级和创新型的工业活动，非高炉炼铁有助于提高钢铁产业的生产效率和竞争力，从而支持经济的持续增长。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该技术作为更可持续的生产模式，其知识传播和技术转让可以支持发展中国家提升向可持续工业转型的科技能力。
sdg_target_description: Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production

rationale: 作为新鲜蔬果的主要零售渠道，该行业直接确保消费者能够获取安全、营养的食物，是实现粮食安全的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 通过提供富含维生素和纤维的新鲜蔬果，该行业有助于促进健康饮食，预防心脏病、中风、糖尿病等非传染性疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 零售业是主要的就业来源之一，该行业为不同技能水平的劳动者提供了就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业通过有效的库存管理、促销临近过期食品等方式，可以直接减少零售环节的食物浪费。然而，如果管理不善，也可能成为食物浪费的来源。因此影响是双向的，但积极管理的潜力巨大。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 该行业通常使用大量塑料薄膜、泡沫托盘等一次性包装来保鲜和展示蔬果，如果不采取减量、可回收或可重复使用的措施，会产生大量塑料废弃物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该零售渠道优先采购本地或小规模生产者的蔬果，并支付公平价格，则有助于提高小农的收入。但这种积极影响取决于其具体的采购政策。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 作为基础制造业，该行业直接贡献于工业产值和就业，是可持续工业化的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry's share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造高价值部件支持经济生产力，并可通过技术升级和创新提高效率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统的铸锻造过程是能源和原材料（如铁矿石、焦炭）密集型产业，对自然资源的可持续管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程可能产生废气（如二氧化硫、颗粒物）、废水和固体废物（如炉渣），如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业会产生工业废料，尽管部分废料（如废钢、炉渣）可以回收利用，但总体上仍是废物产生源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为高能耗和高碳排放行业，其运营是气候变化的主要贡献者之一，突显了将减排措施纳入国家政策和行业规划的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业本身可以通过采用更清洁、资源效率更高的技术（如电炉、废钢回收、节能工艺）进行升级和改造，从而间接贡献于可持续产业目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 电力行业的根本使命就是提供可靠和现代化的电力服务，这是实现能源可及性的核心。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services.

rationale: 电力行业通过投资和发展可再生能源发电（如太阳能、风能、水能），直接增加清洁能源在总发电量中的比例。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix.

rationale: 电网（输配电系统）是国家关键基础设施的核心组成部分，其质量和可靠性直接支持经济发展和社会福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 电力行业向低碳化转型（如发展可再生能源、淘汰煤电）是各国实现气候战略和减排目标最核心的领域之一。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 如果电力结构以化石燃料（特别是煤炭）为主，该行业将成为最大的温室气体排放源之一，严重阻碍气候行动。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 燃煤电厂等化石燃料发电是空气污染物（如可吸入颗粒物PM2.5）的主要排放源，对公共健康构成严重威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 通过批发农业机械，该行业直接为农业生产者（包括小规模生产者）提供提高生产力所需的工具，有助于实现农业生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 如果该行业推广精准农业或节能型农业设备，可以促进可持续农业实践。但作为批发商，其直接影响有限，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems... that help maintain ecosystems...

rationale: 该行业通过提供先进的农业和建筑机械，支持这些基础产业的技术升级和提高生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 作为批发贸易企业，其运营本身创造了就业机会，并支持了上下游产业链的就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation...

rationale: 建筑机械是建设和维护交通、能源等各类基础设施的核心设备，该行业是基础设施供应链的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...

rationale: 如果该行业积极推广节能、低排放的建筑和农业机械，则对产业升级和采用清洁技术有积极贡献。但若主要销售传统设备，则贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...

rationale: 机械的制造和使用本身消耗资源和能源，其生命周期末期会产生废物。作为分销商，该行业间接推动了这些资源消耗和潜在废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果其销售的主力产品是燃油动力的高排放机械，则该行业的活动与应对气候变化的努力相悖，增加了温室气体排放。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业通过建造和翻新住宅及公共建筑的内部和外部（如铺设地砖、墙砖、石质结构），直接贡献于提供充足、安全的住房和基础设施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 石工和瓷砖工事业经常使用本地石材等材料，其技术和实践可以支持建造可持续和有韧性的建筑，特别是在推广本地材料应用的背景下。
sdg_target_description: Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials

rationale: 该行业通常由中小型企业构成，是建筑业劳动力市场的重要组成部分，直接创造就业机会并支持地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 该行业提供了技能型工作岗位（石工、瓷砖工），对实现充分就业有贡献，但其工作环境和工作保障水平会影响其对'体面工作'的实际贡献度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业参与基础设施和建筑的升级改造，如果采用可持续的建筑方法和材料（如节能瓷砖、本地石材），可以促进资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 石材的开采是该行业的上游活动，可能导致不可再生资源的过度消耗、景观破坏和生物多样性丧失，如果管理不善则违背自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 在切割、铺设石材和瓷砖的过程中会产生大量废料（如边角料、废弃砂浆），如果这些废料没有得到有效的回收或再利用，会增加固体废物量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 施工现场的石材切割和加工可能产生有害的硅尘（矽尘），对工人和周边居民的健康构成风险，并造成空气污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 建筑业普遍存在工作安全风险（如工伤）和非正规就业问题，石工和瓷砖工事业也可能面临工作条件不安全、劳工权利保护不足的挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为批发行业，它连接生产与零售，支持中小企业（SMEs）进入市场，促进商业活动和就业，是供应链中创造体面工作的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业本身提供批发贸易相关的就业岗位，但其对'体面工作'的贡献程度高度依赖于具体的劳工标准和薪酬公平性，存在不确定性，故给予中等分数。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业通过其采购和销售决策，可以推广更可持续的产品（如使用环保材料的产品），从而间接支持可持续消费和生产模式（SCP）框架的实施。但行业本身不直接制定政策，影响力有限。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 如果该行业批发的是快时尚或一次性饰品，会鼓励过度消费和资源密集型生产模式，导致自然资源（如水、原材料）的低效使用和不可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 服饰配件和个人用品通常生命周期短，易被丢弃。该行业的商业模式若鼓励快速更新换代，会直接导致固体废物（尤其是纺织品和塑料废物）的大量产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的公司可以通过选择负责任的供应商、采用可持续采购政策并将相关信息纳入报告，来贡献于此目标。但这取决于企业的自愿行动，非行业固有特性。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 该行业可以通过产品标签、营销等方式向消费者传递可持续性信息（如产品的环保属性），但此类实践并非行业核心活动，影响力较小。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 机械设计技术是升级和改造产业基础设施、提高资源效率、采用清洁环保技术的核心环节。优化的设计直接决定最终产品或系统的可持续性表现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 提供机械设计技术服务，特别是在发展中国家，有助于培养本地技术能力、促进产业多元化和附加值创造，符合支持国内技术发展的目标。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 该行业属于高附加值的技术服务业，通过提供先进的设计方案帮助客户产业实现技术升级和创新，从而提升整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为知识密集型行业，它通常提供技能要求高、薪酬相对较好的工作岗位，有助于实现充分的生产性就业和体面工作。
