sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 机械设计阶段对材料选择、能效优化和产品寿命的决策，直接影响最终产品的资源使用效率，是实现自然资源可持续管理的关键一环。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过设计易于维修、可回收、可重复使用或可升级的机械，可以从源头上预防和减少废物产生，支持循环经济原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果设计实践倾向于计划性报废、使用难以回收的材料或导致机械能效低下，则会间接导致资源浪费和废物增加，对该目标产生潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业作为制造业的一个细分领域，通过生产和供应商业设备，支持零售和服务业的运营效率与现代化，从而贡献于整体经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业本身创造制造业就业，其产品（店铺装备）尤其支持了大量中小微零售和服务企业的创立与运营，间接促进了创业和就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 如果该行业致力于生产节能（如LED照明系统）、耐用或模块化设计的店铺装备，则其产品有助于商业基础设施的可持续升级和资源效率提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业的生产过程通常消耗木材、金属、塑料等原生资源，若缺乏可持续采购和资源高效利用实践，会对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 店铺装裝備品通常因商业空间翻新或倒闭而产生大量固体废物。行业若以一次性、不可回收材料为主进行生产，则与减少废物产生的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业积极采用可回收材料、设计易于拆解和回收的产品、或推行产品租赁/翻新商业模式，则能对减少废物产生做出积极贡献。此正面影响取决于行业的最佳实践，目前普遍相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 宝石细工业作为制造业的一个分支，提供了手工艺人、设计师、销售人员等就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业中存在大量中小型企业、工作室和个体工匠，支持创业和创新。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises)

rationale: 宝石和贵金属开采通常消耗大量自然资源，且可能不可持续。作为下游加工业，其供应链对此负有间接责任。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 加工过程中可能产生废料（如切割产生的粉尘、废金属），但通常材料价值高，回收利用率也较高，负面影响相对可控。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 珠宝作为奢侈品，其消费模式可能与倡导的可持续、简约生活方式存在张力，可能鼓励过度消费。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature)

rationale: 珠宝设计和销售领域有较多女性从业者和企业家，有助于女性经济参与和领导力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 全球宝石供应链（尤其是某些地区的采矿环节）历史上存在严重的童工和强迫劳动风险，加工业需要对此保持警惕并承担供应链责任。
sdg_target_description: (Take immediate and effective measures to eradicate forced labour, end modern slavery and human trafficking and secure the prohibition and elimination of the worst forms of child labour...)

rationale: 上游采矿活动可能造成水污染，加工业本身（如电镀、清洗）也可能使用化学品，存在潜在的水污染风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 宝石开采可能导致栖息地破坏和生物多样性丧失，加工业间接与此影响相关。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 作为零售业，特别是可能包含中小企业的本地五金店，该行业直接支持本地经济活动、创造就业，并为个人和小企业主（如工匠、维修工）提供必要的生产资料，促进创业和微型企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业销售的建筑材料、工具和设备是建设、维护和修复基础设施（如房屋、道路、公共设施）所必需的，间接支持了可持续和有韧性的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为本地零售点，五金店连接了供应链与终端用户，支持城乡地区的经济联系，为社区提供基本物资，增强了地方经济韧性。
sdg_target_description: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning

rationale: 五金店销售的产品（如应急工具、维修材料、防灾设备）在帮助社区做好防灾准备和灾后重建方面发挥作用，有助于提升社区的抗灾能力。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels

rationale: 如果该行业有意识地向消费者推广和销售耐用、可维修、节能或环保的产品（如高质量工具、节能电器配件），则有助于引导可持续消费模式。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 如果该行业销售含有有害化学品的产品（如某些溶剂、油漆、杀虫剂）而未提供充分的使用和处置指导，可能对环境管理和人类健康构成风险，与无害化环境管理化学品和废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果该行业主要销售一次性、低质量或过度包装的产品，会助长资源浪费。其自身的运营（如包装材料的使用）也可能产生大量废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 广告代理业本身是创意产业，创造就业岗位，并为广大企业（尤其是中小企业）提供至关重要的市场营销服务，支持其业务增长和创新。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 广告业通过营销和品牌建设，支持新产品、服务和商业模式的推广，间接促进了商业创新和产业价值提升。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 广告业的核心商业模式通常是鼓励消费和创造需求，这可能直接与可持续消费和生产模式的目标相悖，因为它可能推动过度消费和资源密集型产品的消费。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 传统广告常常宣扬物质主义和即时满足，可能削弱公众对可持续发展生活方式的认识和采纳。但反之，若用于公益宣传，则可产生积极影响（此处评估其主流商业实践的潜在负面影响）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 广告内容历史上经常包含性别刻板印象，可能无形中阻碍性别平等和女性在经济社会中的有效参与。尽管行业在改进，但此风险依然存在。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 该行业提供大量白领和创意工作岗位，为男性和女性提供就业机会。但其内部是否存在同工同酬和体面工作条件，取决于具体公司实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 广告，特别是政治广告或某些商业广告，可能被用于操纵公众舆论或传播片面信息，从而可能损害公共机构的有效性和公信力。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 该行业制造用于科学研究、医疗诊断和可持续建筑（如隔热玻璃）的精密玻璃器具，这些是升级可持续基础设施和采用清洁技术的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 玻璃是100%可无限循环利用的材料。该行业通过大量使用回收的碎玻璃作为原料，直接促进了废物的减少和循环利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升，特别是在生产高附加值特种玻璃时。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 玻璃制造过程（如熔炼）可能涉及有害物质（如铅、砷在某些特种玻璃中）的使用和排放，以及生产废水的管理，若处理不当会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 玻璃熔炉是能源密集型设备，通常需要持续高温运行，导致该行业的能源消耗强度很高，对提高全球能源效率的速率构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 由于能源密集型生产的特性，该行业是温室气体（特别是二氧化碳）的直接排放源，对气候变化有直接贡献，突显了将减排措施纳入其运营的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 高效照明器具（特别是LED技术）的制造和普及是提高建筑、工业和公共领域能源效率最直接、最有效的措施之一，直接贡献于能效提升目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 高效、智能的照明系统是现代化和可持续化基础设施（如智能建筑、绿色工厂、节能城市）不可或缺的组成部分，其制造行业支撑了这一转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 道路、车站等公共交通区域的可靠照明对于保障夜间交通安全、提升公共交通的可及性和安全性至关重要，是该目标的支持性产业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 在无电网或电网不稳定的地区，用清洁能源驱动的高效LED灯替代污染严重的煤油灯等照明方式，能显著减少室内空气污染及相关呼吸道疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 通过设计和制造长寿命、模块化、易于拆解回收的照明产品，该行业可以为从源头上减少废物做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 某些照明产品（如含汞的荧光灯）在其生命末期如果得不到妥善处理，会导致有害物质泄漏，对环境和健康构成风险。制造过程本身也可能涉及有害化学品的使用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果行业大量生产短寿命、一次性或难以回收的照明产品，且缺乏有效的回收体系，则会显著增加电子废物的数量，与减废目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 畜牧业是农业的重要组成部分，为大量小规模生产者（如牧民、家庭农场）提供收入和生计来源，直接贡献于提高农业生产力和收入的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 如果采用可持续的畜牧实践（如轮牧、有机养殖），该行业可以贡献于建立可持续的粮食生产系统。但传统粗放式养殖与此目标相悖，因此综合相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 畜牧业及相关产业链（如饲料加工、屠宰、销售）创造了大量就业机会，特别是在农村地区，支持了地方经济发展和创业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 集约化畜牧业通常需要大量土地用于种植饲料作物，消耗大量水资源，其资源利用效率低下，对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 畜牧业中抗生素和激素的使用，以及动物粪便处理不当，可能导致化学品和废弃物对土壤、水体的污染，与无害环境管理的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 畜牧业，特别是反刍动物养殖，是温室气体（尤其是甲烷）的重要排放源，是全球气候变化的主要贡献者之一，对国家制定和实施气候行动措施构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 为扩大牧场或饲料作物种植而进行的土地开垦是导致森林砍伐、栖息地丧失和生态系统退化的主要原因之一，威胁陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 与15.1类似，畜牧业驱动的土地利用变化和环境污染是导致自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失的重要因素。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 该行业是基础设施（道路、桥梁、建筑）建设和维护的核心执行者，直接贡献于发展优质、可靠、可持续且有抵御灾害能力的基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 建筑工事业负责住宅建设，直接关系到提供安全、负担得起的住房。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业是劳动密集型产业，为各技能水平的工人提供了大量的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过建设和加固具有抵御灾害能力的基础设施（如防洪堤、抗震建筑），该行业有助于增强应对气候相关灾害的能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries

rationale: 建筑活动消耗大量沙、石、木材和水等自然资源，对资源的可持续管理构成巨大压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 施工、装修和拆除过程产生大量固体废物，是城市废物的主要来源之一，若处理不当会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 土地平整和开发活动可能破坏自然栖息地、导致水土流失，对陆地和淡水生态系统的保护构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 建筑行业以工作环境风险高、工伤事故多发而闻名，可能存在工作条件不安全、劳工权利保护不足的问题。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 冷冻调理食品通过延长保质期、减少季节性限制和提供便捷的食品获取方式，有助于确保全年的粮食供应和获取，特别是对于城市居民或时间有限的人群。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业遵循严格的食品安全标准和卫生控制措施（如HACCP），有助于减少由受污染食品引起的疾病，间接贡献于减少食源性危害带来的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为食品制造业的一个细分领域，它通过应用加工技术、规模化生产创造就业，并有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业依赖于现代化的食品加工和冷冻技术基础设施，是工业技术升级的一部分，但核心关联度低于直接的环境技术领域。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 冷冻是保存食品、显著减少从加工到消费环节食物损失和浪费的关键技术，直接支持该子目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 冷冻过程（尤其是低温储存和运输）通常能耗较高，如果能源来自不可再生来源，则可能导致自然资源（能源）的使用效率较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业通常使用大量一次性塑料或其他材料的包装来保证食品质量和安全，这可能导致固体废物增加，与减废目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果餐饮店优先采购来自小规模或本地生产者的农产品，可以间接支持其生产力和收入。但'一般飲食店'的采购模式通常不以此为核心，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...)

rationale: 通过采购采用可持续农业实践生产的食材，餐饮店可以推动可持续食品系统。但这取决于其具体的采购政策，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...)

rationale: 许多一般餐饮店的菜单可能富含高热量、高脂肪、高糖或高盐的食品，过量消费此类食品会增加非传染性疾病的风险，对公共健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment...)

rationale: 餐饮业是主要的就业来源之一，为不同技能水平的人群提供工作岗位，对实现充分就业有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 餐饮业普遍存在非正式就业、低工资、长工时和工作环境安全问题（如厨房安全、骚扰风险），对保护劳工权利和安全工作环境构成挑战和潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers...)

rationale: 餐饮店运营消耗大量水资源、能源（用于烹饪、冷藏）和食材（部分可能来自不可持续来源），若管理不善，会导致自然资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 餐饮业是食物浪费的主要产生者之一，包括食材处理损耗、过量制备和顾客剩餐，直接与减少食物浪费的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels...)

rationale: 餐饮店产生大量包装废弃物（尤其是外卖）、一次性塑料制品和有机垃圾，对实现废物减量、回收和再利用的目标构成显著挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 餐饮店可以通过菜单标识（如本地食材、素食选项）、减少一次性塑料倡议等方式，向消费者传播可持续生活方式的意识和信息，但普及程度有限。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development...)

rationale: 餐饮店的能源消耗（尤其是基于化石燃料的）、食物供应链的碳排放以及有机废物分解产生的甲烷气体，都直接贡献于温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响。其运营需要整合减排措施以符合气候行动目标。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 货运代理业通过优化供应链、引入物流技术创新（如数字化平台），直接支持经济生产率的提高和多元化。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业是物流和运输基础设施不可或缺的组成部分，通过高效管理货物流动，贡献于发展可靠、可持续的供应链基础设施。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 通过优化运输路线和整合物流（如多式联运），货运代理可以促进资源的更高效利用，减少空载和浪费。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 货运运输严重依赖化石燃料，是温室气体排放的主要来源。如果行业不积极转向低碳模式（如使用绿色能源车辆、优化碳足迹），其运营会对气候变化产生显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 运输过程中可能涉及有害物质或包装废物的不当处理，若管理不善，会对环境和健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 通过提供消费信贷促进商品销售和消费，直接刺激内需，为经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 作为零售和金融服务的一部分，该行业支持商业活动，并为相关供应链（如销售、物流、客服）创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过分期付款降低购买门槛，可能帮助低收入家庭获得改善生活质量的必需品（如冰箱、洗衣机），从而间接支持减贫。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 理由同上，通过提高购买力，可能有助于减少多维贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions

rationale: 如果信贷审核不严或利率过高，可能导致低收入消费者陷入债务陷阱，加剧其经济脆弱性和贫困风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 理由同上，不负责任的信贷行为可能通过债务问题加剧多维贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions

rationale: 该商业模式的核心是鼓励消费，如果缺乏对商品可持续性的考量，可能直接促进不可持续的消费模式，与可持续消费和生产框架相悖。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 通过促进商品销售，可能增加资源消耗和废物产生，对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力，除非所售商品本身是高效和可持续的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果信贷服务存在歧视（如基于收入、地域），或高利率对低收入群体不公，则会加剧社会经济排斥和不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 该行业作为消费金融的一部分，突显了对金融市场监管的必要性，以防止掠夺性贷款行为，保护消费者权益。其潜在的负面影响指向了加强监管的重要性。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 焦炭制造业是钢铁等基础工业的重要支撑，为工业增加值和就业做出贡献，但其本身的可持续性较低。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过提供关键工业原料支持整体经济生产力，但其技术本身属于传统高碳工艺，升级和创新需求迫切。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统的焦炭制造过程资源效率低，污染严重，是迫切需要升级和改造以实现可持续性的典型产业，当前状态与目标要求相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 焦炭是一种高碳化石燃料，其生产和消费阻碍了向可再生能源转型的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 焦炭制造是温室气体（特别是二氧化碳）的主要排放源，与应对气候变化的政策和措施直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 焦炭生产过程中会释放大量有害空气污染物（如苯可溶物、颗粒物、SOx），严重威胁工人和周边社区居民的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 焦炭生产过程中产生的废气和废水若处理不当，会导致有害物质释放到环境中，不符合无害环境管理化学品和废物的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业本身会产生固体废物（如焦粉）和工艺废物，其废物减量和资源循环利用水平通常有待提高。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 焦炭制造业通常涉及高温、高压以及暴露于有害化学品和粉尘的环境，对工人的健康和安全构成显著风险，需要重点关注工作环境的改善。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 高质量的耐火材料是提高工业熔炉等基础设施能源效率、延长其使用寿命、实现工业可持续改造的关键使能技术之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 通过延长高温工业设备的使用寿命和改善其热效率，耐火材料有助于其所服务的产业更可持续和高效地利用自然资源（如矿物、能源）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 作为基础材料制造业的一部分，该行业通过提供关键工业投入品，直接贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 耐火材料制造过程可能涉及使用特定化学品，并产生粉尘、废料等工业废物，若管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 耐火材料生产本身会产生工业固体废物（如废品、边角料）。同时，废弃的耐火材料处理也是一个挑战，可能增加废物总量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 制造业环境，特别是涉及高温处理和粉尘的耐火材料生产，可能对工人的健康和安全构成风险（如职业病、工伤），需要严格的安全措施。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 耐火材料制造过程通常是能源密集型产业，可能产生显著的温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面贡献。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 高等教育机构是直接提供大学教育的核心主体，其存在和可及性是实现此目标的基础。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 通过教学和培训，高等教育机构直接负责培养青年和成人获得就业、创业所需的相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

rationale: 高等教育通过提供知识和技能，显著提高毕业生的就业能力和获得体面工作的机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 高等教育机构通过吸纳青年入学，直接减少未就业、未受教育或未培训（NEET）的青年比例。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.

rationale: 大学是进行科学研究和技术开发的主要基地，并负责培养未来的研发人员。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending.

rationale: 高等教育通过促进女性受教育机会、培养女性领导者以及在机构内部推动性别平等政策，支持女性参与领导层。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.

rationale: 通过提供教育机会、奖学金和包容性政策，高等教育有助于促进社会流动性和不同背景人群的包容性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 高等教育机构通过开设相关课程、进行气候变化研究以及提升公众意识，直接贡献于气候变化教育和能力建设。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning.

rationale: 校园运营（如实验室、食堂、办公）会产生大量废物，若废物管理不善，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 如果学费过高或招生政策存在壁垒，高等教育机构可能反而会阻碍部分人群平等获得优质教育的机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 大型校园的能源消耗（如教学楼、宿舍供暖制冷）若效率低下，会对提高能效的目标产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency.

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，加工纸制造活动直接贡献于工业生产和就业，是工业体系中的一个环节。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该行业使用来自可持续管理森林的纸张作为原料，并优化加工过程中的资源（如水、能源）使用，则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 加工纸制造过程可能涉及使用化学品（如涂层剂、染料）并产生工业废水和固体废物，如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程本身可能产生废料（如边角料、不合格品），且其产品（如一次性包装材料）可能在使用后成为废物，若未建立有效的回收再利用体系，则不利于废物减量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 造纸和加工过程是用水大户，废水若含有化学物质且处理不当，会对水体质量造成污染风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 加工纸制造通过对纸张进行增值处理，属于制造业中的一环，贡献于经济生产和就业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 销售耐储存的干燥食品有助于在全年，特别是在非产季或供应链不稳定时，保障食物的可获得性，为人们（尤其是脆弱群体）提供营养来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 干燥是一种有效的食品保存技术。零售干物产品本身意味着减少了易腐食品在供应链中的损失，直接有助于减少零售和消费环节的粮食浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 作为零售业的一种，乾物小売为当地创造了就业机会，特别是可能涉及许多小型或家庭式经营，符合支持中小微企业发展的方向。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 干物零售可能使用一次性塑料包装或非环保包装材料来保证产品干燥和卫生，这可能导致塑料废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 部分传统干物产品（如高盐分的鱼干、含糖的果脯）如果过量消费，可能不利于心血管健康，与非传染性疾病的预防目标存在潜在冲突。相关性较低，因为影响取决于具体产品和消费模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 该行业生产的金属结构和零部件是建筑、交通、能源等各类基础设施建设不可或缺的材料，直接支持可持续基础设施的建造。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过采用更高效的金属加工技术（如自动化、精益生产）和环保工艺（如使用可再生电力、减少废料），该行业可以促进自身及下游产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供了稳定的就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 金属加工业存在噪音、粉尘、机械操作等职业安全风险，如果管理不善，可能对工人的健康和安全构成威胁，与提供安全工作环境的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业消耗大量金属原材料（如钢铁、铝）和能源，若资源利用效率低下，会对自然资源造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用化学品（如切削液、防锈剂、油漆），并产生金属废料、废液等，若处理不当，可能对环境造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 金属切割和成型过程会产生边角料等固体废物，如果回收再利用体系不完善，会导致资源浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 生产过程中的粉尘、挥发性有机物排放等，如果控制不力，可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为工业机械的供应商，该行业是工业化的基础，通过提供生产设备直接促进可持续工业化和提高生产力。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业制造的机械是实现产业升级、提高资源效率和采用清洁技术的关键工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过提供先进的机械设备，该行业直接赋能下游产业实现技术升级和创新，从而提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 该行业作为制造业的一部分，直接创造就业机会，尽管其具体对“体面工作”各方面的影响取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该行业生产高效节能或资源节约型机械，则有助于下游产业更可持续地管理资源。但作为通用类别，其积极影响是潜在的，并非所有机械都具备此特性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 机械制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品、消耗能源和原材料，并产生工业废料和排放，对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业自身的制造过程可能产生大量废物（如金属废料、包装材料），与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业专门生产高能效机械或节能设备，则对提高全球能效有积极贡献。但作为通用类别，此贡献并非其核心定义。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 批发贸易是供应链的关键环节，通过促进商品流通和创造就业（如物流、销售岗位）来支持经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 批发行业通常连接大量中小型制造商和零售商，其运营支持了这些企业的市场准入和增长，间接促进了体面就业和创业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 如果该行业有意识地采购和推广由可持续来源材料（如再生纤维、负责任采购的皮革）制成的耐用箱包，则能间接促进自然资源的可持续管理。但此积极影响依赖于其具体的采购政策。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过批发耐用、可修复的箱包而非一次性产品，该行业可以帮助减少废物产生。推广使用可回收材料制成的袋子也对此目标有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业主要批发基于快时尚模式的、低质量、短寿命的箱包，或大量的一次性塑料袋，则会显著增加固体废物，对实现减少废物的目标产生负面影响。这是该行业潜在的、主要的环境风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为专门面向农林水产业的金融机构，其核心业务是直接为农民、渔民和林业工作者提供关键的金融服务和信贷支持，这对于提高他们的生产力和收入至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 通过为农林水产业的中小企业和个体经营者提供融资，该行业直接支持这些生产性活动的发展、创造体面工作和促进企业成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为专注于特定产业的金融机构，其存在和运营本身就加强了金融体系的能力，并旨在扩大农林水产业从业者获得金融服务的机会。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 该机构通过提供信贷等金融服务，帮助小规模的农业、林业和渔业企业融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 通过提供针对性的金融服务，该行业有助于确保农村地区的贫困和弱势群体（如小农）能够获得经济资源，尽管其覆盖范围和公平性取决于具体运营模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 如果该金融机构的贷款政策不包含严格的环境和社会风险评估，其资金可能间接支持导致不可持续森林管理或毁林的林业或农业活动（如为扩大农田而砍伐森林）。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 类似于对15.2的影响，如果融资活动支持了破坏自然栖息地（如通过不可持续的捕捞或农业扩张）的项目，则可能对生物多样性产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 火药在采矿、采石和大型基础设施建设（如隧道、道路）的爆破作业中是不可或缺的，间接支持了可持续基础设施的开发。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业生产的火药是制造武器弹药的核心材料，可能被用于武装冲突、犯罪和恐怖活动，直接加剧各种形式的暴力。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere

sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为金融机构，可以通过融资渠道间接支持对农村基础设施和农业技术的投资，但其直接作用有限。

sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造活动贡献于经济生产力，其发展依赖于技术创新和产品升级。

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 化学肥料通过农业径流造成水体富营养化，是地表水和地下水硝酸盐污染以及近海'死亡区'形成的主要人为来源，严重威胁水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 由化肥流失引起的水体富营养化会破坏湿地、河流、湖泊等水生生态系统的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems...

rationale: 化肥污染通过水体间接影响陆地生态系统（如河岸带），并可能因土壤板结和生物多样性下降而直接损害农田生态系统的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...

rationale: 工业窑炉是工业过程的核心设备。制造高效、低排放的先进窑炉，特别是那些能够使用清洁燃料或处理废物的窑炉，是直接升级和改造工业基础设施以实现可持续性的关键技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 工业窑炉是工业领域的主要能耗设备。制造和推广高能效的工业窑炉，对于实现全球工业能效改善率的提升目标具有最直接和显著的贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency.

rationale: 高效的窑炉通过优化能源和原材料的使用，减少生产过程中的资源浪费，有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 专门用于危险废物处理的工业窑炉（如焚烧炉）可以通过高温分解实现废物的无害化处理。高效窑炉也能减少有害气体（如氮氧化物、硫氧化物）的排放。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 如果制造的窑炉技术落后、能效低下或污染控制不力，其运行可能导致有害物质（如重金属、二噁英、粉尘）向空气、水或土壤的排放增加，与无害化环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，工业窑炉制造本身贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。先进窑炉技术的研发和创新是工业技术升级的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 提供高能效和低碳排放的工业窑炉，是国家将气候变化减缓措施（如工业节能降碳）纳入产业政策和技术推广规划的具体体现和支撑。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 如果制造的窑炉缺乏有效的污染控制技术，或在设计上存在安全隐患，其运行可能增加工作场所和周围环境的空气污染，潜在地对工人和社区居民的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 薪柴和木炭在许多发展中地区是重要的、相对廉价的烹饪和取暖能源来源，有助于满足基本的能源需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 木炭和薪柴属于生物质能，是可再生能源的一种形式。但其贡献的‘正面性’因生产方式的不可持续性而大打折扣，得分较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 如果管理不当，该行业会导致森林过度砍伐和退化，与自然资源的可持续管理目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 不可持续的薪炭生产是温室气体排放和森林碳汇损失的重要来源，对气候变化有显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业是森林退化和毁林的主要驱动因素之一，严重阻碍可持续森林管理目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests... and increase afforestation and reforestation

rationale: 咖啡和茶叶批发商通过将小规模农户的产品分销到更广阔的市场，直接支持其提高收入和获得市场机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 该行业是农产品价值链中的重要环节，通过高效的分销网络提升整体经济生产力，并可能推动供应链的技术升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 批发行业本身创造就业，并支持中小型生产商和零售商的发展，促进包容性经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 负责任的批发商可以通过优先采购经过可持续认证（如雨林联盟、公平贸易）的咖啡和茶叶，推动上游生产环节对自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 批发商可以与生产国合作，引入或支持可持续农业技术和实践，促进更可持续的生产模式。
sdg_target_description: Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production

rationale: 咖啡和茶叶种植是水资源密集型产业，批发商若未积极推动可持续采购，其供应链可能加剧产地的水资源压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 为扩大咖啡和茶园而导致的森林砍伐是该行业供应链的主要风险之一，批发商若缺乏可追溯性和可持续性标准，可能间接助长此问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 炮弹是直接用于武装冲突和暴力的工具，其制造和最终使用与减少暴力和死亡率的根本目标完全相悖。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.

rationale: 大规模杀伤性武器的扩散可能破坏国家机构和法治，与加强机构以预防暴力的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels, in particular in developing countries, to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime.

rationale: 炮弹造成的直接伤亡以及对冲突地区人民造成的长期心理创伤，严重阻碍了降低非正常死亡率和促进心理健康的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业确实能提供一定的就业岗位。但鉴于其产品的性质，这种积极贡献的可持续性和伦理性受到严重质疑。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 该行业属于工业制造活动，对工业化有微弱的直接贡献。然而，其与可持续发展的‘可持续性’原则存在根本矛盾，因此相关性得分较低。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries.

rationale: 炮弹制造过程可能涉及危险化学品的使用和废弃物的产生，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 作为医药零售渠道，该行业是确保公众获得安全、有效、优质和可负担的基本药品（包括非处方药）的关键环节，直接支持全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业通过实体店和在线平台创造就业机会（如店员、药剂师、管理人员），并支持中小型企业的经营和发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业为不同性别、年龄的人群提供就业岗位，贡献于实现充分和生产性就业。但其工作条件（如薪酬、福利）需符合体面工作标准才能产生完全积极的影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 医药和化妆品零售通常涉及大量包装材料（塑料、纸盒、玻璃瓶），尤其是化妆品行业常被批评过度包装，导致固体废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该零售商优先采购和使用来自可持续来源、采用环保工艺生产的化妆品和药品（如有机成分、公平贸易），则可以对自然资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献，但这通常不是行业核心活动的默认状态。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 化妆品零售有时可能通过广告和营销强化刻板的性别角色和不切实际的美容标准，这可能间接对女性的自信和参与公共生活产生微妙的负面影响，尽管联系较弱。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 作为批发商，该行业通过分销网络为陶瓷和玻璃制品领域的中小制造商提供市场准入，支持其正规化和发展，从而促进体面就业和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业作为价值链中的一环，帮助中小型陶瓷和玻璃制造商整合到更广阔的市场中，间接改善了这些企业（其供应商）的市场准入和生存能力。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果该批发商优先分销耐用、可回收或由回收材料制成的陶瓷和玻璃产品（例如，可重复使用的玻璃瓶、回收玻璃制成的器皿），则通过促进循环经济对减少废物产生做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该批发商主要分销一次性、易碎或过度包装的陶瓷和玻璃产品，可能导致更高的破损率和废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。其影响取决于具体的产品组合和商业实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 陶瓷和玻璃制造通常是能源和资源密集型产业。批发商通过分销这些产品，间接支持了上游的生产活动。如果上游生产不可持续（例如，高能耗、过度开采原材料），该行业则对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 损害保险通过提供财务保障，帮助个人和弱势群体在遭遇灾害或经济冲击时避免陷入贫困，增强其经济韧性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

rationale: 作为金融服务业的一部分，损害保险有助于扩大保险服务的可及性，支持金融包容性和稳定的经济环境，但其主要焦点是风险保障而非普惠金融的核心。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 损害保险的核心功能是赔偿灾害（如自然灾害、火灾）造成的经济损失，直接帮助减少灾害对个人、企业和社区造成的直接经济影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations.

rationale: 保险是气候变化适应策略的关键组成部分，通过提供灾后重建资金，增强社会对气候相关灾害的经济抵御能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 特殊浴场提供的放松和疗养服务有助于缓解压力、促进身体恢复，对促进顾客的心理健康和整体福祉有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 特殊浴场（尤其是温泉浴场）通常是旅游业的一部分，能够创造本地就业机会并吸引游客，对促进可持续旅游业有间接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products.

rationale: 浴场运营会产生大量含有肥皂、洗发水、人体油脂等污染物的废水。如果废水处理不当，会对水体造成污染，与改善水质的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 浴场是耗水大户，尤其是大型或持续换水的浴场。如果水资源管理不善，会导致水资源利用效率低下，加剧水资源压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity.

rationale: 浴场运营消耗大量的水、能源（用于加热水和维持环境）以及一次性洗浴用品，若管理不当，不符合自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 浴场可能产生大量一次性毛巾、塑料瓶、包装等废弃物，如果缺乏有效的废物减量、分类和回收措施，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 农业机械制造通过提供高效设备，直接提高农业生产力和小规模生产者的收入。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...)

rationale: 先进的农业机械（如精准农业设备）有助于实现可持续和具有气候适应能力的农业实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...)

rationale: 制造业本身是经济生产力的重要部分，农业机械的技术创新直接推动农业部门的生产率提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 农业机械是农业基础设施的关键组成部分，其技术进步有助于产业升级和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable...)

rationale: 高效的农业机械可以优化水、肥料等自然资源的使用，促进可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 机械制造过程本身消耗能源和原材料，可能对自然资源造成压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用有害化学品，且废弃机械的处置不当会造成电子废物等问题。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 如果产品设计不考虑循环经济，可能导致产品生命周期结束时产生大量废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为纺织供应链的关键批发环节，该行业通过高效的物流和分销网络，支持纺织工业的生产力和经济活动。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业本身创造批发贸易领域的就业机会，并支持中小型纺织制造企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 如果该批发商优先采购来自可持续管理资源的纤维原料（如有机棉、认证木材来源的人造纤维），则可对资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献。但这种贡献是间接且依赖于其采购政策。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果该批发商参与或推广使用再生纤维（如再生涤纶）的供应链，则有助于减少废物。但这不是其核心业务的必然组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 传统纺织原料生产（特别是棉花种植的农药化肥使用和化纤制造）是水污染的重要来源。批发商若未对其供应链进行环境合规管理，则间接助长了水污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 棉花种植是极度耗水的农业活动。批发商采购传统棉花间接支持了低效的水资源利用模式。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...)

rationale: 为扩大棉花等纤维作物种植而导致的土地用途改变，可能破坏自然栖息地和生态系统。批发商是这一链条的一部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...)

rationale: 不合理的农业实践（如某些棉花种植）可能导致土壤退化和荒漠化。批发商的采购行为对此有间接影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...)

rationale: 化纤原料（如聚酯）的生产严重依赖化石燃料，排放大量温室气体。批发商分销这些产品，间接与减缓气候变化的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 纺织原料供应链（如棉花采摘）可能存在强迫劳动和恶劣的工作条件。批发商若缺乏供应链尽职调查，可能间接助长这些问题。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers...)

rationale: 该行业生产的电气设备（如变压器、电缆、储能电池、控制系统）是构建和整合可再生能源系统（如太阳能、风能）到电网所必需的基础设施，直接支持增加可再生能源的份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 该行业提供关键的电气组件和技术，用于升级和改造基础设施及工业流程，使其更高效、更可持续（例如，智能电网设备、工业自动化控制系统、节能照明），是采纳清洁技术的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过技术升级和创新（如生产更先进的电气元件）创造就业并贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 如果该行业生产高效节能的电气设备（如LED灯、高效电机驱动器），则有助于实现自然资源的更有效利用。但相关性取决于具体产品。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用或产生有害化学品和污染物（例如，电池生产中的重金属、电路板制造中的溶剂），如果安全管理不到位，可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 制造过程中的工业废水若未经妥善处理，可能含有重金属或其他污染物，对水质构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 该行业在其产品生命周期（特别是制造和废弃阶段）涉及化学品和潜在有害废物的管理。如果实践不当，会导致环境污染，与无害化环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil...

rationale: 该行业本身会产生工业废物，其产品（电子电气设备）在使用寿命结束时成为电子废弃物（e-waste）。如果缺乏有效的废物预防、回收和再利用体系，将对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 住宅租赁行业直接提供住房，是满足人们基本居住需求的关键服务，贡献于确保人人获得适足、安全和负担得起的住房。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 提供租赁住房有助于确保人们（包括贫困和脆弱群体）获得基本服务（住房），但贡献程度取决于租赁市场的可负担性和包容性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services...

rationale: 如果租赁住宅维护不善（如存在霉菌、铅漆、不良通风），可能导致室内空气质量差和健康风险，对减少污染相关疾病的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 租赁市场可能存在歧视性做法（如基于收入、种族或家庭的歧视）或高租金导致的经济排斥，阻碍社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 如果租赁住宅建筑能效低下（如绝缘不良、使用老旧供暖系统），会导致能源浪费，对提高能源效率的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 短期租赁部分（如度假租赁）可能促进旅游业并创造相关就业机会，但相对于整个住宅租赁行业，其相关性较低且较为间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 儿童福利事业通过为贫困家庭儿童提供支持和服务，有助于打破贫困的代际循环，减少儿童贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions

rationale: 通过提供健康监测、营养支持和预防保健教育，儿童福利事业有助于降低婴幼儿死亡率，促进儿童健康成长。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births

rationale: 运营幼儿园、托儿所等是提供早期儿童发展、照顾和学前教育的主要方式，直接确保儿童为接受小学教育做好准备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education

rationale: 提供可及的儿童保育服务，减轻了家庭（尤其是女性）的无偿照料负担，支持她们参与劳动力市场和教育，促进家庭责任共担。
sdg_target_description: Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work through the provision of public services, infrastructure and social protection policies and the promotion of shared responsibility within the household and the family as nationally appropriate

rationale: 该行业本身为社会工作者、保育员等提供了就业机会，同时通过支持父母就业间接促进了充分就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 儿童福利事业旨在确保所有儿童，无论其背景如何，都能获得基本服务和发展的机会，从而促进社会包容，减少不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 保护儿童免受暴力、剥削和虐待是儿童福利事业的核心职能之一，通过咨询、干预和庇护服务直接针对此目标。
sdg_target_description: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children

rationale: 陶磁器絵付業通常由中小型企业或个体工匠经营，该行业支持手工艺创作、 entrepreneurship 和中小企业的增长，符合8.3目标中支持生产性活动和中小企业发展的要求。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业涉及传统的陶瓷装饰技艺，是许多文化中重要的手工艺遗产，其实践有助于保护和传承非物质文化遗产，从而支持目标11.4。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 陶瓷绘画可能使用含有有害化学物质（如铅、镉等重金属）的釉料和颜料。如果生产过程中废弃物管理不当，可能导致这些化学品释放到环境（空气、水、土壤）中，对人类健康和环境造成负面影响，这与目标12.4的环境无害化管理要求相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 通过艺术装饰提升陶瓷器的美观和价值，可以延长产品的使用寿命，减少因审美过时或低价值而导致的过早丢弃，从而在预防层面间接支持减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业将谷物加工成可食用的大米和面粉，是保障主食供应、满足人们基本食物需求的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 作为连接农业和消费的加工环节，其效率和可持续性间接影响整个粮食生产体系的韧性，但直接影响小于农业生产本身。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 现代化的精穀和製粉工艺通过技术改进可以提高水、能源等自然资源的利用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 有效的谷物加工可以减少收获后损失（例如，通过适当的干燥、储存和加工技术防止谷物变质），直接贡献于减少供应链中的粮食损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 加工过程中可能产生粉尘、废水（如果涉及清洗）和废弃包装材料，若管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 加工过程本身会产生副产物（如米糠、碎米、麸皮），虽然这些常被再利用（如饲料），但如果未被有效利用则成为废物，存在增加废物产生的风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业在加工厂提供了直接的就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 该行业是食品工业基础设施的重要组成部分，对许多国家的工业基础和GDP有贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs).

rationale: 行业的技术升级（如采用更节能的碾米机、磨粉机）有助于提高资源效率，向更可持续的工业过程转变。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 研磨材是制造业（如金属加工、汽车、机械）不可或缺的基础材料，其生产和供应直接支持并促进了工业化进程和经济活动。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 作为制造业价值链的一部分，该行业通过提供提高其他行业（如精密制造）生产效率的工具，间接贡献于整体经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 高性能的研磨材和研磨工具可以用于改进和维护工业设备，有助于提高资源效率和生产过程的可持续性，但这是间接且次要的贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 研磨材的制造（例如，开采天然磨料矿物、生产合成磨料）可能消耗大量自然资源（如铝土矿、石英砂），并对资源可持续管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生工业废料和副产品，同时，使用后的研磨制品（如废弃砂轮）通常成为工业固体废物，增加了废物管理的压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 在研磨材制造和使用过程中，若防护不当，粉尘（尤其是可吸入结晶硅尘）的暴露可能导致工人患上矽肺等职业病，对健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 酒精零售业通过增加酒精的可及性，可能助长有害使用酒精，对预防和治疗物质滥用的努力构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，酒类小売为当地经济提供就业机会并支持中小企业发展，但对'体面工作'的贡献需谨慎评估（如销售可能涉及健康风险）。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 零售商可通过推行负责任销售实践（如年龄验证、健康警示）来贡献于该目标，但相关性较间接且依赖具体企业行为。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 酒精饮料的包装（如玻璃瓶、易拉罐）可能产生大量废物，如果未有效管理，会对减少废物目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 过度酒精消费可能替代营养摄入或加剧营养不良问题，但该影响较为间接且非行业核心活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

rationale: 该行业通过制造金属加工机械的关键零部件，直接支撑工业体系的运行和发展，是可持续工业化的基础。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该行业生产的零部件用于制造更高效、更节能的机械设备，则间接促进了产业升级和资源效率的提升。但相关性取决于最终产品的具体应用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 金属零部件制造过程通常消耗大量金属原材料、能源和水，如果管理不善，可能导致自然资源利用效率低下和不可持续。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生金属废料、切削液等工业废物，如果废物管理和循环利用措施不足，会对该子目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的能源密集型生产过程通常伴随较高的碳排放，除非采用清洁能源和节能技术，否则与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 运输代理行业通过促进货物流动和贸易便利化，直接支持经济增长和供应链效率，对实现可持续的经济增长有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 作为服务业，运输代理行业创造了物流协调、客户服务等就业岗位，为体面工作和经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 运输代理是物流基础设施的关键服务环节，通过优化运输网络和连接性，支持可持续和有韧性的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过推广多式联运、路线优化和数字化管理等创新实践，运输代理可以促进物流行业的资源效率提升和可持续转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 高效的物流规划和路线优化有助于减少空驶、降低燃料消耗，从而促进自然资源的更可持续管理和使用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果运输代理主要依赖高能耗、高排放的运输方式（如空运或非环保的公路运输），则可能导致自然资源（如化石燃料）的低效使用和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 运输代理行业若未能优先选择低碳运输方案或忽视碳排放管理，其协调的物流活动会直接产生温室气体排放，对气候变化应对产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业生产的弹药是实施暴力的主要工具。虽然可用于合法防御，但其存在和流通更普遍地与暴力冲突、犯罪和死亡率的增加相关，与减少暴力的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.

rationale: 弹药是非法武器流动的关键组成部分。该行业的产品若管理不当，极易流入黑市，助长有组织犯罪和区域不稳定，严重阻碍减少非法武器流动的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime.

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于工业产值和就业，符合工业化的广义定义。但其“可持续性”和“包容性”存疑，因此相关性得分较低。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries.

rationale: 弹药制造通常涉及危险化学品和能源密集型过程，不属于清洁或环境友好型技术。该行业与升级为可持续产业和采用清洁技术的要求相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes.

rationale: 虽然目标特指交通事故，但弹药造成的死亡和伤害是暴力致伤致死的核心原因之一。该行业的产品直接用于造成人身伤害，与促进健康福祉的总体目标严重不符。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents.

rationale: 该行业作为制造实体，提供了一定的就业机会。但“体面工作”的维度（如安全性）可能存在问题，因此相关性为中等偏下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 弹药制造属于高危行业，涉及爆炸物和有毒物质，对工人的安全构成显著威胁，与促进安全的工作环境目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 该行业间接相关。其产品若被用于冲突地区，会直接破坏教育设施的安全，阻碍建立安全、非暴力的学习环境。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all.

rationale: 分期付款金融通过提供获得资产（如交通工具、生产设备）的信贷途径，可以帮助低收入和脆弱群体获得经济资源，但需在负责任借贷的前提下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是提供普惠金融，通过分期付款产品扩大个人和中小企业获得金融服务的机会，直接支持金融包容性。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 分期付款金融可以为小型企业购买设备或库存提供融资渠道，间接支持其融入市场和价值链，但相关性较SDG 8.10为低，因其主要焦点不一定是工业型企业。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 通过提供信贷机会，该行业可以在经济上赋能某些被排除在传统银行服务之外的群体，促进其经济包容性，但效果取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 如果分期付款金融不加区别地鼓励过度消费和非必需品的购买，可能会助长不可持续的消费模式，与可持续消费和生产的目标相悖。
