sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries.

rationale: 如果信贷实践存在歧视性（如基于年龄、性别、种族）或导致弱势群体陷入债务循环，则可能加剧社会经济不平等。此负面影响的风险性存在，但非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 商业捕鲸活动，特别是大规模或不受严格监管的捕捞，直接威胁鲸类种群，破坏海洋生态系统的平衡和健康，与可持续管理和保护海洋生态系统的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 捕鲸业历史上是过度捕捞的典型例子。尽管有国际规范（如国际捕鲸委员会的管制），但争议和某些国家的持续捕捞行为，使其与有效规范捕捞、终止过度捕捞的目标存在根本性冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 捕鲸活动在海洋保护区内通常被禁止或严格限制。在保护区外进行的捕鲸活动，可能间接削弱海洋保护区的整体保护成效，与海洋生物多样性保护的精神相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, conserve at least 10 per cent of coastal and marine areas, consistent with national and international law and based on the best available scientific information

rationale: 鉴于鲸类种群恢复缓慢及其在生态系统中的关键作用，商业捕鲸很难被普遍认为是自然资源的'可持续管理'，更常被视为一种不可持续的资源利用方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 活体鲸鱼是可持续观鲸旅游业的核心资源。捕鲸业直接减少观鲸资源，可能对依赖观鲸的可持续旅游业及相应就业机会产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 该行业通过出版学术期刊、专业教材和在线课程材料，为职业、技术和高等教育提供关键的知识资源，促进教育机会的平等获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 出版业提供技能培训和终身学习相关的出版物，帮助青年和成年人获得就业和创业所需的相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

rationale: 通过出版关于可持续发展、全球公民意识和人权的书籍与资料，该行业有助于传播促进可持续发展所需的知识。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...

rationale: 出版业是创意产业的一部分，直接创造编辑、设计、营销等岗位，支持创业和创新活动。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 虽然相关性较弱，但出版旅游指南、文化地图等产品可以间接支持可持续旅游业，促进当地文化和就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products.

rationale: 数字出版（如电子书、在线数据库）依赖于并促进ICT的普及，增加了人们获取信息的途径。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020.

rationale: 实体出版业（尤其是使用非可持续来源纸张的）可能对森林资源造成压力，与自然资源的可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 未售出的出版物和包装材料可能导致固体废物增加，特别是如果回收体系不完善。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 出版业是传播可持续发展信息和提高公众环保意识的核心渠道，直接支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature.

rationale: 出版业的供应链（纸张生产、印刷、运输）会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响，尽管其核心业务不直接涉及气候变化措施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 出版业是保障公众获取信息、促进言论自由和知识共享的基础设施，是其最核心的积极贡献之一。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.

rationale: 通过出版法律文本、学术研究和社会评论，该行业可以间接支持法治和强大机构的建设，但相关性相对间接。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen relevant national institutions... for preventing violence and combating terrorism and crime.

rationale: 基督教组织经常提供食物、住所和基本生活援助，作为社会安全网的一部分，直接覆盖贫困和脆弱群体。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 通过社区支持、咨询服务和营造归属感，对信众的心理健康和福祉做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 通过主日学、教会学校等途径提供包含道德、伦理和可持续生活方式的教育，培养促进可持续发展所需的价值观。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... and appreciation of cultural diversity

rationale: 某些基督教派别在神职任命、领导角色等方面限制女性，可能延续或合理化对妇女和女童的歧视。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 与5.1类似，某些教派的治理结构可能限制女性在教会决策层（如牧师、主教）的平等参与机会。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 教会社区通常旨在接纳不同背景的人，为弱势群体提供支持，促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 某些教派可能公开反对或游说反对保障LGBTQ+群体权利等促进机会平等的立法和政策。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard

rationale: 基督教教义倡导和平与非暴力，通过教育和社区建设为减少暴力做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere

rationale: 基于其道德教义，倡导公平、正义，并可能为社区成员提供调解或支持服务。
sdg_target_description: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all

rationale: 运作良好的宗教组织可以作为地方层面的有效机构，但其透明度和问责制水平因组织而异。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 某些教派可能游说反对被认为与其教义冲突的非歧视性法律（例如，基于性取向或性别认同的法律）。
sdg_target_description: Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development

rationale: 基督教组织经常与政府、其他非政府组织和社区团体合作，共同实施发展、救灾和慈善项目。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

rationale: 肥料和饲料是提高农业和畜牧业生产力的核心投入品，直接有助于提高产量和生产者收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 特别是化学肥料的过度和不合理使用，会破坏土壤健康、导致温室气体排放，与建立可持续粮食生产系统的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems... that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change...

rationale: 肥料（尤其是氮磷）的径流流失是造成水体富营养化和水质恶化的主要非点源污染源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 如果该行业采用更高效、污染更少的生产工艺（如精准施肥技术、绿色氨合成），则能产生积极影响。但目前传统生产方式往往不符合此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...

rationale: 化学肥料生产（特别是氮肥）是能源密集型产业，消耗大量天然气等自然资源，其使用效率低下导致资源浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 化肥生产和使用涉及有害化学品，其不当管理会对环境和人类健康构成风险。饲料生产中的抗生素滥用也属于化学品管理问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...

rationale: 该行业可以通过利用农业副产品或有机废物生产饲料或有机肥料，促进废物的循环利用，对目标有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 肥料流失造成的土壤退化、水体富营养化以及由此引发的生物多样性丧失，直接威胁陆地和水生生态系统的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...

rationale: 不合理的施肥方式会加剧土壤板结、酸化和有机质下降，导致土地退化，与防治荒漠化和恢复土地的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...

rationale: 该行业的核心活动是提供社会保险和福利服务，直接对应建立和实施国家社会保障体系，旨在覆盖贫困和脆弱群体。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 作为社会保险的一部分，该行业可能涉及管理健康保险或相关福利，为全民健康覆盖（UHC）提供财务风险保护，促进健康福祉。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 社会保险和福利是核心的社会保护政策，通过财富再分配和提供基本保障，直接有助于减少国家内部和国家间的不平等。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 该行业的有效运作依赖于并有助于建立负责、透明的社会保障管理机构，这是构建强大公共机构的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 谷物种植农业直接生产主食作物，是保障粮食安全、消除饥饿的基础。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 可持续的谷物种植实践（如保护性农业、精准施肥）有助于建立有弹性的农业生产系统，改善土地和土壤质量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 谷物种植为大量农村人口提供就业和收入来源，是许多发展中国家减少极端贫困的重要途径。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 传统谷物农业可能过度使用水资源、化肥和农药，导致资源低效利用和环境污染，与可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 不合理的耕作方式（如过度开垦、单一连作）可能导致土壤侵蚀、肥力下降和土地退化。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 农业活动是甲烷和一氧化二氮等温室气体的重要排放源，特别是水稻种植和化肥使用，对气候变化有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 医疗附带服务（如设施维护、清洁、后勤支持）是医疗保健系统能够持续、安全、高质量运行的基础保障，间接但关键地支持了全民健康覆盖目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 专业的医疗环境清洁、感染控制和医疗废物管理服务有助于加强医疗机构应对和管控健康风险（如医院内感染）的能力，这是国家健康风险管理的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 该行业作为劳动密集型的服务行业，为不同技能水平的人群提供了就业机会，有助于实现充分的生产性就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 医疗附带服务（如设备维护、设施管理）对于维持医疗基础设施的质量、可靠性和持续运行至关重要，直接支持了人民福祉所依赖的关键社会基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果服务内容包含医疗废物的分类、收集或初步处理，并且遵循环保标准，则对实现化学品的环境无害化管理有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果服务提供商在运营中（例如，使用一次性清洁材料、不当的包装）未能有效推行废物减量、回收和再利用措施，则可能产生负面环境影响，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。此评分较低是因为负面影响取决于具体实践，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 配线器具是构建可靠电力输送网络的基础，对于实现家庭、企业和社区的电气化和获得现代能源服务至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 这些器具（如逆变器连接器、专用开关）对于将太阳能、风能等分布式可再生能源安全集成到建筑和电网中是必需的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 电气配线系统是所有现代基础设施（建筑、交通、工业设施）的核心组成部分，其质量和可靠性直接决定基础设施的可持续性和韧性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being

rationale: 在基础设施升级和工业改造中，采用更安全、更高效、支持智能控制的现代配线器具是实现资源效率提升和清洁技术应用的关键一环。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...

rationale: 安全可靠的电气配线是住房提供基本服务（如照明、供暖、电器用电）的先决条件，直接关系到住房的安全性和适宜性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长。技术创新（如智能开关、节能插座）也提升了产品价值和经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 制造过程需要消耗金属（如铜）、塑料等原材料和能源，若管理不善可能导致自然资源的不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 某些配线器具的生产可能涉及有害物质（如铅、卤素阻燃剂），其制造过程和产品报废后若处理不当，可能对环境造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil...

rationale: 制造过程会产生工业废料，且产品多为复杂复合材料，生命周期结束后的回收利用具有挑战性，可能导致废物增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 鞋类零售业作为典型的零售部门，为本地社区创造了销售、管理等就业岗位，并支持中小型企业的运营和发展，促进了体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业提供了广泛的入门级和灵活就业机会，有助于实现充分就业，但其对‘体面工作’（如工资水平、工作保障）的贡献程度取决于具体公司的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该行业主要销售快时尚或非耐用鞋类，可能鼓励过度消费和频繁更换，导致废弃物（如旧鞋）增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 鞋类零售商可以通过优先采购和销售采用环保材料、符合公平贸易标准的鞋子，并披露其供应链的可持续性信息，来鼓励可持续实践。但这取决于企业的主动选择，而非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 零售业普遍存在低薪、非全职工种等问题，如果该行业未能提供公平的工资和充分的社会保障，可能会加剧收入不平等。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 零售业是女性员工占比较高的行业，该行业有潜力通过促进女性在管理和决策岗位的平等机会来支持性别平等，但这同样依赖于具体公司的政策。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 提供专业驾驶服务，有助于减少因私人不当驾驶行为导致的道路交通事故伤亡。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents)

rationale: 作为服务业，该行业是重要的就业来源，其影响取决于是否能提供体面的工作条件和公平的薪酬。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 作为交通服务的一部分，支持经济和社会的连通性，是基础设施可达性的体现。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 作为公共交通的补充，为特定人群和区域提供灵活、可及的出行选择，增强了整体交通系统的包容性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons)

rationale: 如果车辆空驶率高或与公共交通系统缺乏协调，可能加剧交通拥堵，降低城市交通系统的整体效率和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons)

rationale: 车辆的制造、维护和最终报废环节消耗资源并产生废物，若未采取循环经济措施，会对资源效率产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 前提是行业向电动化或使用低碳燃料转型，则其运营能直接支持国家气候行动目标。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 若车队主要由化石燃料驱动，其运营是温室气体和空气污染物的直接排放源，对减缓气候变化构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 水产食品制造提供了重要的动物蛋白和微量元素，有助于保障粮食安全和营养供给。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 鱼类产品富含优质蛋白、Omega-3脂肪酸等关键营养素，对解决营养不良问题有积极作用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

rationale: 水产食品制造业是许多沿海地区的重要产业，通过加工增值创造就业和促进地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业包含大量中小型企业，其发展有助于创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过加工（如冷冻、罐装）将易腐的水产品转化为耐储存的食品，显著减少了食物在供应链中的损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 如果原料来源不可持续（如过度捕捞），该行业则违背了对水生自然资源进行可持续管理的原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 加工过程中可能使用化学品（如防腐剂），并产生富含有机物和化学物质的废水，若处理不当会对环境造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 加工过程会产生大量副产品（如鱼内脏、鱼鳞）和包装废弃物，若未有效管理则增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业对SDG 14.4的影响是双刃剑。其积极贡献在于，如果严格遵守可持续捕捞配额和使用经过认证的可持续来源的原料，则直接支持了该目标。其消极影响在于，如果依赖过度捕捞或IUU捕捞的原料，则直接破坏该目标。鉴于行业名称本身不预设可持续性，此处评估其潜在的高风险负面影响。但为了全面反映其潜力，将同时列出积极和消极两种影响类型，并给出不同分数。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 作为水产品的主要需求方，如果其供应链管理不善，该行业的存在本身就会形成对鱼类资源的巨大压力，可能间接推动过度捕捞。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 该行业可能受益于导致过度捕捞的渔业补贴，从而间接对实现此目标构成障碍。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, prohibit certain forms of fisheries subsidies which contribute to overcapacity and overfishing, eliminate subsidies that contribute to IUU fishing, and refrain from introducing new such subsidies, recognizing that appropriate and effective special and differential treatment for developing and least developed countries should be an integral part of World Trade Organization fisheries subsidies negotiation

rationale: 加工厂排放的废水如果含有高浓度的有机物、氮、磷等，可能导致沿海水域的富营养化污染，属于陆地活动对海洋的污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，胶合板生产通过将原材料转化为高价值产品，为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 胶合板是建筑和基础设施中广泛使用的材料，其制造技术的改进（如使用环保粘合剂、提高资源效率）有助于实现可持续基础设施的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 如果采用可持续林业管理的木材，胶合板制造可以促进木材资源的有效利用。但此积极贡献高度依赖于原材料来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统胶合板制造过程使用含甲醛等有害化学物质的粘合剂，可能对环境和工人健康造成负面影响，与化学品和废物的无害化管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程会产生边角料、粉尘等废物，如果处理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果胶合板生产的木材原料来自非法或不可持续的采伐，将直接导致森林退化，严重威胁陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 对木材的需求是森林砍伐的主要驱动因素之一。不可持续的胶合板制造业会阻碍森林可持续管理目标的实现，并可能导致毁林。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 生产过程中挥发的有害化学物质（如甲醛）可能污染空气，对工厂工人和周边社区居民的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为批发业，该行业通过其分销活动直接贡献于经济多样化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业创造就业机会（如销售、物流、管理），并支持中小企业（其客户）的发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 通过分销运输工具的关键零部件，该行业对维持和修复交通基础设施的可靠运行起到支持作用。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 作为供应链中的一环，该行业帮助其客户（可能是小型维修厂或零售商）接入更广阔的市场和价值链。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises... to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets)

rationale: 如果其业务主要围绕支持传统、高能耗的运输工具，则可能助长对自然资源的低效利用和不可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 行业运营（如包装材料）可能产生废物，且若其分销的产品生命周期短或不可回收，则与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 通过提供公共交通系统所需的零部件，该行业间接支持可持续交通系统的维护和运行。但相关性取决于所服务交通系统的可持续性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all...)

rationale: 该行业若主要服务于化石燃料驱动的运输部门，则其经济活动与向低碳经济转型的气候行动目标存在根本性冲突。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 作为体育赛事组织者，推广自行车和赛马运动可能间接鼓励身体活动，有助于预防非传染性疾病，但影响较弱且非核心。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 该行业与赌博活动紧密相关，可能加剧赌博成瘾问题，这是一种行为成瘾，对心理健康和福祉产生显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 该行业为运动员、教练、管理人员、赛事运营人员等创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 大型赛事可能吸引游客，促进体育旅游和相关地方经济发展，从而创造就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 博彩行业存在较高的洗钱和非法资金流动风险，可能被有组织犯罪利用，对法治构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 博彩业的监管和运营过程中存在潜在的腐败和贿赂风险，例如在赛事结果操纵或执照发放方面。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 作为受严格监管的行业，其运营机构需要在法律框架内运作，这在一定程度上促进了问责制和透明度，但前提是监管有效。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 在日本等国家，竞轮、竞马等公营赌博的部分收入会作为税收上缴，可能被政府用于社会福利项目，间接惠及弱势群体。但这是一种间接且存在争议的贡献方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 赌博可能导致参与者，特别是低收入参与者，陷入财务困境，加剧贫困风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 赌博的财务损失可能不成比例地影响低收入群体，阻碍其收入增长，从而加剧不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, progressively achieve and sustain income growth of the bottom 40 per cent of the population at a rate higher than the national average

rationale: 作为劳动密集型的基础服务行业，高效的货物运输是实现经济多样化和提升整体生产率的关键支撑。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 货物汽车运输是经济基础设施（物流网络）的核心组成部分，直接支持商品流通和经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 优化运输路线和提高车辆装载率有助于更有效地利用燃料等资源，但整体影响取决于运营效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的货物运输是温室气体（尤其是二氧化碳）和空气污染物的主要排放源，对减缓气候变化构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 大型货运车辆参与道路交通，增加了发生严重交通事故的风险，对道路安全构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 柴油卡车等车辆排放的尾气（如颗粒物、氮氧化物）是造成空气污染和相关呼吸系统疾病的重要因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 长途货运司机可能面临长时间工作、疲劳驾驶、安全风险以及相对孤立的工作环境等劳动权益挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 向电动卡车、氢燃料电池车等清洁车辆技术转型，以及采用智能物流系统，是实现该行业可持续发展的关键路径，符合此子目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 城市内的货物运输可能加剧交通拥堵，并与公共交通、行人和非机动车争夺路权，对构建包容、安全的城市交通系统带来压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 货运车辆，特别是在城市地区，是局部空气污染和噪音污染的重要来源，增加了城市的人均环境负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 运输活动本身产生包装废物（如一次性包装材料），车辆运营消耗润滑油、轮胎等，这些物品的废弃处理不当会增加废物量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业生产砖、瓦等基础建筑材料，是建设和维护各类基础设施（如住房、公共建筑）所必需的，为基础设施发展提供了物质基础。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 粘土制品（如砖块）是建造经济适用房和改善贫民窟住房质量常用的主要建筑材料之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 粘土制品的生产严重依赖粘土等自然资源的开采，可能导致土地退化、资源枯竭，若管理不善则与自然资源的可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统的粘土烧制过程通常能耗高，并可能向大气排放温室气体（如CO2）和其他污染物（如氟化物、粉尘），对实现化学品和废物的无害化环境管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业直接创造了就业机会，为当地经济发展和实现充分就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 粘土制品制造业可能存在高温、粉尘等职业健康风险，如果工作场所安全措施不到位，可能对保护劳工权利和促进安全工作环境的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 麻是一种可再生、可生物降解的天然纤维，相比合成纤维（如涤纶）其生产通常对自然资源的压力较小，符合可持续资源管理的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，麻织物制造通过生产和销售产品贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更节水和清洁的生产技术来进行可持续改造，但其相关性取决于具体企业的实践，并非行业固有强关联。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 麻纤维的加工，特别是染色、漂白和精炼过程，通常需要大量用水并可能排放含有化学物质的废水，对水质构成污染风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 纺织品制造是水资源密集型产业，麻织物的生产过程中如果水资源管理不当，会导致水资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...)

rationale: 制造过程中可能产生废料（如边角料、不合格品），且某些化学处理可能产生有害废物，如果未妥善管理，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业专门零售大米和谷物等主食，是保障粮食安全、确保人们获得充足食物的关键分销环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 作为零售商，通过有效的库存管理和销售策略，可以在减少零售层面的食物浪费方面做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 如果该零售商优先采购来自可持续农业的谷物，则可以间接促进自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果零售过程中过度使用塑料等一次性包装材料，可能会增加废物产生，对目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业提供了就业机会，并支持了本地中小企业的经济活动，但这不是其最核心的影响。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 交易所通过为企业提供融资渠道，促进资本的有效配置，是维持人均经济增长的重要金融基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 交易所支持的企业发展能够创造就业机会，但其对实现充分和生产性就业的影响是间接的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 交易所（特别是新兴板块如创业板）为中小企业提供了重要的直接融资平台，帮助其融入更广阔的市场和价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 作为受监管的金融市场核心机构，交易所的规范运作本身有助于全球金融市场的稳定和监管。但其主要角色是执行而非制定法规，因此相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 交易所通过推出绿色债券板块、要求ESG信息披露等方式，可以引导资本支持气候变化应对措施，间接推动将气候行动纳入商业战略。但这种影响取决于交易所的具体政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 交易所的运作建立在透明度、问责制和规则之上，其本身是市场经济中一个需要保持高效、负责和透明的关键机构。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 作为零售业，该行业是重要的就业来源，为不同技能水平的劳动者提供工作岗位，直接贡献于实现充分就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 零售商通过其采购决策和产品选择，可以推动可持续消费模式，例如优先销售符合可持续生产标准（如FSC认证）的家具。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 通过推广使用可再生或回收材料制成的家具，以及销售耐用、可修复的产品，有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 通过销售高质量、耐用的家具减少更换频率，或提供旧家具回收/翻新服务，可以从源头上减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果销售的家具来自不可持续管理的森林或使用资源密集型材料，则会加剧自然资源的枯竭和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果主要销售廉价、不耐用的“快时尚”家具，会导致产品生命周期短，增加固体废物填埋量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果供应链中包含来自非法采伐或不可持续管理的木材，该行业的采购行为会直接或间接地助长森林砍伐和森林退化。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 洗衣业在生产过程中产生大量含有化学洗涤剂、漂白剂和有机物的废水。如果未经有效处理直接排放，会造成水污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 传统洗衣业是耗水大户。如果采用低效的设备和工艺，会导致水资源的大量消耗，加剧水资源短缺压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity...)

rationale: 洗衣业作为服务业，为不同技能水平的劳动者提供了就业机会，有助于实现充分就业。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 洗衣业工作环境常涉及高温、高湿、噪音以及接触化学品，若劳动保护不足，可能对工人的健康和安全构成威胁，尤其是在非正规就业中。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 洗衣业大量使用化学洗涤剂和溶剂。对这些化学品及其包装废弃物的管理不善，以及对含有害物质废水的处理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 行业可能产生塑料包装（如洗衣袋）、废弃化学品容器等固体废物，若未实施有效的减量、回收和再利用措施，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 提供清洁的纺织品（尤其是医院布草）有助于减少疾病传播，对健康有积极贡献。但同时，工作场所的化学品暴露和不当排放造成的污染也可能引发健康问题，存在双重影响，但整体上负面风险更突出。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 含有磷酸盐等营养素的洗涤废水若排入河流并最终进入海洋，可能导致沿海水域的富营养化，危害海洋生态系统。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution)

rationale: 制造安全、有效、高质量的医疗用品（如注射器、敷料、基本器械）是提供基本医疗服务、实现全民健康覆盖不可或缺的物质基础。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 医疗用品的稳定生产和供应是加强各国（尤其是在突发公共卫生事件中）卫生风险管理和应对能力的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术、提高资源效率来升级其制造过程，使其更具可持续性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 医疗用品制造业依赖于持续的研发和创新，以开发更有效、更安全、更易用的新产品和制造工艺。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 医疗用品制造过程可能使用化学品并产生有害废物（如溶剂、塑料废弃物），如果管理不当，可能对环境（空气、水、土壤）和人类健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业可能产生大量包装废物和一次性产品相关的废弃物，若未有效实施废物减量、回收和再利用策略，将对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 整毛业在加工过程中使用化学品（如洗涤剂、助剂），若管理不善，其废水、废渣可能对环境（水、土壤）和人类健康造成负面影响，与实现化学品和废物的环境无害化管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 加工过程会产生大量废水和高有机负荷的固体废物（如泥沙、植物性杂质），若未有效处理或回收，则增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过技术手段，可以回收加工过程中的副产品，如从废水中提取羊毛脂进行再利用，从而通过回收减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 整毛业是重度水污染行业，排放的废水含有高浓度有机物、悬浮物和残留化学品，若未经充分处理直接排放，会严重恶化水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业为当地社区提供一定的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 工作环境可能暴露于潮湿、化学品、粉尘等职业危害中，若职业健康与安全措施不到位，则对工人的安全和健康构成风险，与促进安全工作环境的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 通过采用节水、节能技术和改进废水处理工艺，整毛业可以进行可持续性升级，提高资源利用效率，符合可持续产业升级的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 燃气行业通过管道网络提供相对可靠和现代的能源服务，有助于确保部分地区的能源获取，尤其是在城市和工业区。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 燃气管道网络是国家能源基础设施的关键组成部分，支持经济和工业活动。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 行业自身可能通过采用更高效、泄漏更少的技术进行升级，但其核心产品（天然气）并非长期可持续的清洁技术，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 当天然气用于替代更污染的固体燃料（如煤、生物质）进行烹饪和取暖时，有助于减少室内空气污染，改善公共健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 天然气作为一种化石燃料，其燃烧是二氧化碳排放的主要来源，其持续大规模使用与将气候变化措施纳入国家政策以实现深度脱碳的目标根本冲突。甲烷（天然气主要成分）泄漏也加剧温室效应。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 天然气是不可再生资源，其开采和消耗本身不符合资源的长期可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 燃气开采和生产过程（如水力压裂）可能涉及化学品使用和废水产生，存在污染水土的风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 行业运营可能产生工业废物，但其核心负面影响不在于废物产生，而在于其产品的消费导致温室气体排放。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为金融中介，该行业通过引导资本投资于各类企业，直接支持国家和全球的经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 通过风险投资、私募股权和替代性融资平台，该行业为中小微企业提供了传统银行之外的重要融资渠道，支持其创立、发展和创新。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业通过提供投资和金融服务，帮助中小企业（包括发展中国家的企业）获得资金并融入更广阔的市场和价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 作为“证券类似业”，其活动可能比传统银行业务更不透明或监管更宽松，若监管不力，可能加剧金融市场的系统性风险和不稳定，从而对实现有效的金融监管目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 作为投资者，该行业可以通过环境、社会和治理（ESG）投资原则，推动被投资公司采纳可持续实践和进行可持续发展报告。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 如果该行业忽视ESG因素，纯粹追求短期财务回报，其投资决策可能支持不可持续的企业行为，阻碍可持续实践的实施。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 该行业可以通过将气候变化风险和机遇纳入投资分析和决策过程，间接推动企业和国家层面将气候措施纳入战略规划。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果该行业持续为高碳排放行业（如化石燃料开采）提供大量资金，则会阻碍向低碳经济的转型，对抗击气候变化的努力产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业可以通过绿色债券、影响力投资等方式，参与动员气候资金，支持发展中国家的减缓气候变化行动。
sdg_target_description: Implement the commitment undertaken by developed-country parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change to a goal of mobilizing jointly $100 billion annually by 2020 from all sources to address the needs of developing countries in the context of meaningful mitigation actions and transparency on implementation and fully operationalize the Green Climate Fund through its capitalization as soon as possible

rationale: 提供符合人体工程学、支撑良好的床垫有助于改善睡眠质量，而优质睡眠是预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康的关键因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济生产力，并可通过产品创新和技术升级（如智能床垫）带来附加值。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 床垫制造业提供了生产性就业岗位，对实现充分就业有直接贡献，但其体面工作条件（如化学品暴露风险）需要关注。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果行业采用可持续采购的原材料（如来自可持续林业的木材、有机棉花），则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。但这并非行业普遍实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统床垫制造可能使用阻燃剂、粘合剂等有害化学品，其生产过程和废弃床垫若处理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险，与无害化化学品管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 床垫体积大、材料复杂（金属、泡沫、织物），回收困难，是城市固体废物的主要来源之一。行业普遍存在的'一次性'消费模式和低回收率对减少废物目标构成显著挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作家和艺术家通过其作品（如教育书籍、教程、启发性的艺术）间接促进技能发展和终身学习。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 文学和艺术是传播可持续发展理念、促进文化间理解和欣赏文化多样性的核心媒介。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development)

rationale: 该行业本质上是创意和创业的，支持以创造力为基础的生产性活动和就业。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 作家和艺术家行业常以非标准、项目制或自由职业为主，可能导致工作不稳定、收入波动和缺乏社会保障，与体面工作的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 作为创意产业的一部分，该行业通过文化创新和内容创作贡献于产业多元化，尽管与技术发展的直接关联较弱。
sdg_target_description: (Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries... including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities)

rationale: 作家和艺术家通过创作和诠释，在保护和弘扬文化遗产（包括非物质文化遗产）方面发挥着至关重要的作用。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 该行业依赖于并倡导表达自由和信息的自由流通，这是其创作活动的基石。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements)

rationale: 通过文化外交、国际艺术合作和文学翻译，该行业促进跨国界的知识共享和文化交流。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge sharing...)

rationale: 创意产业内的合作伙伴关系（如联合出版、艺术展览）有助于为实现可持续发展目标调动和共享资源。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources...)

rationale: 动力传导装置是工业机械、运输设备和基础设施（如发电厂）的核心部件。制造高效、耐用的传动系统对于升级和改造产业与基础设施，提高其资源使用效率至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业涉及精密工程和材料科学，持续的研发和创新对于提高传动效率、减少摩擦损失、轻量化设计和延长使用寿命至关重要，这有助于提升整体工业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 风力涡轮机等可再生能源设备严重依赖高性能的齿轮箱和传动系统。因此，该行业通过为清洁能源基础设施提供关键部件，间接但重要地支持可再生能源比例的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，动力传导装置制造通过提供高价值的精密部件，支持整体工业生产力的提升，并创造技术性就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 高效的传动装置可以减少能源在传递过程中的损失，从而提高整个机械系统的能源效率，促进自然资源的更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及金属切削、热处理和表面处理，会产生废料、废液和能耗。如果环境管理不善，可能导致废物产生和污染，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 表面处理钢材是建筑、交通等基础设施和制造业的关键材料，其耐腐蚀和长寿命特性有助于提高资源利用效率，构建更可持续和耐用的基础设施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过表面处理延长钢材使用寿命，减少了因腐蚀损坏而导致的频繁更换，从而促进了对钢材资源的更可持续管理和更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 表面处理过程（如电镀、酸洗、涂装）可能使用和产生有害化学品、重金属污泥和废水，若管理不当，会对环境和人体健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的废水可能含有重金属离子、酸性或碱性物质以及其他处理剂，是工业水污染的潜在来源，对改善水质构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 生产环境中工人可能接触化学品、高温和机械设备，存在职业健康与安全风险，需要严格的安全措施来保护工人。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，文具和办公用品制造通过生产和创新活动，为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业是轻工业的一部分，其发展有助于促进工业化和创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业大量消耗纸张、塑料和金属等自然资源，如果采购和生产过程不可持续，将对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程本身可能产生工业废料，且许多文具和办公用品（尤其是一次性或低质量塑料制品）最终成为固体废物，增加了废物管理的负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 行业内领先的公司可以通过采用环保材料、实施绿色制造和发布可持续发展报告来做出积极贡献，但这并非行业普遍做法。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 如果制造文具所用的纸张来源于不可持续的林业实践，则会直接或间接地助长森林砍伐，与可持续森林管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 停车场运营作为服务业，直接创造就业机会（如管理员、保安、维护人员），并支持中小企业的运营（许多停车场由中小企业管理）。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 旅游交通严重依赖停车设施，停车场业是支持旅游业基础设施的一部分，间接促进与旅游相关的就业和地方经济。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 停车场是城市交通基础设施的一个组成部分，为经济活动（如商业区、住宅区）提供必要的服务。但其可持续性和公平性取决于具体管理和规划。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 过度依赖或便利私家车使用的停车场，可能与发展可持续公共交通系统的目标相悖，从而加剧交通拥堵、道路安全问题，并可能忽视弱势群体的出行需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 低效或过量的停车场占用城市土地，可能导致城市蔓延，土地利用效率低下，与可持续和包容性城市规划的原则相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries

rationale: 鼓励私家车出行可能增加道路上的车辆数量，从而潜在地增加交通事故的风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 支持以化石燃料为动力的汽车使用会增加空气污染（如PM2.5、氮氧化物），对公共健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 传统停车场基础设施便利了高碳排放的交通方式，若未与低碳政策（如电动汽车充电、与公共交通衔接）整合，则与国家气候行动目标不一致。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 信息提供服务（如在线课程平台、技能培训资料库）是获取知识和技能的重要渠道，直接帮助青年和成年人提升就业和创业所需技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业通过提供市场数据、行业分析、商业情报等信息，帮助企业进行决策、技术创新和效率提升，从而促进经济生产力的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 信息提供服务本身是数字基础设施的关键组成部分，其发展和普及有助于构建高质量、可靠的信息基础设施，支持经济社会发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为ICT服务的一部分，该行业的存在和扩展依赖于并反过来促进互联网的普及和信息的可及性，尤其是在提供有价值的内容服务方面。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 通过提供公开数据、政策信息和公共服务内容，该行业有助于提高机构的透明度和问责制。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 该行业的核心业务就是确保公众能够获取信息，是实现此子目标最直接的贡献者之一。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements

rationale: 信息提供服务是知识共享和国际合作的基础平台，促进科学、技术和创新知识的传播与交流。
sdg_target_description: Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge sharing on mutually agreed terms, including through improved coordination among existing mechanisms, particularly at the United Nations level, and through a global technology facilitation mechanism

rationale: 如果提供的信息包含虚假新闻、误导性内容或用于操纵舆论，则会损害机构的有效性和公信力，对此目标产生潜在的消极影响。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 如果信息提供服务传播的是受限制的、非法的或不准确的信息，或者其运营方式侵犯隐私等基本自由，则会对“确保公众获取信息”的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements

rationale: 石棉制品制造和使用是导致间皮瘤、肺癌等职业病和公共健康危机的主要原因，与减少危险物质导致的疾病和死亡的目标直接冲突。即使岩棉作为替代品，其生产过程中的纤维若控制不当，也对工人健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 石棉制品制造业历史上对工人健康造成严重危害，违背安全工作环境的目标。即使在现代岩棉生产中，也存在职业暴露于矿物纤维的风险，需要严格的安全措施来缓解。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 岩棉制品作为高效的保温隔热材料，在升级建筑和工业基础设施以提高能源效率和可持续性方面发挥着关键作用，支持清洁技术的应用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes.

rationale: 岩棉产品具有优异的防火性能，能够显著提高建筑物的防火安全，减少火灾灾害造成的人员伤亡和经济损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations.

rationale: 石棉废物的处理是一个重大的环境挑战，需要极其谨慎的无害化管理。整个石棉产品生命周期的管理不善会对人类健康和环境造成持久危害。岩棉生产过程中的废物管理也需要符合高标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业有积极贡献，但其'体面工作'的程度高度依赖于职业健康与安全措施的执行情况。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 内陆水产养殖通过生产动物蛋白，直接为粮食安全和营养做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 如果采用可持续实践（如循环水养殖、多营养级综合养殖），该行业可以成为可持续和有韧性的粮食生产系统的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 内陆养殖业通常由中小型企业或个体户经营，为农村地区创造了就业和生计机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 某些内陆养殖场可能与休闲垂钓或观光农业相结合，间接支持可持续旅游业和当地产品推广。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 与捕捞渔业相比，养殖业在理想情况下可以更有效地利用水资源和饲料资源，实现可持续管理。但相关性取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统的内陆养殖可能使用抗生素、消毒剂和其他化学品，其废水排放若未经处理会对水体和土壤造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 虽然目标主要针对小岛屿发展中国家和最不发达国家的海洋资源，但其原则——通过可持续水产养殖增加经济效益——同样适用于内陆水域，尤其是在发展中国家。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism

rationale: 内陆养殖排放的富含营养物质（氮、磷）的废水是重要的陆源污染，可导致内陆水体乃至沿海水域的富营养化。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 不合理的养殖设施建设（如围堰、清塘）可能破坏内陆水域的自然生态系统和生物多样性，间接影响河流生态系统的健康及其与海洋的连接。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 养殖逃逸的非本地物种可能对本地鱼类种群造成竞争或疾病传播等负面影响，干扰基于生态系统的渔业管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 虽然UNCLOS主要针对海洋，但其体现的可持续利用原则也适用于国际水道。不当的内陆养殖可能违背相关国际协议或国家法规中关于水资源保护和可持续利用的精神。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources by implementing international law as reflected in United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea (UNCLOS), which provides the legal framework for the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources, as recalled in paragraph 158 of "The future we want"

rationale: 养殖废水是内陆水体点源或面源污染的重要来源，对实现水质改善目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 共済事業作为一种非正式或补充性的社会保障机制，通过成员间的风险共担，为参与者（包括弱势群体）提供财务安全网，防止其因意外事件陷入贫困。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 提供健康相关的共済（互助保险），帮助成员分担医疗费用，是实现全民健康覆盖（UHC）中“财务风险保护”的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 共済事業的合作性质通常更具包容性，可能以可负担的方式服务于低收入群体或被主流金融保险服务排斥的人群，促进其经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 通过提供财产、灾害等保险共済，帮助个人和社区在灾害后恢复，减少直接经济损失，增强社区韧性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations

rationale: 作为一项事业，其运营本身会创造就业机会。但其主要影响在于风险保障而非直接就业创造，故相关性为中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 乳制品是重要的营养来源，提供蛋白质、钙和维生素，有助于消除饥饿和确保食物安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 强化乳制品有助于解决微量营养素缺乏等营养不良问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

rationale: 适量摄入乳制品作为均衡饮食的一部分，有助于预防营养不良相关疾病，促进整体健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 乳制品制造业是农业价值链中的重要环节，创造就业并推动农村经济发展和技术升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 乳制品生产依赖大量水资源和土地资源（用于饲料种植），若管理不善可能导致资源不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过加工和包装，乳制品制造可以延长牛奶的保质期，减少供应链中的食物损失。但也可能因过度包装或产品滞销造成浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 生产过程中使用的清洁剂、消毒剂以及产生的乳清等废水若处理不当，可能对环境造成化学污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 乳制品包装（如塑料、纸盒）会产生大量固体废物，对废物减量目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 乳品加工废水含有高浓度的有机物（如BOD/COD），如果未经充分处理排放，会严重污染水体。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 乳制品制造是用水密集型产业，从清洗设备到产品成分都消耗大量水资源，对水资源效率构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 乳制品行业，特别是与畜牧业相关的环节（甲烷排放）和能源密集的加工过程，是温室气体的重要来源，对气候变化有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 为满足奶牛饲养需求而进行的牧场扩张或饲料作物种植，可能导致森林砍伐和自然栖息地退化，影响生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过商品流通和价值增值促进经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 宝石和贵金属制品属于高价值商品，其贸易活动有助于经济多元化并可能带动相关服务业（如鉴定、设计）的发展。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 批发商可能作为连接小型生产商（如手工匠人）与更大市场的桥梁，促进其融入价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果采购的宝石和贵金属来自不可持续的开采活动，会导致自然资源（矿产、水、土地）的枯竭和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 采矿活动产生大量废石和尾矿，造成严重的废弃物问题。批发商若未推动可追溯和负责任的供应链，则间接关联于此负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 宝石和贵金属开采，尤其是使用汞或氰化物等化学品的开采，是水污染的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业的供应链，特别是在小规模和手工采矿中，存在严重的童工、强迫劳动、不安全的工作条件等侵犯劳工权利的风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 采矿活动直接导致栖息地破坏、森林砍伐和土地退化，威胁陆地生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: '冲突矿产'或'血钻'贸易是非法资金流动和有组织犯罪的典型例子。不负责任的采购可能助长此类活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 资源开采行业腐败风险高，批发商若缺乏透明度，其供应链可能涉及贿赂和腐败行为。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 作为基础的制造业，该行业通过木材加工创造经济价值并提供就业机会，贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业提供制造业岗位，为实现充分就业做出贡献，但其‘体面工作’的程度取决于具体的工作条件和安全保障。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 制材业可能存在工伤风险（如机械操作、粉尘），如果工作场所安全措施不到位，则对保护工人安全和劳工权利构成潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 作为工业制造部门的一部分，该行业直接贡献于工业化进程及其在就业和国内生产总值中的份额。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs))

rationale: 木材是一种可再生资源。如果行业采用高效、清洁的生产技术（如废水处理、能源回收），并生产可持续的建筑材料，则有助于产业升级和资源效率提高。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities)

rationale: 该行业的核心原材料是木材这一自然资源。如果木材采购自可持续管理的森林，则直接支持自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制材过程可能使用化学防腐剂，并产生锯末、废水和废弃木材等废物。如果这些化学品和废物管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 木材加工过程本身会产生大量锯末和边角料等固体废物，若未有效进行减量化、回收或再利用，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 木材产品作为碳汇，有助于减缓气候变化。使用木材替代高能耗建材（如钢铁、混凝土）可减少碳排放，间接支持气候行动。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 该行业严重依赖森林资源。如果木材来源不可持续，例如来自非法采伐或不可持续管理的森林，将直接导致森林生态系统退化，严重威胁其保护和可持续利用。这是该行业最主要的潜在负面影响之一。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements)

rationale: 不可持续的木材需求是导致毁林和森林退化的主要驱动因素之一。如果行业采购政策不强调可持续认证（如FSC, PEFC），则会对推动森林可持续管理和遏制毁林的目标产生显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 该行业生产食品级糖类，作为能量来源，有助于确保食物供应。但糖类并非'营养'食物的核心，其贡献是间接且有限的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 过量消费添加糖是肥胖、2型糖尿病、心血管疾病等非传染性疾病的主要风险因素。该行业生产的产品若不加节制地消费，会对此目标构成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济产出和生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，对实现充分就业有积极贡献，但需确保工作条件符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 传统的糖类精炼过程可能消耗大量水和能源，并产生废水等污染物。若未采用清洁技术和资源高效工艺，会对该目标产生负面影响。其影响程度取决于具体生产工艺。
