sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 糖类制造（尤其依赖特定农作物时）可能涉及大量的水、土地和能源资源消耗，若管理不当，不利于自然资源的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 制造过程可能产生有机废料、废水和其他副产品，若未有效进行废物管理和回收，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 质屋为难以获得传统银行贷款的个人（特别是贫困和脆弱群体）提供了获取小额紧急资金的渠道，这是一种非传统的金融服务形式，有助于确保其获得经济资源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 质屋本身属于小微企业，其存在支持了地方经济和一种特定形式的创业。同时，它也可能间接为其他小微企业和个人提供维持生计或应对现金流短缺的资金。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 如果质屋的运营不规范，可能存在劳工权益问题，例如员工薪酬过低或工作环境不安全。此评分较低，因为这是潜在风险而非行业固有属性，但需纳入考量。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 质屋的服务在一定程度上促进了经济包容，为被主流金融机构边缘化的群体提供了金融支持。但其积极影响可能因高利率等因素而打折扣。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 质屋的核心业务模式基于二手商品的质押和流通。当抵押品未被赎回时，这些物品会作为二手货再次出售，这直接促进了产品的再利用，延长了其生命周期，有助于从源头上减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 如果质屋的贷款利率过高或条款苛刻，可能使本就经济困难的借款人陷入债务循环，反而加剧其经济脆弱性，这与确保贫困群体获得有益经济资源的目标相悖。此消极影响与上述积极影响（1.4 Positive）并存，需综合看待。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 该行业生产的管道是建设饮用水输送网络的核心部件，直接支持安全饮水供应基础设施的普及。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all

rationale: 该行业生产的管道是建设污水处理和卫生设施系统（如下水道）不可或缺的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations

rationale: 管道是能源、水利、工业等几乎所有类型基础设施的血管系统。该行业为构建优质、可靠、可持续和有韧性的基础设施提供基础材料。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过提供用于升级工业流程（如高效流体输送系统）和环保基础设施（如废水处理厂管道）的组件，间接支持产业可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 管道是住房内供水、排水、供暖等基本服务的核心组成部分，对实现 adequate housing 和 basic services 至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业的生产过程（如金属冶炼、加工）通常消耗大量能源和原材料（如铁矿石），若管理不善，可能导致自然资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 管道加工过程会产生金属切屑、废料和可能有害的冷却剂等废物，若未有效管理和回收，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供了就业机会。但其工作环境（如噪音、粉尘）和待遇是否符合‘体面工作’标准，取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业通过开采非金属矿物支持建筑和制造业，为经济增长和生产力提供基础原材料，属于资源密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 碎石、沙子等非金属矿物是建设道路、桥梁、建筑等基础设施不可或缺的基础材料。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 非金属矿物的开采，特别是如果管理不善，会导致资源枯竭、土地退化，与自然资源的可持续管理目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 采矿过程会产生大量废石和尾矿，是固体废物的重要来源，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 采矿活动可能通过径流、渗滤液污染地下水和水体，含有沉积物或化学物质，恶化水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 露天采矿等活动会直接清除植被、破坏土壤结构、改变地形，对陆地生态系统造成严重且通常是不可逆的破坏。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 采矿活动导致自然栖息地丧失和碎片化，是生物多样性丧失的主要驱动因素之一。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 采矿作业（如钻探、爆破、运输）产生的粉尘（如硅尘）会危害工人和附近居民呼吸系统健康，存在职业安全风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 冷藏仓库通过防止易腐食品变质，确保食物供应链的稳定，有助于全年提供安全、有营养的食物，特别是对于保障粮食安全至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 冷藏仓库对于安全储存疫苗、血液制品和某些药品至关重要，这些是防治传染病的医疗干预措施的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 通过防止食品因不当储存而腐败变质，减少了食源性疾病的风险，从而有助于减少由受污染食品引起的疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 冷藏仓库是现代供应链和物流系统的关键部分，支持农业、食品加工和制药等高附加值产业的发展，通过减少损耗和提高效率来提升经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 冷藏链是支撑食品、医药等关键行业可持续发展的优质、可靠的基础设施，对于保障民生和经济韧性至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 冷藏仓库的核心功能是减少食品在供应链（特别是从生产到零售之间）的损失，这是实现该子目标最直接和重要的贡献之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 冷藏仓库是能源密集型设施，如果使用老旧、低效的制冷设备，其高能耗会对提高全球能源效率的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 传统冷藏仓库消耗大量电力（可能来自化石燃料），并且可能使用具有高全球变暖潜势（GWP）的制冷剂，这两种情况都会导致温室气体排放，与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过分销洗涤剂和卫生用品，该行业间接支持改善家庭和公共环境的卫生条件，有助于减少由不洁环境引起的疾病。但其分销的产品若含有害化学物质，则可能产生负面影响，不过批发商对产品成分的控制力有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 该行业分销的某些洗涤剂若含有磷等成分，最终用户使用后可能造成水体富营养化，对水质产生间接负面影响。批发商虽不直接排放，但其供应链的影响需被考虑。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业本身是劳动密集型产业，提供就业机会，并通过高效的物流和供应链管理促进经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 批发行业通常服务于大量中小型零售商，支持其业务运营和发展，间接促进了中小企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises.

rationale: 该行业分销的化妆品和洗涤剂通常含有化学成分。如果这些产品在整个生命周期（包括使用后处置）中未能得到环境无害化管理，会对环境和健康造成风险。批发商在供应链中的责任主要是传递产品，但其选择的产品线会影响整体影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 该行业分销的产品通常使用大量塑料包装（如瓶子、容器）， contributes to plastic waste generation。批发环节本身的运营（如运输包装）也可能产生废弃物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 如果该批发商积极选择并推广带有环保认证、可生物降解或采用可持续包装的产品，并向下游零售商传递相关信息，则可以间接促进消费者对可持续生活方式的认知。但这取决于企业的具体实践，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature.

rationale: 光学仪器（如显微镜、光谱仪）是进行科学研究和技术创新的基础工具，直接增强了各产业部门，特别是高科技行业的技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 光学医疗设备（如内窥镜、手术显微镜、诊断成像系统）是实现高质量、精准医疗服务的核心组成部分，有助于全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 光学仪器是科学、技术、工程和数学（STEM）教育及职业技术培训中不可或缺的教学工具，有助于培养具备相关技能的人才。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 光学仪器制造业本身是高科技产业，其发展和技术转移可以支持发展中国家的国内技术研发和产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 光学仪器制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品（如蚀刻液、镀膜材料）和稀有金属，其生命周期末端（如电子废物）若管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 精密光学元件的制造可能产生废料（如不合格镜片、金属碎屑），且产品生命周期相对较短（如消费电子产品中的摄像头），可能增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产工业基础材料，直接贡献于工业增长、就业和GDP。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术和提高资源效率来做出贡献，但其核心产品（塑料板）本身的可持续性存在争议，因此相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 合成树脂制造过程通常涉及有害化学品的使用和排放，如果管理不当，会对环境和人类健康构成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的一次性塑料产品或难以回收的复合材料是固体废物的重要来源，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料废弃物，包括来自此类产品的废弃物，是海洋塑料污染的主要来源之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 该行业通过钻凿水井，为缺乏集中供水系统的地区提供获取安全饮用水的重要途径。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all

rationale: 通过钻探高效的水井，可以优化地下水的开采和供应，有助于应对水资源短缺问题，但需要以可持续的方式进行管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity...

rationale: 该行业为地热发电和供暖系统钻凿地热井，是开发和利用地热能这一可再生能源的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 钻井是建设水资源供应、能源开采（包括清洁能源）等基础设施不可或缺的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being...

rationale: 如果该行业的核心业务是钻探石油或天然气井，则会直接支持化石燃料的开采和消费，加剧温室气体排放，与应对气候变化的措施背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 钻井活动可能破坏地表植被、土壤结构，并存在污染地下水或影响当地生态系统的风险，对陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 助産所提供专业的分娩服务和孕产妇护理，是降低孕产妇死亡率的关键设施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births

rationale: 助産所提供的专业新生儿护理和产后指导，有助于预防新生儿和婴儿的死亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age...

rationale: 助産所作为社区层面的基层医疗设施，提高了孕产妇和新生儿基本医疗服务的可及性，是全民健康覆盖的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage... access to quality essential health-care services

rationale: 助产士行业主要由女性主导，助産所的运营为女性提供了经济参与和领导职位的机会。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 助産所通过提供安全的分娩服务和生殖健康咨询，保障了女性的生殖健康和权利。
sdg_target_description: Ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health and reproductive rights...

rationale: 如果助産所的分布不均或服务费用对低收入群体构成障碍，可能会加剧在获得基本医疗服务方面的不平等。这是一种潜在的负面影响，但其程度取决于具体的地理和社会经济背景。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 农业服务通过提供技术、咨询和资源管理支持，直接帮助小规模生产者提高农业生产力和收入，是其核心价值所在。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...)

rationale: 服务内容如土壤健康管理、病虫害综合防治和节水灌溉，直接促进可持续和有韧性的农业生产实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...)

rationale: 农业服务通过推广精准农业、优化水肥利用，直接促进自然资源（水、土壤、养分）的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 土壤保护、侵蚀控制和可持续土地管理服务有助于防治土地退化和恢复土壤健康。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...)

rationale: 灌溉系统设计、维护和节水技术咨询等服务直接有助于提高农业领域的用水效率。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals...)

rationale: 如果农业服务包含或导致对化学农药、化肥的过度依赖和不妥善管理，可能对环境造成负面影响，与化学品无害化管理的目标相悖。此影响取决于具体服务内容，故相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 类似对12.4的分析，不当的农业化学服务可能导致化肥和农药径流，造成水体污染，对改善水质的目标产生潜在消极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals...)

rationale: 剧场和演艺场馆是文化创意产业的重要组成部分，直接创造演员、导演、舞台技术、行政管理等多种体面工作机会，并支持中小型文化企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 著名的剧场和特色演出是吸引游客的重要文化资源，能促进可持续旅游业发展，创造就业并推广当地文化。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 剧场是表演艺术的载体，其运营直接致力于保护、传承和弘扬无形文化遗产（如传统戏剧、音乐、舞蹈），是城市文化保护的核心努力之一。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 作为向公众开放的文化空间，剧场在提供包容性公共空间方面发挥作用，但其可达性（如对残疾人的便利设施）和普遍访问程度因具体场馆而异。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 剧场通过艺术表演这一非正式教育形式，能够传播思想、促进文化多样性理解、探讨社会议题，有助于培养全球公民意识和对文化贡献于可持续发展的欣赏。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 通过提供文化参与机会，剧场可以在一定程度上促进社会包容。但门票价格、地理位置等因素可能限制其普惠性，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 剧场运营可能产生大量废弃物，如演出宣传单、节目册、布景材料、餐饮包装等。若缺乏有效的废物管理和回收措施，会对该子目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 虽然剧场本身促进文化旅游，但其运营（如能源密集型灯光音响、观众交通带来的碳排放）若未被有效监测和管理，可能对可持续旅游的总体环境影响产生轻微的负面贡献。
sdg_target_description: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 作为农耕用品的零售渠道，该行业为小规模生产者提供了获取提高生产力所需的关键投入品（如种子、肥料、工具）的途径，直接支持农业生产力和收入的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 该行业的潜在积极贡献取决于其是否积极推广和销售可持续农业实践所需的投入品，如有机肥、生物农药、节水灌溉设备等。但作为一般零售商，其产品组合可能包含非可持续产品，因此相关性为中等且具有条件性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 如果该零售商主要销售传统化学肥料和农药，会鼓励可能导致土壤退化、水资源污染和自然资源低效利用的农业生产模式，对自然资源的可持续管理构成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 农药和某些化肥的零售直接关联到化学品的生命周期管理。不当销售和使用这些化学品会导致其向环境释放，对环境和健康造成危害。零售商在提供安全使用指导和推动环保产品方面负有责任，但通常被视为风险点。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 推广可能导致土壤退化的农业投入品（如过量使用化肥破坏土壤结构）与该目标相悖，间接助长了需要被防治的土地退化问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业本身创造了一定的就业机会，支持了地方经济。但其对体面工作和经济增长的直接贡献相对有限，且非其核心业务活动的主要影响。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 地铁是城市优质、可靠、可持续和具有韧性的交通基础设施的典型代表，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉，并提供普惠的交通服务。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 地铁行业的核心业务就是提供安全、大容量、相对环保的公共交通系统，是实现城市可持续交通的关键。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 作为低碳排放的公共交通方式，地铁的运营是将气候变化减缓措施（从私人交通向公共交通转移）纳入城市规划和交通政策的具体体现。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过吸引乘客使用相对更安全的地铁而非私人汽车或摩托车，有助于减少道路交通事故的伤亡人数。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 地铁系统在单位乘客公里的能源消耗上通常远低于私人汽车，代表了更高效的能源利用方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 地铁运营需要司机、维护人员、管理人员等，创造了大量的就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 地铁线路的建设和日常运营（如维修、乘客产生的垃圾）会产生大量废弃物，如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 地铁隧道和车站的地下施工可能直接破坏土壤结构、地下水系，并对沿线地表生态系统和生物栖息地造成干扰或破坏。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 汽车批发业作为供应链的关键环节，支持生产性活动，并为物流、销售和管理领域创造就业机会，特别是促进中小型经销商企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业依赖于并支持高效、可靠的交通和物流基础设施网络，以确保车辆从制造商到零售点的顺畅流通，从而支撑经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业积极推广和批发电动汽车等清洁技术车辆，则直接有助于采用环境无害化的技术，推动交通产业的可持续升级。此相关性取决于其销售组合中对清洁车辆的侧重程度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 如果其业务核心是批发传统燃油车，则会鼓励对化石燃料等自然资源的低效和不可持续消耗，与资源的可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为高排放车辆分销渠道的一部分，该行业若不以支持低碳转型的方式运营，则实质上抵消了将气候变化措施纳入国家政策的努力。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 批发和推广燃油车会导致城市空气污染和温室气体排放增加，对城市环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 与燃油车尾气排放相关的空气污染是导致呼吸系统疾病等健康问题的重要原因，该行业若主导分销此类车辆，则对此目标有消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业通过安全、卫生地处理遗体，防止因尸体处理不当导致的疾病传播，是公共卫生风险管理体系的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: 加强各国，特别是发展中国家早期预警、减少风险以及管理和应对国家和全球健康风险的能力

rationale: 葬礼服务（如在殡仪馆、墓地举行的仪式）为社区提供了进行哀悼和纪念活动的社会空间，有助于社会心理健康和社区凝聚力，具有一定程度的包容性。
sdg_target_description: 到2030年，向所有人提供安全、包容、无障碍、绿色的公共空间，尤其是妇女、儿童、老年人和残疾人

rationale: 传统火葬过程可能排放汞（来自牙齿填充物）、二噁英等有害物质，并对这些物质的管理提出挑战，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: 到2020年，根据商定的国际框架，在化学品和所有废物的整个生命周期内实现其无害环境管理，并大幅减少它们排入大气、水和土壤，以尽量减少它们对人类健康和环境的不利影响

rationale: 火葬消耗化石燃料或天然气，直接产生碳排放，属于资源消耗和废物（温室气体）产生过程。传统土葬也可能占用土地资源。
sdg_target_description: 到2030年，通过预防、减排、回收和再利用，大幅减少废物的产生

rationale: 火葬是温室气体（主要是CO2）的一个排放源，对气候变化有贡献，这凸显了将该行业纳入更广泛的气候政策和减排规划的必要性。
sdg_target_description: 将气候变化措施纳入国家政策、战略和规划

rationale: 作为食品供应链的关键环节，该批发活动通过高效的物流网络，有助于确保食物的可及性和供应，特别是日常消费品的稳定分销。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业主要批发高糖、高脂、高加工度的糖果和面包类食品，这些产品的过度消费与营养不良（如肥胖）相关，可能对实现改善营养的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

rationale: 大量分销不健康的加工食品可能助长不健康的饮食习惯，增加肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险，与促进健康和福祉的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为分销业的一部分，该行业通过优化物流和供应链管理，为经济增长和生产率提升做出贡献，并创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业对易腐食品（如面包）的库存管理、物流效率和分销速度直接影响供应链中的食物浪费水平。高效的运营有助于减少食物损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 该行业分销的产品通常使用大量一次性塑料或过度包装，可能增加废物产生，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 石油精炼产品（如液化石油气、煤油）是当前为全球人口，特别是部分发展中地区，提供现代能源服务的重要来源之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 现代炼油厂通过采用更高效的工艺和设备，可以提升自身的能源效率，对整体能效提升有微弱的正面贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 炼油副产品沥青是道路等基础设施建设的关键材料。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...

rationale: 炼油行业自身通过采用更清洁的生产技术（如脱硫技术）进行升级改造，可被视为向更环保技术过渡的一部分，但贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...

rationale: 石油精炼过程涉及大量危险化学品，其生产、储存和废物处理若管理不当，会对环境和人类健康构成严重风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...

rationale: 炼油过程会产生大量的工业废料和污泥，是工业废物的重要来源之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 石油精炼及其产品的燃烧是二氧化碳等温室气体的主要排放源，是导致气候变化的核心因素，与气候行动目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 炼油厂排放的空气污染物（如PM2.5、SOx、NOx）以及潜在的水体和土壤污染，严重威胁周边居民的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 炼油过程需要大量水并产生含油废水及有毒化学品，若处理不当，会对水体造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 该行业通过专业化的工业用水供应和管理，直接致力于提高工业部门的用水效率，并通过循环利用等方式确保淡水供应的可持续性，以应对水资源短缺问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 工业用水道业通常包含废水处理环节，通过减少污染物排放、增加废水回收和安全再利用，直接有助于改善水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 工业供水系统是支撑工业生产和经济发展的关键、可靠的基础设施，其可持续管理使其成为可持续基础设施的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过优化工业用水流程，促进了水资源这一关键自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过废水处理和循环利用，该行业有助于减少工业活动产生的废水（一种液态废物）的最终排放量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果工业用水取水过量或管理不当，可能会对河流、含水层等与水相关的生态系统造成压力，影响其健康和恢复能力。这是潜在的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes

rationale: 如果工业废水处理不彻底，含有污染物的排放水最终可能进入海洋，造成海洋污染。这是需要严格管理以避免的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为批发业，该行业通过商品流通促进了经济活动，但其对技术创新和生产效率提升的直接贡献有限，相关性中等偏下。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 皮革供应链（从畜牧业到制革厂）长期以来存在工作条件恶劣、使用童工等劳工权利问题。作为该供应链中的关键一环，批发商若不对其供应商进行尽职调查，则间接助长了这些负面实践。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 皮革生产是资源密集型产业，需要大量的水、土地（用于畜牧业）和化学品。批发业推动了对皮革产品的需求，从而间接支持了不可持续的资源消耗模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 皮革鞣制过程使用大量有毒化学品（如铬），如果管理不当，会造成严重的水体和土壤污染。批发业是连接污染性生产过程和消费市场的重要环节，负有供应链责任。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 虽然皮革制品相对耐用，但其生产和最终处置仍会产生废物。该行业若主要推动快时尚或一次性皮革制品，则与废物减量目标相悖。但其负面影响小于直接生产环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 为获取牧场而砍伐森林（特别是亚马逊雨林等地区）是皮革原料供应链的主要环境风险之一。批发业的需求是这一驱动因素的间接推手。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 与15.2类似，畜牧业扩张导致的栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失是该行业供应链的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 皮革制造业是水污染的重要来源。批发业通过采购和销售行为，间接支持了可能造成水污染的生产活动，除非其供应链有严格的环保标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业生产的液化石油气（LPG）等气体燃料，相比煤炭和传统生物质能更为清洁，在某些场景下有助于向更清洁的能源过渡，但其本身并非可再生能源，故贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 工业气体（如氧气、氮气）是众多制造业（如钢铁、化工、电子）的关键投入品，对于提高工艺流程效率、实现产业技术升级和采用清洁生产技术至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 医用氧气是该行业的重要产品之一，是手术、急救和呼吸治疗等高质量基本医疗服务不可或缺的组成部分，直接支持全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 气体压缩和液化过程是高度能源密集型的，如果依赖化石燃料发电，会产生显著的温室气体排放，与将气候变化措施纳入政策和规划的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 生产过程消耗大量电力和水资源，若管理不善，可能导致自然资源使用效率低下。部分气体（如某些工业溶剂）本身或其副产品可能是有害物质，对可持续资源管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能存在有害化学物质泄漏的风险，或某些气体产品（如易燃、有毒气体）若发生事故性释放，会加剧空气污染，对健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 服装制造业是全球重要的就业来源，尤其为许多发展中国家的男性和青年提供大量工作岗位，直接贡献于实现充分就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 传统服装制造过程消耗大量水、能源和原材料（如棉花、化纤），且资源利用效率往往较低，对自然资源的可持续管理构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 面料染色、整理等工序使用大量化学品，其不当处理可能导致有害物质排放到水和土壤中，对环境与健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 服装制造业供应链中普遍存在劳工权益问题，如低工资、长工时、不安全的工作环境，特别是在一些低成本生产国，对保护劳工权利构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 印染和后整理是服装制造的关键环节，会产生大量含有染料、助剂等污染物的废水，若处理不当会严重污染水体，影响水质改善目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 若该行业投资于节水技术、清洁生产流程和可持续材料（如有机棉、再生纤维），则能推动产业向更可持续的方向升级，贡献于该目标。但传统模式相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes...)

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过高效的物流和供应链管理支持经济活动，对提高经济生产力有间接但基础的贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业是橡胶工业供应链的重要环节，通过保障原材料和制品的流通，直接支持制造业和可持续工业化的进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该批发商积极推行并采购经过认证的可持续天然橡胶，则能促进自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果其供应链中的天然橡胶采购与毁林、土地退化或不可持续的种植方式相关，则对该目标产生显著的负面影响。批发商对供应链负有责任。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 橡胶制品的生产和使用周期可能涉及有害化学品。如果批发商不关注其经销产品的环境合规性和生命周期管理，可能间接助长环境污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果该行业参与翻新轮胎或回收橡胶制品的批发，则对减少废物产生有积极贡献，但这通常不是其主要业务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 大量橡胶制品（尤其是使用寿命短的制品）的流通，最终会转化为固体废物，如果缺乏有效的回收体系，批发环节间接促进了废物的产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 天然橡胶种植是热带地区毁林的主要驱动因素之一。批发商若采购与毁林相关的橡胶，则对该目标有重大的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 与毁林相关的橡胶种植会破坏自然栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失。批发商的采购决策对此有间接但重要的影响。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 机械修理是一个技术性和劳动密集型的服务行业，通过维护和优化设备性能，直接支持各行业的经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业为技术工人创造了体面的就业机会，并支持中小企业的创业和运营（如独立的维修店）。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 维修和保养是延长现有基础设施和工业设备寿命、提高其资源使用效率的关键活动，是实现可持续产业升级的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 通过维修延长机械设备的使用寿命，减少了对新原材料的需求，促进了自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 机械修理是废物预防和再利用的直接体现，通过修复故障设备，防止其成为废弃物，是减少废物产生的核心手段。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 维修过程可能涉及使用润滑油、溶剂、制冷剂等化学品，以及处理废旧零部件（如电池、电路板），若处置不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。但这种负面影响是可以通过规范操作来管理和减轻的。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 该行业通过提供饲料、兽药等关键生产资料，有助于提高畜牧生产者的生产力，从而支持小规模生产者的收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers... through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 若该行业支持的是不可持续的集约化畜牧业（如依赖大量化肥种植饲料作物、过度使用兽药），则会破坏生态系统，加剧土壤退化，与建立可持续粮食生产系统的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 通过提供兽药和健康管理服务，有助于控制人畜共患病的传播，间接贡献于抗击流行病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 畜牧业及其供应链（如饲料生产中的农药残留、动物粪便处理不当）是水和土壤污染的重要来源。该支持性行业若管理不善，可能加剧环境污染及相关健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 畜牧业是土地、水、饲料资源消耗大户。该行业作为其支持环节，若服务于资源密集型畜牧模式，则与自然资源的可持续管理目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 畜牧业产生大量废弃物（如粪便、屠宰副产品）。该支持性行业本身可能产生包装废物等，且其服务对象（畜牧业）是主要的废物产生源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 畜牧业是温室气体（如甲烷）排放的重要来源。支持该产业的行业若不转向低碳实践，则间接阻碍了将气候变化措施有效纳入经济部门。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 为扩大牧场或饲料种植园而导致的森林砍伐和土地转换是生物多样性丧失的主因之一。支持畜牧业扩张的行业间接加剧了对自然栖息地的破坏。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 作为金融服务的一部分，商品交易和投资业为生产性企业（尤其是资源相关行业）提供风险管理和融资渠道，支持其发展和创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过提供商品价格对冲工具和投资，该行业可以帮助中小企业，特别是发展中国家的初级产品生产者，管理风险并融入全球价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果该行业积极推动和投资于可持续认证的商品（如可持续棕榈油、负责任采矿的金属），可以引导市场向更可持续的资源管理方向发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 投资机构可以通过环境、社会和治理（ESG）投资标准，促使其所投资或交易的商品生产公司采纳可持续实践和提高透明度。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 通过跨国投资和合作，该行业可以促进资本流向发展中国家的可持续发展项目，加强全球伙伴关系。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

rationale: 农产品市场上的过度投机行为可能加剧粮食价格的极端波动，威胁全球粮食安全，这与确保粮食商品市场正常运作的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Adopt measures to ensure the proper functioning of food commodity markets and their derivatives and facilitate timely access to market information, including on food reserves, in order to help limit extreme food price volatility

rationale: 该行业是化石燃料（如石油、煤炭）交易的关键参与者，其活动在实质上支持了高碳排放的经济模式，阻碍了将气候变化措施纳入主流的努力。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果交易涉及与毁林相关的商品（如非法采伐的木材、大豆、牛肉），则该行业间接助长了森林退化，与可持续森林管理目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 如果缺乏严格的尽职调查，商品交易可能被用于洗钱或交易来自冲突地区、与有组织犯罪有关的'冲突矿产'，助长非法资金流动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是实现工业废弃物的环境无害化管理，直接符合此子目标的要求。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 通过回收和再利用废弃物组成部分，该行业直接为减少废物产生做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 妥善处理工业废弃物可以防止有害物质渗滤液污染地下水和地表水，从而改善水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 通过安全处理废弃物，减少了由不当废弃物管理导致的空气、水和土壤污染相关的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 废弃物处理行业的部分岗位（如收集、分拣）可能暴露于有害物质和安全隐患中，如果工作条件不佳，则可能违背此子目标。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 如果废弃物处理主要依赖填埋（产生甲烷）或效率低下的焚烧（产生二氧化碳和其他温室气体），且未采取最佳减排技术，则该行业会成为显著的温室气体排放源，对气候行动构成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 练炭/豆炭燃烧时释放有害空气污染物（如颗粒物、一氧化碳），导致室内外空气污染，增加呼吸系统疾病风险，与减少污染相关疾病的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 在缺乏现代能源基础设施的地区或作为应急燃料时，练炭/豆炭可能提供基本的能源可及性，但其非现代、不清洁的特性限制了积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services.

rationale: 该行业依赖非可再生化石燃料（如煤）作为原料，阻碍向可再生能源转型，与增加可再生能源比例的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix.

rationale: 练炭/豆炭制造通常采用传统技术，资源效率低且污染高，不符合可持续工业升级和清洁技术采用的要求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes.

rationale: 燃烧练炭/豆炭恶化城市空气质量，增加有害排放，对城市环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management.

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及有害化学物质（如粘合剂）的使用和排放，废物管理不当可能污染环境。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil.

rationale: 生产过程中可能产生工业废物，且产品使用后残留灰烬，增加废物生成，与减废目标不一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 燃烧练炭/豆炭排放温室气体（如二氧化碳），加剧气候变化，削弱应对气候灾害的能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 海面养殖业生产鱼类、贝类等水产品，是重要的动物蛋白来源，直接贡献于全球粮食安全和营养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 若采用可持续实践（如多营养级综合养殖），海面养殖可以提高生产力并增强对气候变化的适应能力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 海面养殖业，特别是在沿海社区，是重要的经济活动，可以创造就业机会并支持中小型企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 部分海面养殖业可能存在工作条件艰苦、安全标准低、甚至强迫劳动的风险，对工人的权益构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 不合理的海面养殖（如过度投喂、滥用抗生素）可能导致海洋自然资源（如野生鱼苗作饲料）的低效利用和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 可持续的海面养殖可以通过提供替代蛋白源，减轻对野生鱼类种群的捕捞压力，有助于恢复野生鱼群。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 若管理不善，养殖逃逸的鱼类可能与野生种群杂交或传播疾病，对野生鱼类资源的有效管理和恢复构成风险。
海面养殖业是可持续利用海洋资源创造经济收益的重要途径，特别有助于沿海和小岛屿发展中国家的经济发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism

rationale: 密集的海面养殖（特别是网箱养殖）会导致水体富营养化，产生大量有机废物（如粪便、残饵），是海洋营养污染的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 为开辟养殖场而破坏红树林、海草床等沿海生态系统，或养殖活动本身对底栖生境造成破坏，均不利于海洋生态系统的可持续管理和保护。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 焦油和染料制造过程通常涉及危险化学品，并可能产生有害废物和排放物。如果管理不当，会对实现化学品的无害环境管理目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 传统的焦油和染料制造工艺可能资源效率低且污染严重，与升级产业以实现可持续性的目标相悖。除非进行技术改造，否则其影响是负面的。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities)

rationale: 该行业生产和使用危险化学品，潜在的空气、水污染可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险，增加与有害物质相关的疾病负担。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 制造过程产生的工业废水若处理不当，会向水体排放污染物和化学物质，对改善水质的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力，但其积极贡献的强度受到其环境负面影响的制约。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 金属热处理行业本身是工业制造的关键环节。采用先进、高效、低排放的热处理技术（如真空热处理、感应加热）是实现工业可持续升级（Target 9.4）的具体实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业通过提供关键的金属材料处理服务，支持制造业（如汽车、机械）提高产品质量和附加值，从而间接贡献于通过技术升级实现的经济生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统的金属热处理是能源密集型过程，如果使用低效的炉窑和工艺，会消耗大量能源，对全球能效改善目标构成挑战。其影响类型为负面，但通过技术革新可以转变为正面贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 热处理过程消耗大量能源（化石燃料或电力），并对水资源（冷却）有一定需求，若管理不善，可能导致自然资源的使用不可持续。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 某些热处理工艺（如盐浴热处理、使用淬火油）可能涉及有害化学品，如果处理不当，其废物和排放可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 可持续的基础设施和产业升级高度依赖更高效、更环保的材料。该行业通过生产和提供这些基础材料（如轻量化材料、节能材料、可回收材料）来支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过改进生产工艺、提高材料利用率、使用再生原料，该行业可以直接贡献于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为基础工业部门，素材生産業提供了大量的就业岗位，对实现充分和生产性就业有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 许多材料生产过程（特别是化工、冶金）涉及有毒化学品的使用和危险废物的产生。如果管理不当，会对环境（空气、水、土壤）和人类健康造成严重负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 钢铁、水泥、化工等材料生产是能源密集型产业，也是全球温室气体排放的主要来源之一。该行业的排放对气候变化有显著的负面贡献，是实现气候目标需要重点关注的领域。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 材料生产行业（如采矿、冶金、化工）通常存在较高的职业健康与安全风险，如果劳动保护不足，可能对工人的安全和权利构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 机械化和纸制造是一个特定的制造业分支，代表了传统工艺与现代技术的结合，有助于促进可持续的工业化并提供就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业的核心是使用可再生植物纤维（如楮、三桠）作为原材料，其可持续采购和管理直接关系到自然资源的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业创造就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果造纸用的纤维原料来自可持续管理的人工林或非木材植物资源，则有助于促进对森林和陆地生态系统的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 造纸过程可能产生大量的工艺废水、废渣（如树皮杂质、污泥）。如果废水处理不当或废物回收利用率低，会对该子目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统造纸是耗水且可能产生污染的行业。如果生产过程中的废水（含有有机物、化学品）未经充分处理就排放，会加剧水污染，与改善水质量的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为批发业的一部分，该行业通过其分销活动支持商业运作和经济效率，但其本身不属于高技术升级或高附加值核心领域，贡献程度中等。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业的物流和供应链网络是支持商业活动的经济基础设施的一部分，但其对基础设施'质量、可靠性、可持续性'的直接贡献有限，相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业主要分销一次性、难以回收的办公用品（如某些塑料制品、低质量文具），或其运营中产生大量包装废弃物，则会显著增加废物产生，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业积极推广和分销可回收、可再填充或由再生材料制成的文具和办公用品，则有助于减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为向政府机构等提供办公用品的供应商，该行业可以通过提供环保产品选项来支持可持续的公共采购实践。
sdg_target_description: Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities

rationale: 通过向学校和教育机构供应基本的文具和学习用品，该行业间接支持了创建有效学习环境所需的基础物资保障。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all

rationale: 如果其分销的纸张和木制品来自不可持续来源，未获得FSC或类似认证，则该行业供应链会间接助长不可持续的森林管理和 deforestation。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 制造高质量的医疗设备（如诊断成像设备、生命支持系统）是提供基本医疗服务、实现全民健康覆盖的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 医疗设备制造行业包含研发活动，其产品（如诊断工具、治疗设备）对于应对各种疾病至关重要，包括在发展中国家流行的疾病。
sdg_target_description: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries, provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines

rationale: 医疗机械器具制造是典型的技术和研发密集型产业，直接推动工业部门的技术升级和创新。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 作为高科技制造业，该行业通过技术创新有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 制造过程可能使用有害化学品，产品寿命终结后可能产生电子废物，如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 医疗设备制造和处置过程可能产生特定废物，如果未实施有效的废物减量和管理策略，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 办公设备租赁服务降低了企业的初始资本支出，使中小微企业能够以更灵活、低成本的方式获得必要的办公工具，从而支持其创业、运营和成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 租赁模式提高了办公设备（作为一种基础商业基础设施）的利用效率和可及性，使其更可持续和具有韧性，但该目标更侧重于大型物理基础设施，故相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 共享租赁模式通过提高单台设备的使用率，减少了对新设备的总需求，从而促进了自然资源（如金属、矿物、塑料）的更可持续管理和更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 租赁模式本身通过延长产品的使用寿命和促进再利用，有助于从源头上预防和减少废物（特别是电子废物）的产生。专业的租赁公司通常也负责设备的维护和生命周期结束后的处理，可能促进回收。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果租赁公司未能有效管理其设备库存，或者设备在多次租赁后损坏率较高且得不到妥善维修或回收，反而可能导致电子废物的不当积累和处理问题，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 设施园艺通过环境控制实现作物的稳定、高产和周年供应，有助于保障全年粮食安全和营养食品的稳定获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该技术密集型农业模式能显著提高单位土地面积的生产力，并可能为从业者带来更高收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 受控环境减少了对外界气候的依赖，增强了生产系统的韧性，并通过精准管理促进可持续集约化生产。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production...

rationale: 设施园艺中普遍采用的滴灌、水肥一体化等技术，相比传统大田灌溉能显著提高水资源利用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...

rationale: 设施农业创造了相对稳定、技术性的农业工作岗位，可能提供比传统农业更体面的工作条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 设施园艺是农业科技创新的重要领域，涉及生物技术、环境控制、自动化等多个技术层面的研发与应用。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people...

rationale: 通过精准控制水、肥、农药的投入，设施园艺有助于实现资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 封闭或半封闭的环境有利于对化学品（如农药）进行更严格的控制和管理，减少向环境的扩散。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 设施园艺（尤其是温控和补光）通常是高能耗的。如果其能源供应主要依赖化石燃料，则不利于提高可再生能源份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 设施农业可能产生塑料薄膜、废弃营养液、植物残体等特定类型的废弃物，若处理不当会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 高能耗带来的温室气体排放（如果能源不清洁）与应对气候变化的目标相悖。尽管其本身是气候适应型农业，但运营碳足迹可能构成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为新鲜海产品供应链的核心环节，该行业通过分销活动，有助于确保人们（特别是沿海地区）获得安全、有营养的食物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 批发行业本身提供就业机会。但其对‘体面工作’的贡献程度取决于具体的工作条件、工资水平和社会保障。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 如果该行业采购的海产品来自过度捕捞或不可持续的渔业，则直接违背对海洋自然资源的可持续管理。这是其核心业务固有的主要风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 新鲜海产品极易腐败。高效的冷链物流和快速分销对于减少供应链中的粮食损失至关重要，这是该行业的核心竞争力之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 该行业的采购决策是市场需求的关键驱动因素。如果批发商不加区分地采购，可能间接支持过度捕捞、非法捕捞或破坏性捕捞实践，对恢复鱼类种群构成重大威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics.

rationale: 虽然该行业不直接提供补贴，但其商业模式可能受益于导致过度捕捞的补贴（例如，通过采购因此获得补贴的廉价渔获物），从而间接与目标14.6的精神相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, prohibit certain forms of fisheries subsidies which contribute to overcapacity and overfishing, eliminate subsidies that contribute to IUU fishing, and refrain from introducing new such subsidies...

rationale: 如果该行业从发展中国家的小规模渔民或可持续管理的渔业进行负责任的采购，可以为这些地区带来经济利益。但这通常不是其主要业务焦点，相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism.

rationale: 该行业可以作为小规模个体渔民进入市场的一个渠道。如果其供应链政策有意纳入并支持这些小规模渔民，则产生积极影响。
sdg_target_description: Provide access for small-scale artisanal fishers to marine resources and markets.

rationale: 面类作为基础主食，其制造和供应有助于保障全年粮食安全，特别是提供易于储存和分配的食物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 通过遵守食品安全标准，该行业有助于减少因食品污染引起的疾病，但其核心活动并非直接针对环境污染导致的健康问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，但其工作环境和薪酬是否符合'体面工作'标准取决于具体企业管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业是工业的一部分，对GDP和就业有贡献，但其可持续性和创新性可能不如高科技产业突出。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs)

rationale: 通过将农产品（面粉）加工成保质期更长的面类，有助于减少供应链中的粮食损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用清洗剂、消毒剂等化学品，其排放和包装废物的管理不当会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程会产生废水、不合格品和包装材料等废物，如果管理不善，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 面条制造（如和面、清洗设备）需要消耗大量水资源，可能加剧水资源压力，尤其是在缺水地区。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 生产过程中的能源消耗（电力、热能）会间接产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有轻微负面影响，除非使用可再生能源。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 涂装是基础设施（如桥梁、建筑物、工业设施）维护和保养的关键环节，通过防腐蚀、防老化处理，直接延长基础设施的使用寿命，增强其可靠性和韧性，支持经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 对历史建筑、纪念物等文化遗产进行专业的保护和修复性涂装，有助于维护其结构完整性和外观，是文化遗产保护工作的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 该行业提供技能型工作岗位（涂装工），为不同技能水平的劳动者，包括可能吸纳部分青年或经过培训的残疾人土，提供就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 行业需关注工人安全，如防止高空坠落、化学品吸入危害等，推动安全的工作环境建设。但实际执行程度因企业管理水平而异，故相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 传统涂料中的挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）和有害物质会污染空气，影响施工人员和周边居民健康； improper disposal of waste can contaminate soil and water.
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 清洗工具、设备产生的含漆废水，以及雨水冲刷未干漆面形成的径流，若未经处理排放，会对水体造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业是化学品（涂料、溶剂、稀释剂）的重要使用方，若未能实现全生命周期的无害化管理（包括采购、储存、使用、废弃物处理），会导致有害物质释放到环境中。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 施工过程会产生大量包装废弃物（涂料桶、包装材料）、废旧涂层剥离物等，若缺乏有效的废物减量、回收和循环利用措施，会增加固体废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 船用发动机制造业通过研发和生产更高效、更清洁的发动机技术（如液化天然气发动机、氢燃料电池系统），直接贡献于使航运基础设施和产业向可持续方向升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过技术升级和创新，创造高技能就业岗位并促进经济增长，贡献于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统船用发动机（尤其是重油发动机）是海洋污染的重要来源，包括油污泄漏、废气排放（硫氧化物、氮氧化物）以及噪音污染，这些都对海洋生态系统构成严重威胁，与减少海洋污染的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 航运业是主要的温室气体排放源。制造和使用传统高碳排放的船用发动机，直接加剧气候变化，与将气候变化措施纳入各层面的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 船用发动机制造过程（如金属加工、化学品使用）以及其产品在整个生命周期（包括报废处理）中，可能涉及有害物质和废物的不当管理，对环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果该行业专注于研发和制造低碳、零碳排放的船用发动机（如氨动力、电动发动机），则能积极支持向低碳航运的转型，从而贡献于气候变化应对措施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过生产符合或超越国际海事组织（IMO）排放标准（如限硫令）的清洁发动机，该行业可以帮助减少船舶对海洋的空气和噪音污染，对海洋环境保护做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 旅馆和酒店是旅游业的核心组成部分，直接创造大量就业机会，并可通过推广本地文化和产品促进地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 负责任的酒店可以通过实施可持续实践（如资源管理、支持本地采购）来贡献于可持续旅游的监测和发展。
sdg_target_description: (Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 酒店，特别是那些位于文化遗产地附近的，可以通过尊重和保护当地文化及自然环境来支持这一目标。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 提供清洁、卫生的住宿环境有助于保障客人和员工的健康，间接支持公共卫生。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks)

rationale: 酒店业是水资源密集型行业，低效的用水实践会导致水资源浪费，特别是在水资源紧张的地区，对可持续用水目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity...)

rationale: 酒店运营消耗大量能源、水和材料，如果管理不善，会导致自然资源不可持续的使用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 酒店业产生大量固体废物（如食物垃圾、一次性塑料、包装材料），如果不采取有效的减废和回收措施，会对减少废物产生的目标产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 租赁模式通过最大化单个物品的利用率，减少了对新资源开采和生产的总体需求，促进了自然资源的更可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 通过延长物品的使用寿命和促进重复使用，租赁服务直接从源头预防和减少了废物的产生，支持循环经济。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 物品租赁行业通常由中小型企业构成，该行业的存在和发展支持了创业、中小企业增长和就业创造。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises.

rationale: 通过提供设备租赁而非要求购买，该行业降低了中小企业（尤其是在发展中国家）获取提高生产力所需工具和技术的前期资本门槛，相当于提供了一种获取'实物'资本服务的途径。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 在城市环境中，共享租赁模式可以减少人均物品拥有量，从而潜在地减少与生产、处置相关的总体环境足迹和废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management.

rationale: 租赁物品（如电子设备、机械设备）在其生命周期末期可能成为电子废物或其他有害废物。如果租赁公司未能确保对这些物品进行环保的报废管理（回收、处理），可能会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 租赁行业，特别是非正规部门或零工经济模式下的部分，可能存在工作条件不稳定、劳工权利保护不足的风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 租赁业务的物流，如频繁的运输和配送以服务客户，可能会增加温室气体排放，与气候行动目标相悖。这种影响取决于运输效率和能源来源。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 作为制造业分支，该行业通过生产和创新活动直接贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 陶瓷产品（如建筑瓷砖、卫生洁具）是建设和维护可持续基础设施的关键材料。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 行业通过采用更节能的窑炉和清洁生产技术，可推动产业可持续升级，但传统工艺仍占主导，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies)

rationale: 陶瓷制造大量消耗粘土、长石等不可再生矿物资源和水资源，若管理不当会导致资源不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用含重金属的釉料，且废弃陶瓷品难以降解，若处理不当会对环境和健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 制造过程产生次品、废料，且产品生命周期结束后成为固体废物，增加废物管理压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 卫生洁具等产品有助于改善卫生条件，间接减少污染相关疾病，但贡献较为间接。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 卫生陶瓷（如马桶、洗手盆）是实现基本卫生设施的关键产品，直接支持该目标。
