sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all...)

rationale: 传统陶瓷烧结过程需高温（常超过1000°C），能耗高且主要依赖化石燃料，导致大量温室气体排放，与气候变化应对措施相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 作为批发商，该行业通过其分销活动支持供应链运作，间接促进经济活动和生产率，但其直接贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业为手工艺者、小型企业等提供原材料，支持创业和小微企业发展，但其影响力中等。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 作为纺织业供应链的组成部分，该行业支持工业活动，但其本身不直接进行工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization...)

rationale: 如果批发的缝纫线和毛线源自资源密集型生产（如传统棉花种植耗水量大），则该行业间接助长了自然资源的不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 该行业销售的产品（尤其是合成纤维线）若未被有效回收利用，最终可能成为废弃物，间接与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为供应链中的关键环节，批发商可以通过优先采购和推广具有可持续认证（如有机、公平贸易）的线材，积极鼓励上游生产商和下游客户采纳可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage companies... to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle)

rationale: 如果该批发商参与向公共机构（如学校、社区中心的手工课）供应材料，并提供可持续产品选项，则可促进可持续公共采购。
sdg_target_description: (Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities)

rationale: 半导体是几乎所有现代技术（包括清洁技术、自动化、数字化）的核心组件，直接增强科学研究和技术能力，是实现产业升级和基础设施现代化的基础。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 半导体制造业是高技术、高附加值的先进制造业，通过技术创新显著推动经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 半导体是开发和应用可再生能源系统、能源效率解决方案、智能电网等关键气候技术的核心赋能器，间接支持将气候行动纳入各项规划。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 半导体制造过程需要消耗大量的纯净水、能源和多种稀有金属，其资源密集型的特性对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程会产生有害化学废物和电子废物，如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通常提供技术性强、薪酬相对较高的制造业岗位，有助于实现生产性就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 补习班和私人辅导所为学生提供额外的学术支持，旨在帮助他们更好地理解和完成中小学课程，从而提高学习成果的质量和有效性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes

rationale: 虽然主要关注学术科目，但一些补习班也提供考试技巧、批判性思维等对就业和未来发展有益的技能培训。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业主要由中小型企业和个体经营者组成，为教师、辅导员和行政人员创造了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 有偿的补习服务可能加剧教育不平等。只有社会经济地位较高的家庭才能负担得起额外的教育投入，这可能拉大不同背景学生之间的学业差距，阻碍基于经济状况的社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 法律事务所通过提供法律咨询、代理诉讼等服务，是保障个人和组织诉诸司法、维护法治的核心机构，直接促进平等获得司法公正。
sdg_target_description: (Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all)

rationale: 专利事务所通过提供专利申请、知识产权保护和维权服务，为技术创新和研发成果提供法律保障，是激励和维持创新生态系统不可或缺的一环。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending)

rationale: 法律事务所可以通过劳动法相关业务，帮助雇员维护其劳动权利（如工资、工作条件、免受歧视），间接促进体面工作。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 如果法律服务资源分配不均，主要服务于支付能力强的客户，可能导致弱势群体在获得法律保护方面处于不利地位，潜在地加剧了机会不平等。这种负面影响的程度取决于法律服务的普及性和可及性。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard)

rationale: 如果法律和专利行业内部存在性别歧视，例如在晋升合伙人或领导职位方面存在玻璃天花板，则可能对实现性别平等目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 丝绸纺纱业是一个具有高价值和一定劳动密集型的传统产业，其发展和现代化可以促进经济多元化并提高生产力，特别是在拥有丝绸生产传统的地区。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业在特定地区提供了制造业就业岗位，对当地就业有贡献，但需要关注工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，丝绸纺纱业的发展有助于可持续的工业化，尤其是在将其传统工艺与现代可持续实践相结合的情况下。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更节水和清洁的生产技术进行升级，从而为可持续产业做出贡献，但这取决于具体的技术投入。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes)

rationale: 传统的丝绸生产（特别是染色和精炼）可能是水资源和化学品密集型的，如果管理不善，会导致自然资源使用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 丝绸加工中使用的化学品（如染料、助剂）若处理不当，可能对环境和健康造成危害，与无害化环境管理化学品和废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 生产过程中可能产生固体废物和废水，若未实施有效的废物减量化和回收措施，则不利于减少废物产生的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 丝绸工业是著名的水污染源之一，其废水若未经妥善处理排放，会严重损害水质，与该子目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 为扩大桑树种植园而进行的土地利用变化，或在种植过程中使用农药，可能对陆地生态系统产生潜在负面影响，但其影响程度因具体实践而异。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements)

rationale: 与15.1类似，农业实践和土地利用可能间接影响生物多样性，但关联性相对较弱且不确定。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 石油批发通过分销一种主要的能源商品，在现阶段为全球能源供应和获取做出了贡献，尽管这不是一种清洁能源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是推广和维持化石燃料在能源结构中的主导地位，直接阻碍了向可再生能源的转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业提供了一定的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 石油储存和运输环节存在火灾、爆炸和化学品暴露等职业健康与安全风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 石油供应链（如储油罐、管道、油轮）是现有能源基础设施的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业维持着基于化石燃料的不可持续的基础设施和工业模式，阻碍了向清洁技术的升级改造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业的核心业务依赖于不可再生自然资源（石油）的消耗，且其使用效率通常不高，与可持续管理目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 石油产品的储存、运输和潜在泄漏会对空气、水和土壤造成污染，对环境声音管理化学品构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 运营过程中可能产生包装废弃物（如油桶）或受污染的物料。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的存在和盈利能力可能受益于或依赖于低效的化石燃料补贴，这些补贴鼓励了浪费性消费。
sdg_target_description: Rationalize inefficient fossil-fuel subsidies that encourage wasteful consumption...

rationale: 作为温室气体排放的主要贡献者供应链的一环，该行业是气候变化应对政策和措施需要规制的关键对象，其利益可能与强有力的气候政策相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 海上石油运输和泄漏是海洋污染（油污）的重大风险源。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 陆上石油储存设施的泄漏或运输事故会对土壤和淡水生态系统造成严重破坏。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业就业岗位，但其'体面工作'的程度取决于具体工厂的劳动条件。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 作为轻工业的一部分，该行业是工业基础的组成部分，但其可持续性取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization...)

rationale: 传统皮革生产严重依赖畜牧业，对土地、水和饲料资源的需求巨大，且通常管理不可持续。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 传统制革工艺使用铬等有害化学品，若处理不当，会对环境和工人健康造成严重危害，与无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 皮革裁剪会产生废料，且许多皮革制品寿命结束后难以回收，通常被填埋，增加了废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 制革厂是著名的水污染源，排放含有有机物、重金属和盐分的废水，严重威胁水质。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals...)

rationale: 为获取皮革而进行的畜牧业扩张是导致森林砍伐、土地退化和生物多样性丧失的主要驱动力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...)

rationale: 与15.1类似，皮革供应链对自然栖息地的退化有显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats...)

rationale: 煤炭作为一种主要的化石燃料，其开采和供应直接支撑了高碳能源结构，阻碍了向可再生能源的转型，与目标7.2背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: 到2030年，大幅增加可再生能源在全球能源结构中的比例

rationale: 煤炭是温室气体排放的最大单一来源，其持续的采矿活动与将气候变化应对措施纳入主流的全球努力存在根本冲突。
sdg_target_description: 将气候变化措施纳入国家政策、战略和规划

rationale: 煤炭开采过程产生矿尘和可能导致的事故，而其最终燃烧是空气污染的主要来源，严重危害人类健康。
sdg_target_description: 到2030年，大幅减少因危险化学品、空气、水和土壤污染导致的死亡和患病人数

rationale: 煤矿开采可能产生酸性矿井排水、重金属污染和大量固体废物，若管理不当，会对环境和人类健康造成持续危害。
sdg_target_description: 到2020年，根据商定的国际框架，对化学品和所有废物在整个生命周期内进行无害环境管理，并大幅减少它们排入大气、水和土壤的量，以最大限度地减少其对人类健康和环境的不利影响

rationale: 特别是露天采矿会直接导致森林砍伐、土地退化和生态系统破坏，与保护和恢复陆地生态系统的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: 到2020年，推动各类森林的可持续管理，制止毁林，恢复退化的森林，大幅增加全球的植树造林和再造林

rationale: 在特定地区和转型过渡期，煤炭矿业可以提供就业机会和经济增长。然而，采矿工作通常伴随着安全风险和健康隐患，与'体面工作'的全部内涵存在差距，且其长期可持续性存疑。
sdg_target_description: 到2030年，所有男女，包括青年和残疾人实现充分和生产性就业，有体面工作，并做到同工同酬

rationale: 历史上，煤炭作为能源对工业化和发展中国家的基础设施建设起到了支撑作用。但考虑到其对气候和环境的巨大代价，这种贡献在现代可持续发展语境下的积极相关性已非常有限且充满争议。
sdg_target_description: 发展优质、可靠、可持续和有抵御灾害能力的基础设施，包括区域和跨境基础设施，以支持经济发展和人类福祉，重点是人人可负担得起并公平利用上述基础设施

rationale: 远洋航运是全球贸易和供应链的核心、可靠的跨境基础设施，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过促进国际贸易，是全球和各国（尤其是依赖商品出口的最不发达国家）实现可持续经济增长的关键推动力。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 航运活动是海洋污染的重要来源，包括油污泄漏、压载水排放引入有害生物、船舶废弃物和废气排放造成的酸雨等，对实现该子目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 国际航运是重要的温室气体排放源（约占全球2-3%），其高碳排放强度对各国实现气候行动目标构成压力，凸显了将其纳入气候政策的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 航运业通过支持全球价值链和贸易多元化，间接促进了经济生产力的提升，并且行业本身也在通过技术创新（如自动化、数字化）进行升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为全球化的载体，航运促进了技术、知识和商品的流动，间接支持发展中国家获得向更可持续模式转型所需的技术和能力。
sdg_target_description: Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动直接贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献，但'体面工作'方面存在潜在风险（见8.8的负面映射）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 纺织制造业历史上存在工作环境安全（如粉尘、化学品暴露）和劳工权利方面的挑战，构成潜在负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为工业部门的一部分，该行业的存在和发展支持了工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 传统的纺织制造过程通常是资源密集型和污染型的，其当前普遍的生产方式与升级为可持续产业的目标相悖，除非采用清洁技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 纺织制造过程通常使用大量化学品（染料、整理剂），其废水、废气和不善管理的废物可能对环境造成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业在生产过程中可能产生大量固体废物（如边角料、不合格品），且许多纺织制品寿命周期短，最终成为废弃物，对减少废物生成的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 纺织工业是水污染的主要行业之一，废水排放（含染料、化学品）如处理不当会严重恶化水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 纺织纤维（尤其是微塑料）通过废水进入水体，是海洋塑料污染的一个来源，对减少海洋污染的目标有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 锻造业作为基础制造业，直接贡献于工业化和经济增长，提供就业和增加产业GDP份额。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果锻造业采用高效、清洁的技术（如节能熔炉），可以促进产业可持续升级；但传统方法可能效率较低，因此相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业机会，但需要评估工作条件（如安全性和公平性）以确保体面工作；基础贡献存在，但可能因行业特性而受限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 锻造业消耗大量能源和金属资源，如果未优化管理，可能导致资源低效使用，违背可持续资源管理目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 金属加工可能产生有害废物（如废渣、化学品），如果处理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 锻造过程可能释放空气污染物（如颗粒物）并带来工伤风险，对工人和周边社区健康构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 能源密集型过程（如燃煤或燃气加热）可能导致温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响；除非采用低碳技术，否则相关性主要为负面。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 纸制品制造业通过采用更高效的造纸技术、水循环系统和清洁生产技术，有助于提高资源利用效率，实现产业升级和可持续制造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 如果行业实践可持续的森林管理和提高原材料（木材、水、能源）的使用效率，可以对资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纸制品本身是可回收的，行业通过使用再生纸浆制造产品，直接支持废物的回收和再利用，减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过技术创新和生产流程优化，为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 如果纸制品制造依赖不可持续的木材来源，会导致森林砍伐、生物多样性丧失，与可持续森林管理的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 传统造纸过程消耗大量水资源并产生含有化学物质（如漂白剂）的废水，若处理不当，会对水体造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials

rationale: 造纸是高度耗水的行业，如果不采取节水措施，其高水耗与提高用水效率的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater

rationale: 制造过程中使用的化学品（如漂白剂、染料）若管理不善，可能对环境和人类健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle

rationale: 造纸过程通常能源密集，如果依赖低效的能源系统，会阻碍全球能源效率提升的进程。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 该行业的核心产品（化学机械和装置）是实现化工及其他相关产业可持续升级和改造的关键技术基础，直接提供提高资源效率和采用环保技术所需的设备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 先进的化学机械设备可以优化化工生产过程，提高原料转化率，减少原材料和能源消耗，从而促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业制造的设备（如密封系统、废气废水处理单元、安全反应器）对于在化学品生命周期内实现其无害环境管理、防止有害物质泄漏至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 化学机械设备广泛应用于工业废水处理厂，用于去除污染物、回收水资源和处理有害物质，直接有助于改善水质和增加废水安全再利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 通过提供更节能、支持碳捕获或用于生产低碳产品（如生物塑料）的设备，该行业为实施国家气候战略提供了技术手段。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果制造的设备用于传统的、效率低下的线性生产模式，可能会支持产生大量工业废物的过程，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。这种负面影响取决于最终用户如何使用该技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果制造的设备设计不当、安全性差或用于高风险化工过程，可能增加有害化学品事故性泄漏或慢性污染的风险，从而对健康构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 铅锌矿业作为基础原材料供应部门，通过提供工业必需的金属材料，间接支持经济多样化和工业生产。但其本身不一定是高技术或高附加值活动，贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 铅和锌是某些可持续技术（如高级电池）的组成部分，因此该行业间接支持可持续基础设施和产业。然而，其自身的开采过程往往不符合可持续性要求，积极相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 铅是一种剧毒重金属。铅锌矿的开采、选矿和尾矿处理过程极易造成空气、水体和土壤的重金属污染，严重威胁矿工和周边社区居民的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 矿山酸性排水和含有重金属的选矿废水是重要的水污染源，如果不经严格处理，将对地表水和地下水造成长期、严重的污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 矿工可能暴露于粉尘（导致矽肺病）、噪音、塌方以及铅等有毒物质中，工作环境危险性高，对劳工的职业健康与安全构成显著威胁。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 铅锌矿业产生大量含有重金属的固体废物（尾矿）和废水，实现其全生命周期的无害环境管理极具挑战，不当管理会导致有害物质释放到环境中。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 露天或地下开采会直接破坏地表植被和土壤结构，导致栖息地丧失、土地退化、水土流失，严重影响陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 电气测量仪器是监测、分析和优化能源使用、从而提高能源效率的基础工具，广泛应用于工业、商业和住宅领域。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 该行业生产的关键设备是实现工业流程优化、基础设施升级和资源效率提升的核心技术，直接支持可持续产业转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 电气计测器制造本身属于高科技产业，依赖于持续的研发和创新，其产品也是其他领域科学研究和技术开发不可或缺的工具。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 电子测量仪器的制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品和产生电子废物，如果环境管理不善，可能对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为技术密集型制造业，该行业通过提供高技能工作岗位和推动技术进步，对经济增长和生产力提升有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 碳和石墨制品（如高强度电极、耐高温部件）是许多基础工业（如钢铁、化工）和可持续技术（如高效熔炉）升级改造所必需的关键材料，有助于提高资源使用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 高级碳材料（如碳纤维、石墨烯）是许多前沿科技领域（如航空航天、纳米技术、电子）研发的基础，该行业的存在和支持间接促进了科学研究和技术创新。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 该行业生产的部件（如燃料电池的电极、电池材料）是某些清洁能源技术的关键组成部分，间接支持了清洁能源技术的研发和应用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它通过生产高附加值的特种材料贡献于经济增长和生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 碳和石墨制品的制造过程（如石墨化过程的高温处理、使用沥青等化学品）可能产生有害排放物（如多环芳烃、粉尘）和废物，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响，与无害化化学品和废物管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中的废料（如切割碎料、不合格品）以及产品寿命结束后的处理问题，可能导致废物产生，与减少废物的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的制造过程，特别是高能耗的石墨化环节，通常依赖化石燃料能源，可能导致大量的温室气体排放，直接加剧气候变化，与气候行动目标相悖。尽管其产品可能有助减排，但此处评估其直接运营的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 发泡树脂产品（如建筑保温板）通过提高建筑物的能源效率，直接贡献于可持续基础设施的升级和资源效率提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为节能建筑材料的生产者，该行业间接支持将气候变化减缓措施（如建筑节能标准）纳入政策实施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造过程可能使用或产生有害化学品和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs），若管理不善会对环境和健康造成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 许多发泡树脂产品（尤其一次性包装）回收困难，生命周期短，是塑料废物的重要来源，与减少废物产生的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料废物，包括发泡树脂产品，若未妥善管理，可能进入水体并最终成为海洋垃圾，造成海洋污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 该行业通过为中小企业提供关键融资渠道，直接支持其创立、正规化和增长，从而促进生产性活动、创造体面工作和鼓励创业创新。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是增加中小企业获得金融服务的机会，与子目标9.3的描述高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 作为金融体系的一部分，该行业通过专门服务于常被主流金融机构忽视的中小企业客户，有助于扩大普惠金融的覆盖面。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 中小企业主中包括贫困和脆弱群体。获得金融服务是他们获得经济资源的关键途径，该行业为此做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 通过支持中小企业发展，该行业有助于促进经济包容，赋能不同背景的企业家，减少经济不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 如果该行业存在不当行为，如提供掠夺性贷款、收取过高利率或缺乏透明度，则会损害中小企业利益，违背普惠金融（8.10）的初衷，对包容性经济增长产生负面影响。这种风险在监管不力的环境中更高。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 如果该行业的运营缺乏有效监管、问责制和透明度，可能导致金融不当行为，侵蚀对金融体系的信任，从而对建立有效、负责和透明的机构（16.6）产生潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 贵金属矿业通过开采高价值商品为国民经济做出贡献，并创造就业机会，有助于经济多元化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 贵金属是许多高科技产品（如电子产品）的关键原材料，间接支持了技术研发和创新产业。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 贵金属开采过程（如使用氰化物堆浸）可能造成严重的水体污染，与改善水质的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 矿业活动产生大量含有有害化学物质的尾矿和废物，若管理不当，将对环境和健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 采矿本质上是资源提取过程，会产生大量固体废物（尾矿），与从源头上减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 露天矿坑、尾矿库等采矿活动会直接破坏和分割陆地栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失和生态系统服务功能下降。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 采矿作业中接触粉尘、有害化学品（如氰化物、汞）可能对矿工和附近社区的健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 大规模采矿项目可能引发土地征用、原住民土地权冲突等问题，影响当地社区对土地和资源权利的平等获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 经济团体的核心职能是代表企业利益，游说有利于商业和经济增长的政策，支持中小企业发展，直接促进生产性活动、创业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 经济团体通过为会员企业（包括中小企业）提供信息、网络和资源，帮助它们更好地获得金融服务和融入市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 经济团体是公私伙伴关系和多利益攸关方合作的关键参与者，通过动员资源、分享知识和最佳实践，促进可持续发展目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

rationale: 经济团体本质上是促进公私伙伴关系（PPP）的平台，其活动直接有助于建立和加强有效的合作模式。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

rationale: 经济团体主要代表资方利益，其政策游说可能侧重于降低劳动力成本或放松监管，从而可能削弱对劳工权利和工作场所安全的保护。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 经济团体的游说活动如果缺乏透明度，可能涉及特权寻租或不当影响政策制定，与减少腐败和贿赂的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 广告业是服务业的组成部分，通过促进市场竞争、品牌建设和信息流通，直接支持商业活动和经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 特别是数字广告业，其运营严重依赖并促进了互联网和数字通信基础设施的发展与普及，属于支持经济发展的服务性基础设施的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 广告业作为强大的传播工具，有潜力被用于教育和提高公众对可持续发展与环保生活方式的认识，例如推广绿色产品或可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 广告业的核心功能往往是刺激消费需求，这可能鼓励过度消费和资源密集型产品的消费模式，与自然资源的可持续管理目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 部分广告内容可能延续或强化有害的性别刻板印象，物化女性形象，从而对消除性别歧视的努力产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，非铁金属铸造直接贡献于工业产值和就业，是可持续工业化的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更高效的熔炼技术、废金属回收和清洁生产工艺，来提升资源效率并向可持续产业转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 非铁金属铸造业通过生产高附加值部件支持制造业生产力，并依赖于持续的技术升级和创新。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 原生金属的开采和能源密集的熔炼过程可能导致自然资源（矿石、能源）的不可持续利用和低效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 铸造过程可能产生有害废物（如熔渣、废气、废水），如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业通过回收废金属作为原料，为减少废物产生和促进循环经济做出了积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 铸造厂可能排放粉尘、烟雾和化学物质，如果控制不严，会对工人和周边社区的健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 高能耗的熔炼过程是碳排放的重要来源，对减缓气候变化构成挑战，除非采用低碳能源和技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业通过有效配置资本、支持企业融资和证券市场流动性，直接促进可持续的经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 投资信托基金可为中小企业和创新项目提供融资渠道，支持创业和体面工作创造。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过专项基金或ESG投资，该行业可增加中小企业获得金融服务的途径，促进其市场整合。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 通过提供普惠金融产品（如低门槛基金），该行业可帮助弱势群体获得经济资源和金融服务，间接减少贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 作为受监管的金融机构，该行业的合规运作有助于加强金融市场监管和稳定性，减少系统性风险。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 通过ESG投资和绿色基金，该行业可引导私人资本支持气候行动和绿色气候融资，助力减排项目。
sdg_target_description: Implement the commitment undertaken by developed-country parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change to a goal of mobilizing jointly $100 billion annually by 2020 from all sources to address the needs of developing countries in the context of meaningful mitigation actions and transparency on implementation and fully operationalize the Green Climate Fund through its capitalization as soon as possible

rationale: 若该行业投资于高污染、高能耗或不符社会责任的公司（如化石燃料行业），则可能间接鼓励不可持续实践，违背可持续报告要求。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 若投资策略偏向高收入群体或加剧资本集中，可能扩大经济不平等，与促进平等的政策目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 速记和笔耕服务通过记录和整理信息（如讲座、会议内容），支持知识和技能的传播与获取，间接促进技能发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业作为服务型中小企业，提供就业机会（如速记员、笔耕员），支持体面工作和本地经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 复印和文档服务是信息基础设施的一部分，支持经济和社会活动的高效运行，但贡献相对间接。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 速记和笔耕服务（如记录法庭、会议内容）有助于提高机构运作的透明度和问责制，确保信息准确存档。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 复印活动可能消耗大量纸张和能源，导致资源浪费和废物增加，但行业规模较小，负面影响有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 船只（尤其是客船和货船）是交通和贸易基础设施的关键组成部分，其制造和维修保障了水上运输网络的可靠性和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过采用更高效的设计、环保材料（如可再生复合材料）和清洁动力系统（如电力或氢燃料电池）制造或改造船只，该行业可以促进产业升级和资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 船舶制造和修理业通过技术创新（如自动化制造、数字化设计）和业务多元化（如从制造扩展到高级维修服务）来提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 该行业在制造、工程、焊接、喷漆、电子系统集成等多个领域创造了体面的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 传统船舶的运营（尤其是修理不当或老旧船只）可能导致油污泄漏、有害防污漆的使用以及废水排放，直接造成海洋污染。制造过程也可能产生进入水道的污染物。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 船舶制造和修理过程（特别是船舶拆解和改装）会产生大量固体废物（如金属废料、玻璃纤维、废油漆、废油），如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的船舶是温室气体排放的重要来源，对减缓气候变化构成挑战。该行业在向低碳转型前，其主流产品与服务与气候行动目标存在冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过为信用担保机构提供再保险，增强了金融体系为中小微企业（MSMEs）提供融资服务的能力和稳定性，直接支持了生产性活动、创业和创新。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为再保险机构，它通过分担风险来加强国内信用担保机构（金融中介的一种）的能力，从而鼓励和扩大对所有人（特别是中小企业）的金融服务覆盖面。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 该活动通过支持信用担保，间接增加了小规模工业企业和其他企业获得信贷等金融服务的机会，有助于它们融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 信用担保再保险机制本质上是多方（政府、私营担保机构、再保险机构）之间的风险共担伙伴关系，通过共享金融资源和专业知识来支持发展目标，符合全球伙伴关系的精神。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

rationale: 如果该机构的承保政策或其所支持的原担保机构存在系统性偏见（例如，倾向于特定地区、行业或已有一定规模的企业，而忽视边缘化群体或初创企业），则可能加剧融资机会的不平等，阻碍社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 作为连接农产品生产者和市场的关键环节，该行业通过高效的物流和分销网络，确保新鲜蔬菜和水果能够稳定供应，有助于保障人们获得安全、营养的食物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业为小规模农户提供了重要的市场渠道，通过采购他们的产品并将其分销到更广阔的市场，直接支持了农民收入的提高。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 高效的批发物流、适当的仓储和库存管理有助于减少蔬菜水果在从农场到零售商这一供应链环节中的损失（食物损失）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 该行业本身是劳动密集型产业，创造了物流、仓储、销售等领域的就业机会，并支持了中小型批发企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 为了保鲜和运输，该行业通常大量使用一次性包装材料（如塑料薄膜、泡沫箱），如果管理不当，会导致固体废物增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 行业运营依赖交通运输（尤其是长途或冷链运输），会产生显著的温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响，这与将气候行动纳入各领域的可持续发展目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 代理商和经纪业通过促进交易和市场效率，为整体经济增长做出贡献，特别是在促进商品和服务流通方面。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过为中小企业提供市场准入和交易渠道，支持其发展和正规化，是价值链中的重要服务环节。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 代理商和经纪业本身创造就业机会，但其对'体面工作'的贡献程度取决于具体公司的劳工实践，基于通用名称给予中等评分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为中间人，该行业通过帮助中小企业连接到更广阔的市场和价值链，间接支持了其市场整合。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 国际贸易代理商通过促进跨境交易，直接有助于增加发展中国家的出口。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries’ share of global exports by 2020

rationale: 该行业通过建立商业伙伴关系和网络，是多利益攸关方合作的一种形式，有助于资源共享和市场连接。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources...

rationale: 代理商和经纪业可以促进公私合作，但其直接参与度不如专门的合作促进机构，因此相关性为中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

rationale: 辅助金融业（如支付处理、金融科技平台）为中小企业提供了更便捷的金融服务渠道，支持其正规化、创新和增长，从而促进生产性活动和创造体面工作。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业的核心功能（如金融科技、支付解决方案）直接扩大了银行和金融服务对个人和企业的可及性，特别是通过创新技术增强国内金融机构的服务能力，促进普惠金融。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 辅助金融业通过提供信贷评估、供应链金融、便捷支付等工具，帮助中小企业（包括发展中国家）获得金融服务并融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果监管未能跟上金融辅助服务（尤其是新兴的金融科技）的创新步伐，可能导致系统性风险、市场滥用或加剧金融排斥，从而对国家内部和国家间的不平等产生潜在负面影响。此关联在于行业对健全监管框架的需求和潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 辅助金融业（如国际支付网络、跨境金融科技合作）通过促进知识、专业技术和金融资源的共享与流动，加强了支持可持续发展的多利益攸关方伙伴关系。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

rationale: 作为批发业的一部分，该行业通过商品分销支持经济活动和经济多元化，但其 '杂项' 和非专业化性质削弱了其对生产力提升的直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业可能为中小型企业提供市场渠道并创造就业，但由于缺乏具体信息，其贡献程度不明确且可能有限。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises...)

rationale: 作为各种商品的批发商，如果其供应链中包含资源密集型或不可持续生产的产品，该行业可能间接助长自然资源的低效利用。由于 '杂项' 性质，这种风险存在但无法量化。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 内水面漁業提供动物蛋白来源，有助于保障粮食安全，特别是对沿岸社区。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 若采用可持续的养殖或捕捞实践（如生态养殖、配额管理），该行业可成为可持续粮食生产系统的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 内水面漁業通常由小型企业、家庭或个体经营，提供生计和就业机会，特别是在农村地区。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 该行业为从业者提供就业，但需要关注工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 如果管理得当，可以实现鱼类资源的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 内水面漁業若管理不善，极易导致过度捕捞，破坏鱼类种群，与恢复鱼类种群的目标直接冲突。此目标虽主要针对海洋，但其原则（规范捕捞、结束过度捕捞）完全适用于内陆渔业。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics.

rationale: 通过可持续的内陆渔业管理，可以增加依赖渔业资源的社区（包括偏远和农村地区）的经济收益，其精神与14.7一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism.

rationale: 不合理的渔业活动（如水体污染、栖息地破坏、引入入侵物种）会直接损害内陆淡水生态系统的健康和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements.

rationale: 集约化水产养殖可能使用化学品（如抗生素、消毒剂）并产生大量废物（如饲料残留、排泄物），若处理不当会对水环境造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 作为零售业的一个细分领域，该行业通过提供销售、仓储、管理等岗位，为实现充分和生产性就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该行业主要销售短寿命、塑料包装过多或不可回收材料的玩具，会助长资源浪费和废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业有机会通过推广环保玩具、提供产品可持续性信息或开展相关活动，来提高消费者对可持续生活方式的意识。但其核心商业活动并非直接提供教育信息，故相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 通过销售促进学习、创造力、解决问题的教育玩具和游戏，该行业可以间接支持幼儿的早期发展和学习准备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education

rationale: 通过销售鼓励身体活动（如运动器材）或有助于放松和社交的娱乐产品，该行业可以间接促进身心健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 如果销售的玩具含有有害化学物质（如某些涂料、塑料中的增塑剂）或生产过程中造成污染，则可能对健康和环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为专业工业设备的批发商，该行业是工业供应链的重要组成部分，通过提供必要的资本货物，直接支持各产业的工业化进程和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过分销可能包含资源节约型、清洁或高效技术的特殊产业机器，间接促进现有产业的可持续升级和改造。其积极影响程度取决于其产品组合的环保性能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 提供先进的特殊产业机器有助于客户产业实现技术升级和提高生产力，从而对整体经济生产力增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 如果该行业批发的设备旨在提高资源效率（如节能机器、优化材料使用的设备），则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。但这是间接且依赖于具体产品的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果该行业批发的某些特殊机器（例如，涉及有害化学品使用或产生危险废物的设备）在其生命周期内管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。行业本身虽不直接操作，但其供应链选择会影响此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为基础金属材料的批发商，该行业是制造业供应链的重要环节，支持经济多元化和产业活动，间接促进生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 非铁金属（如铜用于电线，铝用于轻量化结构）是建设可持续基础设施（如智能电网、可再生能源系统）和升级产业的关键原材料。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业所交易金属的上游开采和冶炼过程可能产生有害化学物质和污染，对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 非铁金属生产是工业废水和水体污染的重要来源之一。该行业依赖于这条供应链，因此间接与水污染问题相关。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 如果所交易的非铁金属来自不可持续或效率低下的采矿活动，该行业则间接助长了自然资源的不可持续管理和消耗。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 金属开采和加工会产生大量尾矿和工业废物。该行业本身不直接产生大量废物，但其供应链是废物的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 非铁金属的开采常导致森林砍伐、土壤侵蚀和生态系统破坏，与该行业供应链紧密相关。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 露天采矿等活动是土地退化和荒漠化的主要原因之一。该行业与这种负面环境影响存在间接关联。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 住宅金融业通过提供抵押贷款等金融服务，帮助人们（包括弱势群体）获得住房这一关键的经济资源和财产所有权，是实现该目标的重要途径。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是提供住房融资，直接促进人们获得安全、适足和负担得起的住房，是该目标实现的关键推动力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums.

rationale: 作为金融服务业的一部分，住宅金融业通过提供专门的住房贷款产品，有助于扩大普惠金融的覆盖范围，让更多人获得正规金融服务。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 如果住宅金融业的贷款标准不包含或鼓励能源效率要求，可能会为高能耗住宅的建设提供资金，间接阻碍能效提升。这是一种潜在的、取决于具体实践的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency.

rationale: 如果贷款审批过程中存在基于收入、地域、种族或性别的歧视性政策或偏见，则会加剧不平等，违背该目标。这是一种潜在的、取决于具体实践的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard.

rationale: 老人福祉事業通过提供健康管理、疾病预防、康复护理和心理健康支持等服务，直接促进老年人的身心健康与福祉，减少非传染性疾病带来的过早死亡风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 该行业通过提供可及的、专业的长期照护和健康服务，是全民健康覆盖（UHC）体系的重要组成部分，特别是针对老年这一特殊需求群体。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 老人福祉事業的核心目标是促进老年人的社会包容，通过提供支持服务，增强其能力，确保他们不因年龄而被排除在社会生活之外，符合不分年龄促进所有人包容的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 许多老人福祉服务（如养老院、辅助生活设施）直接提供了适合老年人居住的安全、适足的住房选择，并配套基本服务，是对该目标的重要贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业创造了大量的护理人员、社工、管理人员等就业岗位，为社会提供了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 在某些情况下，养老护理行业可能存在工作强度大、薪酬偏低、职业发展路径不清晰等问题，这可能与实现“体面工作”的目标存在差距，构成潜在的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果老人福祉服务收费过高，可能导致低收入老年人无法负担，反而加剧了基于经济状况的社会排斥，与促进包容的目标相悖。此外，若服务模式过于机构化而忽视个性化和社会融合，也可能产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 民间调查与信息机构是研发和创新生态系统的重要组成部分，它们进行科学研究、数据分析和知识生产，直接支持各行业技术能力的提升。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries..., encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people...)

rationale: 这些机构通过提供独立的调查数据、绩效评估和情报分析，为政府、企业和非营利组织提高决策的透明度、问责制和有效性提供了关键的证据基础。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 民间信息机构是高质量、分类数据的重要生产者，其工作有助于弥补数据差距，特别是在商业和社会领域，支持对可持续发展目标的监测和评估。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries... to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, geographic location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts)

rationale: 该行业本身属于高附加值的知识密集型服务业，通过提供信息和情报服务，帮助企业和其他组织提高生产力、实现技术升级和多元化，从而推动经济增长。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 如果信息收集和处理不当（例如，未经充分同意收集个人数据、数据泄露），可能会侵犯个人隐私权，这与确保公众获取信息的同时保护基本自由的原则存在潜在冲突。负面影响的程度取决于具体机构的伦理规范和操作实践。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements)

rationale: 如果调查方法存在系统性偏差（如抽样不具代表性）或数据分析中隐含偏见，其产出的信息可能强化刻板印象或导致歧视性政策，从而阻碍社会包容和赋权。这是一个潜在风险，而非必然结果。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status)

rationale: 服装零售业是重要的经济活动和就业来源，特别是为女性提供了大量就业机会，支持了体面工作和地方经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为主要面向女性消费者的零售业，其存在和发展间接支持了女性的经济参与和消费权利，但关联性较为间接。
sdg_target_description: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws

rationale: 零售商可以通过提供可持续材料（如有机棉）制成的服装、宣传环保理念等方式，教育和引导消费者采取更可持续的消费模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 如果该行业推崇快时尚模式，鼓励频繁购买和淘汰衣物，会导致纺织品浪费急剧增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 童装零售商有责任确保其销售的产品，特别是面向儿童的产品，符合安全标准，不使用有害化学物质，从而保护儿童健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 医院提供专业的孕产妇分娩、产科急救和产后护理服务，是降低孕产妇死亡率的关键设施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births

rationale: 医院提供新生儿科、儿科疾病治疗和重症监护，直接致力于降低新生儿和五岁以下儿童死亡率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age

rationale: 医院是诊断、治疗和管理艾滋病、结核病等传染病以及应对新发突发传染病疫情的前沿阵地。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 医院通过提供心血管疾病、癌症、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的诊断、治疗和康复服务，以及精神心理科服务，直接降低过早死亡率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为医疗服务的核心提供者，医院是实现全民健康覆盖、确保所有人获得优质医疗服务的基础。但其可及性和费用可能因地区和支付能力而异。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 医院是公共卫生应急体系的重要组成部分，负责接收和处理突发公共卫生事件中的患者，提升社区和国家的健康风险应对能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 医院是劳动力密集型行业，为医生、护士、技师、行政人员等提供大量就业岗位，并通常提供相对稳定的工作环境。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 医院本身是社会关键的基础设施，其建设、维护和可及性直接关系到社区居民的福祉和区域发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果医疗资源（如高端医院、专科服务）过度集中在城市或富裕地区，可能导致农村和贫困人口难以获得优质服务，加剧社会不平等。这是医疗体系结构性问题的体现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 医院运营产生大量具有传染性、毒性的医疗废物（如针头、病理组织、化学品）。如果处理不当，会对环境和人类健康构成严重威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 医院是能源消耗大户（24/7运营，大量医疗设备），通常依赖化石能源，产生显著的碳排放。若未积极采取节能和可再生能源措施，其碳足迹将对气候行动构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 铺装材料是构建交通网络等高质量、可靠、可持续和有抵御灾害能力的基础设施的核心要素，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 安全、耐用的铺装路面是可持续交通系统（包括公路和公共交通基础设施）的基础，对保障道路安全和可达性至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 该行业通过研发和应用可持续的铺装材料（如透水铺装、温拌沥青、使用再生材料），有助于提升基础设施的可持续性和资源效率，符合目标要求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 铺装材料制造严重依赖砂石、沥青等自然资源的开采，若管理不当，可能导致资源枯竭和生态环境破坏，与自然资源的可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统铺装材料（尤其是热拌沥青）的生产过程能耗高，是温室气体排放源之一，对应对气候变化构成挑战，除非采用低碳技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 为制造铺装材料而进行的骨料开采可能导致栖息地破坏、土壤侵蚀和生物多样性丧失，对陆地生态系统的保护产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services

rationale: 采用透水铺装等材料可以帮助管理城市雨水，减少内涝和水污染，并缓解热岛效应，从而减少城市对环境的负面影响。此为正面的潜在贡献，但普及度影响其相关性得分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 天然气作为一种相对稳定和广泛使用的能源，在特定阶段和地区有助于保障能源供应和可及性，但其并非可持续的现代能源终极解决方案。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 天然气开采业是资本和技术密集型产业，能贡献于经济增长和生产效率，但其对经济多元化的贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业能创造直接和间接的就业机会，但工作环境可能存在风险，且行业受市场波动影响较大。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 天然气开采和运输需要建设相关基础设施（如管道、液化天然气设施），这些设施支持能源供应和经济活动。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 虽然行业本身可能采用技术提高效率，但天然气作为化石燃料产业，其核心业务模式与向可持续基础设施和清洁技术的全面转型方向不一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 天然气燃烧是二氧化碳排放的主要来源，加剧气候变化，从而削弱各国应对气候相关灾害的能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries

rationale: 持续依赖和扩张天然气开采与将强有力的气候变化措施（如快速脱碳）纳入国家政策的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 天然气开采过程可能伴生有害化学物质（如压裂液中的添加剂）和废水，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。开采过程中的甲烷泄漏也是一种强效温室气体的释放。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 开采活动会产生工业废物（如钻井岩屑、生产废水），增加了废物管理的负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 水力压裂等开采技术可能消耗大量水资源并污染地下水，对水质构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 牙科诊所通过预防和治疗龋齿、牙周病等口腔非传染性疾病，直接促进患者身体健康和福祉，减少由这些疾病引发的过早死亡风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为基层医疗服务提供者，牙科诊所在提供可及、优质的口腔保健服务方面发挥着关键作用，是全民健康覆盖体系的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 牙科诊所通常会对患者进行口腔卫生和健康生活方式的教育，这间接促进了与健康相关的可持续发展知识和技能的普及。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development.

rationale: 牙科诊所作为服务行业，为牙医、牙科卫生士、护士和行政人员等提供了体面的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 通过提供必要的医疗服务，牙科诊所有助于促进不同背景人群的社会包容，但其影响程度取决于服务的实际可及性和公平性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 牙科诊所运营中会产生医疗废物（如感染性废物、含汞废物等），如果管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响，与化学品和废物的无害化管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 诊所使用的一次性医疗器械和包装材料等会产生固体废物，若未有效实施减量、回收措施，则对减少废物产生的目标有轻微负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 内衣批发行业作为分销渠道，支持着上游的制造企业（通常是中小型企业）进入市场，促进了这些企业的成长和发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 批发贸易行业提供了就业机会，但其工作条件（如薪酬、福利）是否符合'体面工作'标准，取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该行业主要批发快时尚类内衣，会鼓励过度消费和资源密集型生产模式，与可持续消费模式背道而驰。其影响程度取决于产品类型和商业模式。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 内衣生产可能涉及有害化学物质（如染料、整理剂）的使用。批发商作为供应链一环，若不对供应商进行环境管理要求，则间接助长化学品和废物的不当管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 内衣，尤其是快时尚产品，生命周期短，易成为废弃物。批发环节推动的大量销售若不伴随回收或可持续设计，会增加废物产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 内衣产品主要面向女性消费者，该行业的存在服务于女性的经济需求。此外，该行业的从业者可能包含较多女性，为其提供经济资源获取途径。但关联性较为间接。
