sdg_target_description: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws

rationale: 该行业有可能为女性提供经济领域的就业和晋升机会，但其具体影响取决于企业内部的管理和晋升政策是否公平。关联性较弱且不确定。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 该行业制造的基本医疗用品（如纱布、绷带、手术服）是提供高质量基本医疗服务的核心组成部分，直接支持全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 在公共卫生事件（如疫情）期间，该行业生产的口罩、防护服等卫生材料是国家卫生风险管理和应急响应的关键物资。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 该行业生产的卫生巾、尿布、湿巾等个人卫生材料对于维护个人卫生，特别是满足妇女、女童和弱势群体的需求至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations

rationale: 纤维卫生材料的生产过程（如漂白、染色、整理）可能使用有害化学品，若管理不当，会对环境和工人健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业大量生产的一次性卫生材料（如一次性口罩、尿布、湿巾）在使用后产生大量固体废物，增加了垃圾填埋负担，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新（如开发更高效、更环保的卫生材料）为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业就业岗位，但其对SDG 8的贡献程度取决于具体的工作条件、工资水平是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 服装制造业是劳动密集型产业，为大量工人，特别是女性工人，提供就业机会，直接贡献于实现充分的生产性就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业生产满足基本需求的消费品（衣物），是消费和生产体系的一部分。如果采用可持续实践，可以支持可持续消费和生产模式的框架。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 如果制造商采用可持续来源的材料（如有机棉）和提高资源效率的生产工艺，可以对自然资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 服装制造业的供应链（尤其是在某些地区）历史上存在工作条件不安全、劳动权利保护不足的问题，对实现体面工作目标构成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 快时尚和过度生产模式导致大量纺织品废料，该行业是废弃物产生的重要来源，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 服装制造，特别是染色和整理过程，是水污染和有害化学品排放的主要来源之一，对改善水质和减少污染的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 制造过程中使用的化学品可能通过污染空气、水和土壤，对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险，与减少有害污染相关疾病的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业的核心功能是匹配求职者与职位空缺，是促进实现充分和生产性就业及体面工作的直接工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过为中小企业提供高效的人才招聘服务，该行业间接支持了创造体面工作的政策和企业的正规化与发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 职业介绍所通过识别市场需求并将求职者与需要特定技能的岗位匹配，间接鼓励个人获取相关技能，促进了技能与就业的联系。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 如果职业介绍所积极推行无性别偏见的招聘实践，可以帮助女性获得更多经济领域的领导职位和决策机会。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 通过为各类人群（如残疾人、少数族裔）提供就业机会，该行业可以促进社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 如果监管不力，私营职业介绍所可能参与或促成剥削性用工，例如收取过高中介费、提供不安全的工作条件或助长非正规就业，从而损害劳工权利。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 如果职业介绍所在招聘过程中存在无意识的偏见或歧视性算法，可能会延续对女性求职者的歧视，例如在薪资或职位推荐上存在性别差异。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 如果服务主要面向高技能或高收入人群，而忽视了弱势群体，该行业可能会加剧现有的社会经济不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 该行业批发建筑石材和陶瓷制品，是建设和维护高质量、可持续基础设施（如建筑、道路）所必需的关键材料供应商。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过供应链运作支持经济活动，但其本身并非高技术创新领域，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 航空运输业直接创造了飞行员、机组人员、地勤、维护、物流和管理等大量就业岗位，是体面工作和经济增长的重要贡献者。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 航空运输通过促进贸易、旅游和全球供应链，是驱动国家和全球经济增长的关键基础设施。
sdg_target_description: (Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries)

rationale: 机场和航空网络是现代交通基础设施的核心组成部分，对于连接地区、促进发展和支持人类福祉至关重要。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 航空货运是实现高价值、时效性强的国际贸易（包括发展中国家的出口）的关键推动力。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries’ share of global exports by 2020)

rationale: 航空运输在紧急情况下（如疫情爆发时）能够快速运送医疗人员、药品和疫苗，对全球公共卫生有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries... and provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines)

rationale: 航空业严重依赖化石燃料，是温室气体排放（尤其是高空排放对气候变暖影响显著）和碳排放增长最快的来源之一，对实现气候行动目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 航空运输消耗大量不可再生的化石燃料，其资源利用效率相较于其他运输方式较低，与自然资源的可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 在某些地区，航空业可能受益于化石燃料补贴，这间接鼓励了高碳排放的消费模式，与调整低效化石燃料补贴的目标不一致。
sdg_target_description: (Rationalize inefficient fossil-fuel subsidies that encourage wasteful consumption...)

rationale: 有线广播网络是信息和通信技术（ICT）基础设施的重要组成部分，提供可靠的信息传输服务，支持经济发展和社会福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 有线广播网络，特别是现代基于光纤的网络，是提供互联网接入服务的关键方式之一，有助于增加ICT的普及度。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 作为媒体渠道，有线广播可以传播教育节目、职业培训内容和远程学习课程，促进知识和技能的普及。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: 有线广播服务是公众获取新闻、信息和娱乐内容的重要渠道，有助于保障公众的信息获取权。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements

rationale: 有线广播网络的持续运行（如数据中心、放大器）和用户终端设备（如机顶盒）消耗电能，如果能源效率不高，则对提高能效的目标构成轻微挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 用户设备（如机顶盒、调制解调器）的更新换代和技术淘汰会产生电子废物，如果回收处理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业制造的锅炉和原动机可用于生物质能、地热能或聚光太阳能热发电等可再生能源系统，从而增加可再生能源份额。但其对SDG 7.2的贡献取决于产品是否专门用于可再生能源领域。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 开发和制造高效率的锅炉、燃气轮机、蒸汽轮机等原动机是提高全球能源效率的关键，特别是在发电和工业部门。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 高效、清洁的锅炉和原动机是升级能源基础设施和改造工业流程，使其更具可持续性和资源效率的核心技术装备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为资本货物制造业，该行业通过技术创新和生产高效的动力设备，直接贡献于提高整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 制造更高效的能源转换设备有助于提高资源使用效率，并在一定程度上推动经济增长与能源消耗/排放的脱钩。
sdg_target_description: Improve progressively, through 2030, global resource efficiency in consumption and production and endeavour to decouple economic growth from environmental degradation

rationale: 如果该行业主要生产依赖化石燃料（如煤炭、重油）的锅炉和发动机，则会固化高碳能源结构，阻碍向可再生能源的转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 化石燃料锅炉和原动机是主要的温室气体排放源，其生产和销售与国家将气候变化措施纳入政策的努力相冲突，加剧气候变化。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及有害化学品的使用和废物的产生（如金属加工废料、冷却剂、涂料），若管理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil

rationale: 重型设备制造通常会产生工业废料，如果未能有效实施废物减量化和循环利用措施，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为当前全球能源体系的主要燃料来源之一，原油开采在短期内为部分地区的能源供应提供了基础，但其不可持续性和污染性限制了其正面贡献的得分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services)

rationale: 原油矿业是许多国家，特别是资源型经济体的重要经济支柱，通过出口和税收贡献于经济增长。
sdg_target_description: (Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries)

rationale: 过度依赖原油开采可能导致经济结构单一，阻碍经济多样化和向更高生产率领域的转型，即所谓的'资源诅咒'风险。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业提供了大量的直接和间接就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 原油开采业（尤其是某些地区的野外作业和海上平台）通常伴随着较高的安全风险和工作环境危害。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 原油是支撑现有交通和能源基础设施运行的关键资源。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 原油是不可再生资源，其开采本质上是不可持续的资源管理方式，且开采过程可能效率低下并造成资源浪费。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 原油开采过程可能导致化学品泄漏、油污、钻井废料和伴生水的排放，对空气、水和土壤造成严重污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业在其运营过程中会产生大量固体和液体废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 原油作为主要化石燃料，其消费是温室气体排放和气候变化的主要驱动因素，从而加剧了气候相关灾害的风险和强度，削弱了社会的抵御能力。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries)

rationale: 该行业的存在和利益可能成为阻碍将强有力的气候变化措施（如逐步淘汰化石燃料补贴、征收碳税）纳入国家政策的阻力。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 部分原油产业相关方可能进行游说或宣传，淡化气候变化的风险，从而对公众教育和认知提升产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning)

rationale: 地方政府是‘各级’机构中的核心一环，其有效、负责和透明的运作是实现该目标的直接体现和关键。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 地方政府是与公民互动最直接的层级，负责推动包容性、参与性的地方决策过程。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 地方政府在提供和管理保障性住房、供水、环卫等基本服务方面扮演核心角色。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services.

rationale: 城市规划和管理是地方政府的基本职能，直接关系到可持续城市化的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries.

rationale: 地方政府通常负责运营或管理基层医疗卫生机构，是实现全民健康覆盖的前线。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 地方政府在教育事务中承担重要职责，包括管理公立中小学，确保教育服务的普及和质量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes.

rationale: 地方政府是重要的公共部门雇主，其招聘和人力资源管理实践对促进充分就业和体面工作具有示范作用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 地方政府负责制定和实施地方的防灾减灾计划、应急响应和灾后重建，是提升社区韧性的关键行动者。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 地方政府将国家气候政策转化为地方行动，例如通过制定地方气候行动计划、绿色建筑标准等。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 地方政府通过社会福利项目、无障碍设施建设、包容性社区活动等，直接促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 如果地方政府存在腐败问题（如公共采购中的贿赂、权力寻租），将严重阻碍可持续发展，对该目标产生显著的负面影响。此评分反映了该行业潜在的负面风险。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.

rationale: 如果地方政府规划不当或执行不力，可能导致强制拆迁、保障房供应不足或公共服务不均等问题，从而对该目标产生负面影响。此评分反映了该行业潜在的负面风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services.

rationale: 合成树脂是众多工业部门的基础材料，其制造业对工业增加值、就业和经济增长有显著贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过技术升级生产高性能、高附加值的特种树脂，有助于提升经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 合成树脂制造过程涉及化学品的使用，若管理不善，可能导致有害物质排放到空气、水和土壤中，对人类健康和环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的大量塑料制品，特别是一次性塑料，是固体废弃物的重要来源，对实现废物减量化和循环利用的目标构成巨大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料废弃物，尤其是塑料包装，是海洋垃圾污染的主要来源，对海洋生态系统造成严重危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 该行业直接创造司机等就业岗位，是实现充分和生产性就业的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 作为公共交通网络的补充，轻型车辆运输提供了额外的交通可达性选择。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons)

rationale: 车辆运营增加了道路上的交通流量，如果安全管理不善，可能增加交通事故伤亡的风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents)

rationale: 如果车队主要由燃油车构成，其尾气排放会直接恶化城市空气质量，产生负面环境影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management)

rationale: 化石燃料车辆的运营是温室气体排放的重要来源，直接加剧气候变化，与减缓气候变化的措施相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 如果行业积极采用电动汽车等零排放或低排放车辆，则能直接支持气候行动，减少交通部门的碳排放。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的车辆消耗不可再生资源，不符合自然资源的可持续管理要求。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 宣传物制作服务本身常由中小型企业提供，是创意产业的一部分，支持创业和中小企业增长。同时，其服务帮助客户（尤其是中小企业）进行市场推广，间接支持其发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises...)

rationale: 该行业为设计师、文案、营销人员等提供就业机会，属于典型的服务性就业。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 通过为企业（包括中小企业）提供营销和品牌推广服务，该行业帮助它们更好地进入市场和融入价值链。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets)

rationale: 该行业生产的许多实体宣传材料（如一次性传单、塑料促销品）生命周期短，容易迅速成为废弃物，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 某些宣传物制作过程（如印刷、特定材料的加工）可能涉及化学品的使用，若管理不当可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业的服务核心往往是促进消费，如果宣传的是不可持续的产品或生活方式，则与鼓励可持续消费和生产模式的理念存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle)

rationale: 现代宣传物制作服务高度依赖数字工具和互联网进行设计、协作和数字渠道的分发，间接支持了ICT的普及和应用。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020)

rationale: 园艺服务的核心业务是创建、美化和维护绿色空间（如公园、花园、社区绿地），直接增加了城市和社区中安全、包容和可及的绿色公共空间的可用性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 通过在城市环境中引入和维护植物生命，园艺服务有助于保护和可持续利用陆地生态系统（即使是小规模的），提供如碳封存、水土保持和生物多样性支持等服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 负责任的园艺实践，如使用本地植物物种和创建生物多样性热点区域，有助于减少城市环境中的栖息地退化和支持本地生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 植物通过光合作用改善空气质量，有助于减少空气污染对健康的影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 接触绿色空间被证明可以促进身心健康，减少压力，并可能有助于预防非传染性疾病。园艺服务增加了人们接触绿色空间的机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 园艺服务行业通常由中小微企业构成，该行业的发展支持了体面工作的创造和中小企业的成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises...

rationale: 如果园艺服务在养护过程中过度或不当使用化学农药、除草剂和化肥，可能导致土壤和水体污染，对人类健康和环境造成负面影响，与化学品无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 园艺活动（如修剪、除草）会产生绿色废物。如果这些废物没有得到妥善处理（如堆肥或回收），而是被送往 landfill，则增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 金属废料批发的核心业务是回收和再利用金属，直接且显著地减少了废弃物填埋量，并促进材料闭环循环。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提供再生金属作为原生矿石的替代品，该行业减少了对矿产资源的开采压力，促进了自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业为制造业提供了关键的再生原材料，支持产业向资源效率更高、环境更可持续的方向转型，是可持续工业基础设施的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 金属回收行业本身是劳动密集型和资源生产型产业，通过技术创新提高分拣和加工效率，有助于提升经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 回收金属的能耗远低于生产原生金属，从而大幅减少温室气体排放。该行业的存在和发展是实践国家气候变化战略（如循环经济政策）的具体体现。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果废金属处理场所管理不善（如不当的切割、储存），可能导致有害物质（如油脂、重金属）对空气、土壤或水体造成局部污染，对工人和周边社区健康构成潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 与3.9类似，不当的运营可能导致污染物进入水体，但现代规范的废料场会采取控制措施将此风险降至最低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 该行业是劳动密集型产业，为大量人口（包括许多女性）提供了就业机会，是实现充分就业的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业的工作环境和劳工权利（如工资、工时、安全）是社会关注的焦点，其合规性直接关系到对劳工权利的保护。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 服装制造严重依赖棉花等自然资源，其传统生产方式往往导致水资源和土地资源的过度消耗和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 快时尚和制服更新周期可能导致大量纺织品废物的产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业面临越来越大的压力，需要采用更可持续的生产实践（如使用有机棉、减少化学品），并提高供应链透明度。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle)

rationale: 服装制造业雇佣了大量女性劳动力，其工作环境和晋升机会对促进妇女经济参与具有潜在影响。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 纺织品染色和整理过程是工业水污染的主要来源之一，会向水体中排放有害化学品，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 褐煤开采提供了能源资源，有助于满足能源需求。但由于褐煤并非‘现代’或‘清洁’能源，其贡献与SDG 7的可持续精神相悖，因此得分较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 采矿业作为初级产业，能贡献于GDP增长。但褐煤开采的长期经济可持续性差，且可能阻碍向绿色经济转型，因此相关性较弱。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 该行业能创造就业岗位。但采矿工作可能涉及健康安全风险，不完全符合‘体面工作’的全部内涵。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 褐煤是单位能源碳排放最高的化石燃料之一，其持续开采和燃烧与国家气候行动目标和向低碳经济转型的根本要求直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 褐煤的开采（粉尘）和燃烧（排放二氧化硫、氮氧化物、颗粒物等）是空气污染的重要来源，严重危害人类健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 采矿活动可能污染地下水和水体，且褐煤发电厂是耗水和潜在的水污染源，与改善水质的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 褐煤开采和发电过程通常需要大量水资源，在水资源稀缺地区会加剧用水压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 褐煤露天开采会大规模破坏地表植被、土壤结构和生态系统，导致生物栖息地丧失和土地退化。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 采矿活动直接造成土地退化，开采后的土地需要大量努力进行生态修复，与实现土地退化零增长的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 办公和民用设备制造业通过生产提高自动化、效率和信息处理能力的设备，直接支持各行各业实现更高的经济生产力、技术升级和创新。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业本身贡献于工业产值和就业，是可持续工业化的组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果该行业致力于生产高能效、长寿命的产品（如节能认证的家电），则间接支持自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。但此关联性取决于具体产品设计和行业实践，故得分中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 电子设备制造过程可能使用有害化学品，且整个生命周期（特别是废弃阶段）若管理不当，会导致有害物质释放，对环境与健康构成风险，与无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业是电子废物（e-waste）的主要来源之一。如果产品设计未充分考虑可修复性、可升级性和可回收性，且缺乏有效的回收体系，则会显著增加废物产生，与减量目标冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 捻纱制造业是劳动密集型和基础性产业，通过技术升级和创新可以提高生产力，为经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业是工业化的组成部分，能够创造就业和产值。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该行业采纳资源效率更高的技术和清洁生产工艺（如节能捻线机、水循环系统），则可以贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过优化原料使用（如减少纱线浪费）、采用可持续来源的纤维，可以促进自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过改进工艺减少生产过程中的废纱、废料，并推动废料的回收利用，可以贡献于减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统捻纱工艺可能涉及纺丝油剂、润滑剂等化学品的使用，若废水处理不当，会造成水污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 如果过度依赖不可持续来源的原材料（如传统棉花），则会对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业对农业原料（如棉花）的需求，若管理不善，可能间接导致土地使用变化或农药污染，影响陆地生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services

rationale: 石油化学工业是现代工业体系的基础，为众多下游产业提供关键原材料，直接贡献于工业产值和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业严重依赖不可再生的石油和天然气作为原料，并且是能源和水的消耗大户，其资源利用模式通常不符合可持续管理的要求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 石化产品的制造、使用和处置过程可能涉及有害化学物质，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。塑料废弃物问题尤为突出。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 许多石化产品，特别是一次性塑料制品，是固体废物的重要来源，其固有的线性经济模式（生产-使用-丢弃）与废物减量目标相悖，尽管回收技术存在，但整体回收率仍不理想。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 石油化学工业是二氧化碳和其他温室气体的主要排放源之一，其以化石燃料为基础的商业模式是全球气候变化的主要驱动因素，因此与将气候行动纳入主流的政策方向存在根本性冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 石化制造业存在潜在的工作场所危险，如接触有害化学品、火灾爆炸风险等，对工人的健康和安全构成威胁，需要严格的安全管理来保障'体面工作'。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 石化生产过程中可能产生含有有害物质的工业废水，若处理不当排放到水体中，会对水质造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 石化工业排放的空气污染物（如挥发性有机物、颗粒物）和潜在的水体污染物，可能对周边社区居民的健康产生不利影响，增加患病风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 通过优化包装设计和材料使用（如轻量化、减少材料消耗），该行业有助于实现自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 通过推广可回收、可重复使用或可生物降解的包装解决方案，该行业有助于从源头减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 若过度依赖一次性或不可回收包装材料，会导致资源浪费和低效利用，与可持续管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 某些包装材料（如某些塑料）的生产、使用或处置可能涉及有害化学物质或造成环境污染，若管理不当则产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 包装业是物流和供应链基础设施的重要组成部分，通过采用可持续包装技术和材料，支持产业向更可持续的方向升级。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 作为制造业和服务业的支撑行业，包装业通过提供就业和促进物流效率，为经济增长和生产率提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 如果包装材料（如纸制品）的来源涉及不可持续的森林砍伐，则会对森林保护和可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests...)

rationale: 通过销售花卉和植物，该行业支持家庭、企业和社区的绿化，间接促进绿色空间的创造和美化，但其作为零售环节的贡献是间接且有限的。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities)

rationale: 如果花卉和植物的供应链涉及不可持续的种植或野生采集（如导致栖息地破坏、过度用水、农药滥用），则会对陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 如果行业采购的植物来自威胁生物多样性的来源（如非法采伐濒危物种或破坏自然栖息地），则会直接加剧自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 花卉种植通常需要大量的水、土地和能源。如果供应链管理不善，会导致自然资源（如水、土壤）的低效使用和不可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 该行业会产生包装废物（如塑料盆、包装纸），并且未售出的易腐产品（花卉、植物）可能导致食物浪费（如果部分可食用）或有机废物，增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业有潜力通过推广本地物种、有机产品或提供养护知识，来教育消费者关于可持续生活方式和与自然和谐共处的信息，但这种贡献取决于零售商的具体实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature)

rationale: 涂料和油墨制造过程中可能使用或产生有害化学物质和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs），若管理不当，会对工人和周边社区居民的健康构成风险，并可能通过空气、水、土壤污染导致疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 生产过程中的工业废水若含有有毒化学物质（如重金属、溶剂）且未经妥善处理排放，会造成水体污染，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动直接创造就业机会并贡献于经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业包含大量中小型企业，其发展有助于支持体面工作的创造和产业活动的持续。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 涂料产品（如防腐涂料）对于保护建筑、桥梁等基础设施，延长其使用寿命和可靠性具有重要作用。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 该行业通过研发和生产低VOC、水性涂料等更环保的产品，本身是向更清洁、环境友好型技术和工业过程的转型，并支持其他产业的绿色升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 行业内的研发活动旨在开发性能更优、更可持续的新产品（如生物基涂料），这体现了技术创新和产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending.

rationale: 涂料和油墨生产涉及化学品的使用，其生产过程和废弃产品若未得到无害化环境管理，可能导致有害物质释放。同时，该行业也在向更安全的化学品管理方向发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 生产过程中可能产生工业废料，且许多涂料包装和残留物最终成为难以回收的废物，对减少废物生成的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 含有害化学物质的工业废水或不当处置的涂料产品可能通过河流等途径进入海洋，造成海洋污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution.

rationale: 化学品泄漏或污染可能对土壤和陆地生态系统（包括生物多样性）产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements.

rationale: 乐器批发通过保障乐器供应，支持音乐教育和技能培训，有助于增加拥有艺术和文化技能的青年和成人数量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 作为分销业的一部分，该行业通过其供应链活动为经济生产力做出贡献，并支持文化产业的经济多元化。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 乐器批发业直接创造就业岗位（如销售、仓储、物流），并支持音乐产业内的创意和创业活动。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 乐器批发商服务的客户（如小型琴行、独立音乐教师）可能是中小企业，该行业通过提供产品供应链间接支持这些企业的运营和发展。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services...)

rationale: 乐器批发活动涉及产品包装（如纸板、塑料）和物流运输，可能产生固体废物和碳排放，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。此外，如果所售乐器寿命短或不可持续材料制成，会加剧资源消耗。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 信用保证机构的核心职能是解决中小微企业（MSMEs）融资难问题，直接为其获得金融服务提供关键支持，从而促进创业、创新和企业的正规化与成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业通过提供信用担保，显著增加了中小型企业获得可负担信贷的机会，这是实现该子目标的核心手段之一。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 通过支持微型企业和个体经营者获得贷款，信用保证机构有助于确保贫困和弱势群体享有金融服务这一经济资源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 信用保证通过降低融资门槛，促进了经济包容性，帮助那些可能因规模小、缺乏抵押品而被排除在主流金融服务之外的实体融入经济体系。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 娱乐业是旅游业的重要组成部分，能够创造就业机会并推广本地文化体验，符合可持续旅游的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 提供健康的休闲和娱乐活动有助于促进公众的心理健康和福祉。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being)

rationale: 部分娱乐业（如主题公园、文化表演）可能涉及对文化遗产的展示和推广，间接支持文化保护。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 如果该行业包含博彩业，赌博成瘾被视为一种行为成瘾，对个人和家庭的健康与福祉构成严重威胁，与预防药物滥用的精神相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol)

rationale: 大型娱乐活动、主题公园等通常会产生大量一次性塑料和食品废弃物，增加了废物管理的压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 博彩业存在被用于洗钱等非法资金流动的风险，对建设和平、公正的机构构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime)

rationale: 该行业销售的摄影化学材料（如显影液、定影液）和含有有害物质的电子设备（如相机电池），若未被消费者妥善管理、使用和处置，可能导致有害化学物质和废弃物释放到环境中，对人类健康和环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业销售的一次性胶卷、相纸以及快速更新的数码相机产品，促进了物质消费和产品淘汰，间接导致了固体废弃物（包括电子废弃物）的产生。其商业模式本身可能并不侧重于废物预防、减量或循环利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为零售业，该行业通常由中小型企业或个体经营者运营，其存在本身支持了创业和中小微企业的发展，提供了经济活动。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises)

rationale: 该零售行业为销售、管理、物流等岗位提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有微小的直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 作为摄影技术和设备的销售渠道，该行业间接支持了影像技术这一创新领域的普及和应用，但其本身并不直接进行研发或显著提升技术能力。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending)

rationale: 摄影器材可用于摄影技能培训，帮助人们获得技术和职业技能，但这是非常间接和次要的贡献，取决于最终用户如何使用产品。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 百货店作为主要零售雇主，提供大量就业机会，并可通过公平工资和体面工作条件贡献于该目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 通过销售本地特色产品和纪念品，百货店可支持可持续旅游和本地经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 百货店可通过减少包装浪费、实施回收计划和推广可重复使用产品来减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为大型企业，百货店有责任采纳可持续实践（如绿色采购）并发布可持续发展报告。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle)

rationale: 百货店可通过促进性别平等政策，确保妇女在管理和领导职位中的平等参与。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 如果百货店的供应链和运营过度依赖资源密集型产品，可能导致自然资源不可持续的管理和使用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 百货店的能源消耗（如照明、空调）和物流运输可能产生显著温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响，除非采取减排措施。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 如果劳动标准不严格，百货店可能存在工作环境不安全或劳动权利受损的风险，尤其对低薪或临时工。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 保险中介通过推广普惠保险产品（如灾害险、小额保险），帮助贫困和脆弱群体管理经济风险，增强其对气候变化和意外事件的抵御能力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

rationale: 作为健康保险的销售和咨询渠道，该行业直接促进全民健康覆盖，帮助个人获得财务风险保护，改善医疗服务的可及性。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 保险中介行业本身提供就业机会（如代理人员），并支持中小企业通过保险服务管理风险，促进正规经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 该行业的核心职能是扩大保险服务的可及性，直接贡献于加强金融机构能力，让更多人获得保险和金融服务。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 通过提供包容性保险产品，该行业有助于减少经济不平等，促进社会包容，但影响程度取决于实际覆盖范围和服务公平性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 若保险中介行为缺乏透明监管，可能通过不当销售或歧视性政策加剧不平等，与加强金融监管以促进公平的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations.

rationale: 通过推广气候相关保险（如洪水险、干旱险），该行业帮助个人和社区增强对气候灾害的适应能力和韧性。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 通过提供经过处理的商品煤，该行业为当前能源系统（特别是燃煤发电）提供了燃料，在一定程度上支持了能源供应的可靠性。但煤炭并非‘现代’清洁能源，此贡献的可持续性极低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services)

rationale: 作为能源和工业供应链的一环，该行业通过经济活动（就业、产值）为经济增长做出贡献，但这种增长模式与绿色转型的长期目标不符。
sdg_target_description: (Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业本身是工业活动的一部分，但其可持续性存疑，不能被认为是‘可持续的工业化’。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业通过优化煤炭质量，旨在提高下游燃煤设施的燃烧效率，这看似符合‘资源使用效率’。然而，其根本作用是维持和优化高碳基础设施与产业，阻碍了向清洁技术的转型，与使产业‘可持续’的核心目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities)

rationale: 煤炭分选过程可能产生粉尘和废水，造成局部空气和水污染。更重要的是，其产品（洗选煤）的燃烧是环境空气污染（如PM2.5）和相关健康问题的主要来源，直接阻碍此目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 煤炭洗选过程需要大量水，并产生含有煤粉、重金属和化学药剂的废水，若处理不当会对水体造成严重污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 该行业服务于对不可再生的化石燃料（煤炭）的开采和消耗，不符合对自然资源的‘可持续管理’原则，鼓励了不可持续的资源利用模式。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 该行业是化石燃料能源系统的关键组成部分，其存在和运营与全球脱碳和应对气候变化的政策方向直接冲突，是温室气体排放供应链上的重要一环。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 保险服务通过风险转移机制，为个人和中小企业提供财务保障，增强其抵御经济、社会和环境冲击（如疾病、事故、自然灾害）的能力，防止其陷入贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

rationale: 健康保险是实现全民健康覆盖（UHC）的核心组成部分，它提供财务风险保护，使人们能够获得优质的医疗保健服务，而无需面临经济困难。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 保险服务为中小微企业（MSMEs）提供风险保障，使其在面临经营中断、财产损失等风险时能维持运营，从而支持创业、创新和体面工作的创造。保险本身也是一种重要的金融服务。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 保险服务业是金融体系的关键组成部分。发展强大、包容的保险市场直接加强了国内金融机构的能力，并扩大了所有人获得保险服务的机会。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 财产保险和灾害保险通过提供灾后重建资金，显著减少灾害造成的直接经济损失，帮助个人、企业和社区更快恢复，增强城市和社区的韧性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations.

rationale: 通过开发和提供气候风险保险、巨灾债券等金融工具，保险服务业有助于各国，特别是脆弱国家和地区，加强应对气候相关危害和自然灾害的韧性和适应能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 保险公司的投资组合可能包含对环境或社会有负面影响的行业（如化石燃料、污染行业），若未充分实施负责任的投资策略，则与其应倡导的可持续实践相悖。其自身的运营（如能源使用、纸张消耗）也可能产生环境足迹。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle.

rationale: 如果保险公司的承保和投资决策继续支持高碳经济活动（如为新的燃煤电厂提供保险或投资），则可能在长期上削弱应对气候变化的整体努力，与增强气候韧性的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries.

rationale: 作为食品饮料批发商，是连接生产与消费的关键枢纽，通过高效的分销网络确保食品，特别是基本食品的稳定供应和可及性，直接支持消除饥饿和保障粮食安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业参与食品市场运作，其库存管理和市场信息反馈有助于平滑供应链，对稳定食品价格有一定贡献，但作为中间商而非政策制定者，影响力有限。
sdg_target_description: Adopt measures to ensure the proper functioning of food commodity markets and their derivatives and facilitate timely access to market information, including on food reserves, in order to help limit extreme food price volatility

rationale: 如果其分销的产品组合中包含大量高糖、高盐、高脂肪的加工食品和含糖饮料，可能会助长不健康饮食，增加非传染性疾病风险，对公共健康产生间接负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 该行业本身是经济的一部分，通过其批发活动促进商品流通，支持相关产业链（生产、零售）的发展，从而贡献于经济增长和生产效率提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为劳动密集型行业，提供了仓储、物流、销售等领域的就业岗位，对实现充分就业和体面工作有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过优化库存管理、采用先进的仓储技术（如冷链）、改善物流效率，该行业可以显著减少其在供应链环节造成的食品损失，直接支持该子目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 如果运营管理不善，例如预测不准导致库存积压、仓储条件不佳或物流延误，该行业也可能成为供应链中食物损失的一个重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 批发活动通常涉及大量一次性包装材料（如纸箱、塑料膜）的使用，如果未采取有效的减量、回收和再利用措施，会产生大量固体废物，对该子目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的运营，特别是运输车队（卡车）的燃料消耗和冷藏设备的大量能源使用，是温室气体排放的重要来源，对气候变化有直接负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 内陆水运业是区域交通和物流基础设施的核心组成部分，提供了一种运输方式，支持经济发展和贸易。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为物流和供应链的关键环节，内陆水运通过促进货物流动直接支持可持续的经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 高效的内陆水运可以通过降低物流成本和提高供应链效率来促进经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 与公路运输相比，内陆水运通常每吨公里能耗更低，碳排放更少，本身具有相对的资源效率优势。向更清洁的船舶技术（如电动或LNG动力船）升级将进一步增强其积极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 船舶运营可能导致油污泄漏、生活污水排放、垃圾丢弃等，直接污染内陆水道，这些污染最终可能汇入海洋，或对内陆水体生态系统造成损害。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 航运活动（如疏浚航道、船只噪音、栖息地破坏）可能干扰和破坏内陆水域及相连的沿海生态系统的健康和可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 如果船队主要由化石燃料驱动，则会直接产生温室气体排放，加剧气候变化，这与将气候行动纳入各层面的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 船舶运营中涉及的化学品（如燃油、润滑油）和产生的废物（如油污水、生活垃圾）若管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 人文社会科学研究培养批判性思维、分析能力和文化素养等关键技能，这些是就业、体面工作和创业所需的重要能力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 研究所通过探索文化理解、人权、性别平等、和平等主题，为可持续发展教育提供核心知识和教学内容。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...)

rationale: 社会科学研究（如性别研究）通过揭示歧视的根源和机制，为制定消除性别歧视的政策和措施提供证据基础。
sdg_target_description: (End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere)

rationale: 研究妇女在决策中的参与障碍和促进因素，有助于设计策略以确保妇女在政治、经济和公共生活中的平等领导机会。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 社会科学研究通过分析经济结构、创新系统和制度环境，为经济多元化、技术升级和提高生产力提供政策见解。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 研究所通过评估政策和制度对就业和创业的影响，为制定支持创造性活动和创造体面工作的政策提供依据。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 人文社会科学研究深刻分析社会排斥和不平等的成因，为设计和实施促进社会、经济和政治包容的政策提供关键知识。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status)

rationale: 研究所通过识别和评估歧视性法律、政策及实践，为促进机会平等和减少结果不平等的立法和行动提供学术支持。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard)

rationale: 政治学、法学、公共行政等领域的研究是建立有效、负责和透明机构的理论和实践基础，研究所通过独立研究和政策评估支持机构建设。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 社会科学研究民主进程、公民参与和代表机制，为促进响应性、包容性、参与性和代表性的决策提供重要见解。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels)

rationale: 人文社会科学研究所经常参与国际学术合作与交流，促进知识共享，特别是在可持续发展相关议题上。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharing...)

rationale: 研究所作为知识生产者，是多方利益相关者伙伴关系中的重要一环，通过提供专业知识和研究成果支持全球可持续发展伙伴关系。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources...)

rationale: 如果研究所的研究受到特定政治或商业利益的过度影响，或其运作缺乏透明度，可能会损害其作为独立知识生产者的信誉，间接对建设负责任和透明的机构产生轻微负面影响。这是一种潜在风险而非必然结果。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 租赁模式的核心是'重复使用'，通过共享运动娱乐用品，显著减少了对一次性产品或个人低频次购买的需求，从而从源头上减少了废物产生和资源消耗。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提供易于获取且相对便宜的体育器材租赁服务，降低了人们参与体育锻炼的门槛，鼓励积极的生活方式，有助于预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 运动娱乐用品租赁业通常是中小型企业或创业项目，该行业的发展创造了就业机会，并体现了支持可持续消费的创新商业模式。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 通过提供公园、绿地、公共体育设施中可能用到的娱乐用品租赁服务，该行业有助于增强公共空间的功能性和吸引力，促进社区的包容性和活力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 租赁业务的运营（如物流运输、设备清洁和维护）需要消耗水、能源和其他资源，可能对自然资源的可持续管理构成轻微压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 与积极影响（通过共享减少生产排放）相比，租赁业务运营中产生的交通排放等是其直接的负面气候影响。尽管总体影响可能是净积极的，但运营环节存在负面因素。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业的核心产品（灭火器、消防系统）直接用于预防和控制火灾，减少灾害（火灾）造成的人员伤亡和经济损失，是建设安全、有韧性的城市和社区的关键。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations

rationale: 火灾会释放有害化学物质和污染物。通过预防和控制火灾，该行业间接减少了因火灾引发的空气污染和有害化学物质暴露导致的死亡和疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 消防设备是保障工业设施、商业建筑、住宅区等关键基础设施安全可靠运行的重要组成部分，使其更具抵御灾害（火灾）的能力。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 在工作场所配备消防设备是保障所有工人安全工作环境的基本要求，有助于减少工伤和死亡。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 灭火器（尤其是某些类型）的制造和报废处理可能涉及有害化学品（如某些阻燃剂、推进剂）。如果管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的产品（如金属罐体、电子元件）在生命周期结束时若未得到妥善回收和处置，会增加固体废物。制造过程中的废料也需要管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 树脂成型材料是众多工业部门的关键基础材料，其制造业活动直接贡献于工业增长和GDP，是工业化的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业可以通过改进生产工艺，提高资源效率，并开发生物基或可降解等环境友好型树脂材料，从而支持可持续产业和清洁技术的采用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过优化生产工艺、使用回收料作为原料，该行业可以贡献于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。但若依赖原生化石燃料，则产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 树脂生产过程中可能使用和产生有害化学品，其产品（特别是传统塑料）在整个生命周期内如果管理不善，会对空气、水和土壤造成污染，对健康和环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的一次性塑料制品或难回收材料是固体废物（尤其是塑料污染）的主要来源，与减少废物产生的目标直接冲突。尽管行业可以推动回收，但整体上其传统产品模式对实现此目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 树脂材料（塑料）的废弃物，尤其是管理不当的塑料垃圾，是海洋塑料污染的主要来源之一，对海洋生态系统产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为基础材料制造业，该行业是工业化的核心组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，促进可持续工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业生产的产品（如铜管、铜线）是升级可持续基础设施（如电力传输、节能建筑）的关键材料，但其自身生产过程需要向更资源高效和清洁技术转型才能完全符合此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过制造加工提升铜产品的附加值，该行业有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业，该行业提供就业机会，但其工作环境的安全性（如接触重金属、高温）是实现体面工作的关键考量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 铜材制造需要消耗大量能源和矿产资源（铜矿），若管理不善可能导致资源利用效率低下和不可持续的开采压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用润滑剂、酸洗液等化学品，并产生含重金属的废水、废渣，若处理不当会对环境和健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 铜具有高度可回收性，该行业通常涉及废铜回收再利用，有助于减少原生资源开采和废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果职业安全健康和环境污染控制不力，生产过程中的粉尘（可能含重金属）、化学物质排放可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 生产过程中的废水若未经妥善处理（如去除重金属离子），可能造成水体污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 学術団体通过组织研讨会、发表研究成果、提供教育资源，促进了高等教育和终身学习的平等获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 文化団体经常提供艺术、手工艺等技能培训项目，帮助青年和成年人获得用于就业和创业的相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

rationale: 文化団体（如博物馆、历史保护协会）的核心活动之一是直接致力于保护、修复和推广物质与非物质文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage.

rationale: 学术团体通过建立研究伦理规范、促进同行评审和公开辩论，为发展有效和负责任的知识机构做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 学術・文化団体运营的图书馆、档案馆、博物馆和开放获取出版平台是保障公众获取信息的重要渠道。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.

rationale: 学術団体是国际学术合作、联合研究、知识交流和最佳实践分享的关键平台和推动者。
sdg_target_description: Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharing jointly agreed mechanisms.

rationale: 轨道和索道业是可持续、可靠的公共交通基础设施的核心组成部分，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉，并提供可及的交通方式。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过运营有轨电车、索道等系统，直接提供安全、可持续的公共交通服务，是扩大公共交通网络、满足多样化需求的关键。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 作为低碳公共交通选项，推广和运营轨道及索道系统是将气候变化减缓措施（如交通领域减排）纳入城市和交通规划的具体体现。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业的运营、维护和管理创造了就业机会，为从业人员提供体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 现代轨道和索道技术代表了更清洁、资源效率更高的交通技术，其部署有助于基础设施的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过提供私家车的替代方案，有助于减少城市交通拥堵和空气污染，从而降低城市的人均环境负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 轨道和索道（尤其是在山区或自然区域）的基础设施建设可能涉及土地清理、栖息地分割，对陆地生态系统和生物多样性构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 与15.1类似，在生态敏感区域建设索道或轨道可能加速自然栖息地的退化和生物多样性的丧失，尤其是在规划不周的情况下。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 蔬菜种植直接生产食物，有助于确保人们获得安全、营养的粮食，对消除饥饿和改善营养有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 如果采用可持续农业实践（如有机种植或节水灌溉），蔬菜农业可以促进可持续粮食生产系统，提高生产力并保护生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 可持续的蔬菜农业实践（如轮作、精准灌溉）有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 高效的蔬菜生产和供应链管理可以帮助减少采收后的粮食损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 如果蔬菜农业采用不可持续的灌溉实践（如过度用水或污染水体），可能对水资源效率产生负面影响，加剧水资源短缺。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 不合理的耕作方式（如过度使用化肥、农药或单一作物种植）可能导致土壤退化和土地荒漠化，对陆地生态系统产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 通信附带服务是维护和运营高质量、可靠通信基础设施的核心，支持经济发展和民生。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过提供支持服务，该行业有助于扩大ICT和互联网的普及与可及性。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 作为技术服务行业，它通过支持通信技术提升整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 通信服务是实现远程教育和知识平等获取的关键赋能因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: 通过支持远程医疗和健康信息传播，该行业间接促进全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 改善通信接入有助于减少数字鸿沟，促进社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 高效的通信服务支持远程工作和虚拟会议，间接减少交通排放，有助于气候行动措施的实施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 行业运营可能涉及电子设备（如网络设备）的更新换代，若管理不当，可能导致电子废物增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 数据中心、网络设备等通信基础设施的持续运行消耗大量能源，若使用非可再生能源或能效低下，则对能源效率目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 租赁模式通过提高工业机械的利用率和共享性，减少了对新设备制造的需求，从而促进了对金属、矿物等自然资源的更可持续管理和更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 通过延长单个设备的使用寿命和在多个用户间共享，租赁业务有助于从源头上预防和减少与制造业相关的废物产生。良好的维护和翻新实践进一步支持了再利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 工业设备租赁为中小企业提供了一种替代昂贵直接购买的融资方式，降低了资本门槛，使它们能够获得提高生产力所必需的工具，从而更好地融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.
