rationale: 通过提供灵活获取现代化机械的途径，该行业支持客户企业（尤其是中小企业）进行技术升级和提高生产效率，从而贡献于整体经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 如果租赁的设备维护不善、寿命缩短，或者租赁模式鼓励了快速的设备更新换代导致旧设备被过早淘汰，则可能反而增加电子废物和重型机械废物的产生。这是一种潜在的负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 信用卡业通过提供支付和信贷服务，是扩大普惠金融和金融服务可及性的核心组成部分，直接加强了金融包容性。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 信用卡为中小企业（包括商户和个体经营者）提供了关键的支付解决方案和潜在的营运资金渠道，有助于其融入市场和价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 信用卡提供了获得金融服务的途径，可以帮助个人管理财务和应对紧急情况，但需注意其潜在的高成本可能对贫困人口不利。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 通过提供标准化的金融服务，可以在一定程度上促进经济包容。但信贷审批中的潜在偏见可能产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 信用卡通过便利即时消费和鼓励借贷消费，可能刺激不可持续的消费模式，与可持续消费的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 信用卡行业本身会产生物理废弃物（如过期或作废的塑料卡片），其支持的数据中心运营也消耗能源，对减少废物产生有轻微负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果管理不当，信用卡的高利率和费用可能使低收入用户陷入债务陷阱，从而加剧其经济脆弱性，与减贫目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 信贷审批算法或政策中可能存在无意识的偏见，导致对某些群体（如少数族裔、低收入者）的排斥，从而加剧不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 新闻供应业的核心职能是收集和传播信息，直接保障公众获取信息的权利，是SDG 16.10的关键推动者。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements

rationale: 新闻内容作为非正式教育的重要来源，可以传播可持续发展、全球公民意识等知识和技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...

rationale: 通过报道性别平等议题、揭露性别歧视现象，新闻业可以促进社会对性别平等的认识，间接贡献于消除歧视。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 通过关注和报道弱势群体、边缘化社区的问题，新闻业可以促进社会包容和赋权。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all...

rationale: 通过报道气候变化新闻、提高公众对气候行动的认识和紧迫感，新闻业可以贡献于气候变化教育和意识提升。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation...

rationale: 新闻业本身可能受到腐败影响，如有偿新闻、新闻审查或为特定利益服务，这会削弱其监督作用，与减少腐败的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 新闻行业内部可能存在性别不平等，例如女性在领导层和决策岗位的代表性不足，构成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making...

rationale: 新闻业可能存在非正式就业、工作不稳定或薪酬不公平等问题，影响体面工作的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...

rationale: 新闻业的运营（如办公资源消耗、数字基础设施的能源需求）可能产生废物和碳排放，尽管影响相对间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为建筑材料供应链的关键环节，该行业通过提供基础设施（如建筑、道路）建设所需的材料，支持可持续和有韧性的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业分销节能、资源效率高或环境友好的建筑材料（如高效隔热材料、低碳水泥替代品），则直接支持对现有基础设施和工业进行可持续改造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过供应住房建设所需的材料，该行业间接支持提供充足和安全的住房。如果提供经济适用的材料，则贡献更直接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 如果分销低挥发性有机化合物（VOC）涂料、可持续采购的木材或有助于改善建筑能效的材料，可以减少城市的环境影响（如改善空气质量、减少能源消耗带来的排放）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 如果该行业积极推广和分销来自可持续来源、可回收含量高或资源效率高的建筑材料（如认证木材、再生金属、回收塑料制品），则对自然资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过分销可回收、可重复使用或产生较少废物的建筑材料（例如，采用可回收包装、推广模块化建筑系统），该行业可以帮助减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业自身可以采用可持续采购政策，并鼓励其供应商（制造商）和客户（建筑商）采取可持续做法，例如通过提供环保产品信息和认证。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 如果该行业主要分销不可持续开采的原材料（如未经认证的热带硬木）、高能耗材料（如初级铝材）或资源密集型产品，则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果分销含有有害化学物质（如某些含铅涂料、含甲醛的粘合剂、含石棉的旧材料）或在其生命周期内产生有害废物的建筑材料，且未进行适当管理，则会对环境和健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果分销难以回收、一次性使用或产生大量包装废物的建筑材料，则会增加废物产生量，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造高效供暖装置（如冷凝锅炉、高效热泵）可以直接提高终端用户的能源效率，从而为改善全球能源效率增长率做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 如果制造的供暖装置专为或兼容可再生能源（如太阳能热系统、地源/空气源热泵），则有助于增加可再生能源在供暖领域的份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 高效、清洁的供暖技术是升级建筑和工业基础设施以实现可持续性的关键组成部分。该行业通过提供这些技术来支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 如果该行业主要生产依赖化石燃料（如燃油、燃气）的低效供暖装置，则会增加温室气体排放，严重阻碍将气候变化措施纳入国家政策的目标。这是该行业最显著的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造清洁、安全的供暖装置（避免室内一氧化碳泄漏、颗粒物污染等）有助于减少因室内空气污染导致的疾病和死亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 供暖装置的制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品（如制冷剂、焊接材料），如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为食品批发商，该行业通过分销耐储存的干货和罐头食品，有助于确保全年的食品供应和获取，特别是在应对季节性短缺或紧急情况时，对实现粮食安全有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 通过为耐储存农产品（构成干货和罐头原料）提供市场，该行业间接支持了具有韧性的农业生产系统，因为这些作物可能更适应某些气候压力。但关联性较为间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 通过提供豆类、鱼类罐头等营养食品，该行业可能对健康饮食有潜在贡献。但许多罐头食品可能含有高盐、高糖或防腐剂，对预防非传染性疾病存在潜在负面影响。综合来看，积极影响有限且存在不确定性，相关性得分较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业提供了就业机会，并通过高效的物流和供应链管理贡献于经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业是食品供应链基础设施的关键组成部分，确保食品从生产地到市场的可靠流通，支持经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 干货和罐头食品的核心优势在于极长的保质期，这显著减少了食品在批发、零售环节以及消费者层面的浪费，对实现减少食物浪费的目标有非常直接和重要的积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 罐头包装（通常是金属或镀锡铁皮）的生产和处理可能涉及化学品的使用，如果回收不当，会对环境造成负面影响。该行业大量使用此类包装，因此在化学品和废物管理方面存在显著的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 尽管干货本身包装简单，但罐头食品会产生大量包装废物。如果该行业不积极推动包装材料的减量、回收和再利用，就会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过减少食物浪费（见12.3），该行业间接减少了垃圾填埋场中腐烂食物产生的甲烷排放，这是一种强效温室气体，从而对气候行动有微弱的积极贡献。但其物流运输的碳排放是负面因素，综合影响较小。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 出版业通过提供教育材料、职业培训手册和技能发展书籍，直接帮助青年和成年人获得相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 出版业可以制作和传播关于可持续发展、全球公民意识等内容的教育材料，促进相关知识和技能的普及。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...

rationale: 出版业本身是一个创造就业（如编辑、作者、设计师、发行人员）和鼓励创意与创新的生产性行业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 数字出版依赖于并促进了信息和通信技术的普及，有助于增加信息的可及性。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 出版业是传播可持续发展信息和提高公众环保意识的关键渠道。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 实体出版物的生产（尤其是纸张消耗）和生命周期结束时未回收的出版物可能导致资源浪费和废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造高效发电机、变压器和电动机等重电设备，直接有助于提高工业和能源传输部门的能源效率。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 制造的电网基础设施设备（如变压器、变流器）对于将间歇性的可再生能源（如风能、太阳能）安全可靠地接入和输送到电网至关重要。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix)

rationale: 重电机器是能源、交通和工业等所有经济部门高质量、可靠基础设施的核心组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 该行业提供实现基础设施和产业升级、使其更可持续和资源高效所需的关键技术和设备。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable...)

rationale: 重电机器制造是技术密集型产业，持续进行研发以提升设备性能、效率和智能化水平。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors...)

rationale: 通过提供先进的动力和自动化设备，该行业帮助其他产业提高生产力，并自身通过技术创新推动产业升级。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供工程技术、生产管理等多种就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all...)

rationale: 通过制造支持清洁能源转型和提高能效的设备，该行业间接支持国家将气候变化应对措施纳入能源和工业政策。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 重电机器制造过程通常需要大量金属（如铜、钢）、稀土等原材料，其开采和加工可能造成资源消耗和环境压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用有害化学品（如绝缘油、溶剂），并产生工业废水和固体废物，若管理不当会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 生产过程中的边角料、废品以及产品寿命结束后的处置（如废旧变压器）可能产生大量废物，挑战废物减量化和循环利用的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 会计和税务服务帮助企业优化财务管理、控制成本、进行投资决策，从而提高其生产效率和经济效益，支持经济多元化发展。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 事务所为中小企业提供关键的财务和税务合规服务，帮助它们实现正规化运营，获得融资，从而支持创业、创造体面工作和促进企业发展，这是该行业最核心的贡献之一。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过提供可靠的财务报表和审计服务，事务所帮助企业（尤其是中小企业）满足银行贷款或投资者的要求，从而增加其获得金融服务和信贷的机会。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果事务所参与或未能识别客户的洗钱、腐败、逃税等非法金融活动，则会助长非法资金流动，对实现此目标产生显著的负面影响。这种风险是该行业固有的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 当事务所严格遵守职业道德和反洗钱法规，进行尽职调查和合规审计时，它们有助于识别和阻止非法金融活动，为减少非法资金流动做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 会计和审计是确保企业（作为社会经济的重要机构）财务透明和问责的核心机制。事务所的服务直接促进了商业机构的有效性和透明度。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 税务师事务所协助个人和企业进行合规的税务申报，直接支持政府（尤其是发展中国家的税务当局）有效地征收税款，从而加强国内资源动员。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to developing countries, to improve domestic capacity for tax and other revenue collection

rationale: 如果热供給業利用地热、生物质能、太阳能热或工业废热等可再生能源/废热源，则直接增加了可再生能源在终端能源消费中的份额。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 集中供热系统通常比分散的个体锅炉或电采暖具有更高的能源转换和利用效率，有助于提高整体能源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 热力供应网络是支撑城市和社区运行的关键基础设施之一，提供可靠的热力服务对经济活动和居民福祉至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being

rationale: 对现有供热系统进行升级，采用更清洁、高效的技术（如热电联产、热泵），是基础设施可持续化改造的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies

rationale: 集中供热可以减少大量分散小锅炉造成的局部空气污染（如颗粒物、二氧化硫），有助于改善城市空气质量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities... paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 发展低碳或零碳的区域供热系统是城市和国家层面气候行动和能源战略的关键措施之一，直接支持温室气体减排。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果热供給業主要依赖煤炭或天然气等化石燃料，则会阻碍向可再生能源的转型，对实现该子目标产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 基于化石燃料的热力生产是温室气体排放的重要来源，与气候行动目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 若供热厂（特别是燃煤或垃圾焚烧厂）的污染物排放控制不当，可能对周边居民健康构成风险，增加空气污染相关疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 供热厂（尤其是使用特定燃料或产生飞灰等副产品的）在运行和废弃物处理过程中，若管理不善，可能导致有害物质释放。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil

rationale: 食品加工机械是实现农产品增值（value addition）的关键工具，通过提高加工效率和产品质量，帮助小规模生产者进入市场并增加收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 该行业通过制造技术先进的食品加工机械，直接推动食品工业的技术升级和创新，从而提高整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 食品加工机械是食品产业基础设施和工业流程的关键组成部分。先进的机械有助于提高资源使用效率（如水、能源），并采用更清洁、环保的技术，直接促进产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 高效的食品加工、包装和保鲜机械可以显著减少食品在加工和供应链环节的损失和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 食品加工机械制造过程本身可能消耗原材料和能源，并产生工业废料和排放，对减少废物生成的目标构成轻微负面影响。但该行业的核心产品旨在帮助下游实现更可持续的生产，因此负面影响的相关性得分较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，袋物制造提供了就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有基础性贡献，但具体贡献程度取决于工作条件和薪酬是否‘体面’。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业是工业的一部分，对工业增长和就业有贡献。但其‘可持续性’取决于生产过程的资源效率和环境友好程度，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果行业采用可持续来源的材料（如有机棉、再生纤维）并优化资源使用，可对此目标做出积极贡献。但这是潜在贡献，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果行业大量生产一次性塑料袋或快时尚风格的廉价、不耐用袋物，会导致废弃物大量增加，特别是塑料污染，与减少废物的目标直接冲突。这是该行业最显著的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 袋物制造，特别是塑料材质产品的废弃物如果管理不当，可能成为海洋塑料垃圾的来源，对减少海洋污染的目标构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution)

rationale: 建具是建筑物基础设施的基本组成部分，其制造直接支持可持续和高质量基础设施的建设。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业采用资源效率更高的生产工艺和环保技术（如使用可持续木材、低VOC涂料），则对目标有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业的核心原材料是木材，其可持续管理和高效利用（例如，使用认证木材、减少材料浪费）直接关联此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中产生的木材边角料等废物可以通过回收再利用来减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业的就业岗位，但其对“体面工作”的贡献程度取决于具体的工作条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为建筑材料供应商，间接支持住房建设，但关联性较为间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 如果该行业的技术或产品（特别是基于本地木材的产品）有助于发展中国家建造可持续建筑，则产生微弱正面影响。
sdg_target_description: Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials

rationale: 如果该行业使用的木材来自不可持续的采伐或导致毁林，则会对森林保护和可持续管理产生显著的负面影响。这是该行业最主要的潜在负面风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 如果制造过程中管理不善，可能导致大量的木材废料和包装废物，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 中央行政机构的核心职能就是建立和运作用于国家治理的有效、负责和透明的制度。其治理能力是实现该目标的关键。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 行政机构通过立法、公共咨询、选举制度等方式，在塑造国家层面的决策过程是否具有回应性、包容性和参与性方面扮演决定性角色。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 行政机构负责协调不同部门的政策（如经济、社会、环境），确保它们相互支持而非冲突，是实现可持续发展政策一致性的核心。
sdg_target_description: Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.

rationale: 如果行政机构内部存在系统性腐败或监管不力，其本身就会成为腐败的温床，严重阻碍该目标的实现。这是其职能固有的潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.

rationale: 若行政机构制定或执行带有歧视性或忽视弱势群体利益的政策，将直接导致机会不平等和结果不平等的加剧，违背此目标。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard.

rationale: 政治团体是民主制度的重要组成部分，通过参与选举、政策辩论和公众监督，在理论上旨在促进建立有效、负责和透明的机构。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 政治团体通过汇集和代表公民的利益与观点，并组织其参与政治进程，是实现包容性和参与性决策的关键机制。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 政治团体的活动（如言论、集会自由）本身是基本自由的体现，其倡导透明和信息公开也有助于公众获取信息。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.

rationale: 政治团体如果卷入政治献金丑闻、权钱交易或庇护主义，会成为腐败和贿赂的温床，严重破坏良政。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.

rationale: 如果政治团体运作不透明、派系斗争激烈或阻碍政府有效运作，则会削弱机构的有效性和问责制。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 无纺布是土工布、过滤材料等多种可持续基础设施和工业应用的关键组成部分，支持产业升级和资源效率提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 如果行业采用可回收或可生物降解材料生产无纺布，并推动产品回收计划，则对减少废物产生有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 用于医疗防护装备、空气过滤器和水过滤系统的无纺布，直接有助于减少污染相关的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 在水处理和废水过滤中的应用有助于减少水污染，改善水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 无纺布制造过程可能涉及化学粘合剂或其他处理剂，若环境管理不善，可能导致有害物质释放到环境中。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 许多一次性无纺布产品（特别是基于塑料纤维的）难以回收，其废弃后可能加剧固体废物问题，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业制造的加工玻璃材料（如建筑节能玻璃、电子玻璃）是升级可持续基础设施和产业所需的关键组件之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 玻璃制造过程需要消耗大量硅砂、纯碱等自然资源，并且是能源密集型产业，若管理不当，可能对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 玻璃制造过程可能涉及化学品的使用（如涂层、抛光剂）并产生工业废料、废水或废气（如颗粒物、二氧化硫），若处理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 玻璃本身是高度可回收的材料。该行业通过生产耐用产品和参与玻璃回收产业链，可以为减少废物做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业生产用于建筑的节能玻璃（如中空玻璃、低辐射玻璃），可以帮助建筑物提高能源效率，从而减少城市的能源消耗和相关的环境影响（如温室气体排放）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新（如开发新型特种玻璃）为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 传统的玻璃制造熔炉是巨大的能源消耗源，通常依赖化石燃料，导致显著的温室气体排放，这与将气候变化措施纳入政策和实践的目标存在冲突，除非采用碳捕获或电气化等低碳技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为林业供应链的重要组成部分，该行业通过促进木材和竹材的流通，支持相关产业的经济活动和生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业本身创造批发贸易领域的就业机会，并支持上游（林业）和下游（制造业）的体面工作。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 木材和竹材是可持续建筑和绿色基础设施的关键可再生材料，该行业的供应活动支持这一目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 如果该行业优先采购来自可持续管理森林的木材和竹材，则直接促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 通过促进可持续木材贸易，该行业有助于森林生态系统的保护和可持续利用。竹材作为一种生长迅速的可再生资源，也支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 可持续的木材批发贸易依赖于并鼓励森林的可持续管理，有助于遏制毁林和森林退化。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 如果该行业的供应链涉及非法采伐或不可持续的管理实践，则会对森林生态系统造成破坏和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 与非法或不可持续采伐相关的木材贸易直接导致毁林和森林退化，与此目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 轴承是提高机械系统效率、可靠性和寿命的核心部件，直接支持工业和基础设施的可持续升级与改造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 高性能轴承（如陶瓷轴承、磁悬浮轴承）的研发和应用是工业技术升级和创新的体现，支撑整体技术能力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 轴承是风力涡轮机、水力发电机等可再生能源设备的关键部件，其可靠性和效率直接影响可再生能源的利用和推广。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 高效轴承通过减少机械摩擦，显著提高电机、泵、压缩机等各种设备的能源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 轴承制造业本身是工业体系的一部分，创造就业并支撑制造业生产力，其技术进步有助于整体经济生产率的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 通过延长设备使用寿命和提高效率，轴承有助于更可持续地管理资源（如减少因设备过早报废导致的资源浪费）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 轴承制造过程（如金属加工、热处理）可能消耗大量能源和水资源，并产生金属废料、切削液等工业废物，如果管理不当，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业是制造业的重要组成部分，通过生产内燃机电气设备支持工业化和经济增长，为就业和GDP做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 内燃机电气设备制造涉及精密技术和创新，有助于提高经济生产力和产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，支持体面工作目标，但得分中等，因为就业质量取决于具体企业实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业涉及技术性制造，可能间接支持国内技术发展，但相关性较泛，得分较低。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 高效的内燃机电气设备（如改进的点火系统）可以略微提高发动机的能源效率，但贡献有限，且整体上支持的是化石燃料系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 制造过程消耗金属、塑料等自然资源，若管理不当可能导致资源不可持续使用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能产生工业废物和电子废物，对减少废物目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的核心产品是内燃机的组成部分，而内燃机是温室气体排放的主要来源之一，与向低碳经济转型的气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 宗教团体通过倡导和平、非暴力解决冲突和提供社区凝聚力，可以在减少暴力和促进和平文化方面做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.

rationale: 宗教伦理常强调公正和道德行为，可以间接支持法治和正义观念的普及。
sdg_target_description: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.

rationale: 作为社区组织，宗教团体可以为其成员提供参与和表达的平台，促进包容性决策。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 宗教活动本身是宗教信仰自由（一项基本自由）的实践，该行业的存在直接支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.

rationale: 宗教教育常涉及伦理、和平、包容等价值观，这些是可持续发展教育的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development.

rationale: 宗教团体提供的精神支持、社区归属感和应对压力的方法，有助于促进心理健康和整体福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 宗教社区可以为成员提供社会支持网络，促进特定群体内的社会包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion, economic or other status.

rationale: 宗教组织作为公民社会的重要部分，可以参与并促进实现可持续发展目标的伙伴关系。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships.

rationale: 某些宗教的教义或实践可能包含对女性的歧视性规定或限制，这可能与消除性别歧视的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere.

rationale: 如果宗教团体内部存在基于性别、性取向或其他身份的排斥性做法，可能会加剧社会不平等。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard.

rationale: 若宗教团体倡导或维护与可持续发展相悖的歧视性社会规范，可能对推广非歧视性法律和政策构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development.

rationale: 预拌混凝土是建造道路、桥梁、建筑等各类基础设施最基本、最核心的材料，直接支撑可持续和有抵御灾害能力的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为住房和城市基础设施（如供水、排水系统）建设的关键材料，该行业对保障人人获得适当、安全和负担得起的住房及基本服务至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业属于建筑业供应链中的重要一环，提供了从生产到运输的就业岗位，并通过对建筑业的支持间接促进经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 混凝土生产大量消耗不可再生的自然资源，如沙、石和淡水，其开采和使用方式往往不可持续，对自然资源的管理和高效利用构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 水泥生产是温室气体（特别是二氧化碳）的主要工业排放源之一，该行业的高碳足迹对应对气候变化的努力构成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 生产过程中产生的粉尘（尤其是可吸入结晶硅粉尘）可能对工人的呼吸系统健康造成危害，存在职业健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业本身可以通过采用更环保的技术（如使用替代燃料、提高能效、开发低碳水泥）进行升级，从而对目标做出积极贡献，但目前传统生产方式仍是主流，故相关性得分中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为基础化工行业，其提供的衍生产品（如甲醇）是许多清洁技术（如燃料电池）和可持续材料（如生物可降解塑料的原料）的基础，间接支持产业升级和清洁技术采用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 甲烷衍生物（如甲醛、氯甲烷）的制造、使用和处置过程涉及危险化学品，若管理不当，可能对人类健康和环境造成重大风险，与实现化学品无害环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 以化石燃料（天然气）中的甲烷为原料的制造过程，可能产生温室气体排放（包括甲烷泄漏和工艺排放），直接加剧气候变化，是气候行动政策需要规制的对象。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 化工制造过程通常产生含有害物质的工业废水，若处理不当，会对水体造成污染，阻碍水质改善目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为资本和技术密集型的制造业，该行业通过生产高附加值的基础化工产品，对经济增长和生产力提升有贡献，但相关性相较于其环境影响较弱。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 非铁金属冶炼是基础工业部门，为制造业提供关键原材料，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，支持工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过提供用于可持续基础设施（如电网、可再生能源系统）的金属材料（如铜、铝）间接支持目标，但其自身生产过程往往资源效率低且污染严重，限制了正面贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 金属冶炼是高度资源密集型活动，消耗大量矿石、能源和水，通常伴随低效的资源利用和生态系统破坏，与可持续资源管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 冶炼过程产生大量固体废物（如尾矿、炉渣）、有毒化学品和重金属排放，对空气、水和土壤造成严重污染，是实现化学品和废物无害化环境管理的重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 尽管部分行业使用回收废料，但初级冶炼过程本身会产生大量工业废物，总体废物产生量高，与减少废物产生的目标存在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为资本密集型工业，该行业提供一定数量的直接和间接就业机会，贡献于经济增长和就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 冶炼厂工作环境通常存在高温、噪音、暴露于有毒物质和事故风险，对工人健康和安全构成威胁，可能违背保护劳工权利和安全工作环境的目标。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 冶炼过程的废水可能含有重金属和其他污染物，若处理不当会严重污染水体，对改善水质目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 该行业排放的空气污染物（如二氧化硫、颗粒物、重金属）和可能的水土污染，对周边社区居民和工人的健康构成风险，导致呼吸系统疾病等，与减少污染相关疾病的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 非铁金属冶炼是能源密集型产业，通常依赖化石燃料，产生显著的温室气体排放（特别是铝冶炼），对气候变化有贡献，与将气候措施纳入政策的目标存在冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为汽车工业的核心制造业，该行业通过技术升级和创新直接贡献于经济生产力的提升，并提供大量就业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该制造业部门为大量工人提供就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业是工业化的重要组成部分，对工业产值和就业有贡献。但其'可持续性'方面较弱。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 行业内持续改进内燃机热效率，客观上对提高能源效率有微弱的正面影响，但这仍是在依赖化石燃料的框架内。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 汽车内燃机是交通领域二氧化碳和其他温室气体排放的主要来源，与应对气候变化的全球努力直接冲突，阻碍将气候措施纳入政策的进程。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 内燃机排放的氮氧化物、颗粒物等空气污染物是导致城市空气污染和呼吸系统疾病的重要原因，对公共健康产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业的产品依赖并促进化石燃料的消费，阻碍了向可再生能源的转型，对提高可再生能源份额的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 制造过程消耗金属等自然资源，其核心产品（内燃机）的生命周期依赖于不可再生的石油资源，不符合自然资源可持续管理的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业本身代表的是传统技术而非清洁技术，在全球向电动化转型的背景下，其持续存在可能延缓产业向更可持续技术和过程的升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 建筑用金属制品（如结构钢、钢筋）是建设高质量、可靠、有韧性基础设施（如建筑、桥梁）不可或缺的基础材料，直接支持该子目标。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业生产的金属构件和材料用于建造安全、坚固的住房，对保障人人获得适足、安全和负担得起的住房有间接但重要的贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动、技术升级和创新（如开发新型轻质高强金属材料）来促进经济生产力的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业领域的就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有贡献，但需注意确保工作环境的安全和公平（潜在的负面影响需通过法规管理）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业自身可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术（如节能熔炉、减排技术）和提升资源效率（如提高材料利用率）来实现产业升级，间接贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 金属制品的生产严重依赖矿产资源的开采（如铁矿石），其提取和加工过程可能造成自然资源的大量消耗和低效使用，对资源的可持续管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程会产生废金属、废料和可能的有害废物，如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量。但同时，该行业也是金属回收利用的重要环节，具有潜在的积极影响。此处主要评估其生产环节固有的负面潜力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁等金属的生产是能源密集型产业，通常是温室气体排放的重要来源，对减缓气候变化构成压力，突显了将气候措施纳入产业政策的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 金属具有高度可回收性。该行业通过使用回收废金属作为原料，极大地促进了材料的循环利用和废物产生的减少，这是其对SDG 12.5的显著积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 家庭手工业为部分人群（如无法外出工作的人）提供了就业和收入来源，具有一定的正面作用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 家庭手工业通常是非正规就业，缺乏劳动保护、社会保障和安全的工作环境，工人权利易受侵害，与体面工作目标严重不符。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 该活动可能为极端贫困人口提供微薄的补充收入，但其不稳定性和低报酬使得减贫效果非常有限。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day)

rationale: 家庭手工业常由女性在承担无偿家务劳动的同时进行，可能固化传统的性别角色分工，增加女性的总工作量，不利于实现家庭责任共担。
sdg_target_description: (Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work through the provision of public services, infrastructure and social protection policies and the promotion of shared responsibility within the household and the family as nationally appropriate)

rationale: 小规模、分散的家庭生产模式通常缺乏资源效率和环境管理意识，可能造成原材料浪费和不当处理，不利于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 定期的汽车维修和保养（如刹车系统、轮胎检查）对于确保车辆安全、防止交通事故至关重要，直接有助于减少道路交通伤亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents.

rationale: 专业的汽车维修，特别是对排放控制系统的维护，有助于减少车辆的有害污染物排放，从而改善空气质量，减少相关疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 汽车维修行业提供了大量的技术性就业岗位，并为技工提供技能发展机会，贡献于实现充分就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 该行业通过学徒制和职业培训，为年轻人提供进入劳动力市场的途径，有助于减少不升学、不就业、不进修的青年比例。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.

rationale: 汽车是交通基础设施的重要组成部分。保持车辆的良好状态对于维持交通网络的可靠性、支持经济和民生至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 汽车维修服务保障了各类车辆（包括部分公共交通和私人车辆）的安全性和可靠性，是支持可持续交通系统的环节之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons.

rationale: 汽车维修过程会产生废机油、废旧电池、废旧零部件等危险废物。如果处理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 维修行业通过修复和翻新零部件，延长汽车及其部件的使用寿命，符合减少废物产生、促进循环经济的原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 虽然良好的维护可以提高燃油效率，但该行业的核心业务是维护现有的、大部分仍依赖化石燃料的车辆，这可能在一定程度上延缓向低碳交通的转型。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 劳动团体通过集体谈判和倡导政策，促进创造体面工作机会和支持中小企业劳动者的权益，有助于实现生产性就业和正规化。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 劳动团体的核心使命是争取公平工资、安全工作环境和充分就业，直接贡献于实现全民体面工作和同工同酬。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 保护劳工权利和促进安全的工作环境是劳动团体的根本职能，尤其关注弱势劳动者群体，与目标8.8高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 劳动团体在职场中倡导性别平等，反对基于性别的歧视，有助于消除对妇女的歧视。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 工会组织本身可以成为妇女参与经济决策的平台，促进女性在领导层的代表性。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 劳动团体通过争取公平工资和福利政策，是减少收入不平等和推动社会保护政策的关键行动者。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 作为劳动者的代表组织，劳动团体促进了在经济社会决策中的包容性和参与性。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels

rationale: 该行业通过制造和推广高能效的家用电器（如节能认证的冰箱、空调），直接贡献于提高全球能源效率改善率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为制造业的关键组成部分，该行业通过创造就业和增加值，促进可持续的工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 通过提供改善生活条件的电器（如冰箱减少食物腐败带来的健康风险，空调改善热浪期间的室内环境），间接支持健康目标。相关性相对间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业的产品在其生命周期末端成为电子废弃物的主要来源，若回收和处理不当，其中的有害化学物质（如铅、汞）会对环境和健康造成严重危害，与无害环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业产品的快速更新换代和一次性设计文化导致了大量的电子废弃物，对实现废物减量化的目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的全球供应链中，尤其是在某些地区的零部件制造和组装环节，可能存在劳工权益保障不足、工作环境不安全的风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 钟表修理通过修复和再利用产品，直接防止了废物产生，延长了产品的使用寿命，是实现减废（特别是通过预防和再利用）的关键活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 钟表修理通常是微型或小型企业，提供本地服务和创造体面就业机会，符合支持中小企业和创业的政策目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises.

rationale: 该行业为技能工匠提供就业机会，有助于实现全民生产性就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 钟表修理可以作为一项技能为年轻人提供职业培训和非正规教育之外的就业途径，尽管相关性较间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.

rationale: 维修活动通过维持现有产品（一种形式的基础设施）的功能，间接支持资源效率，但其与大规模基础设施升级的直接关联性较弱。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes.

rationale: 通过维修延长产品寿命，减少了对新原材料的需求，促进了自然资源的可持续管理和更高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 修理服务本身是一种可持续的商业模式，鼓励了循环经济实践。虽然该行业多为小微企业而非大型跨国公司，但其存在和推广本身就体现了可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle.

rationale: 维修过程中可能产生少量有害废物（如废旧电池、化学溶剂）或电子废物，如果处理不当，会对减废目标产生轻微的负面影响。但总体而言，其正面影响远大于此潜在负面因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 无机颜料制造过程通常涉及重金属等有害化学品的使用和废物的产生，若管理不当，可能向环境释放污染物，对人类健康和环境构成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 传统无机颜料制造业通常是资源密集型和能源密集型产业，可能使用污染较大的工艺，与升级为可持续产业的目标相悖，除非积极采用清洁技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 制造过程中产生的废水可能含有重金属或其他有害化学物质，如果处理不当，会对水体造成污染，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 生产过程中的化学品排放（空气、水）可能增加周边社区和工人暴露于有害物质的风险，从而导致健康问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 工人可能直接接触有害化学品，如果职业健康与安全措施不足，会面临健康风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过提供就业和经济增长做出一定贡献，但其可持续性（环境影响）削弱了其正面相关性。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造多样化的食品和饮料，有助于增加食品供应，满足不同人群的需求，从而支持粮食安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 如果该行业生产营养强化食品、低糖低盐产品或特殊医用膳食，可以对预防非传染性疾病做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 如果该行业大量生产高糖、高盐、高脂肪、过度加工的食品和饮料，可能会助长不健康的饮食模式，增加肥胖和非传染性疾病的风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 该行业通过遵守食品安全标准，控制食品中的污染物和有害物质，有助于减少食源性疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动直接贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业创造了制造业领域的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 该行业是工业化的一部分，其发展有助于提升工业在就业和GDP中的份额。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs).

rationale: 该行业的生产过程可能消耗大量水、能源和农产品原料，如果管理不当，可能导致自然资源的不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 食品制造通过加工和包装可以延长农产品的保质期，有助于减少从生产到消费环节的食物损失和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 如果该行业积极采取措施优化流程、减少原料浪费、使用可回收或可生物降解的包装，可以对减少废物产生做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 该行业通常会产生大量的包装废物（如塑料、纸箱）和有机废水/废料，如果处理不当，会对环境造成压力，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 高质量的寝具通过改善睡眠质量，有助于预防健康问题和促进身心健康，间接贡献于减少非传染性疾病风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，但相关性中等，需具体看工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果行业采用可持续设计（如可回收材料、减少废料），可积极贡献于废物减量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 若生产过程中过度消耗自然资源（如棉花、水）或使用不可持续材料，可能对资源可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生纺织废料或产品寿命短导致废弃物增加，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 缝纫机和针织机是纺织服装业（一个重要的劳动密集型产业）提高生产力的核心工具，通过技术升级支持经济多元化和发展。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业为全球众多中小型纺织服装企业提供了基本的生产资料，支持其生产活动和创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业本身是工业化的组成部分，其产品也直接支持纺织业的工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 现代高效的缝纫机和针织机可以提高资源利用效率（如减少布料浪费、降低能耗），是纺织产业升级改造所需的环保技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业是“快时尚”和纺织品过度消费的赋能者。其产品的大规模使用可能导致纺织品生命周期缩短和废物量增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。同时，其自身的制造过程也可能产生工业废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过支持纺织品的大量生产，该行业间接推动了棉花、水、染料等自然资源的大量消耗，可能不利于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纸制容器作为可回收、可生物降解的包装选项，是减少塑料废物和促进循环经济的关键替代品，直接有助于通过回收和再利用减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通过制造可持续包装产品支持供应链基础设施。若其生产过程采用资源高效和清洁技术（如使用再生纸浆、节能工艺），则直接贡献于产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 如果行业优先采购来自可持续管理森林的纸浆（如持有认证），则对森林的可持续管理有积极贡献。但此贡献高度依赖于具体的采购实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业并贡献于经济增长和生产力，尽管其相关性相较于环境目标较为一般。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 纸容器制造严重依赖木材和水资源。如果生产过程中资源效率低下或原材料来源不可持续，会导致自然资源（森林、水）的过度消耗和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果造纸木材来自非法或不可持续的采伐，该行业的需求可能直接或间接地推动森林退化和毁林，对森林可持续管理目标构成重大威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 卫生检查和消毒服务通过消除环境中的病原体，直接有助于抗击水媒疾病和其他传染病（如COVID-19等）的传播。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases.

rationale: 通过控制环境中的生物污染，该行业有助于减少由污染引起的疾病。但需注意，其自身使用的化学品也可能带来风险（见负面影响）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 消毒服务是维持环境卫生（Sanitation）的关键环节，特别是在医疗机构和公共设施中，有助于实现全民卫生设施和卫生条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations.

rationale: 通过改善城市环境（如公共场所、污水处理）的卫生状况，该行业间接有助于减少城市的环境负面影响，特别是与废物管理和公共卫生相关的方面。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management.

rationale: 如果消毒过程中使用的化学品（如氯制剂、醛类）管理不当，其生产、使用或处置可能对环境造成污染，与无害化环境管理化学品的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 消毒活动可能产生一次性防护装备、废弃的化学容器等固体废物，如果未妥善处理，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 海洋渔业是全球数亿人动物蛋白和营养的重要来源，直接贡献于粮食安全和消除饥饿。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业为沿海社区，特别是小型和个体渔民，提供了重要的就业和生计来源，支持地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 渔业，尤其是远洋渔业，可能存在工作条件艰苦、安全风险高、劳工权利保障不足等问题。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 如果采用基于科学的配额管理和可持续捕捞实践，可以实现海洋生物资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 渔业活动可能产生废弃物，如废弃、丢失或丢弃的渔具（幽灵渔具），是海洋塑料污染的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 不可持续的“一般海洋渔业”是导致过度捕捞、鱼类种群衰退、破坏海洋生态系统健康的最主要原因，与该子目标的核心要求直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 可持续的海洋渔业可以为相关国家，特别是小岛屿发展中国家和最不发达国家，带来重要的经济收益。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources, including through sustainable management of fisheries, aquaculture and tourism

rationale: 渔船的化石燃料消耗会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 育林业是实践可持续森林管理的核心活动，直接促进森林的可持续管理、恢复退化森林以及增加造林和再造林。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为碳汇，管理良好的森林是减缓气候变化的关键措施。育林业通过固碳直接支持将气候变化措施纳入国家行动。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 育林业，特别是在农村地区，可以创造就业机会并支持以资源为基础的地方经济发展，尽管其就业规模可能小于其他行业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 可持续的育林业旨在实现木材和非木材林产品的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果育林业实践不当（例如，大规模单一树种种植取代天然林），可能会损害生物多样性、土壤健康和水文服务，从而对陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 不动产租赁业是提供住房供应的核心机制，直接贡献于确保人们获得适足、安全和负担得起的住房。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 租赁住房是保障人们（尤其是弱势群体）享有基本经济资源（住房）权利的重要途径。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 通过提供和管理城市空间，租赁业影响着城市形态和居住模式，可以促进包容和可持续的城市化。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries

rationale: 如果租赁实践中存在基于收入、种族、性别等的歧视性定价或准入政策，会加剧居住隔离和社会不平等。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard

rationale: 如果租赁的房产能效标准低下（例如老旧的供暖/制冷系统），业主缺乏升级动力，会阻碍整体能效提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 建筑运营（如水电消耗）和翻新活动若管理不善，可能导致自然资源（水、材料）的低效使用和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业生产和推广基于石油和煤炭的产品，巩固了化石燃料在能源结构中的地位，阻碍了向可再生能源的转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 虽然目标提及'更清洁的化石燃料技术'，但该行业的核心活动并非专注于清洁能源技术的研发与推广，而是延续传统化石燃料产品的生产，总体上与促进清洁能源技术的主流方向相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology

rationale: 该行业的部分产品（如沥青）是建设和维护交通基础设施（如道路）的关键材料，对经济发展有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业本身属于需要升级和改造的高能耗、高排放产业。其传统生产工艺与采用清洁环保技术和提高资源效率的目标存在直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业以不可再生的石油和煤炭为原料，其核心业务模式与自然资源的可持续管理目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业的制造过程可能涉及有害化学物质的使用和排放，并产生危险废物，对实现化学品和废物的无害环境管理构成重大挑战和风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程本身可能产生工业废物，且其许多产品在使用后成为难以回收的废物（如某些塑料添加剂、受污染的润滑油），增加了废物管理的压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业是温室气体排放的重要来源，其持续运营与将减排措施纳入国家政策和规划的气候行动核心要求相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 金属冲压制品制造是工业化和制造业的重要组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，符合可持续工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更节能的冲压设备、优化生产工艺来提高资源效率，从而支持产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业为工人提供就业机会，但其“体面工作”的程度取决于具体企业的劳动条件和管理实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 金属冲压制造消耗大量金属原材料和能源，若管理不善，可能导致自然资源不可持续的利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 冲压过程会产生金属废料（边角料），如果回收体系不完善，会增加废弃物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用润滑油、冷却剂或产生金属粉尘，若防护措施不足，可能对工人健康构成风险或造成环境污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 造纸机械制造是造纸工业进行可持续改造和技术升级的核心基础。提供高效、现代化的机械设备是实现该子目标的关键。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 先进的造纸机械可以通过优化工艺来提高木材、水和能源等自然资源的利用效率，从而促进资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为资本货物制造业，造纸机械制造本身通过技术创新提升生产力，并支持下游造纸行业的生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业的产品（造纸机械）服务于造纸业，如果造纸业的原料来源不可持续（如导致毁林），则间接对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过制造节能、低排放的造纸机械，该行业可以间接支持国家将气候变化措施纳入工业发展战略，但相关性较为间接。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 高质量的润滑油和润滑脂是维持和优化工业机械、运输设备等基础设施运行效率的关键，通过减少摩擦和磨损来提高资源使用效率，间接支持可持续产业改造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为化学制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和创新润滑产品贡献于经济增长和生产力提升，并提供就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 润滑油本身在使用寿命结束后会成为危险废物（废油）。如果回收和再精炼体系不完善，该行业的产品生命周期末端会产生大量有害废物，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 润滑油（尤其是矿物油）如果因泄漏、不当处置或事故进入水体，会对水生生态系统造成严重污染，是主要的海洋污染源之一，与防止海洋污染的目标严重冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 若润滑油生产严重依赖石油等不可再生自然资源，且资源效率不高，则与自然资源的可持续管理目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 玻璃容器本身高度可回收和重复使用，其制造和推广是构建循环经济、减少废物（尤其是塑料废物）的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为基础工业，玻璃制造业通过采用更节能的熔炉和清洁生产技术，有助于产业升级和资源效率提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 玻璃作为惰性包装材料，能安全储存食品和药品，避免化学物质迁移，有助于保障产品安全和公共健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 玻璃制造过程（特别是原材料开采和高温熔炼）是能源和资源密集型产业，若管理不善，会导致自然资源（如硅砂、纯碱）的不可持续消耗和高能耗。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统玻璃制造过程依赖化石燃料或高耗电，产生大量温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响，与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造业环境可能存在高温、机械操作等安全隐患，如果工作场所安全措施不足，可能对工人健康和安全构成风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为基础食品原料的批发商，该行业通过保障砂糖的稳定供应和分销，间接支持食物供给系统的运行，有助于实现粮食安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 过量摄入添加糖是肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险因素。作为砂糖的主要分销渠道，该行业的活动在某种程度上促进了砂糖的可得性和消费，可能对公共健康目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 批发贸易是劳动密集型行业，该活动通过物流、仓储、销售等环节创造就业机会，并促进商品流通，对经济增长和生产力提升有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 砂糖的批发通常涉及大量包装材料（如麻袋、纸袋、塑料内衬）的使用。如果未采取有效的减量和回收措施，该行业可能会产生显著的包装废物，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 砂糖原料（如甘蔗）的大规模种植是某些地区森林砍伐和土地退化的驱动因素之一。作为供应链中的一环，该行业的采购行为间接与这些环境压力相关联，可能对可持续森林管理和遏制土地退化的目标产生负面影响。
