sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

rationale: 货物运输是供应链和贸易的支柱，通过确保商品高效流通，直接支持经济多元化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 专业的货物汽车运输服务是物流和贸易网络的关键组成部分，构成了支持经济发展和民生的重要基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更清洁的车辆（如电动汽车、氢燃料电池车）和提高物流效率的技术来升级其运营，从而为可持续基础设施做出贡献，但这取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的货物运输消耗不可再生资源（石油），并可能导致资源使用效率低下，特别是在空载或路线规划不佳的情况下，与可持续资源管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 道路货运是温室气体（特别是二氧化碳）和空气污染物的主要排放源，对国家实现气候行动目标构成重大挑战，凸显了将减排措施（如排放标准、碳定价）纳入运输政策的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 柴油卡车等货运车辆排放的尾气（如氮氧化物、颗粒物）是城市空气污染的重要来源，对公众健康构成威胁，与减少污染相关疾病的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果该行业优先使用来自可持续管理森林的纸浆或高比例的再生纸，则有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 纸制品本身是可回收的，该行业通过使用再生纸原料和制造可回收产品，为减少废物做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过创造就业和贡献GDP，直接促进可持续工业化。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业提供制造业岗位，对实现充分就业和体面工作目标有贡献，但其'体面工作'程度取决于具体工作条件。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 纸加工过程可能使用化学品（如漂白剂、染料、粘合剂），如果管理不当，可能导致有害物质释放，对环境和社会产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 传统的纸浆和造纸加工是耗水和潜在水污染行业。虽然'其他纸加工品'制造的水强度可能低于初级制浆，但若废水处理不当，仍可能对水质产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 如果该行业大量使用来自不可持续采伐的原生木浆，则会助长森林砍伐和森林退化，对可持续森林管理目标产生负面影响。积极使用再生纤维或认证可持续木材可以缓解此影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 该行业通过提供室内装修服务，改善居住和工作空间的适宜性、安全性和舒适度，直接贡献于获得适足住房和升级现有建筑环境。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 作为建筑业的一部分，该行业提供了大量的就业机会。如果确保公平工资和安全的工作条件，则对体面工作有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 建筑行业（包括室内装修）已知存在工作安全事故风险、非正规就业和劳工权利保护不足的问题，可能对工人的安全和权利产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 通过采用节能材料（如高效隔热材料）、可持续采购的木材或低环境影响的内装材料，该行业可以促进现有建筑和产业的可持续改造和升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 装修工程通常涉及拆除旧材料和产生大量建筑垃圾（如废弃木材、石膏板、包装材料），如果缺乏有效的废物分类、回收和再利用措施，会显著增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过选择和使用低VOC（挥发性有机化合物）的涂料、粘合剂和建材，该行业有助于改善室内空气质量，减少因室内空气污染导致的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业通过提供专业的技术服务支持出版、包装和广告等关键经济领域，有助于实现经济生产的多元化和技术升级，属于知识密集型和支持性的经济活动。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业通过采用数字制版、计算机直接制版（CTP）等先进技术，减少了对传统化学工艺的依赖，是产业向更清洁、资源效率更高的技术升级的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 传统制版和印刷辅助过程可能使用和处理有害化学品（如显影液、清洗剂、含重金属的印版），如果管理不当，会对环境和人体健康造成风险，与化学品无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业可能产生废版、废化学品容器、测试打印废料等，若未有效实施废物预防、回收和再利用措施，则会增加固体废物量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提高成员（尤其是小规模农民、渔民）的收入和经济稳定性，合作社直接有助于消除极端贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 合作社的核心功能是确保成员（包括贫困和弱势群体）能够平等获得经济资源、技术、市场和金融服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 合作社通过集体采购、资源共享、技术推广和市场谈判，直接旨在提高小规模农业生产者的生产力和收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 许多合作社推广可持续的农业、林业和渔业实践，有助于建立具有气候适应力的生产系统并保护生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 合作社支持其成员的生产活动，创造体面工作，并帮助中小规模生产者实现正规化和成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 合作社为其成员提供就业和收入机会，并通常遵循公平原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 部分农林水产合作社可能参与推广与当地文化和产品相关的可持续旅游，但这不是其核心活动，相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 合作社通过集体管理资源（如森林、渔场、农田），有潜力促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 合作社可以通过改善供应链效率、仓储和加工设施来帮助减少生产后的粮食损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 林业合作社和推广可持续农业实践的合作社有助于陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 林业合作社可以直接促进森林的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 合作社可以作为一种机制，为成员调动资源用于可持续的土地管理和生物多样性保护。
sdg_target_description: Mobilize and significantly increase financial resources from all sources to conserve and sustainably use biodiversity and ecosystems

rationale: 合作社网络经常参与知识共享、技术交流和国际合作。
sdg_target_description: Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharing on mutually agreed terms, including through improved coordination among existing mechanisms, particularly at the United Nations level, and through a global technology facilitation mechanism

rationale: 合作社本质上是基于民间社会的伙伴关系模式，是促进可持续发展目标实现的有效合作形式。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

rationale: 如果合作社以追求短期产量最大化为导向，且缺乏有效的可持续性监管，其集体行动可能导致对土地、森林或渔业资源的过度开发。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 同样，管理不善的合作社活动可能对陆地生态系统（如森林砍伐、土壤退化）产生负面影响，尽管这不是其设计初衷。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 乐器制造为音乐教育提供工具，音乐教育是促进包容性教育、文化理解和创造力发展的重要途径，有助于为所有人提供公平的教育机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations

rationale: 乐器是文化表达和传承的核心载体。制造乐器直接支持音乐艺术，而音乐教育是培养对文化多样性欣赏和理解的关键方式，这与可持续发展教育的目标高度一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 乐器制造业是一个细分制造业领域，通过工艺创新、材料科学和精密制造技术来提升产品价值，有助于经济多样化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业直接创造制造业相关的就业岗位，包括手工艺人、工程师、设计师等，为人们提供工作机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为制造业和文化产业的一部分，乐器制造促进了工业活动的多样性，但其规模和全球产业占比相对较小，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs)

rationale: 乐器制造，特别是高端乐器，涉及声学工程、材料科学等领域的研发和创新，可以支持本土技术发展。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 乐器制造可能依赖特定木材（如红木、云杉）等自然资源，如果采购不可持续，会对自然资源管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 高质量的乐器是耐用品，使用寿命长，符合减少废物产生的理念。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业是工业化的重要组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，推动工业发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业通过生产更高效、更清洁的汽车零部件（如轻量化部件、电动化部件），间接支持工业和交通基础设施的可持续升级。但其自身制造过程的可持续性取决于具体实践。

rationale: 汽车零部件制造消耗大量金属、塑料等原材料和能源，若资源管理不善，会导致自然资源低效使用和枯竭。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及有害化学品的使用（如电镀液、切削液、溶剂）和废物产生，若处理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 生产过程中会产生工业废料和副产品，是废物的重要来源之一，对减少废物目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业主要为汽车产业供货。如果其产品主要用于传统内燃机汽车，则间接支持了高碳排放的交通系统，与气候变化应对措施的目标相悖。其相关性取决于产品组合中清洁技术零部件的比例。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 制造业，特别是在某些地区或供应链中，可能存在工作条件、劳工权利和职业安全健康方面的风险。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 该行业生产的许多特种无机化学品（如催化剂、用于清洁技术的材料）是其他产业实现可持续升级、提高资源效率和采用环保技术的关键投入品。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为化学品制造商，该行业负有在整个生命周期内对环境无害化管理其产品和生产过程产生的化学物质和废物的直接责任。负责任的运营是对此目标的核心贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的水处理化学品（如絮凝剂、消毒剂）直接用于改善水质、减少污染和促进废水回用。

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 化学制造业存在固有的职业健康和安全风险（接触有害物质、事故风险）。如果安全工作环境得不到保障，可能违反此目标。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 化学制造过程可能产生大量有害或无害的工业废物。如果废物减量化和循环利用措施不足，该行业可能成为废物的主要产生者，与此目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 无机化学品生产通常是能源密集型过程，可能产生显著的温室气体排放（直接或间接）。如果未采取有效的减排措施和清洁能源转型，将对气候行动构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 计量仪器是工业自动化、过程控制和基础设施监控的核心组件，对于提高资源使用效率、实现精准管理和采用清洁技术至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 精确的计量（如对原材料、能源、水的测量）是实现自然资源可持续管理和高效利用的基本前提，它使得监测、报告和优化资源消耗成为可能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 能源计量仪表（如智能电表、热能表）是监测、分析和优化能源使用，从而大幅提高能源效率的关键工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 水表和流量计等设备对于精确测量用水量、检测泄漏和管理水资源分配至关重要，直接支持提高各行业的用水效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 计量器制造过程本身可能消耗原材料和能源，并在产品生命周期结束时产生电子废物，这与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突，尽管其产品的正面效益通常远大于此负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业生产的医疗测量设备（如体温计、血压计、血糖仪）是疾病诊断、健康监测和公共卫生管理的基础工具，增强了健康风险的管理能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 部分个人服务（如健身、水疗、按摩）有助于缓解压力、促进身体活动和整体福祉，间接支持心理健康和福祉目标。但并非所有服务（如殡葬）都直接相关，且贡献较为间接，故得分中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: '其他个人服务'行业是女性就业比例通常较高的领域，为女性提供了经济参与和就业机会，有助于其在经济生活中的参与。但行业内的领导职位比例和决策权平等性仍需审视。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 该行业可能存在基于性别的职业隔离（如某些服务被视为'女性工作'）以及潜在的性别薪酬差距，构成了对性别平等的挑战，与消除歧视的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 该行业主要由中小微企业和个体经营者构成，是创造就业和支持创业的重要领域，特别是为低技能劳动者提供了入口级工作岗位。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 该行业中存在大量非正式就业、兼职工作，可能伴随低工资、不稳定的工作条件、有限的社会保障和职业发展机会，与'体面工作'的目标存在差距。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 许多个人服务（如美容美发、清洁服务）会消耗一次性用品、化学品包装和水资源，并产生相应废物，若管理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业中的企业可以通过选择环保产品、减少资源消耗、进行废物分类和回收等可持续实践，对目标做出积极贡献。但鉴于行业以小微企业为主，广泛采纳可持续实践和报告的程度可能有限。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 作为肥料和饲料的批发商，该行业通过确保关键农业投入品的供应，直接支持提高农业生产力和农民收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 如果其分销的化肥被过度或不合理使用，会导致土壤退化、水资源污染，破坏可持续农业实践和生态系统的韧性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...

rationale: 化肥生产消耗大量自然资源（如磷矿、天然气），其批发活动支持了这种资源密集型产品的流通，与资源的可持续管理目标相悖。

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...

sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains...

sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...

rationale: 不合理的施肥 practices can contribute to soil degradation, which is contrary to the goal of combating desertification and restoring land.
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...

rationale: 化肥中的氮、磷等成分是造成水体富营养化的主要污染物，该行业的分销活动间接支持了这种污染源的扩散。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 铝加工品（如轻质铝材）是升级可持续基础设施（如节能建筑、轻量化交通工具）和改造产业的关键材料，有助于提高资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 铝具有极高的可回收性。铝加工行业通过回收废铝并再加工成新产品，直接促进了废物的减少和资源的循环利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，铝加工业通过技术升级和生产高附加值产品，为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 初级铝生产（铝土矿开采和电解）是资源密集型活动，消耗大量能源和水资源，并可能造成土地退化。铝加工行业依赖此类原料时，对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 铝的生产和加工是能源密集型过程，若能源结构以化石燃料为主，将产生大量温室气体排放，对气候变化产生显著负面影响，与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 铝加工过程（如熔炼、表面处理）可能涉及化学品的使用，并产生废气、废水和固体废物（如赤泥，若涉及初级生产），若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为谷物和豆类（基本主食）的主要分销渠道，该行业通过确保这些关键食品从产地高效运送到市场，对保障粮食供应和可及性至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 该行业作为连接生产者和市场的重要环节，通过为农民（包括小规模生产者）提供销售渠道，有助于提高他们的收入。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment.

rationale: 作为批发贸易部门的一部分，该行业通过其运营活动贡献于经济增长和生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业本身创造就业机会，并支持供应链上的中小微企业（如供应商、客户）发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 高效的农产品批发贸易依赖于并推动着交通、仓储等物流基础设施的发展和完善。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 专业的批发商可以通过改进仓储、包装和物流管理，有效减少供应链环节中的粮食损失（例如，减少谷物和豆类在储存和运输过程中的变质和损耗）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 该行业的运营（如运输、包装）消耗能源和资源，如果管理不善，可能导致自然资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 运营过程中可能产生包装废弃物（如塑料袋、纸箱），如果未妥善处理，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的运输车队会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 如果其采购的农产品（特别是大豆等）与毁林或不可持续的土地利用有关，则间接对森林保护和可持续管理产生压力。此关联较为间接，但确实存在潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

rationale: 金属表面处理通过提高金属制品的耐腐蚀性和耐久性，直接延长了基础设施和工业设备的使用寿命，从而提高了资源使用效率，是制造业可持续升级的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业传统上大量使用和排放含有重金属、氰化物等危险化学品和废液，如果管理不当，会对土壤、水体和人体健康造成严重危害，与无害环境管理化学品和废物的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果行业采用闭环系统（如电镀液回收、废水回用、废渣资源化），可以有效减少原生化学品消耗和废物产生，对废物减量目标做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 表面处理过程是工业废水的重要来源，若废水处理不达标，会直接向环境中排放有毒污染物，严重威胁水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 工人在生产过程中可能直接暴露于有害化学品，且不当的污染物排放会通过空气、水污染影响周边社区健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业提供了就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果工作场所的通风、防护设备和安全管理不到位，工人面临化学品暴露、工伤等职业健康安全风险，对促进安全工作环境的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为基础调味品的批发商，该行业通过确保味噌和酱油等食品的稳定供应和分销，有助于保障食物可及性和营养摄入，间接支持消除饥饿。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 味噌和酱油是传统发酵食品，含有益生菌等有益成分，适量食用可促进健康饮食。批发环节使其更易获得，间接支持健康福祉。但相关性中等，因健康影响更取决于消费量和方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为批发业，该行业创造就业机会（如物流、销售），并通过供应链效率促进食品贸易和经济增长，贡献于经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 批发商连接小型味噌/酱油生产商与更大市场，帮助中小企业融入价值链，间接支持其获得市场机会。但相关性较低，因该目标更直接针对金融服务。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 高效的批发物流和库存管理有助于减少味噌、酱油在供应链中的损耗和浪费，直接贡献于减少食物损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 批发活动可能使用大量一次性包装材料（如塑料瓶、纸箱）进行运输和储存，若未妥善管理，会增加废弃物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 针织面料制造业可以通过采用资源效率更高的技术和更清洁的生产工艺（如节水染色技术）来实现产业升级，从而对该目标做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 如果行业实践可持续资源管理（如使用再生纤维、优化水和能源消耗），则可能产生积极影响。但传统模式的积极贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 针织面料制造过程中的边角料、不合格品以及化学品使用可能产生大量固体和有害废物，对该目标构成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 染色、整理等工序通常使用多种化学品，若管理不当，可能导致有害物质释放到环境（特别是水体）中，产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中的废水，尤其是含有染料和助剂的废水，是重要的工业水污染源，对该目标构成显著挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为劳动密集型制造业，它提供了就业机会，但对‘体面工作’（如工资、工时、安全）的贡献程度取决于具体的企业实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 纺织制造业历史上存在工作环境安全隐患（如粉尘、化学品暴露）和劳工权利问题，因此可能对该目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 化妆品与个人形象、自信和心理健康相关，其使用可以促进个人福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 如果化妆品含有不安全或受污染的化学成分，可能对使用者健康构成风险，与减少危险化学品危害的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 制造过程可能产生含有化学物质的工业废水，若处理不当会污染水体。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 化妆品制造通常是水资源密集型产业，可能对当地水资源可持续性构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业创造了制造业就业岗位，但需确保工作环境安全和待遇公平。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 化妆品和香料研发涉及化学、生物学等领域的技术创新。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 生产过程中使用的化学品和产生的废物若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成显著负面影响。这是该行业的主要环境挑战之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业通常使用大量包装材料（尤其是塑料），是消费品包装废弃物的主要来源之一，对减少废物目标构成挑战。积极的一面是，企业可通过推行包装回收和减量化计划做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过营销和标签，该行业可以教育和引导消费者选择可持续、环保的产品，促进可持续生活方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 化妆品中的塑料微珠（部分国家已禁用）和包装塑料废弃物可能进入海洋，造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 房地产中介是住房市场的重要组成部分，通过匹配供需，帮助人们（尽管通常是有支付能力的人）获得住房，对实现'适足住房'目标有积极贡献。但其对'负担得起'方面的贡献可能有限，取决于市场定价和监管环境。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 通过促进现有物业的交易和再利用，中介行业可以支持更高效的土地利用和建成环境的优化，间接支持可持续的城市管理，减少城市无序扩张的压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries

rationale: 该行业本身是服务业的组成部分，创造了大量的就业机会（如房地产经纪人、评估师、行政人员），许多是中小型企业，符合支持创业和创造就业的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 提供就业机会，但对实现'充分就业'和'同工同酬'的直接影响相对中等，取决于具体国家的劳动法规和行业实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过促进财产交易，间接支持了对财产（特别是土地和住房）的获取权利。但这种贡献通常是面向有经济能力参与市场的群体，对最贫困和最脆弱群体的直接帮助有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 如果房地产中介实践中存在'红线歧视'（redlining）、基于种族、性别或其他受保护特征的歧视性行为，则会加剧社会排斥和不平等，对此目标产生负面影响。这种风险是行业潜在的负面外部性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 行业运营（如办公用纸、营销材料、能源消耗）会产生一定的废物，但与其核心业务相比，这种影响相对较小。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制冰业提供的冷链服务有助于防止食物腐败，确保食品安全和可及性，特别是在缺乏可靠电力的地区，对实现全年粮食安全有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 通过减少从农场到市场的收获后损失，制冰业支持建立更具韧性和可持续的粮食供应链。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 医疗冷链对于许多疫苗和基本药物的储存和运输至关重要，是保障优质医疗卫生服务可及性的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 可靠的冷链基础设施是确保研发出的疫苗和药物在分发过程中保持效力的基础。
sdg_target_description: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries, provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines...

rationale: 制冰业是冷链基础设施的重要组成部分，支撑着食品、医疗等多个经济部门的发展和人居福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 制冰是减少供应链中（特别是收获后、运输和储存阶段）食物损失的关键技术，直接贡献于减少食物浪费的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 制冰过程能耗高，如果其电力主要来自化石燃料，则增加了非可再生能源消耗，与提高可再生能源比例的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix.

rationale: 若使用老旧、低效的制冰设备，该行业可能成为能源效率低下的领域，对全球能效提升目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency.

rationale: 某些传统制冰系统可能使用氢氟碳化物（HFCs）等强效温室气体作为制冷剂，若未妥善管理或转型，其排放会加剧气候变化，与将气候行动纳入政策的目标冲突。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 钢铁是建设交通、能源、建筑等各类高质量、可靠、有韧性的基础设施不可或缺的基础材料，直接支持该子目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 钢铁工业是许多国家经济的重要组成部分，通过技术升级和提高生产效率，可以为经济增长和生产率提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 传统炼钢过程是资源密集型产业，大量消耗铁矿石、煤炭、水等自然资源，其资源利用效率和管理方式往往不符合可持续性要求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 钢铁生产过程中会产生大量固体废物（如钢渣）以及可能含有有害化学物质的废水、废气，若管理不当会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 尽管废钢回收是行业的一部分，但原生钢生产本身会产生大量工业废物（如炉渣），总体上废物产生量巨大。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁行业是二氧化碳和温室气体的主要排放源之一，其传统生产工艺对气候变化有显著负面影响，是实现气候行动目标需要重点管理和转型的行业。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 钢铁生产过程中的颗粒物、硫氧化物、氮氧化物等空气污染物排放，可能对周边社区居民的健康造成不利影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 钢铁制造业存在高温、重型机械等职业风险，历史上职业安全事故发生率较高，对工人安全和劳动保护构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业本身需要通过采用更清洁的技术（如电弧炉炼钢、碳捕获利用与封存）和流程来提高资源效率，实现可持续升级，这符合该子目标的方向。但其现状通常与目标要求存在差距。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为批发业，该行业是劳动密集型产业，创造了分销、物流、销售等就业岗位，并支持汽车产业的经济活动，从而贡献于经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 汽车零部件供应是维持和修复交通基础设施（车辆）不可或缺的一环，确保了运输系统的可靠性和韧性。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 该行业支持汽车制造业和维修业的运作，是工业化供应链的重要组成部分，促进了产业的持续发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果该行业分销用于车辆能效提升、排放控制或电动汽车的零部件，则间接支持了向更清洁、更可持续的交通技术的转型。但相关性取决于其销售的产品组合。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes)

rationale: 通过分销再制造零部件或促进旧件回收流通，该行业可以支持循环经济，减少废弃物产生。但同时，其运营（如包装）也可能产生废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果分销的零部件有助于提高车辆燃油效率（如高效发动机部件），则对此目标有间接的积极贡献。但贡献程度有限且间接。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 如果其业务核心是支持传统燃油车（高碳排放）的持续运营，并且阻碍了向低碳交通的转型，则与国家气候行动目标相悖。其自身的物流配送也可能产生碳排放。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 提供体育设施鼓励规律的身体活动，是预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康的关键手段，直接贡献于该目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 体育设施是重要的公共空间，其安全、包容和可及性（尤其是对弱势群体）直接支持创建包容和可持续的城市环境。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 体育设施提供业创造了从管理、维护到教练等多种就业岗位，支持体面工作和经济增长，尤其可能涉及中小型企业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 通过提供包容性的设施和项目，该行业可以促进女性在体育参与和体育产业管理决策中的平等参与和领导机会。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 体育设施的运营（如游泳池加热、场地照明、草坪维护）可能消耗大量能源和水资源，如果管理不具可持续性，则对自然资源的有效利用构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果体育设施的布局鼓励步行或骑行前往，可能间接有助于减少道路交通伤亡，但此贡献相对间接和次要。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 作为水果和蔬菜的分销渠道，该行业通过确保这些营养食品的有效供应和可及性，为消除饥饿和改善营养做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 代理商通过将小规模农民（水果和蔬菜生产者）与更广阔的市场连接起来，有助于提高他们的收入和获得市场的机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 该行业通过促进农产品（尤其是高价值产品如水果蔬菜）的流通和增值，支持经济多元化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 青果物代理行业本身在物流、销售和管理领域创造了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 由于水果和蔬菜易腐，代理商的储存、处理和物流效率低下可能导致显著的采后损失和食品浪费，与减少供应链损失的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 行业通常使用一次性包装材料（如纸箱、塑料薄膜）来保护和运输产品，如果管理不当，会导致废物产生增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 分销活动依赖运输（通常是公路运输），会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响，除非采用低碳物流方案。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果代理商利用其市场力量对小型生产者施加不公平的贸易条件（如压低采购价），可能会加剧价值链中的不平等。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality

rationale: 家具制造业是典型的劳动密集型产业，通过制造活动贡献于经济增长和生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业就业岗位，对实现充分和生产性就业有贡献，但需要确保工作环境符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，木制家具制造是工业化的组成部分，贡献于工业产值和就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果行业采用来自可持续管理森林的木材（如FSC/PEFC认证），则直接贡献于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果木材采购不可持续，涉及非法采伐或对原始森林的破坏，则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过优化材料利用（如减少切割浪费）、使用木材边角料生产其他产品（如颗粒燃料）或回收旧家具，可以对减少废物做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中可能产生大量木材废料、粉尘以及涂料、胶粘剂等化学品的包装废物，如果处理不当，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 家具制造中使用的涂料、清漆、胶粘剂可能含有挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等有害化学物质，其使用和废弃物若管理不善，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 木制家具制造对木材的需求是驱动森林砍伐和森林退化的主要压力之一，如果供应链不透明且不可持续，将严重阻碍森林的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，树脂加工机械的制造本身是工业活动的一部分，为工业产值和就业做出贡献，支持可持续的工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造更节能、更精密、能加工可再生或可回收树脂的新型机械，直接为其他产业的可持续升级和资源效率提升提供关键技术装备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 树脂加工机械的制造涉及工程技术和技术创新，其技术转移和能力建设可以支持发展中国家的工业发展和技术进步。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 高效的树脂加工机械可以减少生产过程中的原料浪费和能源消耗，从而在一定程度上促进资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业制造的机械是塑料制品大规模生产的基础。塑料（尤其是传统化石燃料基塑料）的整个生命周期，从生产到废弃，对化学品和废物的环境无害化管理构成巨大挑战，可能导致有害物质释放和环境污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 虽然高效机械可以减少生产过程中的废料，但该行业的核心产品（树脂加工机械）极大地促进了塑料制品的生产，而塑料废弃物（尤其是难以回收的）是全球废物问题的重大来源，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供了就业机会。但其相关性是间接且通用的，与许多其他制造行业相似。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业领域的稳定就业岗位，尽管自动化程度可能较高，但仍需要熟练技工和工程师，有助于实现充分的生产性就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 钟表制造，特别是高端品牌，严重依赖于精密工程、材料科学和设计方面的持续研发与创新，是提升产业技术能力的代表性行业。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 该行业的知识和技术转移可以支持发展中国家的产业升级和技术发展，尽管其全球价值链可能高度集中于少数地区。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 钟表制造消耗贵金属（金、银）、宝石、不锈钢等自然资源。如果供应链管理不善，可能导致资源开采不可持续和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程（如电镀、清洗）可能使用有害化学品，如果处理不当，其排放和废物可能对环境（水、土壤）和工人健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中会产生金属废料、包装材料等固体废物。如果缺乏有效的预防、回收和再利用措施，将增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 生产过程中接触化学品和粉尘可能对工人健康构成风险，如果职业安全措施不足，可能导致职业病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 制造过程中的工业废水若含有重金属或其他污染物且未经妥善处理就排放，会污染水体，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 纪录片、教育影片等视听内容是传播可持续发展知识、促进跨文化理解和全球公民意识的有效媒介。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...

sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 行业内可能存在非正式工作、不稳定合同、长工作时间等问题，对部分从业者的劳动权利和工作环境构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers...

sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 通过制作反映多元化和包容性故事的内容，该行业可以促进社会包容，赋予边缘化群体话语权。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 制作过程可能产生大量物理废物（如布景材料）和电子废物（淘汰的设备），消耗资源，对环境造成负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 电影和视频是提高公众对可持续生活方式和消费模式认识的有力工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships...

sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse
