sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 木质建材作为一种可再生、可持续的建筑材料，有助于升级和改造基础设施与产业，使其更具资源效率和环境友好性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业若使用来自可持续管理森林的木材，则体现了对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 对可持续来源木材的需求可以激励和促进可持续的森林管理实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 木质建材可用于建设更可持续的人类住区，支持可持续的城市化。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries

rationale: 木材产品在其生命周期内可以储存碳，使用木结构建筑是一种减缓气候变化的措施。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造过程可能产生木材废料、锯末等，如果处理不当，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 木材处理过程中可能使用防腐剂、胶粘剂、涂料等化学品，若管理不善可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果木材原料来自不可持续的采伐或非法砍伐，该行业会直接导致森林退化、毁林和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 不可持续的木材采伐会破坏自然栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 与毁林相关的木材采购会释放大量储存的碳，加剧气候变化。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 机械工具是制造业和工业化的基础性投入品，其制造活动直接支撑着可持续工业化的进程，并贡献于工业产值和就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 高效、精密的机械工具是实现产业升级、提高资源利用效率和采用环保生产工艺的关键技术装备。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 机械工具制造业通过提供提高生产效率的关键设备，直接支持各行业实现更高的经济生产力，并本身是一个技术密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业需要具备专业技能的工程师和技术工人，间接推动了与先进制造相关的职业技术教育和培训的需求。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 高质量的机械工具可以通过提高加工精度和减少材料浪费，间接促进下游制造业对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 机械工具制造过程（如金属切削、热处理、表面处理）可能使用化学品并产生工业废水和危险废物，若管理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程中的金属屑、废切削液等工业废物的产生，若未有效实施减量化、回收和再利用措施，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 化学纤维制造业是工业化和现代纺织业的关键组成部分，为许多国家的GDP和就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业涉及材料科学和工艺技术的持续研发，以改进纤维性能和生产效率，推动产业技术创新。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 通过生产耐用、可回收（如再生聚酯）的纤维，理论上可以支持资源的更有效利用，但整体贡献有限，因为初级生产仍高度依赖不可再生资源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业通过制造活动提供就业机会，并通过技术升级提高生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 化学纤维制造（尤其是染色和整理工序）是水污染的重要来源，会向水体排放含有染料、化学品和重金属的废水。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 生产过程中使用和可能释放的有害化学品（如溶剂、单体）若管理不当，会对环境和健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业在生产过程中会产生固体废物和副产品，且许多化学纤维产品（快时尚）寿命短，最终成为废弃物，增加了垃圾填埋场的负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 工人和周边社区可能因接触制造过程中使用的化学品或排放的污染物而面临健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 废水排放和合成纤维纺织品洗涤时脱落的微塑料是海洋污染的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 水污染和化学品排放可能对依赖清洁水资源的陆地生态系统（如湿地）产生不利影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 通过分销液化石油气（LPG）等清洁烹饪燃料，该行业有助于部分无法接入电网的人群获得现代能源服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 如果该行业参与分销由可再生能源生产的氢气（绿氢），则对增加可再生能源份额有积极贡献。但对于主要分销化石燃料气体（如LNG）的情况，贡献有限甚至为负。此处取中性偏积极假设。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 工业气体是制造业（如钢铁、化工、电子、食品加工）的关键投入品，其稳定供应直接支持工业生产和工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 通过提供用于更清洁工业过程的气体（如用于废水处理的氧气）或作为清洁能源的过渡燃料（LNG替代煤炭），该行业间接支持基础设施和产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 医用氧气的批发供应是医疗保健系统（特别是医院和诊所）正常运行的关键环节，直接关系到高质量基本医疗服务的可及性。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过支持下游产业的投入需求，间接促进经济生产力的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 气体压缩和液化过程本身消耗大量能源，若能源来源不可持续，则导致自然资源（尤其是化石燃料）的低效使用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 行业运营可能产生废弃的气瓶、包装材料等固体废物，若回收体系不完善，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业主要批发化石燃料气体（如LNG、LPG），其产品的最终燃烧是温室气体排放的重要来源，与气候行动目标相悖，对国家减排政策构成挑战。运输和储存过程中的气体泄漏（特别是甲烷）也加剧气候变化。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 压缩和液化气体通常具有危险性（易燃、易爆、有毒）。在储存、运输或使用过程中发生泄漏事故，可能对工人和周边社区的健康安全构成威胁，造成空气污染甚至伤亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 药品制造业通过生产和供应安全、有效、高质量的必需药品和疫苗，是实现全民健康覆盖（UHC）的核心支柱之一。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 该行业进行新药研发，特别是针对传染病和非传染病的治疗手段，对支持此目标至关重要。但其对发展中国家的可及性和可负担性方面的影响取决于具体商业实践和专利政策。
sdg_target_description: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-communicable diseases that primarily affect developing countries, provide access to affordable essential medicines and vaccines

rationale: 制药业是研发密集型产业，其活动直接增强了科学研究和技术创新能力，并创造了高技能就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 作为高科技和高附加值产业，药品制造通过技术创新和产业升级贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 药品制造过程可能使用和产生有害化学品及废物，如果管理不当，可能对环境造成污染，与实现化学品和废物的环境无害化管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制药生产过程可能产生工业废物（如溶剂、包装材料），若未有效实施减量化、回收和再利用措施，则会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 在某些情况下，药品定价过高、专利壁垒或供应分配不均可能限制贫困和边缘化群体获得基本药物，从而对实现公平的全民健康覆盖构成潜在挑战。此负面影响与行业的具体商业实践和监管环境密切相关。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业提供销售、管理等就业岗位，为达成全民充分生产性就业和体面工作做出贡献。但作为传统零售模式，其就业质量和稳定性可能面临挑战，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该零售商选择销售由可持续来源材料（如有机棉、再生纤维）制成的和服或寝具，则间接支持自然资源的可持续管理。但这依赖于其采购实践，并非行业固有属性，因此相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业的核心是促进纺织品（服装、寝具）的销售和消费。快时尚或过度消费文化可能导致纺织品浪费增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统零售模式通常侧重于销售新产品，可能不积极宣传产品的可持续生命周期信息（如护理、修复、回收），从而未能有效促进与自然和谐共处的生活方式的意识和信息传播。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 销售传统和服（呉服）有助于保护和推广日本传统文化遗产，使其得以延续和传承，这与保护和捍卫世界文化遗产的目标高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 如果该零售商主要从本地或小型手工业者处采购传统和服，则可能支持小型企业融入价值链和市场。但此关联性较弱，并非行业普遍特征。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 建筑物服务中的清洁和害虫防治活动，通过维护卫生环境、减少污染物和有害生物，直接有助于减少由环境危害引起的健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 作为服务业，建筑物管理提供了大量的就业岗位（如清洁工、保安、维修工），对实现充分和生产性就业有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 建筑物服务通过维护建筑的结构安全、设备功能和环境卫生，间接支持了“安全”住房和基本服务的目标，尽管不直接提供住房。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums.

rationale: 建筑物服务中的废物分类、收集和资源管理实践，有助于减少城市建筑运营对环境的不利影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management.

rationale: 如果管理不当，建筑物服务中使用的清洁化学品、杀虫剂以及产生的运营废物（如废弃包装、清洁材料）可能对环境造成污染，与无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 建筑物服务的日常运营（如一次性清洁用品的使用）可能产生大量废物，若未采取减量化和循环措施，会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 内衣制造过程中使用的染料、漂白剂和其他化学处理剂若管理不当，可能导致有害物质释放，对环境（水、土壤污染）和工人健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 服装制造业通常产生大量纺织品废料（如边角料）和包装废物。快时尚模式下的过度生产和不耐用的产品设计加剧了废物问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 服装制造业，尤其是在某些地区，可能存在低工资、长工时和不安全的工作条件，与'体面工作'的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业供应链中可能存在劳工权利保障不足（如结社自由、集体谈判权）和工作环境安全隐患等问题。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 传统棉花种植耗水量大，合成纤维依赖化石燃料，整个生产过程消耗大量水、能源和原材料，若管理不善则不符合自然资源可持续利用的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 通过采用节水技术、使用有机或再生材料（如有机棉、再生聚酯纤维）、优化能源效率，该行业可以升级其生产工艺，向更可持续的产业模式转型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为主要服务于女性消费者且可能雇佣大量女性员工的行业，积极推动女性在管理层和决策层的参与，可以为实现性别平等做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是分销酒精饮料，酒精的有害使用是SDG 3.5明确要预防和治疗的。批发活动增加了酒精的可及性，可能助长有害使用，因此产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 作为批发行业，它本身是经济活动的一部分，为物流、销售、管理等领域创造就业机会，并支持相关中小微企业（如小型酿酒厂）进入市场。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 酒精饮料（如地方特色清酒、葡萄酒）是旅游业（如餐饮、酒店体验）的重要组成部分。该行业通过分销这些产品，间接支持了与地方文化和产品相关的可持续旅游业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 酒精饮料的生产通常需要大量自然资源（如水、粮食作物）。作为分销商，虽然不直接进行生产，但其业务依赖于这种可能不可持续的资源使用模式，因此存在间接的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 航空制造业是高科技产业的核心，通过研发先进材料、轻量化设计和高效推进系统，直接推动技术创新和产业升级，提高资源使用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 飞机制造业供应链长且技术密集，可以带动发展中国家的工业技术发展和产业升级，尤其是在复合材料、精密加工等领域。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 该行业是高附加值制造业，通过技术创新和生产流程优化，显著提升经济生产力，并创造大量高技能岗位。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 航空制造业提供大量高技能、高薪酬的工程师、技术人员等体面工作岗位。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 航空运输是主要的温室气体排放源，其产品的使用直接加剧气候变化，对实现气候行动目标构成重大挑战，除非行业加速向可持续航空燃料和零排放飞机转型。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 飞机制造消耗大量铝、钛、复合材料等资源，其开采和加工可能对自然资源造成压力，尽管轻量化设计有助于提高使用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中可能产生工业废料和报废飞机的处理问题，尽管行业在回收利用方面有持续改进。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 航空制造业通过严格的安全标准和持续的技术创新，致力于提高航空安全水平，减少航空事故造成的伤亡。该目标虽特指道路交通，但航空安全是整体运输安全的重要组成部分，其原则和努力方向一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 机场附近的飞机起降会产生显著的噪音污染，可能对周边居民的健康和福祉产生负面影响，同时制造过程中的化学品使用也存在潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 金属弹簧制造业是工业体系的基础组成部分，为汽车、机械、电子等多个行业提供关键零部件，直接支撑工业生产和工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造高精度、高性能的弹簧产品，推动技术升级和创新，有助于提高整体经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它提供了就业机会，但其'体面工作'的程度取决于具体工厂的劳动条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 金属弹簧制造是资源密集型产业，消耗大量钢材、能源和水，如果管理不当，会对自然资源造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程会产生金属废料、切削液、润滑油等废弃物，若处理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业本身可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术和提高资源效率来实现可持续升级，但其核心产品（弹簧）对基础设施升级的贡献是间接的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 特殊教育学校专门为残疾人等弱势群体提供教育机会，直接消除教育差距并确保其获得教育和职业培训的平等机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations

rationale: 特殊教育学校是专门为残疾学生设计和升级的包容性教育设施，提供安全、有效的学习环境。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all

rationale: 通过提供教育和技能发展，特殊教育学校直接促进残疾人的社会和经济包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 特殊教育学校通过提供职业培训和继续教育，帮助有特殊需求的青年融入社会并减少其未受教育或未培训的比例。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training

rationale: 如果特殊教育学校与主流教育体系隔离过度，未能有效促进融合教育，可能在长期上加剧教育隔离，与完全消除教育差距和实现真正包容的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations

rationale: 肉制品制造提供了重要的动物蛋白来源，有助于满足人们的营养需求和粮食安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 集约化的肉类生产系统通常与不可持续的资源利用（如土地、水）和环境污染相关，对建立可持续的粮食生产系统构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 过度消费加工肉制品与某些非传染性疾病（如心血管疾病、某些癌症）的风险增加有关。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 生产过程中的废水、废弃物（如屠宰场废料）如果处理不当，可能造成水体和土壤污染，影响健康。同时，需要严格控制添加剂和污染物以确保食品安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 作为食品制造业的重要组成部分，该行业通过将初级农产品加工成高附加值产品，贡献于经济生产力和多元化。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业是劳动力密集型产业，提供了大量的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 肉类生产是资源密集型活动，需要大量的土地、水和饲料，对自然资源的可持续管理构成巨大压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用清洁化学品、包装材料，并产生有机废物和废水，需要严格的环境管理以防止污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 该行业会产生包装废物、加工副产品等，增加了废物管理的负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 畜牧业及其加工链是温室气体（特别是甲烷和一氧化二氮）的重要排放源，对气候变化有显著贡献，因此该行业是气候政策需要重点规范和引导的领域。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 为扩大牧场或种植饲料而导致的土地利用变化（如毁林）是自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失的主要驱动因素之一。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个分支，该行业提供就业机会。然而，'杂品制造'通常涉及标准化、可能低技能的生产，对实现'体面工作'（包括公平工资和职业发展）的贡献程度有限且不确定。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业是工业部门的一部分，贡献于工业产值和就业，从而支持可持续工业化的宏观目标。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果该行业采用资源效率高的生产工艺和可持续材料，理论上可以对资源的可持续管理做出贡献。但鉴于'杂品'的多样性和通常非优先考虑可持续性的特点，这种积极贡献的普遍性和强度较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: '杂品'通常设计寿命短、一次性使用或难以回收，容易导致大量废物产生。其制造过程本身也可能产生工业废物。这与减少废物产生的目标直接冲突，是该行业的主要负面环境影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业生产的许多'杂品'可能助长不可持续的消费模式，例如鼓励对非必需、短寿命商品的购买和丢弃，与可持续消费和生产模式的总体框架相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 作为基础材料供应商，该行业生产用于可持续基础设施（如节能材料、轻量化材料）和清洁技术（如催化剂、膜材料）的化学品，是实现产业升级和资源效率提升的关键支持。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 化学工业是典型的研发密集型产业，其发展依赖于持续的科学研究和创新，有助于提升整体工业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 化学工业的生产过程和使用后的废弃物可能涉及有害化学品，如果管理不当，会对环境和人类健康造成严重风险。这是该行业最核心的负面环境影响之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 化学制造过程可能产生大量工业废物（包括危险废物），对实现废物减量化和循环利用的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 化学生产过程中的废水可能含有有毒有害物质，如果处理不当排放，会严重污染水体。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 化学品在生产、使用或处置过程中的泄漏或不当管理，可能导致空气、水和土壤污染，进而引发疾病，对公共健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 化学工业的工作环境可能存在接触有毒有害化学品的职业风险，需要严格的安全措施来保护工人健康，否则将违背提供安全工作的目标。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过提供摄影和光学设备，该行业间接支持了技术、职业培训和创意艺术等领域技能发展所需的教学工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业推动电子产品和设备的消费与更新换代，可能间接导致电子废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。其负面影响程度取决于产品生命周期管理和回收实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 传统的合成橡胶制造过程可能产生大量工业废物，包括副产品和不合格产品，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。

sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，但其工作环境（如化学品暴露）和薪酬是否符合‘体面工作’标准取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 胶合板制造是林业产品工业化的关键环节，贡献于工业产值和就业。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果木材原料来自不可持续的采伐，该行业将直接导致自然资源（森林）的过度消耗和低效利用。即使采用可持续木材，制造过程中的资源效率也面临挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 制造过程会产生边角料、木屑和废水等废物，若未有效实施减量化、回收和再利用，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。

sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 与15.2类似，不可持续的木材采伐会破坏自然栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 农药通过控制病虫害直接保护作物，有助于提高农业生产力，从而对小规模生产者的收入有潜在积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 传统农药的制造和使用可能破坏土壤健康、水质量和生物多样性，与建立可持续的、维护生态系统的粮食生产体系的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems... that help maintain ecosystems...

rationale: 农药作为危险化学品，其制造过程和使用残留可能导致职业暴露、食物污染以及环境介质（水、土壤）污染，从而对人类健康构成严重风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...

rationale: 农药制造行业是化学品生命周期管理的核心对象。其生产、使用和处置若管理不当，将对实现化学品的无害环境管理目标产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...

rationale: 农药对非目标生物（如传粉昆虫、土壤微生物）具有毒性，其使用可能导致生物多样性丧失和生态系统退化，威胁陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...

rationale: 该行业生产的食用油是食品供应链中的重要组成部分，有助于保障安全、充足的食品供应。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 该行业的核心活动就是提供中等教育，是直接实现“确保所有青少年完成免费、公平和优质的中等教育”这一目标的最主要载体。

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 作为普及性教育机构，中学校在消除教育中的性别差距、确保弱势群体（如残疾学生）平等入学方面扮演着核心角色。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations

rationale: 中学校是向青少年灌输可持续发展理念、人权意识、和平文化等关键知识和技能的主要场所，对培养负责任的全球公民至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 通过课程设置、校园文化和师生互动，中学校可以在早期阶段挑战性别刻板印象，促进性别平等，有助于消除对妇女和女童的歧视。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 中学校开展的性健康和生殖健康教育是确保青少年获得相关知识和信息的重要途径，对促进其身心健康有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to sexual and reproductive health-care services, including for family planning, information and education, and the integration of reproductive health into national strategies and programmes

rationale: 确保青少年完成中等教育是防止其过早离开教育系统、成为“尼特族”（不升学、不就业、不进修）的关键干预措施。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training

rationale: 学校的日常运营（如纸张消耗、食堂废弃物、能源使用）会产生一定的废物和资源消耗，若管理不善，会对减少废物产生的目标产生轻微的负面影响。此影响是运营的副产品，而非核心教育活动的意图。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是提供运输基础设施（如港口、机场、枢纽），直接支撑经济发展和人类福祉，是实现该目标的关键部门。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 运输设施是交通系统的物理基础。提供设计良好、无障碍的设施（如火车站、公交枢纽）对于实现安全、可及和可持续的交通系统至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 高效的运输设施是商品流通和商业活动的基础，通过降低物流成本和提高连通性，为可持续的经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 该行业可以通过升级现有设施（如引入节能照明、太阳能板、电动汽车充电桩）来提高资源效率并采用清洁技术，使其运营更具可持续性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 如果该行业提供的设施包括电动汽车充电站或支持使用生物燃料等清洁能源的基础设施，则间接促进了可再生能源在交通领域的应用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 如果运输设施的规划和发展主要服务于高碳排放的运输模式（如依赖化石燃料的卡车运输、私人汽车），并且未能有效纳入低碳设计和管理措施，则会加剧气候变化，与该目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 运输设施（如道路交叉口、停车场）的设计如果存在缺陷，可能导致交通事故风险增加，对该目标产生潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 运输设施（如新机场、港口扩建、物流园区）的建设可能涉及土地用途改变、栖息地破坏和生态系统碎片化，对陆地生物多样性保护构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 牙科技工所制造的修复体是牙科治疗中高质量、必需的医疗设备，直接支持全民获得优质的基本医疗服务，特别是口腔健康服务，从而贡献于全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 牙科技工所通常是中小型企业，提供了需要专业技能和手工艺的体面工作岗位，促进了小规模工业的发展和创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 该行业为技术人员提供稳定的、生产性的就业机会，有助于实现充分就业和体面工作的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为典型的小规模工业企业，其发展依赖于获得融资和融入医疗价值链，因此与该目标有间接但积极的关联。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 牙科技工所在制造过程中可能使用和排放化学品（如单体、酸、金属粉尘），如果管理不善，可能对环境和工人健康造成负面影响，与化学品和废弃物的无害化环境管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中的材料切割、打磨等环节会产生废弃物（如金属废料、石膏、塑料），如果未有效实施减量化、回收和再利用措施，则会对减少废物产生的目标产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 动植物油脂是重要的食品成分，为全球粮食供应和营养摄入做出贡献，直接支持消除饥饿和确保食物获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 如果制造的油脂产品富含饱和脂肪或反式脂肪，可能增加心血管疾病等非传染性疾病的风险，对公共健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过技术升级和创新（如自动化加工）贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业机会，支持体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 如果采用资源高效和清洁技术（如废水处理、能源回收），该行业可以贡献于工业的可持续升级；但传统方法可能效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 大规模生产常伴随油料作物种植，可能导致水资源过度使用、土壤退化和不可持续的土地利用，对自然资源管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 制造过程可能产生有机废物、废水和包装材料，若管理不当会增加废物产生，与减废目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 特别是棕榈油等植物的种植，是导致毁林和森林退化的主要驱动因素之一，严重威胁森林的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

rationale: 为扩大油料作物种植而进行的土地清理会破坏自然栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 製綿業是高耗水行业，其加工过程对水资源的利用效率和管理方式若不可持续，则与目标12.2相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 加工过程中可能使用化学品（如用于清洁或软化），并产生废水、棉籽壳等废弃物，若处理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 製綿過程會產生廢棉絮、塵埃等固體廢物，若未有效進行減量或回收利用，則增加廢物產生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 原棉清洗和加工產生的廢水若未經妥善處理而排放，會造成水體污染，影響水質。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 該行業是傳統的耗水大戶，其水資源使用效率通常較低，與提高用水效率的目標相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...)

rationale: 製綿業在棉花產區提供了就業機會，對當地經濟和就業有積極作用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 加工環境可能存在棉塵危害，影響工人呼吸健康，若工作環境安全保障不足，則與目標8.8相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 通過引進更高效、節水、環保的加工技術，製綿業可以實現產業升級，向可持續方向轉型。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes...)

rationale: 外国公务机构是执行和促进国家间伙伴关系（包括南北合作、南南合作和三方合作）以实现可持续发展目标的核心行为体。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries

rationale: 通过外交渠道，外国公务机构可以促进法治、善治和机构能力建设方面的国际合作，特别是在支持发展中国家方面。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels, in particular in developing countries, to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime

rationale: 领事服务是外国公务的核心职能之一，直接负责处理签证、护照和公民保护事宜，促进安全有序的移民和人员流动。
sdg_target_description: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies

rationale: 如果外交关系紧张或处理不当，外国公务活动（如强硬的外交姿态或制裁）有可能加剧国际紧张局势，理论上对减少暴力和促进和平构成潜在风险。这是基于其职能的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere

rationale: 如果外国公务机构在雇佣当地员工时未能遵守东道国最高的劳动标准（例如，在薪酬、工作条件方面），则可能对劳工权利产生负面影响。这种风险虽然存在，但并非该行业的核心定义特征。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 贵金属制品制造属于高附加值产业，能够通过技术升级和创新（如精密加工）来提升经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 贵金属在电子、医疗和催化等高科技领域的应用，依赖于并推动了精密制造技术的研发和创新。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 贵金属开采是资源密集型活动，若管理不当，会导致自然资源的不可持续消耗和生态环境破坏。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 贵金属制造过程（如电镀、精炼）可能产生含有重金属的有害废物，对实现废物减量化和循环利用构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 贵金属开采和加工过程中的化学品（如氰化物、汞）使用，如果处理不当，会造成严重的水体污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业的供应链，特别是小规模和非正规的采矿环节，可能存在工作条件恶劣、工人健康安全风险高的问题。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产工业用橡胶涂层布产品，直接贡献于经济生产和就业，属于劳动和技术密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该制造业活动提供就业机会。但其工作环境可能涉及化学品，对'体面工作'的完全实现存在潜在挑战，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业是工业制造的一部分，其发展有助于促进工业化，并贡献于工业领域的就业和GDP。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs)

rationale: 橡胶涂层布制造过程通常使用化学品（如溶剂、硫化剂）并可能产生有害废物（如挥发性有机化合物、废水），如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响，与无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程中的边角料、不合格品以及产品生命周期结束后的处置（橡胶-织物复合材料回收困难）可能导致废物产生量增加，与减少废物的目标存在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业生产用于防护服（如化学防护服）或安全设备的产品，则可以间接帮助减少有害化学品和污染对健康的影响。但这不是该行业所有产品的核心功能，因此相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果生产过程中的废水处理不当，可能导致有害化学物质排入水体，最终可能汇入海洋，构成潜在的海洋污染源。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 社会教育是提供职业、技术培训和高等教育机会（尤其是非正规途径）的关键部分，直接促进全民终身学习机会的平等获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 社会教育的核心活动之一是提供职业技能培训，直接增加青年和成年人获得就业、体面工作和创业所需技能的数量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

rationale: 社会教育项目通常包括扫盲和基础文化算术教育，特别是针对失学青年和成人，有助于实现全民识字和计算能力目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all youth and a substantial proportion of adults, both men and women, achieve literacy and numeracy.

rationale: 社会教育是传播可持续发展教育（ESD）、全球公民教育和可持续生活方式知识的重要平台，面向广大社会成员。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles...

rationale: 通过提供创业培训、技能再培训和创新教育，社会教育支持创造体面工作和促进创业活动。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 社会教育为未就业、未受教育或未接受培训的青年（NEET群体）提供重要的教育和培训机会，帮助他们融入社会和经济生活。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.

rationale: 社会教育通过向边缘化和弱势群体（如低收入者、残疾人、少数民族、老年人）提供教育机会，促进社会、经济和政治包容。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 社会教育课程可以包含可持续消费、废物管理、环境保护等内容，提高公众对可持续发展生活方式的意识和信息获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature.

rationale: 社会教育是开展气候变化教育、提高公众意识和建设应对气候变化能力的重要渠道。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning.

rationale: 如果社会教育资源分配不均，例如优质课程费用高昂或地理位置偏远，可能加剧现有的社会不平等，使弱势群体更难获得赋能机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过商品分销支持经济活动，但其对生产力提升和技术升级的直接贡献有限，主要是间接支持。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业本身提供就业机会，并作为供应链环节支持零售业等中小微企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为物流和供应链网络的一部分，该行业支持商品流通这一经济基础设施的运作，但其不直接参与基础设施的开发和建设。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业批发大量一次性产品、过度包装产品或短寿命周期的日用品，会直接助长废物的产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。这是其核心业务可能带来的主要负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业有意识地推广和销售耐用、可重复使用、可回收或由再生材料制成的产品，则可以积极贡献于减少废物产生的目标。但这取决于其具体的产品组合和经营策略。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果交易的日用品（如某些清洁剂、涂料、电池）含有有害化学品，且其生命周期管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为供应商，该行业有可能通过向其商业客户（包括可能参与公共采购的实体）提供更可持续的产品选择，来间接支持可持续采购实践。但影响力较小且间接。
sdg_target_description: Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities

rationale: 工业树脂产品是许多行业（如汽车、电子、建筑）的关键部件，支持产业升级和可持续基础设施的构建，通过提供轻量化、耐用的材料有助于提高资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业直接创造就业机会，并通过生产高价值的工业中间产品贡献于经济增长和生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 树脂产品的制造严重依赖化石燃料等自然资源，如果未采用循环经济模式（如使用再生树脂），可能导致资源的低效利用和不可持续消耗。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 许多工业用树脂产品（尤其是热固性塑料或一次性工业包装）难以回收，其生命周期末期会产生大量持久性塑料废物，对实现废物减量目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料树脂制品如果管理不当，可能通过河流等途径进入海洋，成为海洋塑料垃圾的来源之一， contributing to marine debris pollution.
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 核燃料制造是核能技术产业链的关键环节，核能作为一种重要的低碳/清洁能源技术，其发展和应用得到该行业的支持，符合促进清洁能源技术和投资的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology

rationale: 核燃料制造为核能这一清洁能源技术提供核心原料，支持可持续能源基础设施（核电站）的建设和运行，是向可持续产业和基础设施转型的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 核能作为低碳能源选项，是许多国家应对气候变化战略的组成部分。核燃料制造是确保核能供应的基础，间接支持将气候行动纳入国家政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 核燃料制造过程涉及放射性物质，存在潜在的职业暴露风险。若发生事故或管理不善，可能导致放射性污染，对工人和周边社区居民的健康构成严重威胁，与减少有害物质引起的疾病和死亡的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 核燃料制造是核燃料循环的一部分，该循环产生高放射性废物，其安全、长期的处置是全球性挑战。实现这些废物的无害环境管理极其困难且成本高昂，对该目标构成重大挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 核燃料制造本身及其上游（铀矿开采尾矿）和下游（乏燃料）环节都会产生大量长寿命放射性废物，这些废物难以通过常规的减量、回收和再利用方法处理，与减少废物产生的目标存在根本性矛盾。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产鞋类材料贡献于经济和就业，属于劳动密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors)

rationale: 该行业是工业制造活动的一部分，有助于提高工业在就业和国内生产总值中的份额。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 传统皮革材料制造过程消耗大量水、能源和化学品（如鞣制剂），并且依赖动物皮革这一自然资源，其资源利用效率和管理往往不符合可持续性要求。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 皮革鞣制过程使用并可能释放有害化学品（如铬盐），其废水若处理不当会对环境和人类健康造成严重危害，与无害化环境管理化学品的子目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 生产过程中会产生固体废物（如皮革边角料、污泥）和废水，废物产生量较大，通常不符合废物减量化的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 皮革制造是水污染大户，其废水含有高浓度有机物、盐分和重金属，对水质构成严重威胁。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 未经妥善处理的工业废水最终可能流入海洋，造成海洋污染，属于需要防止的陆源污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution)

rationale: 皮革原料（牲畜养殖）可能涉及土地用途变化和生态系统压力，间接影响陆地生态系统的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 如果该批发商积极推行可持续采购政策，优先从实施负责任采矿实践的供应商处采购矿物，则能促进自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 作为矿物供应链的关键环节，如果其采购的矿物来自资源消耗过大、管理不善的采矿活动，则直接违背自然资源的可持续管理目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 矿物开采和初级加工是工业废物的主要来源之一。批发商作为该供应链的一部分，若其业务依赖于高浪费率的线性经济模式，则对减少废物产生有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 作为工业原材料（如金属矿石、工业矿物）的供应者，该行业是支持工业和制造业发展的基础，间接促进工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries.

rationale: 作为批发贸易业，它本身贡献于经济增长和就业，但其对生产力提升和技术升级的直接贡献相对间接和有限。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 如果批发的矿物（如某些可能产生粉尘或含有有毒物质的矿物）在其供应链的采矿、运输或使用环节处理不当，可能导致空气、水或土壤污染，对健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 矿物批发业务依赖于采矿业，而采矿是导致自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失的主要驱动因素之一。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 航空运输是实现国际和国内旅游的关键基础设施，通过促进人员流动直接支持可持续旅游业的发展，从而创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 航空运输网络是现代经济中高质量、可靠的基础设施的核心组成部分，对于支持经济发展、贸易和人员往来至关重要。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being)

rationale: 航空业是重要的温室气体排放源，其运营对气候变化有显著负面影响，突显了将减排措施（如采用更高效飞机和可持续航空燃料）纳入行业政策和规划的必要性。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 航空运营会产生大量废物，包括一次性塑料（如餐饮包装）、报废部件和消耗品。尽管行业在改进，但其运营模式本质上会产生显著的废物足迹。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 航空货运为易腐货物和高价值商品（如鲜花、电子产品）提供了快速运输通道，这对于发展中国家增加出口，特别是进入全球市场至关重要。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly increase the exports of developing countries...)

rationale: 航空业通过促进全球贸易、投资和商业活动，对国家和全球的经济增长做出直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances...)

rationale: 非铁金属压铸是制造业和工业化的重要组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，符合可持续工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过生产轻量化、高精度的金属部件（如用于汽车轻量化以提升燃油效率），支持下游产业提高资源使用效率和采用更清洁的技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 压铸工艺可以实现材料的近净成形，减少后续加工中的材料浪费，有助于资源的有效利用。其产品（如轻质部件）也有助于终端产品的资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 压铸过程可能产生废金属、废模具和熔炼过程中的排放物。如果废物管理不善，回收率不高，则会增加固体废物和工业废物的产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业提供就业机会。但其工作环境（高温、噪音）和技能要求需要评估是否完全符合‘体面工作’的所有标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业生产的轻量化部件（特别是铝合金件）被广泛应用于交通运输领域，有助于减轻重量、提高能效，从而间接支持减排和气候行动。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 同上，其产品（轻量化部件）对终端产品（如车辆、飞机）的能效提升有间接贡献。但该行业自身的能耗可能较高，存在负面影响的可能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 帽子制造作为快时尚或纺织业的一部分，通常采用线性生产模式，产生大量纺织品废料和边角料，对实现减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 帽子生产过程中的染色、防水处理等环节可能使用有害化学品，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业在全球范围内创造了制造业就业岗位，为经济增长和就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 特别是在供应链的低端，帽子制造业可能存在工作条件差、工资低、工时过长等问题，对保护劳工权利的目标构成风险。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 纺织染色和整理是水污染的主要来源之一，帽子制造若未采用清洁技术，其废水排放会负面影响水质。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 如果帽子制造商投资于可持续实践，如使用节水技术、清洁能源和可回收材料，则可以为产业升级和资源效率做出积极贡献。但这种贡献在当前行业常态下相关性有限。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes...)

rationale: 作为批发贸易行业，它提供了就业机会，为经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 如果该行业积极采购和推广由可持续资源（如有机棉、再生材料）制成的纱线，则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 如果其供应链中的纱线生产涉及不可持续的资源开采（如传统棉花种植的高水耗）或污染性化纤生产，则对该目标产生负面影响。批发商的选择对上游生产有导向作用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 纺织业是水污染的重要来源。如果批发商分销的纱线来自污染严重的生产过程（如染色、整理），则间接对水质量目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 传统纺织生产，特别是棉花种植，是高度耗水的。批发商支持的不可持续供应链会加剧水资源压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity)

rationale: 中古車卸売業は、自動車の再利用を促進し、その寿命を延ばすことで、廃車による廃棄物の発生を大幅に削減するという目標に直接貢献します。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: この業界は、中小企業を含む卸売業として、経済活動を支え、雇用を創出し、貿易を促進する開発志向の政策の対象となります。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 中古車の流通は、物流・サプライチェーンインフラに依存し、その発展を間接的に支援します。ただし、直接的なインフラ構築ではないため、関連性は中程度です。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 中古車は、新車に比べて手頃な価格で個人の移動手段を提供するため、『手頃な』交通手段へのアクセスという側面に貢献する可能性があります。ただし、『持続可能な』交通システムや公共交通の拡大という目標全体との整合性は低く、関連性は限定的です。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: エネルギー効率が低く、排出量の多い中古車の流通を促進することは、気候変動対策（例えば、クリーンな車両への移行を促進する政策）と矛盾する可能性があります。業界の慣行によって負の影響の度合いは異なります。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
