rationale: 虽然钢材本身可回收，但传统高炉炼钢过程会产生大量固体废物（如高炉渣）和排放。批发环节促进了这种高废物的初级生产模式的持续。此外，行业自身的运营（如包装材料）也可能产生废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁批发贸易作为支撑制造业和建筑业的基础，间接促进了整体经济生产力的提高。高效的供应链有助于下游产业的技术升级和创新。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 钢铁行业是全球主要的二氧化碳排放源之一。批发贸易活动通过维持和扩大钢铁市场的规模，间接支持了高碳排放的生产模式，与将气候变化措施纳入国家政策的目标相悖。除非积极转向低碳供应链，否则其影响是消极的。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业通过种植作物生产食物，是保障粮食安全和营养的基础，直接贡献于消除饥饿。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 种植农业是提高农业生产力和小农收入的主要途径，特别是特种作物可能带来更高的附加值。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment.

rationale: 如果'其他种植农业'包括种植传统或地方品种的作物，则有助于维护作物遗传多样性。但作为一般性类别，其贡献程度不确定。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, maintain the genetic diversity of seeds, cultivated plants and farmed and domesticated animals and their related wild species, including through soundly managed and diversified seed and plant banks at the national, regional and international levels, and promote access to and fair and equitable sharing of benefits arising from the utilization of genetic resources and associated traditional knowledge, as internationally agreed.

rationale: 不合理的耕作方式（如过度开垦、单一连作、过度使用农用化学品）可能导致土壤退化、肥力下降和荒漠化，对土地产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world.

rationale: 农业扩张可能侵占自然栖息地，单一化种植和农药使用可能减少生物多样性。但可持续农业实践可以减轻或逆转这种影响。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 传统农业可能低效利用水、土地等自然资源，并依赖不可持续的投入品。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 农业生产过程可能产生作物残留物、废弃包装物等，若处理不当会增加废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 农业是重要的经济部门，特种作物种植可能通过产品多样化和提高附加值来促进经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 种植农业是劳动密集型产业，为农村地区提供了大量就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 农业是甲烷和一氧化二氮等温室气体的重要排放源，对气候变化有负面影响。但通过改进实践可以转变为碳汇。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 测量和试验机是研发、质量控制和实现工业流程优化与现代化的基础工具，直接增强科学研究和技术能力，是产业创新和升级的关键使能技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 精确的测量仪器对于监控资源消耗（如能源、水、原材料）、优化生产流程以提高资源效率、以及实现自然资源的可持续管理至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业制造的检测设备用于监测化学品泄漏、废物排放以及空气、水和土壤的质量，是实现化学品和废物无害环境管理的关键工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的医疗检测和诊断设备（如血液分析仪、病原体检测仪）是加强疾病早期预警和健康风险管理系统的核心组成部分。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 水质监测和分析设备对于评估水质、检测污染物和确保废水处理效果至关重要，直接支持改善水质的努力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 测量和控制技术是实施清洁技术、优化工业流程和升级可持续基础设施不可或缺的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业自身的制造过程可能消耗能源和原材料，并产生工业废物（如电子废物、化学废料），这与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突，但其负面影响通常可以通过良好的生产实践来缓解，且远小于其产品带来的积极环境效益。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 电子计算机制造业是典型的技术升级和创新驱动型产业，直接贡献于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业是研发密集型产业，其发展直接依赖于并显著推动科学研究和技术创新能力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 电子设备制造过程涉及使用多种有害化学品，且产品生命周期结束时产生大量电子废物，若管理不善，会对环境和健康造成严重风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的产品更新换代快，导致大量电子废物产生，与减少废物产生的目标存在直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中若对有害化学物质管理不当，可能造成工作场所污染，影响工人健康，并可能通过废水、废气排放影响周边社区。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 电子设备制造是能源密集型产业，其生产过程中的高碳排放对气候变化有直接贡献，尽管其最终产品可能有助于节能减排，但制造环节的负面影响是直接的。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 汽车零售业是重要的商业活动，为当地创造大量就业岗位（如销售、管理、维修），并支持中小型企业的发展，符合促进生产性活动和体面工作的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为劳动密集型零售行业，它为实现全民充分生产和体面就业提供了机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 汽车是个人交通和物流系统的重要组成部分，其零售环节支持了交通基础设施的有效利用和可达性，尽管是间接贡献。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该零售业务积极推广和销售电动汽车（依赖电力，而电力可来自可再生能源），则对增加可再生能源份额有积极贡献。但考虑到行业名称本身不指定车辆类型，此贡献具有条件性，故得分中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 如果该零售业务主要销售传统燃油车，则会强化对化石燃料的依赖，阻碍向可再生能源的转型，产生显著的负面影响。此负面影响的可能性同样存在。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 如果推广销售高燃油效率或新能源汽车，有助于更高效地利用能源资源。但汽车制造本身消耗大量资源，零售环节的直接贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 汽车在其生命周期末期成为固体废物。汽车零售业推动的汽车销量增长，从长远看会增加报废车辆的数量，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 销售低碳排放车辆（如电动车）是响应国家气候战略（如碳中和）的具体市场行为，对气候行动有积极贡献。此贡献依赖于销售产品的性质。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 若持续大量销售高排放的传统燃油车，则与应对气候变化的政策和措施背道而驰，产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 私家车数量的增长可能加剧城市交通拥堵，与发展可持续公共交通系统的目标存在一定冲突，并对道路安全带来持续压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 汽车数量的增加是影响道路交通安全的一个重要因素。尽管零售环节不直接导致事故，但它是汽车保有量增长的推动力之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 通过加工畜产品（如蛋粉、动物油脂）增加食品供应的多样性和可获得性，为保障粮食安全做出贡献，但其作为加工环节而非初级生产，直接影响力有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 提供动物蛋白和脂肪等营养素，是均衡饮食的一部分，有助于预防营养不良。但过度消费某些加工畜产品可能增加非传染性疾病风险，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为食品制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过将初级畜产品转化为更高价值的产品，促进经济多元化、提高生产力并创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业的核心活动之一是有效利用牲畜屠宰后的副产品（如内脏、骨骼、血液）生产食品（如明胶、宠物食品），显著减少了整个畜牧业供应链中的食物损失和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 加工过程可能使用化学品（如防腐剂、清洗剂），并产生废水、废渣。如果管理不善，会导致有害物质排放，对环境和健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 负面影响：加工过程本身可能产生包装废物和工业废料。正面影响：如上所述，通过利用副产品减少食物浪费。此处综合评估为负面影响为主，因为作为制造环节，其固有的废物产生问题与目标相悖，尽管其副产品利用有正面作用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 该行业依赖于畜牧业，而畜牧业是甲烷等温室气体的重要排放源。其制造过程的能源消耗也贡献碳排放，对应对气候变化构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 对畜产品的需求是畜牧业扩张的驱动因素之一，可能间接导致土地用途改变（如毁林建牧场），从而加剧自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 作为专门为中小企业提供融资的政策性金融机构，其核心业务直接支持生产活动、创造体面工作，并鼓励中小企业的正规化和成长，通过提供金融服务实现这一目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该机构通过其政策性定位，加强了国内金融体系的能力，专门为中小企业这一传统上可能难以获得充分金融服务的关键群体提供银行和金融服务，促进了普惠金融。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 该机构的核心使命是增加中小企业（包括小型工业企业）获得金融服务和可负担信贷的机会，帮助它们融入价值链和市场，这与目标9.3高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 通过支持中小企业（这些企业是许多个人和家庭的重要收入来源），该机构间接地帮助确保人们，特别是经济上较脆弱的群体，能够获得金融服务和经济资源，从而减少贫困。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 虽然17.11直接针对发展中国家出口，但该机构作为国内政策性金融伙伴，通过支持具有出口潜力的国内中小企业加强产业基础和能力建设，间接为增强一国（此处为日本）的贸易能力和潜在的南南合作/发展合作基础做出贡献，体现了SDG 17的伙伴关系精神在国内层面的应用。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries’ share of global exports by 2020

rationale: 如果该机构的贷款审批标准未充分纳入严格的环境和社会风险评估，其融资可能无意中流向资源效率低下或污染严重的工业活动，从而潜在地增加废物产生，与目标12.5相悖。这是一种潜在的、间接的负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 简易宿所是旅游业的基础设施，通过提供可负担的住宿选择，促进旅游发展，从而创造就业机会并支持当地文化和产品。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 该行业是可持续旅游监测和管理的关键对象，其相对简约的运营模式可能天然具有较低的资源消耗倾向。
sdg_target_description: (Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 保持住宿环境的清洁卫生对于预防疾病在旅客间传播、管理公共卫生风险具有积极作用。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks)

rationale: 如果管理不规范，例如过度使用一次性洗漱用品、床品高频率清洗导致水耗过高，则会导致自然资源（水、原材料）的低效使用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 作为服务行业，尤其是提供短期住宿，容易产生大量生活垃圾和一次性塑料废弃物，若缺乏有效的废物分类、回收和减量措施，将对目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业可能存在非正式就业、低工资、长工时或不安全的工作环境等风险，尤其对于临时工或低技能员工，可能损害劳工权益。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 包装机械制造业是工业部门的重要组成部分，通过提供提高生产效率和自动化水平的设备，直接促进可持续的工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 先进的包装机械有助于产业升级，通过优化包装过程提高资源使用效率，并可以集成更环保的技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 高效的食品包装机械（如气调包装、真空包装）可以显著延长食品保质期，减少供应链中的粮食损失和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 通过制造能够实现精准包装、使用更少材料或便于回收材料（如单一材料包装）的机械，该行业有助于从源头上减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果制造的机械用于生产过度包装、一次性塑料包装或复杂复合材料包装（难以回收），则会增加废物产生，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 包装机械通过自动化和技术创新提高制造业的生产效率和经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 银行业通过向中小微企业提供贷款和金融服务，是其生存和发展的关键支持者，直接促进生产性活动、创造就业和创业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 银行作为核心金融机构，其存在和普惠金融服务的扩展（如基础银行账户、数字支付）是实现全民获得金融服务目标的核心。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 银行是大型基础设施项目（包括交通、能源、数字网络）的主要融资方，对建设可持续和有韧性的基础设施至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过提供信贷和其他金融服务，银行帮助小型企业融入价值链和市场，特别是在发展中国家。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 普惠金融服务（包括小额信贷）的提供，有助于确保贫困和弱势群体获得经济资源和金融服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 银行通过为可再生能源项目（如太阳能、风能）提供融资，直接促进可再生能源在全球能源结构中的份额提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 银行为工业升级、采用清洁技术和提高资源效率的项目提供资金支持。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过提供贸易融资和外汇服务，银行支持发展中国家的国际贸易和出口增长。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries’ share of global exports by 2020

rationale: 银行通过实施严格的“了解你的客户”（KYC）和反洗钱（AML）政策，有助于发现和减少腐败及贿赂行为。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 作为关键经济机构，银行自身的有效、负责和透明运营对建立可信赖的机构体系有贡献。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 如果银行持续为化石燃料开采和高碳排放项目提供大量融资，则会阻碍将气候变化措施纳入主流的努力，加剧气候变化。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 为导致毁林、土地退化的农业或采矿项目融资，会对森林保护和可持续管理产生严重的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 如果银行的贷款政策存在歧视（如“红线”政策），或未能有效服务弱势群体，则会加剧社会和经济排斥。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 类似10.2，不平等的金融服务获取机会和带有偏见的算法信贷评分等实践，会固化或加剧结果不平等。
sdg_target_description: Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard

rationale: 土方工程是建设交通、建筑等各类高质量、可靠、有韧性的基础设施不可或缺的基础阶段，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业是典型的劳动密集型产业，为大量工人（包括技能要求不同的劳动力）提供就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为住房和城市基础设施建设的上游环节，土方工程为实现人人获得适当、安全和负担得起的住房和基本服务提供了场地准备的基础。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 通过参与连接城乡地区的交通等基础设施项目，该行业间接支持城乡之间的积极联系。
sdg_target_description: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning

rationale: 如果该行业采用更可持续的施工方法（如水土保持措施、高效能设备、建筑废弃物管理），则可以贡献于基础设施和产业的可持续升级。但传统施工方式在此方面贡献有限，故相关性得分中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 土方工程涉及大规模的土地开挖和土石方搬运，可能造成土壤资源的破坏和浪费，若管理不善则与自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 施工过程可能产生大量开挖废土和建筑垃圾，如果缺乏有效的减量化、回收和再利用措施，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 土地开发活动可能破坏地表植被、改变地形水文，对陆地生态系统及其服务功能（如水土保持）造成直接负面影响，威胁生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services

rationale: 不合理的土方工程可能导致水土流失和土地退化，与防治荒漠化、恢复退化土地和实现土地退化零增长的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 该行业在染色和洗涤过程中使用化学品并产生工业废水，如果废水处理不当，会直接导致水体污染，与改善水质的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 如果该行业采用节水型洗涤和染色技术、水循环系统，则可以积极贡献于提高用水效率。但这是潜在贡献，并非行业固有属性，故得分中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 作为服务业，洗张染物业直接提供了就业机会，特别是可能包含许多中小微企业，符合支持生产性活动和创造就业的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业为不同技能水平的劳动者提供就业机会，有助于实现充分就业。但工作环境（如接触化学品）和薪酬水平是否“体面”取决于具体管理，故给予中等评分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 染色过程通常涉及使用各种染料和助剂，若对这些化学品管理不善（如不当储存、处理、排放），会对环境和健康造成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业可能产生废水、废弃化学品容器、废布料等固体废物。传统的运营方式会增加废物产生，与减废目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业中的领先企业将更环保的洗涤和染色技术（如节水、低毒染料）推广或转移到发展中国家，可以产生积极影响。但这是间接且非核心的影响，相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production

rationale: 工人在处理染料和化学品时，如果缺乏适当的防护措施和安全管理，可能面临健康风险，这与减少化学品相关疾病的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 含有残留染料和化学品的废水如果排入水体并最终流入海洋，会成为海洋污染源之一。这是一种潜在的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 榻榻米制造的核心原材料（蔺草）是可再生自然资源。如果采用可持续的种植和采购实践，该行业可以直接促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 榻榻米制造通常属于中小型企业或手工作坊，该行业的存在支持了地方性的生产活动、创造就业（尤其是传统工艺岗位）和中小企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises)

rationale: 榻榻米是日本传统文化的象征之一。其制造和销售与文化遗产旅游和推广本地文化产品相关联，间接支持可持续旅游业。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 作为典型的小规模制造业，该行业的发展有赖于获得金融服务并融入更广泛的市场和价值链。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets)

rationale: 蔺草田的可持续管理有助于维持特定的农业生态系统。但该目标已过2020年时限，且关联性较间接，故得分较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 如果蔺草种植过度依赖化肥农药或导致 monoculture（单一栽培），或者制造过程资源效率低下，则可能对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 在蔺草种植过程中可能使用农药，以及在榻榻米制造过程中可能使用粘合剂等化学品，若管理不当，可能对环境造成危害。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 榻榻米作为耐用消费品，使用寿命结束后，其植物纤维部分可能难以回收，通常被焚烧或填埋，从而产生固体废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 软件业是典型的高附加值和技术密集型产业，通过创新和技术升级直接驱动经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 软件业创业门槛相对较低，极大地支持了中小企业的发展和创新活动，创造了大量知识型就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 软件是构建现代数字基础设施（如互联网平台、云计算服务）的核心组成部分，对经济和社会发展至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 软件业本身是研发密集型行业，其技术进步和创新是提升各产业部门技术能力的关键驱动力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 软件业不仅创造了对数字技能的需求，其产品（如在线学习平台、编程工具）也直接促进了相关技能的普及和提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 软件解决方案（如智能电网、供应链优化系统）可以帮助其他行业更有效地管理和利用自然资源，但其直接影响是间接的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 在某些情况下，软件业可能存在高强度工作、加班文化或工作不稳定性等问题，对保障劳工权利和安全工作环境构成潜在挑战，但并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业生产特种玻璃（如建筑节能玻璃、技术玻璃、光纤等），这些是建设可持续基础设施和改造产业所需的关键材料和环境友好型技术组件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 玻璃作为一种高度可回收的材料，其制品支持资源的循环利用。生产耐用玻璃产品有助于自然资源的可持续管理，但效率取决于回收体系的完善程度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 玻璃制造过程（特别是熔炼和某些特种玻璃生产）可能使用和排放有害化学品（如铅、砷等），若管理不当，会对环境和人类健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 尽管玻璃可回收，但制造过程本身会产生工业废料（如不合格品、切割废料），且消费后的玻璃制品若未被有效回收，会增加固体废物量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 玻璃制造业是能源密集型产业，其生产过程中的化石燃料消耗直接产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响，需要纳入气候政策进行管理和减排。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产多样化的特种玻璃产品和技术创新，为经济增长和生产率提升做出贡献，但其影响程度取决于具体产品的附加值。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 如果该行业生产用于医疗、实验室或水净化等领域的玻璃器皿，则间接有助于减少污染相关疾病。但此贡献具有条件性，并非所有产品都直接相关。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 玻璃制造业存在高温、粉尘、机械操作等职业危害，如果工作场所安全措施不足，可能对工人的健康和安全构成威胁，与促进安全工作环境的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 事业协同组合通过为中小企业和个体经营者提供集体支持、资源共享和风险分担机制，增强了这些经济上可能处于弱势地位的成员的韧性，帮助他们抵御经济冲击。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

rationale: 事业协同组合是支持中小微企业发展和正规化的典型模式，通过提供联合采购、销售、融资和市场准入等服务，直接促进生产性活动、创业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 协同组合通过集体行动，帮助其成员中小企业获得金融服务、进入价值链和市场，这与目标9.3高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 协同组合的民主管理和成员导向原则有助于促进经济包容，赋予中小企业和个体经营者权力，减少他们在市场中的不平等地位。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 协同组合可以引导其成员采纳更可持续的集体实践（如环保采购），并促进中小企业之间的可持续性信息共享，尽管其影响力通常小于大型跨国公司。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle.

rationale: 信息记录介质是数字和数据基础设施的基本组成部分，支持可靠的数据存储和访问，对经济和社会发展至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业可以通过改进制造工艺、提高资源效率和采用更环保的技术来贡献于可持续产业升级，但其核心产品本身并非直接的清洁技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 信息存储技术的进步（如更高容量的SSD）依赖于持续的研发和创新，该行业是技术能力提升的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 信息记录介质的制造可能涉及有害化学品的使用（如电子元件中的重金属），其生命周期结束时的电子废物如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产的一次性或多代更迭迅速的物理介质（如光盘、旧型号硬盘）可能导致大量的电子废物，与废物减量化的目标相悖，尽管回收努力可以缓解部分影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它通过技术升级和创新（如从HDD到SSD的转变）贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 信息记录介质是存储和传播教育材料、培训课程和软件的载体，间接支持技能培养，但关联性较间接，因为数字分发已成为更主流的方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业是制造业的关键部分，专门生产工业机械，直接促进可持续工业化和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业涉及机械制造的技术开发和创新，可以支持产业升级，尽管其全球相关性可能因地区而异。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 制造先进的印刷和装订机械有助于提高相关产业的生产效率和技术升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，但需注意工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果制造的机械旨在提高资源效率（如减少墨水或纸张浪费），则可做出积极贡献，但这并非该行业的核心焦点。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 传统印刷机械的使用可能涉及有害化学品（如挥发性有机化合物、油墨中的重金属）和废物产生，如果未加管理，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业通过生产用于制造教科书和学习材料的机械，间接支持教育设施的供应，但关联性较为间接。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all

rationale: 酒精制造是‘有害使用酒精’的物质来源，是该子目标旨在预防和应对的主要问题之一，存在显著的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，酒类制造通过加工农产品增加附加值，并创造就业，有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业包含大量中小型企业，其发展支持体面就业和创业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 酒类制造需要消耗大量水资源和农产品（如谷物、葡萄），可能对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中产生的废水（如酿酒废水有机物含量高）和废弃物如果处理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 行业会产生包装废弃物（如玻璃瓶、铝罐）和生产副产品，需要努力减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 酒类制造为种植酿酒作物（如大麦、葡萄、大米）的农业生产者提供了重要的市场，可以支持其收入。但需注意与粮食安全的潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...

rationale: 非铁合金轧制是制造业和工业化的基础环节，为各种下游产业（如建筑、交通、电子）提供关键材料，直接贡献于工业产值和就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过采用先进的轧制技术和效率提升（如节能工艺），可以贡献于产业升级和资源效率提高，但其正面影响程度高度依赖于具体企业的技术水平和环境管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 非铁合金轧制是资源密集型产业，大量消耗矿石、能源和水资源，若管理不善，会对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 轧制过程可能产生金属废料、废水和废气，如果废物管理和回收措施不到位，会增加废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过技术升级和生产优化，可以提升经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，贡献于就业目标，但需确保工作环境安全、薪酬公平等体面劳动条件才能实现完全正面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 非铁金属生产（尤其是原铝生产）是能源密集型和高排放过程，若依赖化石燃料，会显著增加温室气体排放，对将气候变化措施纳入国家政策构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 煤炭批发贸易维持并强化了化石燃料在能源结构中的主导地位，阻碍了向可再生能源的转型，与增加可再生能源比例的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 尽管不直接涉及能效，但该行业支持的煤炭能源系统整体效率通常低于更现代化的能源系统，间接不利于全球能效提升的总体目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为高碳排放能源的供应链关键环节，该行业的存在和运营与国家层面减少化石燃料依赖、整合气候变化措施的政策方向相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 煤炭燃烧是空气污染（特别是细颗粒物）的主要来源，该行业的活动通过促进煤炭消费，间接导致了与空气污染相关的疾病和死亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为能源供应链的一部分，煤炭批发行业提供了就业机会（如物流、销售、管理），对局部经济和就业有直接的、但不可持续的正面贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 煤炭是不可再生资源，其批发贸易支持了对这种资源的持续大规模消耗，不符合自然资源可持续管理和高效利用的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和就业为工业化做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该行业采用资源效率高、环境友好的生产技术（如低能耗窑炉、无害釉料），则可贡献于此目标。但作为传统制造业，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 制造过程中使用的釉料可能含有有害化学品（如重金属），其生产、废物处理若管理不当，可能对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程可能产生工业废料、次品和废水，如果未有效管理，则与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 搪瓷铁器通常比一次性产品或易损品更耐用、可长期使用，从产品生命周期看有助于减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业，该行业提供就业机会，但其工作环境（如高温、接触化学品）需要符合体面工作标准才能成为积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 搪瓷器皿易于清洁，有助于保持厨房卫生，间接减少食源性疾病风险。如果釉料安全无害，产品本身是健康的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果该行业生产储水罐或水箱等产品，且其搪瓷涂层能安全地储存饮用水，则可间接贡献于此目标。相关性取决于具体产品类型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all

rationale: 作为基础材料制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产各种工业用窑业土石制品（如耐火材料、特种陶瓷），为其他工业部门提供关键投入，直接促进工业化和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造活动贡献于经济生产力。其发展可能涉及生产工艺的技术升级和创新，特别是向高性能、高附加值产品发展时。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该制造业活动提供就业机会。但其'体面工作'方面可能因工作环境（高温、粉尘）而面临挑战，整体贡献是正面的，但需注意工作条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业大量消耗粘土、硅石等不可再生矿物资源，若开采和生产过程缺乏可持续管理，会对自然资源基础造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用或产生有害化学品（如某些釉料、粘结剂中的重金属），窑炉排放可能含有颗粒物、氟化物等污染物。废品、废渣的处理若不当，会对环境造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程会产生废品、废料和粉尘等固体废物。除非积极实施废物减量、回收和再利用措施，否则该行业是废物的产生源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 窑炉高温烧成过程通常需要消耗大量能源（通常是化石燃料），是二氧化碳等温室气体的重要排放源，对气候变化有显著负面影响，除非采用清洁能源和节能技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 工人在生产过程中可能暴露于硅尘、重金属等有害物质，以及高温环境，存在职业健康风险。若排放控制不力，也可能对周边社区的空气和土壤质量造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 旅行社行业是旅游经济的核心，直接通过组织旅行活动创造就业机会（如导游、酒店员工、交通服务），并促进当地文化和产品的消费，是实现该目标的关键推动力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 负责任的旅行社可以采纳和实施可持续旅游监测工具（如碳足迹计算、生态认证），以评估和改善其运营对环境和社会的积极影响。
sdg_target_description: (Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 旅游业通过将游客引导至文化遗产地和自然景点，为其带来经济价值，从而激励当地社区和政府加强对这些遗产的保护和修缮努力。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 国际旅游可以促进不同文化背景人们的交流，并为发展中国家的经济提供重要收入来源，有助于减少国家间的不平等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status)

rationale: 如果管理不善，大众旅游可能导致目的地资源过度消耗（如水、能源）、环境污染和废物增加，凸显了对有效监测工具的迫切需求，也反映了行业潜在的不可持续性。
sdg_target_description: (Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 旅游业，特别是依赖航空和公路运输的旅行套餐，是温室气体排放的重要来源，对气候变化有显著负面影响，这与将气候行动纳入政策的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 餐厅直接提供餐食，是保障人们（尤其是城市居民和上班族）获得安全、营养食物的重要渠道，特别是提供价格合理的餐食有助于解决粮食获取问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 通过提供营养均衡、低盐低脂的健康餐食选择，有助于预防与饮食相关的非传染性疾病，促进顾客的健康福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 餐饮业是主要的就业创造者，为不同技能水平的劳动者（包括女性和青年）提供大量工作岗位，对实现充分就业至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 専門料理店（特色餐厅）通过提供地方特色美食，吸引游客，促进可持续旅游业发展，并支持当地文化和农产品。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products.

rationale: 餐厅通过精准采购、库存管理和减少餐盘浪费等措施，可以在零售和消费环节直接贡献于减少食物浪费的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 通过实施厨余垃圾堆肥、回收包装材料等措施，餐厅可以积极减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 如果缺乏有效的废物管理，餐厅运营会产生大量食物垃圾、一次性塑料包装等，增加环境负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 烹饪产生的废油、清洁使用的化学品若处理不当，可能对水体和土壤造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 餐厅的能源消耗（燃气、电力）和食品供应链中的运输环节会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有负面影响。此目标虽为国家政策层面，但行业活动是其源头之一。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 织物批发业作为纺织产业链中的关键分销环节，通过高效的物流和供应链管理，促进了纺织品的流通和市场效率，对整体经济生产力有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 如果该批发商有意识地采购和推广由可持续管理资源（如有机棉、再生纤维）制成的织物，则能通过市场选择间接推动上游生产的可持续性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果该批发商主要经营传统方式生产的织物（其生产通常耗水多、大量使用化肥农药），则其商业活动间接支持和延续了不可持续的资源利用模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 批发活动本身会产生包装废弃物（如塑料膜、纸箱）。此外，其所处行业（时尚/纺织品）以快速消费和大量废弃物（包括生产废料和消费后废弃）著称，批发环节是推动这一线性经济模式的一部分。

sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为基础制造业的一部分，该行业通过提供工业产品和创造产值，直接促进工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但对'体面工作'的贡献取决于实际的工作条件、安全标准和薪酬水平。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生金属废料、切削液、包装废物等，若废物管理和回收措施不足，则不利于减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用化学品（如酸洗液、镀层材料）并产生粉尘或排放，存在潜在的职业健康风险和环境污染物排放风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 维修是'再利用'和'预防废物'的关键策略。通过修复物品使其重新投入使用，该行业直接减少了最终被丢弃的废物量，促进了循环经济。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通常由中小型企业、工匠和个体经营者构成，为本地社区创造和维持体面的就业机会，并支持创业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 维修活动通过延长现有产品和资产的生命周期，提高了资源利用效率，这符合使产业更可持续的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过减少对新制造产品的需求，维修服务有助于更可持续地管理自然资源，减少原材料开采和相关的环境压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 潜在的轻微负面影响：某些维修过程（如电子设备维修中的焊料、清洁剂使用，或电池更换）如果管理不当，可能产生有害废物。但这并非行业核心，且良好实践可以缓解。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 看板和标识是基础设施（如交通系统、公共建筑）不可或缺的组成部分，它们提供关键信息，确保基础设施的功能性、安全性和可及性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 交通标志和标识是确保道路安全、引导公共交通使用者、满足不同人群（包括残障人士）出行需求的核心要素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 清晰、符合标准的交通警告标志、指示牌能有效预防交通事故，减少伤亡，直接贡献于道路安全目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和创新（如开发智能标识、节能标识）贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业的制造技术和产品创新（例如，使用可持续材料或集成数字技术）可以支持更广泛的技术发展和产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 制造过程可能消耗金属、塑料、能源等资源。如果未采用可持续实践（如使用原生材料而非再生材料），会对自然资源管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中的废料（如金属边角料、化学废料）以及产品生命周期结束后的废弃标识牌（尤其是非可回收材料制成的），如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 政府系金融机构可以通过提供针对贫困和弱势群体的普惠金融产品（如小额信贷、创业贷款），作为社会保障措施的一部分，帮助实现经济包容。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable

rationale: 为中小微企业提供融资和金融服务是该类机构的核心职能之一，直接支持生产性活动、创业和体面工作的创造。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为国内金融机构，其存在和运作旨在扩大金融服务覆盖面，特别是服务于传统商业银行可能忽略的领域，促进普惠金融。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 通过提供可负担的信货，支持中小型企业（包括在国内外）融入价值链和市场，是其政策使命的关键部分。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 通过支持地区发展和针对弱势群体的金融项目，可以间接促进收入最低的40%人口的收入增长，但其影响是间接的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, progressively achieve and sustain income growth of the bottom 40 per cent of the population at a rate higher than the national average

rationale: 作为政府财政体系的一部分，该类机构可以参与官方发展援助(ODA)或与发展中国家的金融合作项目，为发展中国家动员资源，但并非其主要或唯一职能。
sdg_target_description: Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources

rationale: 如果其融资项目未充分考虑环境和社会标准，可能间接支持不可持续的生产或消费模式。但作为政府机构，通常有政策约束，因此负面影响风险相对较低。
sdg_target_description: Implement the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries

rationale: 如果其投资组合中包含高碳排放项目（如某些传统基础设施），且未进行气候风险评估或调整，则可能对气候行动产生负面影响。同样，由于其政策属性，此风险通常被管理。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 染色整理业是工业废水的主要产生者，通常含有未完全处理的染料、重金属和其他有害化学物质，直接排放会导致严重的水体污染，与改善水质和减少有害物质释放的目标严重冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业在生产中大量使用各种化学品（如染料、助剂），若管理不善，会导致这些物质对环境和工人健康造成负面影响，难以实现化学品的无害环境管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 工人可能暴露于有害化学品中，周边社区可能受到其废水、废气排放造成的污染影响，增加健康风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 传统染色整理过程是水和能源密集型产业，资源消耗大，若未采用高效技术和循环实践，则不利于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程会产生大量废水、化学污泥和固体废物，若缺乏有效的废物预防、回收和再利用措施，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业并可通过技术升级（如采用环保染色技术）提升生产效率和产品附加值，对经济增长有微弱正面贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为工业价值链的一环，该行业对工业化有贡献，但其可持续性受到其环境影响的严重制约，正面相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过高效的物流和供应链管理支持建筑和制造业的生产活动，间接贡献于经济生产力的提升，但其本身是辅助性行业，直接影响较小。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 平板玻璃是建筑和基础设施（如商业建筑、公共设施）的关键材料。批发环节确保了这一重要建筑材料的稳定供应，间接支持可持续基础设施的发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过供应建筑用玻璃，该行业间接支持住房建设。但其贡献是供应链中的一环，且玻璃并非住房的基本必需品，相关性相对较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services

rationale: 如果该行业批发节能玻璃（如Low-E玻璃），则间接促进建筑领域的资源（能源）高效利用。但这取决于其销售的具体产品类型。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 批发活动涉及产品包装（如保护玻璃的木材、塑料）和物流运输，可能产生大量废弃物和碳排放。如果未采取有效的废物管理和绿色物流措施，则对减少废物产生有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的物流运输严重依赖化石燃料，其运营在某种程度上依赖于现有的化石燃料基础设施和可能存在的间接补贴，与鼓励可持续消费和生产模式的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: Rationalize inefficient fossil-fuel subsidies that encourage wasteful consumption...

rationale: 铝材是轻量化、可持续建筑和交通解决方案（如节能建筑幕墙、轻量化汽车以降低油耗）的关键材料，对升级可持续基础设施和产业至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 铝轧制行业持续进行工艺创新（如开发高性能合金、提高轧制精度和效率），有助于提升工业部门的技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 原生铝生产依赖铝土矿开采，资源消耗量大，且电解过程能耗极高，对自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 铝具有极高的可回收性。该行业通过回收废铝进行再轧制，显著减少了废物产生和原生资源消耗，是循环经济的典范。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为基础材料制造业，铝轧制通过技术升级和生产高附加值铝产品，贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 制造业环境存在潜在的职业健康与安全风险（如机械操作、高温环境），需要严格管理以符合该子目标的要求，否则可能产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 铝生产是碳排放密集型产业。如果能源结构以化石燃料为主，其高碳排放与气候变化应对目标严重冲突，突显了将该行业纳入气候政策监管和转型规划的必要性。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 铝轧制是能源密集型过程。尽管可以通过技术提高能效，但其固有的高能耗特性对实现全球能效改善速率翻倍的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 通过提供经过处理和包装的安全饮用水，该行业有助于减少因饮用水污染导致的疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 许多清凉饮料（尤其是含糖碳酸饮料和果汁）的高糖分摄入与肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险增加有关，这与预防非传染性疾病的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 制造过程中的废水如果处理不当，可能含有有机物、糖分、清洁化学品等，对水体造成污染风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 该行业是水资源密集型产业，大量消耗淡水用于生产和清洁，在水资源紧张地区可能加剧水资源短缺问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity.

rationale: 生产过程中对水、农产品（如甘蔗、水果用于制糖和果汁）等自然资源的需求量大，若管理不善则不符合可持续利用的原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 生产过程中使用的清洁剂、包装材料中的化学物质以及废水处理需要妥善管理，否则存在环境风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 该行业大量使用一次性塑料瓶、铝罐、纸盒等包装材料，是固体废物（尤其是塑料污染）的主要贡献者之一，与减少废物产生的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 该行业内的公司有潜力通过采用节水技术、使用可再生材料包装、进行可持续采购等措施来展示其可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它通过规模化生产、产品创新（如健康饮品）和技术升级贡献于经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业创造了从生产到分销等多个环节的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 如果该批发商优先采购和推广来自可持续管理森林（如FSC/PEFC认证）的纸制品，则对自然资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 如果该批发商主要分销来自不可持续来源（如非法采伐或导致森林退化）的纸制品，则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 批发活动本身可能产生包装废弃物（如塑料缠绕膜、纸箱过度包装），且如果其分销的产品生命周期结束时难以回收，间接增加了废物产生风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 作为批发贸易行业，它通过高效的物流和供应链管理促进经济活动，有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 纸制品批发依赖于交通和物流基础设施，其高效运作支持了经济基础设施的利用和发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being...

rationale: 通过采购和推广可持续来源的纸制品，该行业可以鼓励对森林的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests...

rationale: 如果其供应链依赖于不可持续的木材来源，则会助长森林退化，与可持续森林管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests...

rationale: 批发活动的运输过程（尤其是长途公路运输）会产生温室气体排放，对气候变化有轻微负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 模具制造业是工业化的重要组成部分，其发展直接支撑和促进整体工业产能的提升和可持续发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 许多模具制造企业属于中小企业，其发展间接依赖于融资渠道和价值链整合，但关联性不如对工业产能的直接贡献那么强。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 精密模具是实现高效、低耗、高质量生产的关键工具，对产业升级、提高资源效率和应用清洁生产技术至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 模具制造业本身具有技术含量，其发展通过技术创新提升经济生产率，并支撑下游众多产业的生产效率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业创造就业机会（尤其是技术岗位），并且包含大量中小企业，其发展符合促进生产性活动和中小企业增长的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 精密模具可以减少生产过程中的材料浪费，间接促进自然资源的更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 模具制造过程（如金属切削、热处理、表面处理）可能使用化学品并产生危险废物（如废切削液、废油、重金属污泥），若管理不当会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 积极方面：高质量的模具通过提高产品合格率和材料利用率，从源头上减少下游生产的浪费。消极方面：模具制造本身会产生金属废料等工业固体废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 模具制造是技术密集型行业，需要具备专业技能的工人（如数控编程、钳工），从而推动相关职业技术教育和培训的发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业生产的金属制品（如结构钢、钢筋）是建设高质量、可靠、有韧性的交通、建筑等基础设施的核心材料。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业本身可以通过采用资源效率更高、更清洁的生产技术来实现产业升级，其产品（如节能建筑所需的金属构件）也支持其他基础设施和产业的可持续改造。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 建筑用金属制品是建造安全、坚固的住房和建筑物（如学校、医院）的关键材料，有助于改善居住条件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 该行业生产的金属产品（如桥梁钢结构、交通标志支架）是构建可持续交通基础设施的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和创新直接贡献于经济增长和生产力提升，并提供就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 金属制造，特别是原生金属的生产，通常需要开采大量矿产资源并消耗大量能源，若管理不善会导致自然资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生工业废料、废水和废气。如果废物管理和循环利用措施不到位，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 钢铁等金属生产是能源密集型产业，是工业领域温室气体排放的主要来源之一，对气候变化有显著负面影响，除非广泛采用低碳技术和清洁能源。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 生产过程中可能使用有害化学品，并产生空气污染物（如粉尘、挥发性有机物）和水污染物，如果控制不当，会对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 各种橡胶制品（如密封件、减震部件）是机械、车辆和基础设施的关键组成部分，提高其耐用性和效率有助于实现产业的可持续升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和创新为提高经济生产力做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但对'体面工作'的贡献程度取决于具体的工作条件和安全标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 部分橡胶制品（如医用导管、手套）是医疗保健领域的必需品，间接支持全民健康覆盖。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 橡胶制造过程可能涉及有害化学品的使用和不善的废物管理，导致空气、水和土壤污染，与无害化环境管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 橡胶制品，尤其是使用寿命结束后，往往成为难以降解的固体废物，若回收体系不完善，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 合成橡胶的生产严重依赖石油化工原料，是碳排放密集型产业，对气候变化有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 证券业通过为企业提供股权和债务融资，支持资本形成和商业扩张，是维持经济增长的关键驱动力。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 通过承销和交易活动，证券业为中小企业和创新公司提供融资渠道，支持创业和正式就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 证券业通常服务于机构和高净值客户，若缺乏普惠金融措施，可能加剧个人和小企业获取金融服务的壁垒。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 证券市场的多层次发展（如创业板）为中小企业提供了直接融资平台，促进其融入更广泛的市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 证券业的复杂金融产品和高频交易若监管不力，可能引发系统性风险，挑战金融市场的稳定和公平监管。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 通过发行绿色债券和进行ESG（环境、社会、治理）投资，证券业可以引导资本流向气候友好项目，推动气候行动主流化。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 若证券业大量投资于化石燃料等高碳行业，则会阻碍向低碳经济的转型，对气候行动产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 证券业存在内幕交易、市场操纵等风险，若治理不善，会助长腐败行为，削弱机构诚信。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 一般診療所提供产前检查、分娩服务和产后护理，直接有助于降低孕产妇死亡率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births

rationale: 提供儿童疫苗接种、常见病治疗和健康监测，是预防新生儿和五岁以下儿童死亡的关键一环。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age...

rationale: 作为一线医疗机构，负责传染病的筛查、诊断、报告和基础治疗，是抗击流行病网络的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 一般診療所是慢性非传染性疾病（如高血压、糖尿病）管理和心理健康问题初步诊断与转诊的主要场所，对降低过早死亡率至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 一般診療所是实现全民健康覆盖的基石，它提供了可及、优质的基本医疗服务，是社区医疗服务的核心提供者。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 通过为社区所有成员提供基础医疗服务，有助于促进社会包容，减少因经济或社会地位差异导致的健康不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 诊所运营会产生医疗废物（如针头、感染性废物、过期药品），如果处理不当，会对环境和人类健康构成风险，与无害化环境管理化学品和废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 医疗活动不可避免地会产生一次性医疗用品等废弃物，若未积极采取预防、减量、回收措施，则与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业作为运输服务提供者，直接创造司机、调度员、维护人员等就业岗位，为达成充分和生产性就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 特定旅客汽车运输（如通勤班车、包车服务）提供了公共交通工具之外的补充性、灵活的集体运输选项，有助于改善特定人群（如企业员工、游客）的交通可达性，是多元化可持续交通系统的一部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons)

rationale: 专业的商业运输司机通常接受过更严格的培训，且集体运输可能减少道路上私家车的数量，从而对提高整体道路安全有潜在的轻微积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents)

rationale: 如果运营车辆使用化石燃料（柴油、汽油），其尾气排放（如颗粒物、氮氧化物）会加剧空气污染，导致呼吸系统疾病，对该目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 该行业运营的燃油车辆是二氧化碳等温室气体的直接排放源，直接加剧气候变化，与将气候措施纳入各层面规划的目标相悖。其负面影响的程度取决于车队规模、车辆效率和燃料类型。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 车辆运营会产生废旧轮胎、废机油、报废车辆等固体废物，若管理不当，会增加废物产生量，对该目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 自然科学研究所是进行科学研究和技术研发的核心机构，其活动直接增强科学研究和提升产业技术能力，是创新的基础驱动力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 许多自然科学研究所隶属于大学或与高等教育机构紧密合作，为研究生和研究人员提供高质量的教育和培训机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: 研究所在培养科学家、工程师和技术人员方面发挥关键作用，增加具备研究和创新技能的人才数量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 生物学和医学领域的研究所通过疾病机理研究、药物和疫苗开发，直接为抗击传染病做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
