rationale: 地球科学、环境科学和气候研究是研究所的重要领域，其研究成果是气候变化教育、意识提升和预警系统的基础。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

rationale: 相关科学研究（如地质学、气象学、生态学）有助于更好地理解和预测自然灾害，从而增强抵御和适应能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries

rationale: 物理学、化学和材料科学研究所进行的能源相关研究（如新能源材料、储能技术）是清洁能源技术进步的关键。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology

rationale: 研究所的实验室活动可能使用和产生有害化学品及废弃物，如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 研究活动可能消耗大量一次性实验材料（如塑料制品）和能源，产生固体废物，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 电信工程业是建设和维护高质量、可靠、可持续的数字基础设施的核心活动，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉，是实现普遍接入的关键。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过扩展网络覆盖和提升网络质量，直接增加信息通信技术的普及度，特别是在服务不足的地区。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 电信基础设施是实现各行业技术升级、提高生产力的基础。同时，该行业本身是技术性和劳动密集型产业，创造就业并推动经济多元化。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 可靠的互联网接入是在线教育、技能培训和获取信息的前提，有助于提升青年和成人的相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 强大的电信网络对于医疗数据的快速传输、远程医疗以及公共卫生预警系统的有效运行至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 电信工程建设（如电缆铺设、设备更新）会产生建筑垃圾和电子废物（e-waste），如果管理不当，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通信塔的建设和地下电缆的铺设可能导致土地清理、土壤扰动和栖息地碎片化，对陆地生态系统构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 该行业开采的矿物（如石灰石用于水泥，硅砂用于玻璃）是建设和升级可持续基础设施、工业厂房所必需的基础原材料。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 采矿业是劳动密集型产业，能在资源丰富的地区创造就业机会，但需要评估其工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 矿物开采本质上是不可再生资源的消耗，如果管理不善，会导致资源枯竭和低效利用，与可持续资源管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 露天开采等活动会直接导致土地退化、土壤侵蚀和栖息地破坏，对实现土地退化零增长的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 作为制造业，该行业提供了就业机会。但其对体面工作的贡献程度取决于具体的劳工实践、工资和福利，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 制造业普遍需要关注工作场所安全。但其具体贡献取决于工厂条件，存在不确定性，故给予中等偏低分数。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业是工业部门的一部分，对经济增长和就业有贡献。但其对'可持续性'的贡献取决于具体实践，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果行业采用可持续采购的原材料（如认证皮革、再生材料），则可积极贡献。但传统制造模式可能不优先考虑资源效率，因此相关性为中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 包袋制造过程中的边角料、有缺陷的产品以及产品寿命结束后产生的废弃物，如果不进行有效的废物管理和回收，会对该子目标产生显著的负面影响。快时尚趋势加剧了这一问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果行业积极实施废物减量、回收材料使用和产品耐用性设计，则可对该子目标产生积极影响。但这通常不是行业默认模式，故相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 活塞环制造是工业供应链中的关键一环，直接支持了交通运输设备制造业的发展，促进了工业化和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业直接创造了就业机会，为工人（尽管需要评估具体工作条件）提供收入来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 活塞环的制造过程（如金属铸造、机加工、表面处理）可能涉及化学品的使用和金属废料的产生，如果管理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 高性能活塞环通过减少内燃机内部的摩擦和泄漏，有助于提高发动机的能源效率，从而在微观层面上对提升能源效率有微弱贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 该行业的核心产品服务于以化石燃料为主的内燃机系统，从系统层面看，它延续了对高碳排技术的依赖，与向低碳经济转型的气候行动目标存在根本性冲突。其微弱的能效提升贡献远不足以抵消其对高碳基础设施的锁定效应。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业的核心活动是零售烟草制品，直接增加了烟草产品的可获得性和便利性，与WHO《烟草控制框架公约》旨在通过减少需求和供应来遏制烟草流行的目标背道而驰，对公共健康产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate

rationale: 烟草使用是心血管疾病、癌症、慢性呼吸道疾病等非传染性疾病的主要风险因素。零售烟草制品促进了这些疾病的根源之一，从而阻碍了降低过早死亡率的进程。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 烟草制品（如烟头）是环境中常见的废弃物，难以降解且含有有害物质。零售这些产品间接促进了此类废弃物的产生，尽管零售环节本身不直接产生大量废物，但其销售的产品生命周期末端对环境有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动创造就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 纺织和杂项制造业历史上可能存在劳动条件、工人安全（如接触化学品）和劳工权利方面的挑战，构成潜在的负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 该行业是工业部门的一部分，其发展有助于促进工业化和提高工业在就业和国内生产总值中的份额。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 如果该行业的生产过程资源效率低下，依赖传统技术且污染控制不足，则与升级产业以实现可持续性的目标相悖，构成潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities)

rationale: 制造过程（尤其是纺织品处理）可能消耗大量水、能源和原材料，如果管理不善，会导致自然资源使用效率低下，与可持续管理目标冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 染色、整理等工序可能使用有害化学品，若处理不当，会对环境和健康造成风险，违背化学品和废物的无害环境管理目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业可能产生大量生产废料（如边角料）和产品寿命结束后的废弃物（特别是如果产品是短寿命的杂项物品），对减少废物生成的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 竞轮竞马场的运营和维护创造了服务业、安保、管理等领域的就业机会，为地方经济做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 大型赛事可能吸引特定类型的游客，对地方旅游业有微弱的促进作用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 该行业的核心商业模式涉及赌博，可能导致赌博成瘾，这是一种有害的行为成瘾，对个人心理健康、家庭稳定和社会福祉产生显著的负面影响，与预防和治疗物质滥用（可扩展至行为成瘾）的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 赌博活动往往对低收入群体具有更高的财务风险，可能导致他们损失本可用于基本需求或积累资产的资金，从而加剧经济不平等，阻碍底层40%人口收入的可持续增长。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, progressively achieve and sustain income growth of the bottom 40 per cent of the population at a rate higher than the national average

rationale: 博彩业历史上与洗钱、非法交易和腐败有关联。虽然现代运营受到监管，但该行业本质上存在被用于非法活动或滋生腐败行为的风险，对建设廉洁机构构成潜在威胁。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms

rationale: 该行业制造的建筑机械（如挖掘机、起重机）是建设交通、能源等各类基础设施不可或缺的设备，直接支持高质量、可靠的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业可以通过研发和生产更节能、排放更低、资源效率更高的新一代机械，为基础设施和工业的可持续升级做出贡献。但这种正面影响取决于技术创新的程度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为资本货物制造业，该行业本身是经济的重要组成部分，通过制造高价值产品和技术创新来提升生产力，并创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业生产的矿山机械主要用于开采矿产和化石燃料等不可再生资源，若管理不当，会直接加剧自然资源的不可持续消耗和低效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable管理 and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业制造和其产品使用过程中通常产生大量温室气体排放（直接使用化石燃料），与将气候变化措施纳入主流的国家政策目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 矿山机械直接用于露天采矿等活动，会导致森林砍伐、土壤侵蚀、栖息地破坏和生物多样性丧失，严重威胁陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 重型机械的制造过程可能涉及有害化学品的使用和废物的产生，如果管理不善，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 作为基础制造业，紧固件生产是工业化的核心组成部分，为各类工业活动提供必要零部件，直接支持工业产值的提升。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 紧固件是建设和升级可持续基础设施（如绿色建筑、可再生能源设施）以及改造工业设备所必需的基础元件。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 制造过程消耗大量金属矿石、能源和水资源，如果资源利用效率低下，会对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 金属加工过程（如切割、锻造、电镀）可能产生金属废料、废水和有害化学物质，若处理不当，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献，但其‘体面工作’的程度（如工资、安全）取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为基础原材料供应业，该行业通过支持建筑和基础设施建设，间接促进经济多元化和发展，从而贡献于生产率的提高。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业提供的砂石、碎石等是建设交通、能源等各类基础设施不可或缺的原材料，是基础设施发展的基础支撑。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 采石和采砂业通常伴随着粉尘、噪音、重型机械操作等职业健康与安全风险，可能对工人的安全和健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers...)

rationale: 传统的采石和采砂方法往往资源效率低、环境影响大，与产业向资源高效、清洁技术升级的可持续发展目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable...)

rationale: 该行业直接开采不可再生的矿物资源，若管理不当易导致资源枯竭和低效利用，不符合自然资源的可持续管理目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 开采过程会产生大量废石、尾矿等固体废物，且对开采后土地的恢复和废物的循环利用往往不足，增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 露天开采直接清除植被、破坏土壤结构、改变地形，对陆地生态系统造成严重且往往是不可逆的破坏，威胁生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...)

rationale: 开采活动导致严重的土地退化和土壤侵蚀，是造成土地荒漠化的因素之一，与防治荒漠化和恢复土地的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...)

rationale: 采石场和砂矿的扩张会侵占和破坏自然栖息地，直接导致生物多样性丧失，需要采取行动减少此类影响。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats...)

rationale: 开采活动可能造成沉积物、重金属等污染物进入水体，导致水质恶化，影响下游生态系统和人类用水安全。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals...)

rationale: 在河床、湖滨或湿地附近进行采砂等活动，会直接破坏与水相关的生态系统，影响其生态功能。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems...)

rationale: 传统洋纸制造严重依赖木材、水和能源，若未采用可持续采购（如FSC认证木浆）和资源高效利用技术，会导致自然资源不可持续的管理和消耗。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 洋纸制造的主要原料是木浆，可能直接或间接导致森林砍伐和森林退化，对可持续森林管理构成威胁，除非确保木材来自可持续管理的森林。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests... and increase afforestation and reforestation)

rationale: 造纸过程（特别是制浆和漂白）会产生大量含有有机物和化学物质的废水，如果处理不当，会对水体质量造成严重污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用和产生有害化学品（如漂白剂）及废物，若管理不善，会对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 造纸过程本身会产生副产品（如污泥）和消费后纸张若未被有效回收，则贡献于废物产生问题。但行业内的废纸回收再利用可视为积极因素，不过整体上传统线性模式以负面为主。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果该行业投资于现代化、资源效率更高的技术和清洁生产流程（如闭环水系统、生物质能源），则可以对可持续产业升级做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，它提供了就业机会。但相关性得分中等，因为评估重点在于环境维度，且工作质量取决于具体企业实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 批发贸易是连接生产和消费的关键环节，通过高效的物流和分销网络，有助于提高整体经济效率和生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业本身创造批发领域的就业机会，并通过其分销网络支持零售业（尤其是中小型企业）的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为供应链中的重要一环，批发商可以通过其采购决策（例如，优先选择使用可持续材料或符合道德劳工标准的鞋类品牌）来鼓励生产商采用可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 如果其分销的鞋类产品依赖于不可持续的材料（如来自不可持续来源的皮革、合成材料），或其商业模式鼓励快速时尚和过度消费，则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 鞋类行业，特别是快时尚部分，与产品生命周期短和大量废弃物（包括未售出库存和废弃鞋子）相关。批发环节是推动这种线性经济模式的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 平板玻璃是建筑和基础设施（如商业楼宇、交通枢纽）的基本材料，对建设可持续和有弹性的基础设施至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过研发和生产更节能、更轻质的玻璃产品（如超白玻璃、真空玻璃），推动清洁技术在建筑和工业领域的应用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为建筑材料，玻璃有助于提供充足、安全的住房。但其贡献是间接的，且并非住房可及性的核心决定因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 汽车玻璃和公共交通设施（如火车站、机场）的玻璃幕墙是运输系统的组成部分，但相关性相对次要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 节能玻璃通过减少建筑物的供暖和制冷需求，显著降低城市能源消耗和相关的空气污染，对改善城市空气质量有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 节能玻璃（如Low-E玻璃）是提高建筑能效的关键技术之一，直接贡献于能效提升的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过技术升级和生产高附加值玻璃产品（如特种玻璃）来促进经济增长和生产效率提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但需要评估其工作条件是否符合“体面工作”标准，存在不确定性，故给予中等分数。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 玻璃制造需要消耗大量的原材料（如硅砂、纯碱）和能源，对自然资源的管理和高效利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及化学品的使用，并产生废气（如CO2, SOx）和固体废物（如废玻璃、耐火材料），若管理不当会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 虽然玻璃本身可回收，但制造过程本身会产生工业废物，且一次性建筑玻璃的废弃处理问题依然存在，与废物减量目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统的玻璃熔炼过程是能源密集型产业，严重依赖化石燃料，产生大量温室气体排放，是气候变化的重要贡献者之一。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 制造过程中排放的空气污染物（如颗粒物、硫氧化物）可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险，但影响程度取决于污染控制技术的水平。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 轮胎制造业是交通运输基础设施和汽车工业的关键支撑产业，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，符合可持续工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造活动促进经济生产力，并可能通过技术创新（如绿色轮胎技术）进行产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业提供就业机会，但其'体面工作'的程度（如工作环境、安全标准）取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 轮胎制造过程涉及合成橡胶、炭黑和其他化学品的广泛使用，其生产、使用和废弃阶段若管理不当，可能导致有害物质释放到环境中。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 轮胎是典型的耐用消费品，但寿命结束后难以降解，产生大量固体废物（废旧轮胎），是全球性的废物管理挑战，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 轮胎在使用过程中的磨损会释放微塑料颗粒，造成空气和土壤污染，对公共健康构成潜在风险。制造过程中的化学品暴露也可能影响工人健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术、提高资源效率（如使用可持续天然橡胶或回收材料）来向可持续制造转型，但这种贡献取决于具体的技术路径选择，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为高效供暖、通风和空调设备的分销渠道，该行业通过促进节能技术的普及，直接支持全球能效改善率的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 该行业为建筑（尤其是住宅和商业建筑）的管道、供暖和空调系统提供关键设备和部件，是构建高质量、可持续基础设施不可或缺的一环。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure... to support economic development and human well-being

rationale: 通过推广高效暖通空调设备，有助于减少建筑能耗和相关空气污染物排放，从而降低城市的环境影响并改善空气质量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities... paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 分销节能型设备促进了能源和水等自然资源的更高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果该行业批发的暖通空调设备使用对臭氧层有破坏作用或高全球变暖潜能值的制冷剂，且在其生命周期结束时管理不当，则可能对化学品和废物的无害化管理目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil

rationale: 作为管道设备和部件的批发商，该行业是建设和维护安全饮用水输送系统供应链的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water

rationale: 通过供应高能效和环保制冷剂的设备，该行业支持了建筑领域节能减排的具体措施，这些措施是国家气候战略的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 木制容器以木材为可再生资源，如果木材来自可持续管理的森林，则该行业通过促进木材的高效利用和可持续管理，对目标12.2做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 木制容器通常比塑料等材料更易于生物降解或回收利用，有助于从产品生命周期角度减少废物。但生产过程本身可能产生木材废料，需要妥善管理以避免负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业对木材的需求是主要驱动因素。如果木材采购不来自可持续管理的森林，而是导致毁林、森林退化或非法采伐，则会对可持续森林管理目标15.2产生显著的消极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests... and increase afforestation and reforestation)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，木制容器制造通过提供工业产出和就业机会，对可持续工业化目标9.2有基础性的积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 该行业作为制造业的一部分，提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作目标8.5有间接的积极贡献。但其具体影响取决于工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 生丝批发业连接着众多小规模的养蚕农户（通常是微型或小型企业），通过提供市场渠道，支持他们的生产活动、创造收入，并促进农业价值链的增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业为小规模养蚕农户（属于农业生产者）提供了关键的市场出口，有助于提高他们的销售收入和生计水平。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 作为价值链中的一环，生丝批发商有助于将小规模养蚕业者整合到更广阔的丝绸制造和全球市场中。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 生丝生产（桑树种植和养蚕）需要大量的水、土地和桑叶。如果管理不善，可能导致水资源压力、土地退化，不符合自然资源的可持续管理要求。批发环节本身不直接造成资源消耗，但其贸易的产品依赖于资源密集型农业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 为扩大桑园面积而进行的土地开垦可能破坏自然栖息地。养蚕过程中可能使用农药，对土壤和水体生态系统产生潜在污染风险。批发贸易促进了这种可能对陆地生态系统有负面影响的生产模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 丝绸生产链中（从蚕茧到生丝）会产生农业和工业副产品及废物。如果批发环节连接的上下游企业缺乏循环经济实践，可能导致整个价值链的废物减量目标难以实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业是重要的就业来源，特别是在发展中国家，为大量人口（包括许多女性）提供了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 服装制造业历史上存在工作条件差、工资低、工作时间长、工人权利保障不足等问题，与'体面工作'的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 快时尚和大量生产模式导致纺织品生命周期短，产生大量固体废物（布料废料、滞销品），是全球废物管理的重要挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 服装生产严重依赖水、能源和原材料（如棉花），其资源密集型特性对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纺织品的染色、印花和整理过程是工业水污染的主要来源之一，会释放有害化学物质，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业在许多国家（尤其是LDCs）对工业化和经济增长有贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 虽然该行业雇佣大量女性，但她们往往集中在低薪、低技能的缝纫岗位，在管理层和决策层的代表性不足，可能加剧性别不平等。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济生产力，属于劳动密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该制造业活动提供了就业机会，但对'体面工作'的具体贡献程度取决于实际工作条件，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为工业/制造业的一个细分领域，该行业的存在和发展支持了工业化进程。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries (LDCs)

rationale: 如果行业采用可持续来源的原材料（如有机棉）和高效的生产工艺，则可对资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献，但此关联性依赖于具体实践，并非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纺织制造过程（如染色、整理）可能使用化学品，如果管理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。这是该行业潜在的显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果主要生产耐用、可重复使用的袋子（如帆布购物袋），则直接有助于减少一次性塑料制品的使用和废物产生，这是该行业最直接和显著的积极贡献之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果产品设计为短寿命或难以回收，或者生产过程中产生大量纺织废料，则会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 集配运输行业通过高效的物流网络支持商品流动，促进贸易和经济活动多样化，从而贡献于经济生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业是运输基础设施的关键用户和组成部分，通过优化集配服务增强基础设施的可靠性和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 集配运输服务是城市和区域交通系统的一部分，通过提供货物配送支持可持续的物流链，但主要焦点是货物而非人员运输，因此相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all...)

rationale: 高效的集配运输可以减少供应链中的货物（尤其是易腐品如食品）损失，但该行业名称未特指食品物流，因此相关性一般。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains...)

rationale: 集配运输通常依赖化石燃料车辆，导致显著的温室气体排放和空气污染，对气候行动目标构成挑战，除非采用低碳技术。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 阀门是供水管网系统中的关键控制部件，其可靠制造和供应对于建设和维护能够普遍提供安全饮用水的基础设施至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve universal and equitable access to safe and affordable drinking water for all

rationale: 阀门广泛应用于污水处理厂、工业废水处理系统和回用设施中，用于控制流程和防止泄漏，直接贡献于改善水质和增加废水安全再利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 高性能的阀门（如精密控制阀、节水阀）有助于减少管网漏损和优化各行业（农业、工业）的用水流程，从而提高水资源利用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 阀门是能源、水利、化工等几乎所有工业和经济基础设施的基石部件。其质量和可靠性直接决定了基础设施的可持续性和韧性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 阀门制造行业通过提供用于升级改造传统产业和基础设施的高效、环保型阀门（如低泄漏阀门、适用于清洁技术的特种阀门），支持资源效率提升和清洁技术的采纳。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 阀门在能源生产（发电厂）、传输（油气管线）和分配系统中必不可少，其可靠运行对于保障能源服务的可靠供应具有支持作用，无论是传统能源还是可再生能源领域。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services

rationale: 阀门制造过程可能涉及金属表面处理（如电镀、喷涂）使用的化学品，以及生产过程中产生的废切削液、废金属屑等。如果环境管理不善，可能对化学品和废物管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造业本身会产生废料（如金属废料、包装材料）。虽然部分可回收，但生产过程本质上贡献了废物的产生，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 证券金融业通过促进资本流动、为企业融资和推动投资，是维持人均经济增长的关键驱动力。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 该行业本身为金融专业人士创造了体面的高技能工作岗位，尽管其直接就业规模相对于整个经济体较小。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 证券和债券市场是基础设施项目（如能源、交通）重要的融资渠道，支持可持续基础设施的发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 风险投资和公开市场融资支持技术创新公司和产业升级，间接促进技术发展和产业多元化。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 一个运作良好、受监管的证券行业本身就是加强金融监管的目标和体现，有助于维护金融稳定。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 如果监管不力，证券金融业的投机行为和系统性风险可能加剧金融市场的不稳定，从而放大不平等，凸显了加强监管的必要性。这种负面影响是监管缺位下的潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 通过ESG投资和绿色债券等金融产品，证券金融业可以引导资本流向注重可持续实践的公司，鼓励其进行可持续发展报告。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 遵守反洗钱等法规是证券行业的义务，有助于打击非法资金流动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 证券金融业作为金融体系的重要组成部分，其有效、负责和透明的运作有助于建设强大的机构。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 专修学校和各種学校是提供技术、职业和非高等教育的主要机构，其核心使命就是确保人们能够获得实用的职业技能教育。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 该行业的核心功能就是通过职业培训，大幅增加拥有就业、体面工作和创业所需相关技能（包括技术和职业技能）的青年和成年人的数量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.

rationale: 通过提供职业培训机会，该行业有助于降低未就业、未受教育或未接受培训的青年比例，为他们进入劳动力市场铺平道路。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training.

rationale: 通过提供与市场需求匹配的技能培训，该行业帮助学员获得生产性就业和体面工作的能力，是实现充分就业的基石之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 职业教育为不同背景的个人提供了提升技能和经济地位的机会，有助于促进社会和经济包容，减少不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 潜在的负面影响：如果此类学校的学费过高，或者课程质量参差不齐，可能会阻碍经济困难群体的入学，从而加剧教育机会的不平等，与确保平等获得负担得起的优质职业教育的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university.

rationale: 喫茶店作为典型的微型或小型服务业企业，直接创造本地就业机会，并支持创业和小微企业的成长，符合促进生产性活动和中小企业发展的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业提供服务业岗位，为实现全民充分就业和体面工作做出贡献，但其工作质量（如工资、合同）因店铺而异，相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过采购可持续认证的咖啡豆或食品原料，以及优化能源和水资源使用（如节能设备），喫茶店可贡献于自然资源的可持续管理，但实践程度因店而异，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 喫茶店运营中常大量使用一次性杯子、吸管、包装等，导致塑料和纸类废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖，负面影响显著。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为社区社交空间，喫茶店通过提供休闲环境间接促进心理健康和福祉，但贡献较为间接，相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 餐饮业可能存在非正式就业、低工资或工作环境不安全的风险，尤其在小规模店铺中，对保护劳工权利有潜在负面影响，但程度因具体运营而异。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为农水系合作社的中央机构，其核心职能是支持小农和小规模渔民通过合作社形式提高生产效率和市场准入，从而直接增加其收入和生产能力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...)

rationale: 该机构可以引导和资助其成员合作社采用可持续的农业和水产养殖实践，保护生态系统，增强应对气候变化的韧性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...)

rationale: 通过改善农村地区，特别是小农和渔民的经济状况和生计，该机构有助于减少和消除极端贫困。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere...)

rationale: 通过促进包容性经济增长和改善农村社区福利，有助于减少各种维度的贫困。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty...)

rationale: 合作社模式本身是支持生产性活动、创造体面工作和促进中小企业发展的有效途径，中央机构在其中起到关键的政策倡导和资源支持作用。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 该机构可能支持与农业旅游（如农家乐）或生态旅游相关的合作社活动，从而促进可持续旅游和本地产品销售，但这不是其核心职能，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 作为水系合作社的中央管理机构，有责任和潜力引导其成员进行可持续的捕捞活动，防止过度捕捞和非法捕鱼。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices...)

rationale: 通过支持可持续水产养殖和渔业，可以为依赖海洋资源的发展中地区（包括但不限于小岛屿发展中国家和最不发达国家）创造经济收益。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, increase the economic benefits to Small Island developing States and least developed countries from the sustainable use of marine resources...)

rationale: 水系合作社的核心目的之一就是为小规模个体渔民提供资源获取、技术支持和市场渠道，此目标高度相关。
sdg_target_description: (Provide access for small-scale artisanal fishers to marine resources and markets)

rationale: 如果该中央机构在管理上失效，或其成员合作社以追求短期利益为目标，可能导致对渔业资源的监管不力，间接助长不可持续的捕捞行为。这是一种潜在的风险和负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices...)

rationale: 如果其支持的农业活动大量使用化肥农药，或水产养殖产生污染，可能会增加废物和污染，与减少废物的目标相悖。但作为中央机构，其影响是间接的，且可能通过推广最佳实践来减轻，故负面影响得分较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 合作社本身就是一种重要的民间社会组织形式，中央机构在促进多利益攸关方伙伴关系（如与政府、私营部门合作）以实现可持续发展目标方面可以发挥关键作用。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships...)

rationale: 公共广播通过电视和电台节目，以极低的边际成本向广大受众提供非正式的教育内容和职业技能知识，促进了全民获得优质教育的公平机会。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university)

rationale: 公共广播经常制作与就业、创业相关的技能培训和生活知识节目，有助于提升青年和成年人的相关技能。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 公共广播是传播可持续发展理念、全球公民意识以及文化多样性理解的关键平台，其节目内容直接致力于培养公众促进可持续发展所需的知识和技能。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...)

rationale: 作为独立的公共机构，公共广播通过调查报道和公正的新闻分析，对政府和企业进行舆论监督，促进机构的有效性和问责制。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 公共广播的核心使命是保障公众获取广泛、客观、多元的信息，这是实现该子目标的基础设施和关键途径。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements)

rationale: 公共广播可以作为平台，促进政府、私营部门和民间社会之间关于可持续发展目标的对话与合作，增强全球伙伴关系。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships...)

rationale: 公共广播通过节目制作和活动，可以鼓励和展示有效的多方伙伴关系实践。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships...)

rationale: 广播电台、电视台和数据中心的运营需要消耗大量能源。如果其设施和设备的能源效率未能持续改善，则会对提高全球能源效率的目标产生轻微的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 港口是区域和跨境贸易基础设施的关键组成部分，其运营直接支持经济发展和供应链韧性。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 港口运输是国际贸易和国内经济活动的重要推动力，通过促进商品流通直接贡献于经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 港口运营创造了大量的直接和间接就业岗位，包括装卸工人、物流协调员、管理人员等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 高效的港口是发展中国家融入全球贸易体系、增加出口的关键节点。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries’ share of global exports by 2020

rationale: 港口现代化和绿色化（如使用电动设备、岸电系统）是实现该行业可持续发展的方向，但目前传统运营方式可能尚未完全符合。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 港口活动可能导致油污泄漏、垃圾入海、船舶废水排放等，对海洋环境造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 港口建设和疏浚等活动可能破坏海岸线和海底生态系统，对海洋生物多样性产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 港口运输严重依赖化石燃料驱动的设备和船舶，是温室气体和空气污染物的排放源，与气候变化减缓目标相悖。其影响程度取决于具体采用的能源和技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业直接创造就业机会，为工人提供收入来源，对实现充分的生产性就业和体面工作有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 金属家具制造业是工业部门的一个组成部分，其发展有助于促进可持续的工业化，并提高工业在就业和国内生产总值中的份额。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries)

rationale: 金属家具通常具有较长的使用寿命，并且金属材料本身具有高度的可回收性。这有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用，符合循环经济原则。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 金属家具的可回收性意味着在其生命周期结束时可以减少最终处置的废物量，通过回收和再利用来减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 金属的初级生产（采矿、冶炼）是能源和资源密集型过程。如果制造过程中使用的金属不是来自回收来源，则可能对自然资源的可持续管理造成压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及使用化学品（如涂料、溶剂、表面处理剂）并产生工业废水和固体废物。如果管理不当，可能对环境（空气、水、土壤）和人类健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 金属加工（如切割、焊接、冲压）存在安全风险（如机械伤害、噪音、粉尘）。如果工作场所安全措施不足，可能对工人的安全和健康构成威胁，与保护劳工权利和安全工作环境的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 金属家具制造过程中的能源消耗（特别是如果能源来自化石燃料）会导致温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响，这与将气候变化措施纳入各层面的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 纸板制造业通过改进生产工艺、提高资源效率以及采用更环保的技术（如废水处理、能源回收），为可持续产业和基础设施升级做出贡献。纸板本身也是现代物流和包装基础设施的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业的核心原料之一是可回收纤维（再生纸浆）。通过将废纸回收再造成纸板，极大地促进了废物的循环利用，从源头上减少了废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业主要依赖原生木浆而非再生材料进行生产，则会消耗大量原始森林资源，并在生产过程中产生较多的工业废料（如污泥），增加整体废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 纸板制造是高度耗水且产生大量工业废水的行业。如果废水处理不当，会向水体排放有机物、悬浮物和化学物质，造成严重的水污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，纸板制造通过技术创新（如自动化、提高产率）和资源效率提升（如使用再生原料降低成本）来贡献于经济生产力的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 制造过程中使用的漂白剂、染料、助剂等化学品若管理不善，可能对环境（水、土壤、空气）和人体健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 纸板制造是能源密集型产业，其温室气体排放（特别是当能源来自化石燃料时）对气候变化有显著贡献，与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果行业实践并采购来自可持续管理森林（如FSC/PEFC认证）的木浆，则有助于推动可持续森林管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 如果原料采购不可持续，过度依赖原生木浆可能导致森林砍伐、栖息地破坏和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为食品分销的关键环节，该行业通过其零售网络确保消费者能够获得食物，对实现粮食安全至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 通过优先采购来自可持续农业或本地生产者的食品，该行业可以间接支持和激励可持续的粮食生产系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production...

rationale: 通过提供和推广新鲜水果、蔬菜等健康食品选择，该行业有助于促进健康饮食，预防非传染性疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 如果过度营销和销售高糖、高盐、高脂肪的加工食品和不健康零食，可能会助长不健康的饮食习惯，对公共健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 食品零售业是劳动密集型行业，为大量人口提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 行业内可能存在低工资、非标准工作安排（如兼职、临时工）或较差的工作条件，这与'体面工作'的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 食品零售是食物浪费的主要来源之一，原因包括库存管理不善、产品外观标准严格、保质期短等，直接阻碍此目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 通过改进供应链管理、与食物银行合作捐赠临期食品、降价促销临近保质期产品等措施，该行业可以积极减少零售环节的食物浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 食品零售业大量使用塑料包装、一次性塑料袋等，是固体废物（尤其是塑料污染）的重要来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过推广使用可回收或可降解包装、提供包装回收服务、减少不必要的包装等措施，该行业可以为减少废物做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为基础制造业，为渔业、农业、运输和建筑等多个经济部门提供必要的生产资料，支持其生产活动和经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业本身是制造业的一部分，贡献于工业产值和就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 其产品（如安全网、土工网）可用于可持续基础设施建设和工业安全防护，间接支持可持续性升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 制造过程中可能涉及化学品的使用和废物的产生，若环境管理不善，可能对环境和健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果行业实践包括使用回收材料（如再生塑料制网）和减少生产废料，则产生积极贡献。但若以传统线性模式生产，则贡献有限甚至为负。此处基于潜在最佳实践给予低分积极评价。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料渔网是海洋塑料污染和“幽灵捕捞”的主要来源之一，对海洋生态系统构成持续威胁，这是该行业最显著的潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 通过制造具有选择性的、符合法规的渔具，该行业可以支持可持续渔业管理，减少对非目标物种的捕获和栖息地的破坏。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 仓库业作为供应链的关键部分，通过提高物流效率和支撑贸易，促进经济多元化和生产力增长。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业提供仓储管理、物流操作等就业机会，有助于实现充分就业，但需确保工作条件符合体面劳动标准。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 普通仓库是物流基础设施的基础组成部分，支持商品流动和经济韧性，但其可持续性取决于具体设计和运营。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 高效的仓库管理可通过优化库存和减少货物损耗，促进自然资源的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 仓库运营可能产生包装废物、废弃货物或能源浪费，若不实施绿色实践，会加剧废物生成。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 仓库通常依赖大量能源用于照明、温控和设备运行，如果使用低效技术，可能阻碍能效改进目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 高能耗仓库运营可能导致温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响，除非整合减排措施。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 仓库中储存的化学品或货物处理可能带来健康风险，如不当管理可能导致污染或工伤，影响工人和社区健康。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 皮革鞣制过程消耗大量水并产生含有重金属（如铬）和有毒化学物质的高污染性废水，若处理不当，会严重恶化水质，与改善水质量的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 传统的皮革鞣制工业通常是资源密集型和污染型的，除非进行大规模技术改造和采用清洁生产技术，否则其当前模式阻碍了向可持续产业和基础设施的升级。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 该行业在其生命周期中大量使用和排放有害化学品（如铬鞣剂），是实现化学品和废物无害环境管理的主要挑战之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 皮革制造是资源密集型产业，消耗大量水、化学品和动物原料，其传统模式往往不符合自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 鞣革过程产生大量固体废物（如皮革碎料、污泥）和废水，废物减量、回收和再利用方面存在挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 工人可能暴露于有害化学品和恶劣的工作条件，如果安全措施不足，会对劳工权利和安全的工作环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业排放的化学污染物可能污染水源和土壤，对附近社区的健康构成潜在风险，增加由环境污染引起的疾病负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 療術業作为医疗保健服务体系的补充，提供了多样化的治疗选择，有助于扩大人们获得医疗服务的途径，特别是在主流西医服务不足或作为个性化选择时，支持全民健康覆盖的目标。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 许多療術（如按摩、针灸）被用于管理慢性疼痛、缓解压力和提高整体福祉，这有助于非传染性疾病的预防、治疗和心理健康促进。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 療術業是一个劳动密集型的服务行业，为理疗师、按摩师、针灸师等专业人员创造了就业机会，贡献于体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 从事療術業需要专门的职业技能培训（如解剖学、特定疗法技术），这促进了相关技术技能的培养，与增加拥有职业技能人数的目标一致。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 如果療術業缺乏有效的监管、标准化的培训和科学证据支持，可能存在提供无效或不安全治疗的风险，这可能削弱公共卫生系统有效管理和降低健康风险的能力。这种负面影响的程度取决于具体国家对该行业的监管框架和整合程度。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 演艺团体是文化产业的重要组成部分，通过制作和演出活动创造直接和间接的就业机会（如艺术家、技术人员、管理人员），并支持中小型创意企业的发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 有特色的演艺活动（如地方传统戏剧、音乐节）可以成为吸引游客的亮点，促进可持续旅游业的发展，并展示当地文化。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 表演艺术是传播思想、文化和价值观的有力媒介，可以作为一种非正式教育形式，增进观众对不同文化、社会议题和可持续发展的理解和欣赏。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 演艺团体，特别是那些表演传统或古典艺术的团体，在保护、传承和弘扬非物质文化遗产（如传统戏剧、音乐、舞蹈）方面发挥着关键作用，使公众更容易接触到文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 通过策划包容性的演出内容（如涉及多元文化、为残障人士提供便利）或社区参与项目，演艺团体可以促进社会包容和文化多样性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 演出活动可能产生一次性布景、宣传材料、食品包装等废弃物，如果管理不当，会增加垃圾填埋量。此外，大型演出的能源消耗（灯光、空调）也构成环境足迹。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为基础材料制造业，该行业直接贡献于工业产值和就业，是工业体系的一部分。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 通过制造技术和产品创新（如开发高性能或可生物降解薄膜），该行业可以提升经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 塑料树脂薄膜的生产依赖化学品，其废弃后若管理不当，会造成严重的土壤和水体污染，难以实现全生命周期的无害化管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 许多树脂薄膜产品（特别是薄型、复合型薄膜）回收利用困难，是固体废弃物，尤其是塑料垃圾和微塑料污染的主要来源，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 管理不善的塑料薄膜废弃物是海洋塑料垃圾和微塑料污染的重要来源，严重危害海洋生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为批发业，该行业是商品流通和供应链的重要组成部分，通过促进纸张贸易支持一般性的经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 批发商通过连接大小生产商与市场，有助于企业（包括可能的小型纸厂）融入价值链。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果该行业积极采购和推广来自可持续管理森林的认证纸张，则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。此得分较低是因为其作为中间商的影响力是间接的。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果其供应链主要依赖不可持续来源的纸张，该行业的商业活动会助长对森林资源的不可持续利用和管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纸张的过度消费和不当处置会产生大量废物。批发业通过推动纸张销售，间接与废物产生问题相关，但其责任小于生产者和消费者。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 纸张批发业的需求是驱动木材采伐的关键市场力量。如果纸张来源不可持续，该行业将对森林生态系统的保护和可持续利用构成显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 与15.1类似，不可持续的纸张供应链是导致森林砍伐的重要因素，该行业作为供应链环节负有间接但重要的责任。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 眼镜是矫正视力、保障眼部健康的基本医疗辅助器具。该行业通过零售渠道使公众能够获得这些基本产品，对实现全民健康覆盖，特别是获得优质基本医疗服务做出直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业在销售、管理、物流等环节创造了就业机会，为经济增长和实现充分的生产性就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该行业销售高品质、耐用、可维修的钟表和经典款式的眼镜框，并推广以旧换新或维修服务，则有助于延长产品寿命，减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业主要销售廉价、一次性或快时尚风格的眼镜和配饰，鼓励频繁更换而非长期使用，则会助长不可持续的消费模式，增加固体废物（如旧眼镜、包装材料）的产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的负面影响风险在于其供应链。如果采购的钟表、眼镜及其原材料的生产过程不符合环境和社会标准（如资源消耗、劳工权益），则对促进企业采用可持续实践产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 该行业作为制造业的一部分，提供了生产性活动和就业机会，尤其可能涉及中小型企业，支持地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises)

rationale: 木制品制造可能涉及工艺创新、设计和技术改进，特别是在增加木材产品附加值方面，对产业多元化有潜在贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by providing a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities)

rationale: 如果行业采用来自可持续管理森林的木材，并优化生产流程以减少原材料浪费，则有助于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 通过采购经过认证的可持续木材（如FSC认证），该行业可以促进可持续森林管理实践，为森林保护做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 木制品制造过程中可能使用胶粘剂、涂料和防腐剂等化学品，如果管理不善，可能导致有害物质释放，对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 制造过程会产生木材边角料、锯末等废物，如果未能有效实施废物预防、回收和再利用措施，则会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果木材原料来自不可持续的采伐，例如导致森林砍伐或生态系统退化，则该行业会对陆地生态系统的保护和可持续利用产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements)

rationale: 一般小売店是中小微企业的重要组成部分，是本地经济的关键，创造了大量就业机会，直接支持体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 零售业为不同背景的人群（包括青年和残疾人）提供了广泛的就业岗位，是实现充分和生产性就业的重要领域。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 一般小売店在销售过程中可能涉及大量一次性包装、塑料制品和鼓励过度消费的模式，从而增加废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 零售店可以通过负责任的采购政策（如选择可持续来源的产品）、减少塑料使用、推广环保商品等方式，采纳并鼓励可持续实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 如果零售店销售烟草制品，则其活动会助长烟草消费，对公共健康产生负面影响，与烟草控制的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate

rationale: 作为主要雇主，零售业可以通过推行平等的晋升政策和包容性文化，促进女性在管理层和决策层的参与。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 作为食品零售商，通过销售面包等基本食品，有助于确保人们（尤其是当地社区）的食物可获性，但其核心产品（糖果点心）并非解决饥饿和营养不良的主要手段，贡献程度中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 该行业主要销售高糖、高脂肪、高加工度的糖果和点心，过度消费此类产品是导致肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险因素，对促进健康饮食和预防疾病产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业支持地方经济活动，尤其许多点心面包店可能是中小型企业，为当地创造了就业机会并促进了经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业提供了零售领域的就业岗位，但其工作条件（如薪资、福利）是否符合'体面工作'标准取决于具体企业实践，相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为食品零售商，易腐商品（如面包、某些点心）面临较高的浪费风险。管理不善会导致零售层面的食物浪费，直接与该子目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业是包装废弃物的主要产生者之一（尤其是点心、面包的独立包装和塑料袋），其商业模式通常依赖于一次性包装，对从源头上大幅减少废物产生构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 该行业的生产活动是危险化学品的潜在来源，不当操作可能导致职业暴露或环境污染，从而增加相关的疾病和死亡风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 化学生产过程通常产生含有害物质的工业废水，对水体质量构成威胁，与改善水质、减少污染的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 传统的化学合成过程可能产生大量工业废物和副产品，若未有效实施废物减量、回收和再利用措施，则不利于减少废物产生的目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 该行业通过提供基础化学品间接支持经济，但其本身作为需要升级的传统工业部门，对可持续基础设施和清洁技术的直接正面贡献有限，更多是作为需要被改造的对象。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes...)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和创新为经济增长和生产力提升做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 寝具批发商通过分销影响睡眠质量的商品，间接促进了身心健康和福祉，良好的睡眠是预防非传染性疾病和促进心理健康的重要因素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为批发行业，它本身创造就业机会，并作为供应链关键一环，支持了大量中小型零售企业的运营和发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 批发行业的仓储、物流环节需要关注劳工的工作条件。负责任的运营商会为此目标做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 如果批发商优先采购和推广使用可持续原材料（如有机棉、再生材料）的寝具，则对自然资源的可持续管理有积极贡献。但相关性取决于具体采购政策。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 如果批发商大量分销基于不可持续资源（如传统棉花耗水多）或短期使用寿命的产品，则对自然资源的可持续管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 寝具（尤其是大件物品如床垫）的废弃处理是挑战。批发环节推动的快速消费模式若缺乏回收体系，会导致废物增加，与此目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 大型寝具批发商可以通过其采购标准和供应商行为准则，鼓励上游制造商采用更可持续的生产实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle.

rationale: 批发业依赖于物流和供应链基础设施，其高效运作间接支持了经济基础设施的利用和发展，确保了商品的流通。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 肉类批发业作为经济的一部分，通过物流优化和供应链管理，贡献于经济生产力和商业活动。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 高效的批发物流和库存管理有助于减少肉类在供应链中的损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 与12.4类似，行业运营可能产生包装废物和食品废物，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。

sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 有效的土地和房产市场是城市规划和发展的基础。该行业通过交易活动支持人类住区的形成和管理，但其对'包容性'和'可持续性'的贡献取决于具体的市场规范和监管。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property...

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources
