rationale: 有机化学品的制造过程可能使用和产生有害物质，如果管理不当，可能导致化学品和危险废物对环境和人类健康的释放与污染，这是该行业的主要环境挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 化学合成过程通常会产生副产物和化学废物，如果未实施有效的废物最小化、回收和循环策略，该行业可能成为重要的废物产生源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业生产或使用的某些有害化学品，如果发生事故性泄漏或长期排放，可能通过污染空气、水或土壤而对人类健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 有机化学品制造产生的工业废水可能含有难降解有机物或有毒物质，对水体质量构成潜在威胁，需要严格的处理才能达标排放。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 化工厂的工作环境可能接触有害化学品，存在职业健康与安全风险（如暴露、火灾、爆炸），需要强有力的安全措施来保护工人。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 畜牧服务通过提供育种、兽医、营养和管理知识，直接提高畜牧养殖户的生产效率和收入，特别有助于小规模生产者。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment

rationale: 如果服务内容包含可持续的牧场管理、动物废物处理和资源高效利用的实践，则有助于建立更具韧性和可持续的畜牧生产系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 畜牧服务业本身是农业经济中的专业化、技术密集型部门，通过提供高技术服务提升整个畜牧业的生产率，并创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 通过提供改善饲料转化率、优化水资源使用和促进粪便资源化利用的服务，有助于实现自然资源的更可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 兽医服务中包含对兽药（作为化学品）的合理使用指导，以及针对牲畜粪便（作为废物）的环境无害化管理咨询，有助于减少其对环境的排放。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果服务主要旨在无限度地提高单产而忽视承载能力，可能间接鼓励过度放牧或大规模饲料作物种植，导致土地退化、水资源消耗和自然资源不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 畜牧业是甲烷和氧化亚氮等温室气体的重要排放源。旨在单纯扩大生产规模的服务，若未充分考虑减排措施，则与将气候变化应对措施纳入各领域的国家政策方向相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 推动畜牧业扩张的服务，如果导致牧场向自然栖息地（如森林、草原）扩张，可能加剧自然栖息地的退化和生物多样性的丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 火箭制造是高科技研发和创新的核心领域，直接增强科学研究和技术能力，是产业升级和技术进步的驱动力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 火箭制造代表了高精尖技术，其发展支持国内技术研发和创新体系构建，尽管主要关联发达国家，但其技术溢出效应具有全球意义。
sdg_target_description: Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries, including by ensuring a conducive policy environment for, inter alia, industrial diversification and value addition to commodities

rationale: 航天工业是激励青年学习STEM（科学、技术、工程和数学）领域并培养高技能人才的重要标杆。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 火箭运载的地球观测卫星是监测气候变化、进行灾害预警和环境管理的关键工具，为气候行动提供不可或缺的数据支持。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

rationale: 火箭制造业属于高附加值和技术密集型产业，能显著提升经济生产力并推动产业升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 某些火箭推进剂（如某些固体燃料）的燃烧会释放温室气体和黑碳到高层大气，对气候系统产生负面影响，这与将气候措施纳入政策的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 火箭制造过程涉及复杂供应链和特殊材料，资源消耗密集。此外，某些发射活动会产生太空碎片（废弃的火箭上面级等），构成了特殊的废物管理挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的核心组成部分，该行业直接贡献于工业产值的提升和就业，是可持续工业化的基础。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业提供的机械零部件制造和维修服务，对于升级和改造现有基础设施与产业、提高资源效率至关重要。维修活动本身延长资产寿命，符合可持续性目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 机械制造与修理行业通过提供生产设备和维护服务，直接支持各行各业提高生产效率和技术升级。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业是重要的就业来源，提供了制造、技术、维修等多种类型的岗位，贡献于充分就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 维修和翻新机械及零部件是废物预防和资源再利用的关键策略，直接支持循环经济，减少废弃物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 机械制造过程需要消耗金属、能源等大量自然资源，如果生产 practices 不可持续，会导致资源低效使用和 depletion。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品（如切削液、润滑油、涂料），并产生工业废水和固体废物，若处理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的制造活动通常能源密集，如果能源来源依赖于化石燃料，将直接导致温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响。其积极影响取决于所制造机械的最终用途。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过分销高能效家用电器（如带有节能标签的产品），该行业有助于终端用户提高能源效率，从而为提升全球能源效率改善率做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为批发贸易的一部分，该行业通过其运营活动直接贡献于经济增长和生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 该行业通过其批发业务创造了就业机会（如物流、销售、管理），并支持中小型零售企业的经营活动。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 作为供应链中的一环，该行业帮助将家用电器制造商（包括中小企业）的产品分销到更广阔的市场，促进了价值链的整合。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 该行业的核心商业模式是促进家用电器消费。如果不加引导，这会刺激对原材料（如金属、塑料）的需求，可能导致自然资源的不可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 家用电器在其生命周期末期成为电子废物（E-waste），可能含有有害物质。该行业推动电器销售，间接增加了电子废物的产生量，对环境声音废物管理的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业通过促进新产品销售，可能助长'用即弃'文化，与从源头上减少废物产生的目标相悖。它本身通常不直接负责产品的回收或再利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业的运营实践（如物流、包装）不注重可持续性，且不积极推动或选择可持续供应商，则可能对推广企业可持续实践的目标产生负面影响。这是一个潜在的治理风险点。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 作为书籍零售商，该行业通过提供教科书、课外读物等学习材料，支持普及优质教育，特别是对青少年。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes

rationale: 销售专业书籍、技能培训材料和文具，有助于青年和成人获得就业和创业所需技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业本身创造就业机会（如店员、物流），并支持中小企业的文化活动（如独立书店）。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 销售本地文化书籍和特色文具可以促进地方文化和产品，间接支持可持续旅游和文化产业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 如果行业优先采购和销售由可持续管理资源生产的产品（如再生纸文具、FSC认证书籍），则对资源可持续管理有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 行业可能销售大量一次性塑料文具、过度包装的产品或促进快速消费的书籍，从而导致废物增加，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果销售的书籍和纸张来自不可持续的森林采伐，该行业可能间接助长森林退化和 deforestation，对可持续森林管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 铁路车辆是铁路基础设施的核心组成部分，其制造直接支持发展可持续、有韧性的交通基础设施。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 制造铁路车辆（特别是用于公共交通的车辆）是提供安全、可持续交通系统的关键，有助于扩大公共交通服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 作为制造业的一个高技术分支，该行业通过技术创新和生产活动促进经济生产力的提升，并创造就业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 制造更节能、低排放的铁路车辆（如电动列车）是升级交通基础设施以实现可持续性和采用清洁技术的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 铁路作为一种低碳交通方式，其车辆制造和推广支持将气候变化减缓措施（如交通部门脱碳）纳入国家战略。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过设计和制造耐用、可回收的车辆和部件，该行业可以在产品生命周期结束时促进废物的减少和材料的循环利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程需要消耗大量金属、塑料等原材料和能源，如果采购和生产实践不可持续，可能对自然资源管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用有害化学品（如油漆、溶剂、电池材料），并产生工业废水和固体废物，如果处理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 公园为公众提供进行体育锻炼、亲近自然的空间，有助于预防非传染性疾病和促进心理健康。游乐园提供娱乐活动，有助于提升福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 公园是城市绿色公共空间的核心组成部分，其存在和可及性直接贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 城市公园作为人工或半自然的陆地生态系统，有助于保护生物多样性、调节微气候并提供生态系统服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 设计良好的公园可以成为城市中濒危物种的栖息地或生态廊道，有助于减少生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 游乐园是旅游业的重要组成部分，能够创造直接的就业机会（运营、服务、管理）。大型主题公园还能显著带动地方经济。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 一些历史公园或具有文化主题的游乐园（如展现地方文化的主题区）有助于保护和展示文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 公园的维护（如灌溉）和游乐园的运营（如高能耗游乐设施、大量用水）可能消耗大量水、能源等自然资源，若管理不善则不符合可持续利用原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 特别是游乐园，因游客集中消费（食品、商品包装）可能产生大量固体废物，若废物管理不当则与此目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 烟草制品的使用是导致非传染性疾病（如肺癌、心脏病）的主要风险因素，直接增加早逝风险，阻碍该子目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 烟草制造业的存在与产品推广，直接对抗全球烟草控制框架的实施和强化。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate

rationale: 烟草制造过程产生工业废物（如化学副产品），且其产品（如烟蒂、包装）是常见的环境垃圾，增加了废物管理负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 烟草消费本质上是一种有害健康且不可持续的生活方式，其制造和营销不利于促进与自然和谐共处的可持续生活方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 烟草种植和制造环节，特别是在供应链上游，可能存在工人（如农场工人）暴露于有害化学物质（尼古丁、农药）的健康风险，工作环境安全问题突出。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, particularly women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该制造业活动通过生产皮革制品创造经济价值，提供就业机会，并可能通过技术升级提高生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业支持生产性活动和创造就业，尤其是在拥有相关产业集群的地区。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 如果行业采纳更清洁的生产技术（如无铬鞣制、水循环系统），可以提高资源效率，向可持续产业转型。但这种积极影响取决于技术采用程度。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 如果行业实践可持续采购（如使用来自可持续管理牧场的皮革）和提高材料利用率，可以贡献于自然资源的可持续管理。但这通常不是行业普遍现状。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 传统皮革鞣制是水污染的主要来源，会向水体排放大量有害化学物质（如铬盐、硫化物），严重阻碍水质改善目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 皮革制造过程中使用的化学品（如鞣制剂、染料）及其废物的不当管理，对人体健康和环境构成显著风险，与化学品无害化管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 皮革加工会产生大量固体废物（如边角料、污泥），若未有效实施废物减量、回收和再利用措施，则与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 皮革原料（生皮）的生产与畜牧业扩张密切相关，后者是导致土地退化和荒漠化的主要驱动因素之一。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...)

rationale: 为畜牧业提供原料而进行的土地利用变化（如毁林建牧场）会破坏自然栖息地，导致生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity...)

rationale: 作为制造业，毛织物生产通过技术升级和创新（如自动化织机）有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业在生产和供应链中提供就业机会，但需注意工作条件是否符合“体面工作”标准。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 作为传统制造业，其工业化过程若采用清洁技术，可促进可持续工业化。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization...)

rationale: 行业可通过升级为资源效率更高、污染更少的基础设施和技术来做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable...)

rationale: 如果采用可持续采购（如负责任羊毛标准）和资源高效生产工艺，可对该目标产生积极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 通过提供可持续认证的羊毛产品，可以促进消费者对可持续生活方式的意识。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development...)

rationale: 传统染色和整理过程会使用大量水和化学品，若废水处理不当，可能导致水污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 制造过程中使用的染料、助剂等化学品及其废物的不当管理可能对环境造成危害。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 羊毛生产若涉及过度放牧或不可持续的土地管理，可能对草原生态系统和生物多样性造成压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...)

rationale: 作为批发行业，它通过高效的物流和供应链管理促进商品流通，支持零售业和相关制造业，从而贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业为中小型零售商和制造商提供市场渠道，支持创业和中小企业增长，间接促进体面就业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 玩具和娱乐用品行业通常涉及大量塑料包装和短生命周期产品，批发环节的物流包装和潜在的产品废弃问题可能导致废物增加，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为供应链的关键环节，批发商可以通过选择环保产品、优化物流（如减少碳排放）来推动可持续实践，但其影响力通常次于制造商。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 通过分销教育玩具、建构玩具和创意游戏，该行业可以间接支持儿童和青少年的认知发展、解决问题的能力和创造力培养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 分销体育用品和娱乐产品可以鼓励身体活动和休闲娱乐，从而促进身心健康和福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 如果分销的玩具含有塑料微珠或不环保材料，其包装和产品废弃物可能通过不当处理进入海洋，加剧塑料污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 如果玩具使用来自不可持续来源的木材或纸张（如包装），可能间接对森林可持续管理产生压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 作为汽车核心零部件制造业，该行业是工业化的重要组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，符合可持续工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业通过制造更高效、技术更先进的汽车传动和操纵装置（如节能变速器、电动助力转向），为交通工具的可持续升级提供了关键技术，有助于提高资源使用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 汽车零部件制造业是技术密集型产业，其发展通过技术创新和产业升级直接推动经济生产力的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业作为制造业的一部分，提供了大量的就业岗位，对实现充分就业和体面工作有积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 制造可靠、先进的汽车操纵装置（如防抱死制动系统ABS、电子稳定程序ESP、助力转向系统）是提高车辆主动安全性的核心，直接有助于预防道路交通事故，减少伤亡，其目标精神与SDG 3持续相关。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 制造过程需要消耗金属、塑料等原材料和能源，如果管理不当，可能对自然资源的可持续利用造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 工业生产过程，特别是金属加工和组装，可能产生工业废料、废水和废气，如果废物管理不善，会增加环境负担。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通过生产提高燃油效率的传动系统（如轻量化部件、高效变速器），间接支持了减少交通运输领域温室气体排放的气候行动，但这种贡献是间接且依赖于终端产品的应用。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 批发贸易行业是价值链的关键环节，本身创造就业机会，并支持其上下游的中小企业（制造商、零售商）的发展和融入市场。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 作为分销商，该行业帮助中小型家具和建筑构件制造商进入更广阔的市场，间接支持它们融入价值链，尽管其本身不直接提供金融服务。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果该行业优先采购和销售来自可持续管理森林的木材制成的家具和建具（如获得FSC或PEFC认证的产品），则直接促进自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果该行业分销来自不可持续来源（如非法采伐或导致森林退化的行为）的木制品，则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业可以向政府或公共机构供应符合可持续标准的家具和建筑材料，从而支持可持续公共采购的实施。
sdg_target_description: Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities

rationale: 与对12.2的负面影响类似，如果其供应链涉及不可持续的木材采购，该行业可能间接助长毁林和森林退化，与可持续森林管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 信用金库的核心业务是为中小企业和个人创业者提供融资和金融服务，直接支持生产活动、创业和中小企业的成长，是目标8.3实现的关键地方性金融机构。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 信用金库专门服务于特定地区的中小企业，显著增加了这些企业获得可负担信贷和其他金融服务的机会，帮助它们融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 作为社区型金融机构，信用金库为包括相对弱势群体在内的会员提供普惠金融服务，帮助他们获得经济资源和应对财务风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance

rationale: 信用金库的会员制和社区导向模式，旨在促进本地居民和中小企业的经济包容性，减少地域性的经济不平等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 信用金库及其联合会本身就是国内金融体系的重要组成部分，其存在和发展直接加强了为所有人提供金融服务的地方金融机构的能力。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 作为金融机构，如果其贷款组合过度集中于高碳排放行业（如某些传统制造业），则间接阻碍了气候变化措施的实施。但这种负面影响通常因其主要服务本地中小客户而非大型重工业而相对有限。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 地毯制造中的染色、整理和清洗过程通常消耗大量水资源，并可能向水体排放含有染料、化学助剂和重金属的废水，对水质构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 传统地毯生产是水资源密集型产业，用水效率通常不高，可能加剧水资源紧张地区的压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，地毯制造业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力，并提供了就业岗位。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业创造制造业就业机会，但其工作环境（如接触化学品、粉尘）是否符合“体面工作”标准取决于具体企业的管理和安全措施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为工业部门的一部分，该行业的存在本身支持了工业化。但其可持续性（如资源消耗和污染）是影响其对该目标净贡献的关键。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 地毯生产消耗大量原材料（如石油基纤维、水），且许多地毯产品寿命周期结束后难以回收，导致资源利用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中使用的合成染料、阻燃剂、挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等化学品，若管理不当，会对环境和工人健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 地毯制造业在生产过程中会产生边角料等废物，且其最终产品（废旧地毯）是填埋场中体积庞大的废弃物之一，回收利用率低，造成严重的废物问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 生产环境中的化学物质暴露（如挥发性有机化合物、粉尘）可能对工人呼吸系统和健康构成风险。某些地毯产品也可能在室内释放VOCs，影响消费者健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 家政服务通过将部分无偿的家务和照料工作转化为有酬劳动，有助于社会认可这些工作的价值，并为家庭（尤其是女性）分担照料责任提供了实际解决方案。
sdg_target_description: Recognize and value unpaid care and domestic work through the provision of public services, infrastructure and social protection policies and the promotion of shared responsibility within the household and the family as nationally appropriate

rationale: 家政服务业是劳动密集型行业，为大量人员，特别是女性和低技能劳动者提供了就业机会，有助于实现充分就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 家政服务业在全球范围内普遍存在非正规就业、低工资、缺乏社会保障、工作时间长、工作环境安全性问题等风险，特别是对移民女工而言，这与体面工作的原则相悖。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业生产用于建筑、防水工程等领域的耐用、高性能涂层/防水织物，是升级和改造可持续基础设施（如绿色建筑、防洪设施）所需的关键材料之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过生产耐用、长寿命的防水材料，可以减少因材料过早失效导致的资源浪费和频繁更换，从而在一定程度上促进资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 防水织物在建筑防水、临时庇护所、防洪设施（如沙袋）中的应用，有助于减少与水相关灾害造成的经济损失和对人员的影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations

rationale: 防水材料是增强城市和人类住区对灾害（尤其是洪涝）韧性的重要组成部分，支持综合灾害风险管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards inclusion, resource efficiency, mitigation and adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels

rationale: 防水织物可用于水库、灌溉渠道等水利基础设施的衬砌，防止渗漏，有助于改善水资源的管理和利用效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels, including through transboundary cooperation as appropriate

rationale: 在某些生态修复工程中（如人工湿地防渗），特定类型的防水/防渗材料可能被用于保护和恢复水相关生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, protect and restore water-related ecosystems, including mountains, forests, wetlands, rivers, aquifers and lakes

rationale: 涂层/防水织物的制造过程可能使用有害化学品（如某些溶剂、增塑剂、阻燃剂或PFAS）。如果管理不善，这些化学品可能在生命周期内释放到环境（水、土壤）中，对人类健康和环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 复合材料的涂层织物（如PVC涂层布）在生命周期结束时可能难以回收，通常被填埋或焚烧，增加了废物管理的挑战，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中化学品的不当处理或处置，以及产品废弃后可能产生的微塑料纤维或化学浸出物，存在对海洋环境造成污染的潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 作为体育用品的分销渠道，该行业通过提供促进身体活动的工具，间接支持预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 体育用品批发业本身是经济活动的一部分，创造就业机会（如物流、销售、管理），并支持零售端（通常是中小微企业）的运营和发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业的运营（如产品包装、物流过程中的废弃物）以及其核心商业模式（促进商品消费）可能在总体上增加废物产生，特别是如果产品生命周期管理不善或包装不环保。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为供应链中的一环，体育用品批发商可以通过其采购政策（例如，优先选择采用可持续实践和材料的供应商）来鼓励上游制造商提高可持续性。但其影响力通常有限。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 麻是一种可再生、可生物降解的天然纤维，其使用有助于可持续资源管理，减少对不可再生合成纤维的依赖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 麻制品在使用寿命结束后可生物降解，有助于减少废物产生，但纺纱过程中的废料管理是关键。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，麻纺纱业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation)

rationale: 行业若采用节能、节水的清洁生产技术进行现代化改造，可促进可持续产业升级。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies)

rationale: 麻纤维加工（如脱胶、漂白）可能使用化学品，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle)

rationale: 纺纱过程中的湿法处理可能产生含有化学残留物的废水，若未经妥善处理排放，会导致水污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials)

rationale: 自行车制造提供了促进身体活动的工具，有助于预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 自行车是可持续、有弹性的个人交通基础设施的关键组成部分，支持经济活动和福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 自行车本身是一种清洁环保的技术。但其制造过程需要向更可持续的工业过程升级，以增加资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 自行车制造为所有人（包括与公共交通结合使用）提供了一种负担得起、可持续的交通选择，是实现可持续交通系统的核心要素。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 通过提供零排放的出行方式，自行车有助于减少城市空气污染和整体环境足迹。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 自行车制造过程消耗金属、橡胶等自然资源，如果管理不当，可能对资源的可持续利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程（如金属加工、涂装）可能涉及化学品的使用和废物的产生，存在环境污染的风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中的废料（金属边角料、包装材料等）如果未有效管理，会增加废物产生。积极的一面是，自行车作为耐用产品，其长期使用和可修复性有助于减少废物，但此条目侧重于制造环节的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 自行车产业是低碳交通战略的关键推动者，支持将气候行动纳入国家和城市交通政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业可以通过采用更清洁的生产技术和提高资源效率来贡献于此目标，但其核心产品（传统感光材料）本身并非前沿的清洁技术，因此正面相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业的生产过程涉及卤化银等危险化学品，如果管理不当，会在其生命周期（从生产到废弃产品）中对环境和人类健康造成显著风险，构成主要的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 感光材料制造过程可能产生工业废物，且其最终产品（如废弃胶片和相纸）的回收处理具有挑战性，可能导致废物增加，与减少废物的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中使用的化学品如果通过废水排放，可能对水体造成污染，对改善水质的目标构成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 工人在生产过程中可能暴露于有害化学品，如果安全措施不足，会增加健康风险。产品生命周期末端的不当处理也可能导致环境污染进而影响健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 作为食物零售端，提供营养丰富的鱼类，间接支持粮食安全。但作为特定品类零售商而非主食供应商，直接贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 如果销售的鱼类受到汞、微塑料等污染物污染，或储存不当导致细菌滋生，可能对消费者健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 该行业创造了零售业的就业岗位。但其影响程度取决于实际提供的工作条件是否符合‘体面工作’的标准（如公平薪酬、安全工作环境）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业的需求是驱动渔业活动的关键因素。如果其采购行为不考量可持续性，会直接鼓励对海洋自然资源的不可持续利用和过度开发。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 新鲜鱼类易腐坏，在零售环节若库存管理不善或销量预测不准，极易造成食物浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 零售过程中使用的保鲜冰、泡沫箱、塑料袋等包装材料若处理不当，会产生大量废弃物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 零售商有机会通过产品标签（如MSC认证）和宣传，教育消费者关于可持续海鲜的选择，促进可持续生活方式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 该行业是渔业产品的终端市场之一。其采购政策若不以可持续性为先决条件，便是间接支持甚至驱动过度捕捞、IUU捕捞等行为，对恢复鱼类种群目标构成严重威胁。这是该行业最显著的负面影响之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 如果该行业积极采购和销售来自经认证的可持续渔场或符合科学管理计划的鱼类，则能通过市场力量鼓励可持续捕捞实践，对实现此目标做出积极贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, effectively regulate harvesting and end overfishing, illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing and destructive fishing practices and implement science-based management plans, in order to restore fish stocks in the shortest time feasible, at least to levels that can produce maximum sustainable yield as determined by their biological characteristics

rationale: 若采购来源涉及非法、不报告和不管制（IUU）捕捞的鱼类，则违背了基于国际法的海洋资源保护和可持续利用框架。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources by implementing international law as reflected in UNCLOS, which provides the legal framework for the conservation and sustainable use of oceans and their resources, as recalled in paragraph 158 of The Future We Want

rationale: 维持鱼类新鲜度所需的冷藏、冷冻设备（冷链）是能源消耗大户，间接导致温室气体排放，与气候变化应对措施相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 二手零售的核心是商品的再利用，通过延长产品寿命直接预防废物产生，是实现该目标的关键商业模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过减少对新原材料的需求和产品生命周期内的资源消耗，二手零售促进了自然资源的更高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 二手零售业通常由中小型企业或个体经营者运营，该行业创造了零售、物流、翻新等领域的就业和创业机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 通过促进本地化的商品循环利用，减少了与长距离运输新产品和城市废物处理相关的环境足迹。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 如果二手商品（如电子产品、电池）在回收、翻新或最终处置过程中管理不当，可能导致有害化学物质泄漏到环境中。这是一种潜在的、依赖于具体操作实践的负面影响风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 运动器材的制造和销售直接促进身体活动，有助于预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 某些玩具（如带有小零件的玩具）如果设计或制造不当，可能对儿童造成窒息等安全风险，尽管相关性较弱且主要受法规约束。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents

rationale: 教育类玩具（如拼图、建筑套装、科学工具包）可以补充正规教育，帮助儿童发展认知技能和获得有效学习成果。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes

rationale: 某些建构类和技术型玩具（如编程机器人）可以帮助青少年培养未来就业所需的技术和职业技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升，并可能涉及技术创新。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业创造就业机会，并依赖于设计和创意。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...

rationale: 制造业，特别是在全球供应链中，可能存在工作条件、劳工权利和职业安全方面的风险。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 玩具和运动器材的制造可能涉及新材料、智能技术（如电子玩具、智能健身设备）的应用和创新，从而提升工业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people...

rationale: 制造过程可能使用塑料、电池、涂料等化学品，其生产、使用和废弃阶段若管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业生产大量消费品，许多是短寿命或过度包装的，导致资源消耗和废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。但积极的一面是，通过设计耐用、可回收的产品可以部分缓解此影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过销售体育用品，该行业使更多人能够进行体育锻炼，这是预防非传染性疾病和促进身心健康的关键方式，直接支持目标3.4。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，体育用品商店创造销售、管理和物流等就业岗位，支持体面工作和经济增长，特别是许多此类企业属于中小型企业。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 销售户外运动装备（如登山、露营、水上运动用品）支持与自然和体育相关的可持续旅游活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 该行业通过销售商品促进消费，可能间接导致资源消耗、产品快速更新换代以及废弃运动器材和包装的产生，与减少废物的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提供和推广女性运动用品，该行业可以在社会层面鼓励和支持女性平等参与体育活动和公共生活，尽管这是间接且较弱的贡献。
sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 货币兑换业作为金融服务的一部分，为跨境贸易、旅游和中小企业活动提供便利，间接支持了包括获取金融服务在内的生产性活动政策。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 该行业提供了基础的、可及的金融服务（尤其是对于旅行者或没有国际银行账户的个人），有助于扩大金融服务的覆盖范围，但其影响相对间接和有限。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 一个规范运营的货币兑换行业是全球金融市场监测和监管体系的一部分，但其直接贡献较小。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 货币兑换业是侨汇流动的关键环节。竞争性且透明的兑换服务有助于降低汇款成本，直接支持此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce to less than 3 per cent the transaction costs of migrant remittances and eliminate remittance corridors with costs higher than 5 per cent

rationale: 如果监管不足或存在漏洞，货币兑换业可能被用于洗钱或其他非法资金转移活动，对减少非法资金流动的目标构成显著风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial and arms flows, strengthen the recovery and return of stolen assets and combat all forms of organized crime

rationale: 国家公务员行业是建立和运行国家层面有效、负责和透明机构的核心力量，其日常运作直接决定该目标的实现程度。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 政府有责任设计和实施包容性的决策流程，确保公共政策反映社会各界的诉求。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 国家政府是协调不同部门政策、确保其与国家可持续发展战略保持一致的关键行为体。
sdg_target_description: Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.

rationale: 国家政府在国际合作和多利益攸关方伙伴关系中扮演领导者和参与者的角色，推动全球可持续发展目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships...

rationale: 国家公务员负责设计、资助和管理覆盖全民的社会保障体系，这是消除贫困的核心手段。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all...

rationale: 实现全民健康覆盖需要国家层面的医疗卫生政策制定、系统建设和资源分配，这是政府的基本职能。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage...

rationale: 提供免费、公平和优质的义务教育主要依靠国家教育政策的制定和公共教育体系的建设与维护。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education...

rationale: 政府通过财政、工资和社会福利等政策工具，是减少国内和国家间不平等的主要责任方。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality.

rationale: 如果治理体系存在缺陷，国家公务员系统内部可能发生腐败和贿赂行为，严重阻碍可持续发展。这是该行业潜在的、需要警惕的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.

rationale: 如果政府各部门政策制定缺乏协调，甚至出现相互冲突的情况（例如，经济政策与环境目标背道而驰），则会对可持续发展产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.

rationale: 制糖业为种植甘蔗或甜菜的小规模农民提供了重要的市场，有助于提高其农业收入。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers...)

rationale: 如果糖料种植采用可持续农业实践（如节水、减少农药），则对建立可持续粮食生产系统有贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices...)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，制糖业通过加工初级农产品创造附加值，有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 制糖业在农业（种植）和工业（加工）环节提供了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 传统制糖过程可能消耗大量水和能源，若管理不善则与自然资源的可持续管理相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制糖过程中可能使用化学品（如澄清剂），并产生有机废水（如甘蔗渣废水），若处理不当会造成环境污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 制糖业会产生大量副产品（如蔗渣、糖蜜）和废水，若未有效循环利用则增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 大规模的单一糖料作物种植可能导致土壤退化、生物多样性丧失，与防治荒漠化和恢复土地的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...)

rationale: 过量消费添加糖是肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的主要风险因素，制糖业作为主要供应方与此健康目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment...)

rationale: 制糖废水（富含有机物）若未经处理直接排放，会严重污染水体，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals...)

rationale: 水泥是建设高质量、可靠基础设施（如道路、桥梁、建筑）的核心材料。水泥批发业作为供应链的关键环节，通过确保建筑材料的流通和供应，直接支持基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 水泥批发业作为分销部门，通过高效的物流和供应链管理促进经济活动，为建筑和相关产业提供支持，从而对经济生产力做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 水泥是住房建设的基本材料。批发环节通过供应水泥，间接支持保障住房和基本服务所需的建筑活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 传统水泥生产是资源密集型产业，大量消耗石灰石等自然资源。水泥批发业作为该产品供应链的一部分，其业务依赖于这种不可持续的资源消耗模式。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 水泥生产是主要的二氧化碳排放源。水泥批发业通过分销高碳足迹的产品，间接支持了高排放的经济活动，与将气候变化措施纳入主流的国家政策方向相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果水泥批发商积极推广和分销采用清洁技术生产的低碳或环保水泥，则可以对该目标产生有限的积极影响，推动产业升级。但作为分销商，其直接影响较小。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，食肉小売为不同技能水平的人群提供了就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 本地肉类零售店可以支持和推广本地农产品，间接促进本地经济和产品，但与旅游业的关联性较弱，得分较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 食肉小売是零售环节减少粮食浪费（特别是高价值、易腐坏的肉类产品）的关键节点，其库存管理、促销策略和消费者教育直接关系到该目标的实现。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses)

rationale: 零售商可以通过产品标签（如有机、草饲、本地采购）、信息提供和促销活动，影响消费者的选择，促进对可持续肉类消费的认识。但其影响力取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature)

rationale: 肉类零售提供了营养丰富的食物，有助于食物获取。但肉类通常价格较高，并非解决脆弱群体饥饿和营养不足的最直接手段，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round)

rationale: 过量消费红肉和加工肉类与非传染性疾病（如心血管疾病、某些癌症）的风险增加有关。零售业推广和销售这些产品，若不加引导，可能对公共健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being)

rationale: 肉类生产是土地、水等自然资源密集型产业，也是污染源之一。食肉小売作为供应链末端，其销售的产品若来自不可持续的生产系统，则间接支持了自然资源的低效使用和管理不善。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 畜牧业是温室气体排放的重要来源。肉类零售业的需求驱动了生产环节，从而间接对气候变化做出贡献，与将气候行动纳入各层面的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 为扩大牧场或饲料种植而导致的土地利用变化（如毁林）是生物多样性丧失的主要驱动力。肉类消费需求通过零售环节传递，间接对自然栖息地和生物多样性构成压力。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 骨料和石制品是建造道路、桥梁、建筑等高质量、可持续基础设施不可或缺的基础材料，直接支持经济发展和人类福祉。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业提供的建筑材料是建造安全、适足住房和城市基础设施（如供排水系统）的基础，对实现可持续城市化有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 建筑材料的生产和供应是连接城乡发展、支持区域规划中基础设施建设的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning

rationale: 骨料和石材的开采属于资源密集型活动，若管理不当，会导致自然资源的不可持续消耗和枯竭。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 开采和加工过程可能产生大量废石、粉尘等废弃物，对减少废物产生的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 采石和采矿活动会直接破坏陆地生态系统，导致栖息地丧失、土壤侵蚀和生物多样性下降。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 露天开采可能导致土地退化、土壤肥力丧失，与防治荒漠化和恢复土地的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil...

rationale: 采石和石材加工业可能存在职业健康与安全风险（如粉尘、机械事故），对保障工人安全的工作环境构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers...

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，它提供了就业并贡献于经济活动，但该行业通常规模较小且技术升级潜力有限，因此相关性为中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 属于制造业范畴，对工业化和就业有微弱的正面贡献，但其在整体工业结构中的份额和影响力通常很小。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 宗教用具是文化遗产的重要组成部分，其制造活动直接支持宗教文化和传统习俗的延续，从而间接有助于保护和捍卫文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 如果制造过程依赖不可持续来源的原材料（如特定木材、金属、宝石），则会对自然资源的可持续管理产生负面影响。这是该行业的主要潜在环境风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用化学品（如染料、涂料、抛光剂）并产生工业废物，如果管理不当，会对环境造成危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中的边角料、包装材料等若未有效管理，会导致废物产生。该行业在废物减量方面可能存在挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提供清洁的洗浴设施，公共浴场有助于维持个人卫生，从而在一定程度上预防水媒疾病和其他传染病的传播。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases

rationale: 浴场提供的放松环境有助于缓解压力，促进身心健康和福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

rationale: 作为社区中提供放松和社交的积极场所，可能间接减少对有害物质依赖的风险，但相关性较弱。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol

rationale: 公共浴场为城市居民，特别是那些家中洗浴设施不完善的人群（如租住狭小公寓者、无家可归者），提供了重要的卫生和清洁设施，有助于实现公平的卫生服务获取。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations

rationale: 公共浴场运营消耗大量淡水，并产生含有肥皂、洗发水等化学物质的废水。如果废水处理不当，会对水体造成污染，对改善水质的目标构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 公共浴场是耗水密集型设施，其运营通常涉及大量的淡水消耗，对提高用水效率和应对水资源短缺的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 浴场需要持续加热大量水并维持空间温度，是能源消耗大户，通常对提高能源效率构成压力，除非采用先进的节能技术和可再生能源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为社区基础服务的一部分，公共浴场为居民，特别是居住条件有限的人群，提供了重要的清洁服务，补充了住房的基本服务功能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 公共浴场是重要的社区公共空间，促进社会互动和社区凝聚力，尤其当设计上考虑到不同群体（如老年人）的需求时，有助于建设包容性城市。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities

rationale: 浴场运营消耗水、能源以及清洁剂等资源，若管理不善，则与自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 运营中使用的化学品（如清洁剂、消毒剂）及其包装废弃物若处理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 浴场运营会产生固体废物（如一次性用品包装），对减少废物产生构成轻微压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 疏浚工程是维护和升级港口、航道等关键交通基础设施的核心活动，直接支持可靠和可持续的运输网络，对经济和人类福祉至关重要。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 当用于环境修复目的（如清除污染物、恢复湿地）时，疏浚工程有助于可持续地管理和恢复海洋及沿海生态系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 若管理不善，疏浚作业会直接物理破坏海底栖息地（如底栖生物群落），对海洋生态系统造成显著的负面影响，违背可持续管理的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, sustainably manage and protect marine and coastal ecosystems to avoid significant adverse impacts, including by strengthening their resilience, and take action for their restoration in order to achieve healthy and productive oceans

rationale: 疏浚过程可能搅动并释放沉积物中的污染物（如重金属、营养盐），导致水体二次污染，增加海洋污染风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 通过清除富营养化沉积物或改善水流，疏浚有助于改善内陆水体的水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 疏浚活动本身会短期内显著增加水体浊度，并可能释放污染物，对水质产生不利影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 疏浚工程产生大量疏浚物，若这些物料被归类为废物且未得到有效利用（如填海或资源化利用），则增加了废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 民间广播是向广大公众传播可持续发展、人权、性别平等等知识和技能的重要非正式教育渠道，影响力广泛。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...)

rationale: 广播作为一种信息通信技术，可以通过专门节目和包容性内容制作来增强妇女权能。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the use of enabling technology, in particular information and communications technology, to promote the empowerment of women)

rationale: 通过旅游节目、文化介绍和本地特产推广，可以间接支持可持续旅游业的发展。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 作为传统但广泛覆盖的ICT形式，广播在普及信息获取方面仍扮演角色，尤其是在互联网覆盖不足的地区。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020)

rationale: 通过提供多元化的视角和代表不同群体的声音，广播可以有力地促进社会包容。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status)

rationale: 广播是提高公众对可持续发展和生活方式认识的关键媒介。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature)

rationale: 广播在传播气候变化知识、提高公众意识和发布预警信息方面具有重要作用。
sdg_target_description: (Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning)

rationale: 作为'第四权力'，广播通过调查性报道和舆论监督，对促进机构的有效、负责和透明至关重要。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 保障公众获取信息是广播业存在的核心价值和基本职能。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements)

rationale: 通过报道犯罪、反腐败和支持法治教育，广播可以间接支持相关国家机构的能力建设。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels... to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime)

rationale: 如果广播内容中强化性别刻板印象或在管理层缺乏性别多样性，会阻碍妇女在公共生活中的有效参与和领导机会。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 带有偏见或歧视性的媒体报道会固化社会偏见，加剧不平等，与确保机会平等的目标背道而驰。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure equal opportunity and reduce inequalities of outcome, including by eliminating discriminatory laws, policies and practices and promoting appropriate legislation, policies and action in this regard)

rationale: 广播内容（尤其是广告）可能鼓励过度消费和计划性淘汰，从而导致废物产生增加。其运营本身（如设备、宣传材料）也产生废物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果广播机构自身存在腐败、缺乏透明度或报道失实，则会损害其公信力，并对建设负责任的机构产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 如果广播机构进行自我审查、传播虚假信息或成为特定利益集团的工具，则会严重损害公众获取准确信息的权利。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements)

rationale: 牛奶零售是确保消费者，特别是儿童和家庭，能够方便地获得安全、营养的食品（牛奶）的关键渠道，直接贡献于粮食安全和改善营养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 牛奶作为钙和蛋白质的良好来源，其可获得性有助于支持均衡饮食和预防营养不良相关疾病，间接促进整体健康与福祉。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，牛奶零售店创造了销售、物流、管理等就业岗位，为当地经济做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 牛奶是易腐品，如果库存管理不善或需求预测不准，零售环节容易造成食物浪费，对减少零售层面食物浪费的目标构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 牛奶通常使用纸盒、塑料瓶等包装，如果这些包装材料未被有效回收或采用可持续替代品，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 纺织制造业是全球主要的就业来源之一，为大量人口，特别是女性，提供了就业机会。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 棉丝织物制造常包含中小型企业及手工作坊，该行业的发展有助于这些企业融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets)

rationale: 纺织品的染色和后整理过程是工业水污染的主要来源之一，会向水体排放大量有害化学物质和染料。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 棉花种植是高度耗水的农业活动，纺织制造过程也消耗大量水资源，对水资源可持续利用构成压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...)

rationale: 制造过程中使用的化学品（如染料、助剂）若管理不当，可能对环境（水、土壤）和人体健康造成危害。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 传统线性生产模式可能导致纺织品边角料和废弃产品的产生，增加固体废物负担。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 为扩大棉花种植而进行的土地开垦可能破坏自然生态系统，种植过程中农药的使用也可能影响生物多样性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 沿海航运业是区域交通和贸易网络的关键组成部分，提供了相对可持续（单位货物碳排放较低）和可靠的运输基础设施，支持经济发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过促进货物高效流通，支持区域经济一体化和生产力提升，本身也是一个提供就业的劳动密集型产业。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 船舶运营可能造成海洋污染，包括油污泄漏、污水排放、垃圾倾倒和压载水带来的外来物种入侵，直接对海洋环境构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 航运船舶通常使用化石燃料，是温室气体和空气污染物的排放源，对气候变化有负面影响，需要纳入气候行动规划进行管理和减排。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业为海员、港口工人等提供就业机会。但其影响的正负性取决于实际工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准（如安全、公平薪酬）。此处主要考虑其提供就业的积极潜力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 通过采用更节能的船舶、清洁燃料（如LNG）和环保技术，沿海航运业可以提升其可持续性和资源效率，符合该子目标方向。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为食品制造业，该行业通过生产和分销面包、点心等产品，为人们（尤其是城市人口）提供了便捷的食物来源，有助于确保食物供应。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 作为下游产业，其需求可以推动上游农业的规模化生产，但该行业本身对农业生产体系的可持续性直接影响有限，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production...

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过采用自动化生产线和加工技术，有助于提高经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...

rationale: 该行业提供了从生产、包装到物流等一系列就业岗位，对实现充分就业有贡献，但需要关注工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 行业可以通过采用节能烤箱、优化水资源利用和减少食物浪费的技术来提升可持续性，但并非该行业的核心创新焦点，相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes...

rationale: 许多糕点和甜面包含有高量的糖、不健康脂肪和精制碳水化合物，过度消费此类产品是导致肥胖、糖尿病等非传染性疾病的风险因素，与促进健康的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being.

rationale: 大规模生产可能消耗大量水资源、能源以及农产品原料，若管理不当，会对自然资源造成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 该行业通常使用大量塑料、纸制品等一次性包装，是固体废物（尤其是塑料污染）的重要来源之一，对减少废物目标构成显著挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 作为医疗设备批发商，该行业是医疗供应链的关键环节，通过确保诊断、治疗和监测设备的可及性，直接支持全民健康覆盖所需的基础设施和物资供应。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all.

rationale: 该行业通过分销用于医学研究和诊断的精密仪器（如分析设备、实验室设备），间接支持与健康相关的研发活动。
sdg_target_description: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-提供负担得起的药品和疫苗，根据《与贸易有关的知识产权协议（TRIPS协议）与公共健康多哈宣言》的规定，支持研发影响发展中国家的传染和非传染性疾病的疫苗和药品，并提供负担得起的药品和疫苗。

rationale: 该行业批发的精密仪器（如测量、分析、实验室设备）是科学研究和技术创新的重要工具和投入品，有助于提升各行业的技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending.

rationale: 作为批发行业，它本身提供了一定的就业机会，对实现充分的生产性就业有直接但中等程度的贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 批发行业的物流和仓储环节可能存在职业安全风险或劳工权益问题（如长时间工作、不安全的工作环境），构成潜在的负面影响，但影响程度取决于具体公司的实践。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment.

rationale: 批发活动涉及大量的包装材料（如纸箱、塑料填充物）和物流运输，可能导致废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突，但负面影响通常可通过优化运营来减轻。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 作为制造业，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业的就业岗位，但其'体面工作'的程度取决于具体工厂的劳动条件。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men...)

rationale: 该行业是工业活动的一部分，但其可持续性取决于生产技术和资源效率。
sdg_target_description: (Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization...)

rationale: 皮革作为主要原材料，其可持续获取（与畜牧业相关）和管理常面临挑战，可能导致自然资源（如土地、水）的低效使用和过度消耗。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 传统皮革鞣制过程可能使用铬等有害化学品，若处理不当，会对环境和工人健康造成风险，不符合化学品和废物的无害化环境管理目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle...)

rationale: 生产过程中会产生皮革边角料等固体废物，若未有效回收或再利用，则增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 对皮革的需求可能驱动畜牧业扩张，进而导致森林砍伐、土地退化和生物多样性丧失，威胁陆地生态系统的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems...)

rationale: 与15.1类似，与皮革生产相关的土地利用变化是自然栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失的重要因素之一。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity...)

rationale: 皮革制造中的废水，若含有未妥善处理的鞣制化学品，会造成严重的水污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals...)

rationale: 家具修理通过修复和翻新旧家具，直接防止其被丢弃进入垃圾填埋场或焚烧炉，是实现废物预防和再利用的核心活动。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过延长现有家具的寿命，减少了对新家具的需求，从而降低了对木材、金属等原生自然资源开采的压力，促进了资源的更高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 家具修理行业通常由小型作坊、个体工匠或小微企业经营，该活动为本地社区提供了技能型就业和创业机会。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 通过减少需要处理的固体废物量，家具修理有助于减轻城市废物管理系统的负担，从而降低城市对环境的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management

rationale: 修理过程中可能使用含有挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的油漆、胶粘剂、清漆或木材防腐剂。如果这些化学品的使用、储存或废弃物处理不当，可能对环境和工人健康造成潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是设备安装和工程施工，是建设和维护高质量、可靠、可持续和有韧性的基础设施（如工业设施、公用事业系统）的关键组成部分，直接支持经济发展。
