sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业通过安装和升级工业设备及系统，直接参与基础设施和产业的可持续改造，有助于提高资源利用效率和采用更清洁的技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 作为工程服务行业，它通过技术应用和创新推动经济生产率的提高，属于技术升级和劳动密集型领域。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了大量的工程、技术和熟练劳动力就业岗位，对实现充分的生产性就业和体面工作有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 设备安装和工程施工过程通常会产生建筑垃圾、废弃包装材料等，如果管理不善，会增加废物产生，与减少废物的目标相悖。此评分反映了潜在的负面影响，实际影响取决于具体实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 建筑和工程行业存在固有的安全风险（如高空作业、重型机械）。如果安全管理不到位，可能导致工伤，对保护劳工安全和权利的目标产生负面影响。但如果严格遵守安全标准，则可产生积极影响。此评分反映了风险存在的普遍性。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 如果该行业安装的设备包括高效能的工业机械、HVAC系统或节能设备，则可以间接贡献于提高能源效率的目标。但由于行业定义宽泛，并非所有项目都直接相关。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 批发行业是劳动密集型产业，直接创造了大量的物流、销售和管理岗位，为实现充分和生产性就业做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 高效的批发和物流网络是支撑经济运行的商业基础设施的关键组成部分，确保商品能够可靠地流通。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 作为供应链的关键环节，批发商可以通过选择采购和推广符合可持续消费和生产模式的产品，来推动10年框架的实施。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 如果批发商大量分销资源密集型、不可持续来源的商品（如一次性塑料制品、过度包装产品），则会加剧自然资源的低效使用和不可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 批发活动本身会产生包装废弃物（如纸箱、填充物），且其分销的商品若为短寿命或一次性产品，会间接导致终端废物量的增加。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 批发商可以作为公共部门或大型企业的供应商，通过提供环保、合规的商品和服务，支持可持续的公共采购实践。
sdg_target_description: (Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities)

rationale: 批发业通过连接不同国家和地区的生产商与买家，促进了全球贸易伙伴关系，是实践多利益攸关方合作以实现发展的平台。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources)

rationale: 毛皮服装制造依赖动物资源，若养殖或狩猎不可持续（如过度捕猎、高环境足迹的养殖），会直接违背自然资源的可持续管理目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 毛皮产业可能通过栖息地破坏（为养殖场清地）或直接捕猎濒危物种，加剧生物多样性丧失和物种灭绝风险。
sdg_target_description: (Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species)

rationale: 如果毛皮来源涉及非法偷猎或贩运受保护动物（如某些貂、豹类），该行业会直接助长对生物多样性的威胁。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance global support for efforts to combat poaching and trafficking of protected species, including by increasing the capacity of local communities to pursue sustainable livelihood opportunities)

rationale: 毛皮制造业在一些地区可能存在劳工标准低下问题，如低工资、不安全的工作条件（如化学品暴露），对劳工权利产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment)

rationale: 毛皮鞣制和染色过程常使用铬、甲醛等有害化学品，可能导致工人健康风险及当地环境污染，与减少化学品危害的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 邮政服务是通信和物流基础设施的核心组成部分，提供可靠、可负担的基本服务，支持经济发展和民生，特别是通过普遍服务确保公平接入。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 作为劳动密集型行业，邮政业提供大量就业岗位，包括分拣、投递等，有助于实现充分就业和体面工作。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 邮政网络连接城乡地区，促进经济和社会联系，支持区域均衡发展，是可持续社区规划的重要工具。
sdg_target_description: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning

rationale: 通过提供普遍的邮政服务，减少地理和经济上的隔离，促进社会包容，使偏远或弱势群体也能接入基本通信和金融服务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

rationale: 邮政运营依赖交通工具（卡车、飞机），产生温室气体排放，若未采用清洁能源或优化路线，会对气候变化产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 业务中可能使用大量包装材料（如纸箱、塑料），若管理不当会导致废物增加，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是分销包装用品。如果其分销的产品主要是不可回收、一次性或过度包装的材料，则会直接助长废物的产生，与通过预防、减量、回收和再利用来大幅减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 作为批发商，该行业有能力影响其客户（可能包括大型企业或公共部门实体）的采购选择。通过提供和推广可持续包装解决方案（如可回收、可生物降解的材料），它可以促进可持续的公共和企业采购实践。
sdg_target_description: (Promote public procurement practices that are sustainable, in accordance with national policies and priorities)

rationale: 作为供应链中的重要一环，包装用品批发业通过高效的物流和分销支持制造业和零售业的生产力提升，促进了经济活动。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业本身创造了批发贸易领域的就业机会，并支持了依赖于包装的众多中小型企业（如食品生产商、电商卖家）的创业和运营。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 包装用品批发是物流和供应链基础设施的一部分，确保商品能够被安全有效地运输和储存，从而支持经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being...)

rationale: 如果该行业大量分销塑料等不易降解的包装材料，而这些材料最终因不当处理进入海洋，将成为海洋塑料污染的重要来源之一，对防止和减少海洋污染的目标构成显著威胁。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution)

rationale: 包装用品的生产消耗自然资源（如木材、石油），其废弃物如果处理不当（如填埋或露天堆放），会污染土壤和淡水生态系统，危害陆地生物的生存环境。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...)

rationale: 作为零售业的一部分，该行业为各类人群（可能包括女性和年轻人）提供就业机会，对实现充分就业和体面工作有基础性贡献。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 该行业作为本地商业生态的一部分，支持地方经济和社区活力，间接有助于创造就业和促进本地产品流通。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 该行业通常销售大量廉价、快速更迭的非必需品，可能鼓励冲动消费和过度消费模式，与实现可持续消费和生产模式的总体框架相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 所售商品多为小件、包装繁多、寿命短的个人杂货，极易在使用后成为废弃物，对实现大幅减少废物产生的目标构成显著挑战。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 如果所售个人护理品、化妆品等含有有害化学物质，或其生产供应链造成污染，则可能对消费者健康和环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 零售业通常是女性就业比例较高的行业，为该群体提供了经济参与的机会。但其工作质量和晋升机会的公平性是需要关注的方向。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产和就业为工业化做出贡献，但其作为'其他'类别，规模和影响力可能有限。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 纤维工业生产过程（如水、能源、原材料消耗）若管理不善，可能导致自然资源的使用不可持续。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业在染色、整理等工序中可能使用大量化学品，存在化学品和废物管理不当的风险，可能导致环境污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 生产过程中可能产生工业废料和边角料，若未有效实施废物减量化和循环利用策略，会增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但对'体面工作'的贡献程度取决于具体的工作条件、薪酬和安全标准，作为细分行业，其总体就业贡献相对一般。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 纤维工业的废水（特别是染色废水）若未经妥善处理排放，会对水体质量造成严重污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 摄影行业作为创意产业的一部分，为摄影师、冲印师等提供就业和创业机会，支持小微企业的成长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 行业向数码摄影技术的转型体现了技术升级和创新，尽管其研发强度可能不如高科技制造业。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 传统摄影冲印过程使用显影剂、定影剂等有害化学品，若管理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 传统摄影产生化学废液和废弃相纸等废物；数码摄影虽减少了化学废物，但仍可能产生电子废物（如旧相机、打印机）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 摄影化学品的不当处理可能对工人和社区的健康构成风险，但现代法规和数码化已降低了这种风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 电影院作为服务业场所，提供售票、运营、管理等就业岗位，为不同群体（包括青年）创造体面工作机会。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 电影院作为文化娱乐设施，可吸引本地及游客消费，促进文化消费和本地经济，间接支持可持续旅游业政策。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 电影作为文化产品，能传播知识、促进对不同文化的理解和包容，间接支持可持续发展教育。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development... and appreciation of cultural diversity)

rationale: 电影院作为放映文化遗产电影（如经典影片、纪录片）的场所，有助于保护和传播文化遗产。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 电影娱乐为公众提供休闲和社交机会，有助于心理放松和福祉，但需平衡久坐健康风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being)

rationale: 电影院运营可能产生大量废弃物（如零食包装、宣传单），若管理不当，会增加废物处理压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 电影院设施（如放映设备、空调）通常能耗较高，若未采用节能技术，可能不利于能源效率提升。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 各种教育设施是提供中小学教育服务的基础，是实现普及、公平和优质教育的核心实体。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes

rationale: 该行业涵盖高等教育和职业教育设施，直接为人们提供获得这些教育机会的场所。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: 职业培训中心等教育设施是培养青年和成人就业、创业所需技能的关键平台。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业的核心活动就是教育设施的建造、维护和升级，其设计和运营质量直接关系到是否能为所有人提供安全、包容和有效的学习环境。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all

rationale: 通过提供教育和培训机会，帮助青年留在教育系统或获得技能，从而减少未就业、未受教育或未培训的青年比例。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, substantially reduce the proportion of youth not in employment, education or training

rationale: 教育设施的选址和可达性（例如，是否靠近公共交通）直接影响学生和教职工能否安全、公平地获得教育服务，是可持续社区规划的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all... with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 大型教育设施的运营（如能源消耗、水资源使用、物资采购）如果管理不善，可能导致自然资源的使用效率低下和浪费。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果教育设施本身的设计和运营未充分考虑节能减排（如使用高碳能源、能效低下），则其碳足迹会对气候行动产生负面影响。但同时，教育设施也是传播气候知识的重要场所，具有潜在的巨大正面影响，此条目仅评估其作为物理实体可能产生的直接负面运营影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业的核心业务是销售化石燃料，这直接维持并可能扩大化石燃料在全球能源结构中的份额，阻碍可再生能源份额的增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

rationale: 化石燃料的销售鼓励了对不可再生自然资源（石油）的不可持续消费和低效使用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 作为化石燃料供应链的关键环节，该行业的持续运营与将气候变化应对措施纳入主流的国家政策方向相悖，是温室气体排放的主要贡献者。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业的存在和盈利能力可能依赖于或受益于鼓励浪费性消费的低效化石燃料补贴，这与逐步取消化石燃料补贴的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: Rationalize inefficient fossil-fuel subsidies that encourage wasteful consumption...

rationale: 如果该燃料零售商未来转型或扩展业务，开始提供生物燃料、氢燃料或配套的电动汽车充电服务，则可能对促进清洁能源技术的获取和推广有微弱的正面贡献。但这并非其当前核心业务。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology...

rationale: 作为交通能源补给网络的一部分，该行业在维持现有基础设施的运行方面具有一定作用。如果其设施升级以适应更可持续的燃料，可能对发展可持续基础设施有微弱的正面影响。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...

rationale: 非铁金属制造业是工业体系的基础部门，为众多下游产业提供关键原材料，直接贡献于工业产值和就业，促进工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业严重依赖矿产开采和能源消耗，若管理不善，会导致自然资源（尤其是矿石和化石燃料）的不可持续利用和枯竭。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 初级金属生产过程会产生大量矿渣、尾矿等工业固体废物。尽管金属本身可回收，但初级生产阶段的废物产生量巨大。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 非铁金属（如铝、铜）具有很高的回收价值，该行业通过回收废金属进行再生生产，有助于减少对原生矿产的依赖和废物产生，符合循环经济原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 金属制造业，特别是冶炼环节，可能存在高温、粉尘、有毒物质暴露等职业健康与安全风险，需要严格管理以保护工人权益。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 非铁金属冶炼是能源密集型产业，通常依赖化石燃料，是温室气体（特别是二氧化碳）的重要排放源，对减缓气候变化构成挑战。

rationale: 生产过程中的废水若含有重金属等污染物且未经妥善处理就排放，会严重污染水体，影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 大工工事業提供熟练工匠的就业机会，是建筑行业体面工作的重要组成部分。

sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 使用木材这种可再生资源进行建筑，可以被视为采用更环保的技术和材料来升级基础设施，但相关性略低于直接的基础设施建设（9.1）。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes)

rationale: 大工工事業直接参与安全、适宜的住房建设，有助于保障人们的住房需求。

rationale: 木材在许多地区是重要的本地建筑材料，该行业实践支持利用本地资源进行建设，但此目标主要针对最不发达国家，因此相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: (Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials)

rationale: 如果木材采购自可持续管理的森林，则该行业通过使用可再生资源促进了自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 建筑施工过程（包括木材切割等）可能产生大量废料，如果废物管理不当，会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 木材作为建筑材料可以储存碳，使用木材替代高碳排放材料（如混凝土、钢材）有助于减缓气候变化，间接支持气候行动政策的实施。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 如果木材需求驱动了可持续的森林管理实践，则该行业对森林保护有积极贡献。

rationale: 如果木材来源涉及非法采伐或不可持续的森林砍伐，则该行业会对森林保护和可持续管理产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 商品检验业通过对食品、饮用水、消费品中的有害物质（如化学品、重金属）进行检测，防止不安全产品危害公众健康，直接减少由污染和有害物质引起的疾病和死亡。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 检验服务是确保基础设施（如建筑材料、关键设备）质量和可靠性的关键环节，支持可持续和有韧性的基础设施建设。

rationale: 通过提供检验和认证服务，该行业促进清洁技术和环保工艺的采纳与验证，帮助产业升级以实现更高的资源利用效率和可持续性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities.

rationale: 商品检验涉及对产品中化学物质含量的检测和合规性评估，有助于在整个生命周期内实现对化学品的环境无害化管理，减少其对环境和健康的危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 通过确保产品质量，减少因产品缺陷、过早失效或不符合标准而导致的废物产生，间接支持废物预防。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 商品检验业作为一个专业服务行业，本身属于知识密集型和高附加值活动，并通过确保贸易商品质量来支持经济活动和生产率提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 该行业制造的货物装卸搬运设备是物流、港口、仓库等基础设施的核心组成部分，其质量和可靠性直接支持可持续和有韧性的基础设施发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 高效的搬运设备是提升制造业和物流业生产力的关键，通过技术升级和创新直接促进经济生产率的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 先进的搬运设备可以优化物流流程，减少货物损坏和能源消耗，从而有助于自然资源的更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 设备制造过程可能涉及重金属、电池、润滑油等化学品的使用和废弃，如果管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 如果行业主要生产电动或氢能等低碳排放的搬运设备，则对气候行动有积极贡献。但考虑到行业内可能仍存在传统能源设备，因此相关性得分中等。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 如果行业大量生产和使用以化石燃料为动力的设备，则会直接产生温室气体排放，对气候行动产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通过发行纪录片、教育片和具有深刻文化内涵的电影，该行业是传播可持续发展知识、促进文化多样性和全球公民意识的重要渠道。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development.

rationale: 作为创意产业的核心环节，电影发行直接创造就业（营销、物流、技术、法务等），并为众多中小型制片公司和创意人才提供将产品推向市场的渠道，支持创业和创新。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 发行展现特定地区风景、文化和历史的电影（如旅游宣传片、地方特色纪录片），可以有效吸引游客，促进可持续旅游业发展。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products.

rationale: 现代电影发行严重依赖数字基础设施（高速网络、流媒体平台、数据中心）。该行业的发展推动了对高质量、可及的数字信息基础设施的需求和建设。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

rationale: 通过发行来自不同文化背景、关注边缘化群体故事的电影，该行业可以促进社会包容，增进理解，赋予弱势群体话语权。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 电影发行是保存、修复和传播电影文化遗产（经典影片）以及通过纪录片展示自然与文化遗产的关键手段，使其得以流传并被新一代观众欣赏。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage.

rationale: 该行业的核心职能是确保信息和文化产品（电影、纪录片等）能够广泛地触达公众，是保障公众获取信息和文化权利的重要一环。
sdg_target_description: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements.

rationale: 国际电影合拍与发行是跨国合作与知识（技术、叙事）共享的典型例子，促进了文化交流和技术传播。
sdg_target_description: Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge sharing on mutually agreed terms, including through improved coordination among existing mechanisms, particularly at the United Nations level, and through a global technology facilitation mechanism.

rationale: 电影发行项目通常涉及制片方、发行商、放映方、金融机构等多方合作，是多利益攸关方伙伴关系的体现，有助于在全球范围内分享创意成果。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources, to support the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals in all countries, in particular developing countries.

rationale: 行业内的合作模式（如公私合营建设影院、与 NGOs 合作发行公益影片）是有效伙伴关系的实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships.

rationale: 尽管数字发行是趋势，但传统的物理介质（DVD/蓝光光盘、包装材料）的生产、运输和废弃仍会产生固体废物。数字发行本身也依赖高能耗的数据中心。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 该行业的运营（办公能耗、员工通勤与差旅、数据中心电力消耗）会产生碳排放，若未采取有效的节能减排措施，则对气候行动有负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过提供就业和创造经济价值，为工业化做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 传统织物制造（尤其是印染和后整理）是水资源、能源和原材料（如棉花、化纤）的消耗大户，若未采用可持续实践，则对自然资源的可持续管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 纺织制造过程，特别是染色、整理和废水处理，可能使用和排放有害化学品，对实现化学品的无害环境管理目标构成显著障碍。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业是工业废水的重要来源，含有染料、助剂等污染物，若处理不当，会严重阻碍水质改善目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该制造业活动提供就业机会，对实现充分就业有贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 纺织制造业历史上存在工作条件差、劳工权利保障不足的风险，尤其是在监管不力的地区，可能对此目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 该行业制造科学研究和技术开发所必需的核心测量与分析仪器，是增强科学研究和技术能力的基础。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 其产品（实验室设备、测量仪器）是进行科学、技术、工程和数学（STEM）教育和职业技能培训的关键工具。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业生产的环境监测和分析仪器（如空气质量监测站、水质分析仪）对于检测和量化污染物、保护公众健康至关重要。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 水质监测和分析仪器是评估水质、识别污染源、确保水处理效果和实现该目标的基础设施。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 气候监测仪器（如气象站、温室气体分析仪）为气候变化研究、公众意识提升和早期预警系统提供关键数据。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

rationale: 仪器制造过程可能使用有害化学品（如溶剂、蚀刻剂）并产生电子废物，如果管理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 通信设备是构建现代数字基础设施的核心组件，直接支持可靠、可持续和有韧性的信息通信技术（ICT）基础设施的发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通信设备制造业是典型的技术密集型产业，其发展依赖于持续的科学研究、技术创新和研发投入，有助于提升整体工业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 该行业生产实现互联网接入和普及所必需的基础设备（如基站、网络传输设备），是缩小数字鸿沟的关键。
sdg_target_description: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020

rationale: 作为高科技制造业，通信设备制造通过技术升级和创新，直接贡献于经济生产率的提高。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 通信技术是实现远程教育、在线课程和开放教育资源的技术基础，有助于扩大优质教育的可及性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education, including university

rationale: ICT技能是现代社会重要的就业技能之一，该行业提供的技术平台支持在线技能培训和终身学习。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 现代化的教育设施需要配备通信和网络设备，以创建包容和有效的数字学习环境。
sdg_target_description: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all

rationale: 可靠的通信系统是公共卫生预警、应急响应和远程医疗服务不可或缺的基础。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks

rationale: 通信技术是实现智能电网、远程办公、优化物流等气候变化减缓措施的重要赋能工具。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 通信网络是传播气候变化知识、提高公众意识和进行早期预警信息传递的关键渠道。
sdg_target_description: Improve education, awareness-raising and human and institutional capacity on climate change mitigation, adaptation, impact reduction and early warning

rationale: 电子设备制造过程可能使用有害化学品，其产品报废后若处理不当会成为电子废物（e-waste），对环境管理和减少有害物质释放构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的产品生命周期可能较短，且回收体系尚不完善，导致电子废物产生量较大，与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 零售业，特别是'其他各种商品零售'类别，常常由中小型企业和个体户经营，是创造就业和支持创业的重要领域，符合该子目标对中小企业发展的支持。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 零售业，尤其是非专业化的杂项零售，可能存在非正式就业、低工资、工作条件不稳定或缺乏社会保障等问题，这与实现'体面工作'的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 如果该零售业务包含销售二手商品、可回收产品或鼓励循环利用的商品（如二手店、修理店），则直接通过促进再利用来减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该零售业务主要销售廉价、一次性、低质量或过度包装的商品，则会促进不可持续的消费模式，导致废物增加，与该子目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果所售商品的供应链涉及不可持续的资源开采或低效利用（例如，来自不可持续来源的原材料制成的商品），则对该子目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业的零售商可以通过采纳可持续采购政策、选择环保供应商、减少自身运营的环境足迹等方式，积极贡献于该目标。但其影响程度取决于企业的具体实践。
sdg_target_description: Encourage companies, especially large and transnational companies, to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle

rationale: 零售网络是商业和经济基础设施的一部分。'其他各种商品零售'的存在有助于社区获得多样化的商品和服务，支持本地经济发展和民生便利，尽管其直接关联性不如核心基础设施（如交通、能源）那么强。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 自行车和某些两轮车（如电动自行车）相比汽车通常速度较慢，可能有助于减少严重交通事故的风险，但摩托车本身也存在安全风险，因此贡献有限。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents)

rationale: 销售自行车和电动自行车（使用电力而非化石燃料）有助于减少城市空气污染，从而对公共健康产生积极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 如果零售的车辆包括燃油摩托车，其尾气排放会加剧空气污染，对健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 电动两轮车通常比燃油车辆能源效率更高，其推广有助于提高交通领域的能源效率。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 零售业是典型的中小企业领域，提供就业机会并支持地方经济发展。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises...)

rationale: 作为正规零售业务，为不同人群提供就业岗位，贡献于体面工作。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 两轮车是可持续交通系统的组成部分，支持发展更具弹性和可持续性的城市交通基础设施。

rationale: 自行车和电动自行车提供了相对廉价、可持续的个人交通选择，可以补充公共交通系统，提高交通可及性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons)

rationale: 推广非燃油动力的两轮车有助于减少城市空气污染和噪音污染，降低城市环境负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management)

rationale: 燃油摩托车的使用会增加城市空气和噪音污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management)

rationale: 销售节能、低排放的车辆（如电动自行车）符合可持续消费的方向。
sdg_target_description: (Implement the 10-year framework of programmes on sustainable consumption and production, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries)

rationale: 车辆（尤其是电池）的生命周期结束时若处理不当会产生电子废物和有害废物。零售环节本身也涉及包装材料等废弃物。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 电动两轮车作为低碳交通工具，其推广支持国家气候变化减缓战略。

rationale: 燃油摩托车的销售和使用会增加温室气体排放，不利于气候变化应对。

rationale: 铺装工事业是建设和维护道路等交通基础设施的核心活动，直接贡献于发展可持续、有韧性的基础设施，支持经济发展和人类福祉。

sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业领域的就业机会，对实现充分和生产性就业有直接贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 现代节能升降机（如使用能量回馈技术的电梯）有助于提高建筑物的整体能效，间接贡献于全球能效改善率的提升。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 升降机制造过程可能产生工业废料、包装废物等。如果未实施有效的废物管理和循环利用策略，会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 制造过程中可能使用化学品（如润滑油、涂料、电子元件中的物质），若管理不当，可能对环境和个人健康造成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 信用合作社的核心模式是为社区成员，特别是可能被主流金融机构排斥的群体，提供金融服务（如储蓄、信贷），直接促进其对经济资源的获取，符合目标1.4的精神。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 信用合作社是中小微企业（MSMEs）重要的融资渠道之一，通过提供贷款支持其创业、创新和成长，从而创造体面工作，直接贡献于目标8.3。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 信用合作社专门服务于本地和小规模企业，增加它们获得金融服务（特别是可负担信贷）的机会，助力其融入市场和价值链，与目标9.3高度一致。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 信用合作社的社区所有制和普惠金融模式有助于促进经济包容，减少因经济地位等原因造成的社会排斥，支持目标10.2。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

rationale: 虽然信用合作社旨在扩大金融服务覆盖面，但如果其治理不善、风险管理不足或资本充足率不够，可能导致机构不稳定甚至倒闭，反而会削弱国内金融机构的能力，并对会员的金融安全构成风险，这与加强金融机构稳健性的目标相悖。这种负面影响虽然不总是发生，但是潜在风险。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 如果采取可持续的采集方式，该行业有助于实现森林生态系统及其服务的可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 可持续的非木材林产品采集是促进森林可持续管理的一种形式，可以为保护森林提供经济激励。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 如果管理不当，过度或破坏性的采集活动（如过度挖掘药用植物）会损害森林生态系统的保护和可持续利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements

rationale: 不可持续的采集实践可能间接导致森林退化，与可持续森林管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 对特定非木材林产品（如某些珍稀植物）的过度采集可能加剧栖息地退化和生物多样性丧失。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species

rationale: 该行业的核心是管理和使用森林生物资源，可持续的采集实践直接贡献于自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业为农村地区，特别是森林周边社区，提供了就业和生计来源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 非木材林产品可以作为可持续旅游业（如生态旅游、农林业体验）的一部分，促进当地产品和就业。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products

rationale: 对于贫困的农村人口，采集非木材林产品是重要的收入补充和生计安全网，有助于减贫。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day

rationale: 采集的可食用林产品（如蘑菇、野果）可以直接改善当地社区的粮食安全和营养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality

rationale: 该行业的核心产品氢氧化钠是水处理和废水pH中和的关键化学品，直接有助于改善水质和减少污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 作为基础化学品供应商，该行业支持下游众多产业的发展。但其自身生产过程（特别是传统方法）的资源效率和清洁技术应用水平往往不高，因此对SDG 9.4的正面贡献是间接且有限的。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes)

sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all.

sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations.

rationale: 对农业扩张、采矿、基础设施建设等可能破坏自然栖息地和生物多样性的项目进行投资，会直接对该目标产生负面影响。

sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 传统和纸制造过程中可能使用一些化学品（如漂白剂、胶料）或产生废水、废渣，若处理不当，可能对环境造成负面影响。

rationale: 制造过程可能产生植物纤维废料或其他副产品，如果缺乏有效的废物减量、回收和再利用措施，会增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 造纸过程是水资源密集型产业，抄纸和清洗环节会产生废水。如果废水未经妥善处理直接排放，可能对水体造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

sdg_target_description: By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all, improving road safety, notably by expanding public transport, with special attention to the needs of those in vulnerable situations, women, children, persons with disabilities and older persons

rationale: 通過建設水庫、輸水管道、水處理廠等水利基礎設施，該行業有助於保障安全飲用水的供應。

sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 建設海堤、防洪堤、防災避難設施等有助於增強對氣候相關災害和自然災害的抵禦能力。

rationale: 土木工程施工過程（如水泥生產、重型機械使用、土方開挖）通常伴隨高能耗和高碳排放，若未採用低碳實踐，則與將氣候行動納入規劃的目標相悖。
