sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services

rationale: 不當的施工活動可能導致土壤侵蝕、土地退化和荒漠化，與實現土地零退化的目標衝突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 土木工程消耗大量自然資源（如沙石、木材、水），若管理不善，會導致資源的低效利用和不可持續開採。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 建築和拆除活動是城市固體廢物的主要來源之一，產生大量廢棄建材，若未有效回收利用，則與減少廢物產生的目標相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 存款保险保护了个人（尤其是贫困和脆弱群体）的金融资产（一种经济资源），防止其因银行倒闭而损失，间接保障了他们获得金融服务的安全。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 存款保险作为一种金融安全网，增强了储户（特别是脆弱群体）应对银行体系危机这类经济冲击的抵御能力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

rationale: 通过维护金融体系稳定，存款保险为中小企业获得金融服务和开展生产活动创造了更安全的环境，间接支持了体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 存款保险是增强国内金融机构（特别是银行）稳健性和公信力的核心机制，通过建立公众信心，鼓励更多人使用银行服务，直接促进了普惠金融。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all.

rationale: 稳定的银行体系是中小企业获得信贷等金融服务的基础。存款保险通过降低系统性风险，间接支持了中小企业融入价值链和市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets.

rationale: 存款保险机构是金融监管和安全网体系的重要组成部分，其存在和有效运作本身就是对金融市场和机构进行审慎监管和风险管理的体现，有助于减少金融体系内的不平等和风险。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations.

rationale: 存款保险机构是金融领域一个关键的有效、负责和透明的公共机构。其设立和运作旨在维护金融稳定，保护公众利益，是强大制度建设的具体体现。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 发酵工业生产的酱油、味噌、氨基酸等是重要的食品和调味品，有助于丰富食物种类和改善食品风味，间接支持粮食安全和营养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 发酵技术可用于生产生物肥料或农药，或通过利用农业副产品作为原料，间接支持可持续的农业生产系统。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 发酵工业是抗生素、疫苗等关键药品的重要生产来源，直接有助于防治传染性疾病。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases.

rationale: 作为生物制药的核心部分，发酵工业支持着药物和疫苗的研发与生产。
sdg_target_description: Support the research and development of vaccines and medicines for the communicable and non-提供基本药物和疫苗.

rationale: 发酵工业包含酒精饮料的生产，其产品的滥用可能对公共健康构成风险，与预防有害使用酒精的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol.

rationale: 发酵过程产生的高浓度有机废水如果未经妥善处理直接排放，会严重污染水体，恶化水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 发酵工业可以生产生物乙醇等生物燃料，这些是可再生能源的来源之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix.

rationale: 发酵工业是一个技术密集型产业，通过技术创新和生产高附加值产品（如特种化学品、药品）来驱动经济增长和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors.

rationale: 发酵工业高度依赖生物技术和工艺优化，是工业研发和创新活动非常活跃的领域，直接促进产业技术升级。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending.

rationale: 发酵过程可以利用农业废弃物等生物质资源，将其转化为有价值的产品，促进资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 通过将可能被浪费的农产品或食品加工副产品用作发酵原料，有助于减少整个供应链中的粮食损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 发酵工业可能使用或产生某些化学品，其废渣、废液若管理不当，可能对环境造成有害释放。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 尽管有资源化利用的潜力，但发酵过程本身也会产生固体废物和副产品，需要妥善处理以减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse.

rationale: 如果用于发酵的农业原料（如用于生物燃料的作物）的种植导致森林砍伐或土地退化，则会对陆地生态系统产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements.

rationale: 与15.1类似，不可持续的原料采购可能与森林可持续管理目标冲突，但相关性较间接。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally.

rationale: 批发业是供应链的关键环节，通过高效的物流和分销网络支持经济多样化和生产力提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业为中小型企业提供了进入市场的渠道，支持创业和就业，但其对政策制定的直接影响有限。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 批发活动依赖于并有助于优化物流和供应链基础设施，但其本身不直接进行基础设施的开发和建设。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 如果该行业涉及食品批发，其高效的库存和物流管理有助于减少供应链中的粮食损失。但由于商品种类未知，此相关性具有不确定性。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses

rationale: 批发活动通常涉及大量包装材料（如纸箱、塑料填充物），如果管理不当，会导致废物产生。此外，其分销的商品若为一次性或不耐用品，会间接助长废物问题。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为商品流通的中间环节，如果其分销的商品本身不符合可持续发展理念（如高能耗产品、不可持续来源的商品），则该行业在无意中支持了不可持续的消费模式，与推广可持续生活方式的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development and lifestyles in harmony with nature

rationale: 液压和气动设备是工业自动化、建筑机械和众多制造业的核心基础部件，直接支撑着工业化的进程和生产效率的提升。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 高效、精密的液压和气动系统是实现产业升级、提高资源使用效率（如节能、精确控制减少原材料浪费）所采用的关键技术之一。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 该行业通过提供提高机械自动化水平和生产效率的关键部件，间接支撑了整个制造业实现更高水平的经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 高效的液压/气动系统可以通过精确控制来优化机械操作，从而减少能源和原材料的消耗，促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 液压设备制造和使用过程中可能涉及矿物油等化学品。这些油品的泄漏、设备生命周期结束时的处置不当，可能对环境造成污染，与化学品无害环境管理的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业产品本身在制造过程和报废后会产生金属、橡胶、塑料等废弃物。如果回收体系不完善，会增加废物产生量。但同时，其产品通过提高效率又能帮助其他行业减少废物，因此负面影响相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过提供节能高效的工业部件，该行业间接支持了将节能减排措施融入工业运营，从而对气候行动做出积极贡献，但这种贡献是间接的。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 印刷业是知识传播和技能培训材料（如教科书、手册）生产的重要环节，间接支持技能发展。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship)

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，印刷业通过采用自动化、数字化技术提高生产率，并提供就业机会，贡献于经济增长。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业支持创意产业（如设计、出版）和中小企业发展，创造就业。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 行业向数字印刷、使用环保油墨和水性涂布等技术转型，有助于提高资源效率和采用更清洁的技术。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 尽管数字媒体是主流，但印刷品在信息可及性方面仍扮演补充角色，特别是在互联网覆盖不足的地区。
sdg_target_description: (Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020)

rationale: 印刷过程使用的化学品（油墨、溶剂、显影液）若管理不当，可能对环境造成有害释放，需要严格的化学品和废物管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil...)

rationale: 印刷业会产生大量废纸、印版和包装材料，对减少废物生成的目标构成挑战，尽管回收利用可以缓解部分影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 行业对纸张的巨大需求可能对森林资源构成压力，除非完全依赖经过可持续认证的再生纸或管理良好的森林产品。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally)

rationale: 生产过程中挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的排放可能造成室内空气污染，影响工人和周边社区健康。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 某些印刷工艺（如制版、清洗）可能产生含有害化学物质的废水，若处理不当会污染水体。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

rationale: 信息处理服务通过提供云计算、大数据分析等关键技术，直接帮助各行各业提高生产效率和实现技术升级。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 该行业是数字时代关键的信息通信技术（ICT）基础设施提供者，支撑着经济和社会的数字化转型。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 通过提供可扩展的、相对低成本的计算资源（如云服务），该行业有助于支持全球范围内的技术创新和研发活动。
sdg_target_description: (Support domestic technology development, research and innovation in developing countries...)

rationale: 如果信息处理服务商积极采购可再生能源为其数据中心供电，则直接贡献于增加可再生能源份额。但此贡献取决于企业的具体能源选择，非行业固有属性。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix)

rationale: 行业有强大动力通过改进冷却技术、服务器虚拟化等手段提高数据中心能效，从而推动全球能效提升。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 信息处理服务本身是赋能技术，帮助其他产业进行数字化和可持续升级。同时，行业自身也需采用清洁技术以减少环境影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable... with greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies)

rationale: 通过优化资源利用（如服务器整合、虚拟化）和提高运营效率，有助于更可持续地管理能源等资源。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 若数据中心主要依赖化石燃料供电，其巨大的能源消耗将产生大量温室气体排放，对气候变化产生负面影响，与国家气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 硬件设备（服务器、网络设备）的快速更新换代会产生大量电子废物，若回收处理不当，则与减少废物的目标相冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 数据处理服务涉及大量敏感信息，若发生数据泄露或滥用，会侵蚀公众对机构的信任，影响建立有效、负责和透明机构的进程。
sdg_target_description: (Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels)

rationale: 虽然该行业有助于信息访问，但如果数据管理不当，可能侵犯个人隐私（基本自由之一），或导致信息被不当控制。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms...)

rationale: 证券业通过促进资本流动、支持企业融资和投资活动，为可持续的经济增长做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries

rationale: 证券业可以为中小企业（MSMEs）提供融资渠道（如通过创业板市场），支持其发展和正规化。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services

rationale: 证券业通过提供股权融资等金融服务，帮助中小企业（包括工业领域的企业）获得资金并融入更广阔的市场。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 如果证券业缺乏有效监管，其投机行为或不当操作可能加剧金融市场波动和系统性风险，从而潜在地加剧经济不平等。该目标强调了加强监管的必要性，以减轻此类负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Improve the regulation and monitoring of global financial markets and institutions and strengthen the implementation of such regulations

rationale: 证券业是动员国内外私人投资流向发展中国家的重要渠道之一，例如通过发行债券或股票。
sdg_target_description: Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources

rationale: 证券业可以作为多利益攸关方伙伴关系的一部分，参与动员和分享金融资源，以支持可持续发展项目。
sdg_target_description: Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development, complemented by multi-stakeholder partnerships that mobilize and share knowledge, expertise, technology and financial resources

rationale: 石膏和石灰是建筑和工业基础设施的关键基础材料，支持基础设施的建设和维护。但其制造过程本身需要向更清洁技术升级才能完全符合该目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 石膏和石灰的开采（采矿）可能导致自然资源（矿物、土地）的不可持续消耗和栖息地破坏，对资源的可持续管理构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能产生粉尘（包括有害的结晶硅尘）、废水和工业废料，如果管理不当，会对空气、水和土壤造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业可以利用工业副产品（如发电厂产生的脱硫石膏）作为原料，实现废物的回收利用，从而减少废物产生。但这种积极贡献取决于具体的生产实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济增长和生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 虽然提供就业，但生产环境可能存在粉尘等职业健康风险，若安全措施不足，则对实现“体面工作”构成挑战。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 石灰制造过程（碳酸钙分解）是重要的工业二氧化碳排放源，对减缓气候变化构成显著负面影响，迫切需要将减排措施纳入行业政策。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 生产过程中产生的粉尘（如可吸入结晶二氧化硅）如果控制不当，会增加工人患矽肺病等呼吸道疾病的风险，对健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 司法书士通过提供法律文件起草和登记服务，帮助个人和企业行使法律权利，是保障普通人能够诉诸司法和获得法律服务的关键环节，直接促进法治和司法可及性。
sdg_target_description: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.

rationale: 司法书士处理不动产登记、遗嘱和继承等事务，直接帮助客户确立和保障对土地和财产的所有权与控制权，这对于保障经济资源权利至关重要，尤其对弱势群体。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

rationale: 通过提供平等的法律服务，司法书士可以帮助女性主张其在财产、遗产等方面的合法权利，支持法律赋予的女性平等经济权利的实际落实。
sdg_target_description: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws.

rationale: 司法书士为企业的设立和变更提供商业登记服务，这有助于小微企业实现正规化运营，支持创业和企业发展，从而促进体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.

rationale: 司法书士作为法律专业人士，其工作与法务局等政府登记机构紧密衔接，有助于确保登记程序的规范性和透明度，间接支持建立有效和负责任的公共机构。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 建筑工事业是建设和维护各类物理基础设施（如建筑、道路附属设施）的核心执行部门，直接支撑经济和社会发展。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 该行业直接负责住宅建筑的施工，是提供安全、适当住房的关键环节。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums

rationale: 作为主要就业领域之一，建筑工事业为大量工人提供就业机会，但其工作条件和薪酬公平性是需要关注的重点。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 该行业在采用本地材料和工艺建设可持续建筑方面具有潜力，尤其在对最不发达地区的援助项目中。
sdg_target_description: Support least developed countries, including through financial and technical assistance, in building sustainable and resilient buildings utilizing local materials

rationale: 建筑和拆除活动是城市固体废物的主要来源之一，若未实施有效的废物管理和循环利用策略，会显著增加废物产生量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统建筑活动能耗高，并大量使用水泥等高碳排材料，是温室气体排放的重要贡献者，对减缓气候变化构成挑战。其影响需要通过政策引导向绿色建筑转型来缓解。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 施工现场产生的粉尘、噪音、化学物质（如油漆、粘合剂）可能造成空气、水和土壤污染，影响工人和周边社区居民的健康。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 土地开发和建筑施工可能导致自然栖息地的丧失、土壤侵蚀和生物多样性下降，对陆地生态系统产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services...

rationale: 书籍批发业通过确保技能培训、职业发展和终身学习所需书籍的广泛流通和可获得性，间接支持人们获取相关技能。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills, including technical and vocational skills, for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship

rationale: 该行业作为出版供应链的关键环节，通过其运营支持文化产业的经济生产力，并创造就业机会。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 书籍批发活动涉及大量包装材料（纸箱、塑料）的使用，以及处理未售出或退回书籍时可能产生的纸张浪费，与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 行业运营（如运输能耗）和对纸质书籍的依赖（涉及森林资源）可能对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力，尽管其核心是分销而非直接生产。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 票据交换所是金融基础设施的关键组成部分，提供可靠、高效的支付清算服务，直接支持经济体系的运行和稳定，是优质基础设施的体现。
sdg_target_description: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

rationale: 通过确保支付系统的顺畅运行，票据交换所间接加强了金融体系的整体能力和稳定性，为扩大普惠金融奠定了基础。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

rationale: 作为受监管的金融基础设施，票据交换所的运作需要遵循明确的规则和标准，这有助于在金融领域建立有效和负责任的机构。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels

rationale: 电影和视频是传播可持续发展教育、全球公民意识以及文化多样性的重要工具，能够有效影响广大受众。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development...)

rationale: 该行业可以通过在制片、导演、编剧等关键创意和决策职位上赋予女性权力，促进性别平等和妇女的领导参与。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making...)

rationale: 影视服务业是创意经济的核心部分，支持着大量中小企业、自由职业者和艺术家，创造体面工作和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: (Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation...)

rationale: 制作宣传特定地点风景和文化的影视作品（如旅游节目、取景地电影）可以促进可持续旅游业的发展。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, devise and implement policies to promote sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products)

rationale: 现代影视服务依赖于高质量的数字基础设施（如高速网络、云存储），其发展间接支持了可持续数字基础设施的建设。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...) to support economic development and human well-being)

rationale: 行业不断推动拍摄技术、视觉特效、流媒体传输等领域的研发和创新，提升产业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors... encouraging innovation)

rationale: 通过制作反映多元群体故事和视角的内容，该行业可以有力地促进社会包容，对抗歧视。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all...)

rationale: 纪录片、历史剧等影视形式是记录、展示和保护无形及有形文化遗产的重要手段。
sdg_target_description: (Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage)

rationale: 影视制作过程（如搭建和拆除布景、使用一次性道具、制作宣传物料）可能产生大量固体废物，若管理不善则与减废目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 影视作品是向公众传播可持续生活方式信息和提高环保意识的有效平台。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure that people everywhere have the relevant information and awareness for sustainable development...)

rationale: 制作活动（如大量用电的影棚、设备运输、国际差旅）通常有较高的碳足迹，若未采取减排措施，会对气候行动产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 作为媒体内容的重要提供者，该行业保障了公众获取信息和思想的自由，是民主社会的重要组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms...)

rationale: 跨国合拍片、内容国际发行等活动是多利益攸关方伙伴关系的体现，有助于文化交流和共同发展。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development...)

rationale: 作为制造业的核心部分，该行业通过生产工业机械直接推动可持续工业化和经济增长，提高产业在就业和GDP中的份额。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业生产的特殊机械（如高效生产线、自动化设备）是其他产业进行可持续升级和技术改造所必需的关键投入，有助于提高资源效率和采用环保技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过制造先进的专用机械，该行业直接帮助客户产业实现技术升级和创新，从而提高整体经济生产率。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation

rationale: 作为制造业企业，该行业本身创造就业机会，并其产品支持下游产业的生产活动。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation

rationale: 机械制造过程可能涉及使用有害化学品、消耗能源和资源，并产生工业废料和排放，如果管理不当，会对环境造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 制造过程本身可能产生大量工业废物（如金属废料、包装材料），与减少废物产生的目标存在潜在冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 特殊机械制造通常需要高水平的研发和技术创新，有助于增强科学研究和工业技术能力。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries... encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers

rationale: 如果该行业生产的机械旨在提高资源利用效率（如节水灌溉系统、精准农业设备），则可对自然资源的可持续管理做出积极贡献，但作为通用类别，此关联性不确定且得分较低。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 果树种植生产水果，直接提供食物，有助于实现粮食安全和改善营养。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 可持续的果树种植实践（如综合害虫管理、土壤保护）可以贡献于建立有韧性的农业系统和改善土地质量。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality.

rationale: 果树种植业在 rural areas 创造了季节性及长期的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 采用节水灌溉、有机施肥等可持续实践的果树种植有助于自然资源的有效管理。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

rationale: 改进的收获后处理和储存技术可以减少水果在供应链中的损失。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 管理良好的果园可以作为农业生态系统，提供一定的生态服务，如果园内的生物多样性保护。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements.

rationale: 如果果树种植过度依赖化学农药和化肥，可能导致土壤和水体污染，对环境产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 为扩大果园而砍伐森林或转换自然栖息地，可能导致生物多样性丧失和自然栖息地退化。
sdg_target_description: Take urgent and significant action to reduce the degradation of natural habitats, halt the loss of biodiversity and, by 2020, protect and prevent the extinction of threatened species.

rationale: 果树种植，特别是需水量大的水果，如果灌溉效率低下，可能导致水资源过度消耗，加剧水资源短缺。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity.

rationale: 该行业结合制造和零售，有助于经济多元化并提升生产力，特别是在本地经济中创造就业和增值。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 若行业采用可持续制造技术（如节能工艺或环保材料），可促进产业升级和资源效率。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 若行业优先使用认证的可持续木材或回收材料，可贡献于自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 制造过程可能产生大量木材废料或包装废物，若缺乏有效的废物减量和回收系统，会加剧废弃物问题。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 若家具制造依赖非法或不可持续的木材采伐，可能导致森林退化，违背可持续森林管理目标。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests...)

rationale: 装裱业的核心业务是修复和保护书画等文化遗产，直接致力于文化遗产的长期保存和传承。
sdg_target_description: Strengthen efforts to protect and safeguard the world’s cultural and natural heritage

rationale: 作为一个小型专业服务行业，表具业提供了专业技能岗位，并依赖于创造力和传统工艺，支持中小企业的存在和发展。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 通过修复和重新装裱艺术品，该行业延长了物品的使用寿命，减少了因丢弃而产生的废物，符合废物预防和再利用的原则。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 通过保存文化遗产，该行业间接支持了文化多样性的教育和欣赏，这是可持续发展教育的一部分。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure that all learners acquire the knowledge and skills needed to promote sustainable development, including, among others, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality, promotion of a culture of peace and non-violence, global citizenship and appreciation of cultural diversity and of culture’s contribution to sustainable development

rationale: 国家公务员系统是国家层面制度的核心组成部分，其有效、负责和透明的运作直接决定了该子目标的实现程度。
sdg_target_description: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

rationale: 公务员系统在政策制定和执行过程中，有责任确保决策过程的回应性、包容性和参与性。
sdg_target_description: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.

rationale: 国家公务员的核心职责之一是协调不同部门的政策，确保其与国家可持续发展战略保持一致。
sdg_target_description: Enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.

rationale: 公务员系统在发起、促进和管理实现SDGs所需的多利益攸关方伙伴关系方面扮演关键角色。
sdg_target_description: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships.

rationale: 国家公务员系统负责设计、管理和实施全国性的社会保障体系和措施。
sdg_target_description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable.

rationale: 如果治理不善，公务员系统内部可能滋生腐败和贿赂行为，这是该子目标所要解决的核心问题之一。系统性的腐败会严重阻碍可持续发展。
sdg_target_description: Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms.

rationale: 如果制定的财政、工资或社会政策不当或执行有偏差，公务员系统有可能无意中维持或加剧不平等。
sdg_target_description: Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality.

rationale: 船体模块制造是造船工业的核心组成部分，直接贡献于工业产值和制造业就业，符合促进工业化的目标。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业属于资本和技术密集型的制造业，通过提高生产效率和采用先进制造技术（如自动化焊接、数字化设计）来贡献于经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业为工人（如焊工、装配工、工程师）提供生产性就业岗位，直接贡献于就业目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 船体制造消耗大量钢材、能源和水资源，如果管理不善，可能导致自然资源的使用不可持续。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 制造过程可能涉及有害物质（如油漆、溶剂、焊接烟尘）的使用和废料（如金属废料、废油）的产生，若处理不当，会对环境和健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业会产生固体废物（如金属边角料），尽管部分可回收，但整体废物减量仍是一个挑战，通常对实现此目标构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 虽然制造活动本身是陆基的，但其最终产品（船舶）是海洋污染（如油污、塑料垃圾、压载水排放）的潜在来源，因此该行业间接与此负面目标相关联。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

rationale: 重工业制造环境存在安全隐患（如重型机械、高空作业、焊接风险），如果安全管理不到位，可能对工人安全构成威胁，对此目标产生潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: Protect labour rights and promote safe and secure working environments for all workers, including migrant workers, in particular women migrants, and those in precarious employment

rationale: 作为物流和供应链的关键环节，该行业通过实现货物的高效流动，支持商业活动和经济生产力的提升。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 货物轻型汽车运输是区域和城市物流基础设施的重要组成部分，保障了货物和服务的流动。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure...)

rationale: 该行业为城市内的'最后一公里'物流提供运输服务，是城市交通系统的一部分，但其可持续性取决于车辆技术（如是否电动化）。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, provide access to safe, affordable, accessible and sustainable transport systems for all...)

rationale: 作为全球供应链的一环，高效的轻型货物运输间接支持更可持续的生产和消费模式，但关联性较弱且间接。
sdg_target_description: (Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production)

rationale: 依赖化石燃料的轻型货车是温室气体和空气污染物的直接排放源，与应对气候变化的目标相悖，除非车队实现电动化或使用清洁能源。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 增加道路上的车辆数量会潜在增加交通事故的风险，但轻型货车通常在城市中低速行驶，风险相对可控，相关性中等偏低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, halve the number of global deaths and injuries from road traffic accidents)

rationale: 燃油车辆排放的尾气（如PM2.5、氮氧化物）是城市空气污染的重要来源，对公共健康构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业通过生产活动贡献于经济生产力，并可能涉及技术升级（如自动化装订线）。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业岗位，为就业做出贡献，但其'体面工作'的程度（如工作条件、薪酬）取决于具体企业的实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 作为工业部门的一部分，该行业支持工业化，但其可持续性（资源效率、污染控制）是关键考量因素。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 印刷和加工过程通常使用油墨、溶剂、粘合剂等化学品，如果管理不当，可能对环境（水、土壤污染）和人类健康造成负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业会产生大量固体废物，如裁切产生的纸边角料、不合格品、废旧版材等，直接与减少废物产生的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业严重依赖纸张等自然资源，如果原材料采购不可持续（如来自不可持续管理的森林），则对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的排放和化学品的不当处理可能对工人和周边社区的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果纸张原料来自不可持续的采伐，该行业的需求会间接推动森林砍伐和森林退化，与可持续森林管理目标相悖。

rationale: 如果该行业制造的产品包括自行车、残疾人用车等，可以为可持续和个人化的交通选择做出贡献，补充公共交通系统。

rationale: 如果该行业专门制造残疾人辅助运输设备（如轮椅、电动代步车），则通过改善行动能力间接支持全民健康覆盖和福祉。
sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 制造过程可能产生工业废物和报废产品。如果未实施有效的废物管理和回收措施，会对减少废物产生的目标产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业的制造活动（如能源消耗、材料加工）通常会产生温室气体排放，对减缓气候变化构成挑战，除非采用清洁生产技术。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为肉类供应链的关键环节，屠宰场通过提供动物蛋白，对确保粮食安全和营养供给有间接贡献。但这种贡献的可持续性受到畜牧业整体模式的影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round.

rationale: 屠宰场运营中产生的废水若处理不当，会造成水体污染（富营养化、病原体传播），对周边社区的健康构成风险。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination.

rationale: 屠宰场提供了就业机会。但其工作环境（体力要求高、潜在安全风险）可能难以完全达到‘体面工作’的标准，因此正面相关性中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value.

rationale: 屠宰场是肉类供应链中可能产生损失和浪费的关键节点（如处理不当导致的胴体部分废弃）。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses.

rationale: 屠宰过程产生大量有机废物（血液、内脏、骨骼等）和废水，若管理不善，会对环境和健康造成显著负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment.

rationale: 屠宰场是高耗水行业，其排放的废水含有高浓度的有机物、氮磷营养物质和病原体，是潜在的水体污染源，与改善水质量的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally.

rationale: 作为畜牧业（一个主要的温室气体排放源，特别是甲烷和氧化亚氮）的下游环节，屠宰场的存在和规模间接支撑了高排放的农业生产系统，与气候行动目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning.

rationale: 製糸業作为劳动密集型产业，特别是在农村地区，为当地居民（尤其是女性）提供了重要的就业机会。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 製糸業是纺织服装价值链的关键上游环节，许多中小型企业参与其中，其发展有助于产业价值链的整合。
sdg_target_description: Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises, in particular in developing countries, to financial services, including affordable credit, and their integration into value chains and markets

rationale: 传统的製糸过程需要消耗大量的水和能源，若管理不善可能导致自然资源使用效率低下。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 缫丝过程中的废水（含有丝胶蛋白等有机物）若未经妥善处理直接排放，可能对水体和土壤造成污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 製糸业是耗水和排污行业，生产过程中产生的有机废水是主要的环境挑战，若处理不当会严重影响水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 制造高能效的冷冻和空调设备是提高建筑和工业领域能源效率的关键手段，直接贡献于全球能效改善目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency

rationale: 作为制造业的一个细分领域，该行业本身是工业化的组成部分，提供就业和经济增长。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 该行业生产的设备（如高效热泵、绿色制冷剂空调）是升级建筑和工业基础设施以实现可持续性和资源效率的关键技术。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes

rationale: 通过提供高能效产品，该行业有助于更可持续和高效地利用能源资源。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果继续使用高全球变暖潜能值（GWP）的制冷剂或在产品生命周期结束时处理不当（如制冷剂泄漏、电子废物管理不善），该行业可能对环境（特别是臭氧层和气候变化）和健康产生显著的负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业通过开发和推广使用低GWP制冷剂和高能效的技术，为实施国家气候变化减缓政策（如逐步淘汰氢氟碳化物HFCs）提供了关键的解决方案。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 该行业制造的冷链设备对于减少粮食产后损失、确保食品安全和全年供应至关重要，间接支持消除饥饿。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people... to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round

rationale: 空调设备可以通过提供热舒适度来减轻热浪期间的热应激相关疾病和死亡。然而，此积极贡献依赖于清洁能源供电，否则可能因发电污染产生负面间接影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 传统纸浆制造业通常是资源密集型（水、能源）和污染型产业。如果未进行可持续升级和采用清洁技术，其运营方式与使工业可持续的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 纸浆制造严重依赖木材资源。如果原料来自不可持续的森林管理或导致森林退化，则直接违背自然资源的可持续管理目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 化学制浆过程（如硫酸盐法）使用大量化学品（如氢氧化钠、硫化钠、氯化合物），若管理不善，这些化学品及其副产品（如二噁英）的释放会对环境和健康造成严重危害。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 纸浆制造过程会产生大量固体废物（如树皮、污泥）和工艺废水。如果不实施废物减量、回收和再利用措施，该行业会显著增加废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 对木材原料的需求是森林砍伐和退化的主要驱动因素之一。如果纸浆用材不来自可持续管理的森林或人工林，该行业将对森林保护和可持续管理目标产生重大负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, promote the implementation of sustainable management of all types of forests, halt deforestation, restore degraded forests and substantially increase afforestation and reforestation globally

rationale: 纸浆生产是高度耗水行业，其废水含有高浓度的有机物（BOD/COD）、木质素和可能的有害化学品，如果不经充分处理排放，会严重恶化水质。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，纸浆制造业提供了就业机会，对地方经济有贡献。然而，需要评估工作条件是否符合'体面工作'标准（如安全、健康）。此处给予中等正面评分，承认其就业贡献，但非其主要影响维度。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 管理顾问的核心业务就是通过提供战略、运营优化和技术升级建议，帮助客户提高生产力和创新能力。
sdg_target_description: (Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation...)

rationale: 通过人力资源和多元化咨询，顾问可以促进客户公司实现同工同酬、改善工作条件和平等就业机会。但这种影响是间接的，取决于具体服务内容。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men... and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 以成本削减为核心的咨询项目可能导致非体面的工作条件、裁员或不稳定的就业形式，与体面工作的目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men... and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 为中小企业提供商业计划、财务管理和融资策略咨询，可以帮助它们更好地获得金融服务。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises... to financial services, including affordable credit...)

rationale: 高昂的咨询费用可能使中小企业难以获得专业服务，从而在获取资源和专业知识方面与大企业产生差距。
sdg_target_description: (Increase the access of small-scale industrial and other enterprises... to financial services, including affordable credit...)

rationale: 提供研发管理、技术创新和数字化转型战略的咨询服务，直接有助于提升客户的技术能力和创新水平。
sdg_target_description: (Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors... encouraging innovation...)

rationale: 通过多元化与包容性（D&I）战略咨询，可以帮助客户公司建立更具包容性的工作环境。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all...)

rationale: 若顾问的建议导致客户公司采取加剧工资差距或削弱社会保障的政策，则会对减少不平等产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: (Adopt policies, especially fiscal, wage and social protection policies, and progressively achieve greater equality)

rationale: 提供可持续发展战略、资源效率管理和循环经济模式咨询，可以帮助客户实现自然资源的可持续管理。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 若顾问的建议鼓励以牺牲资源效率为代价的线性增长模式，则与可持续资源管理目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 若咨询项目不包含或忽视废物最小化策略，其推动的业务增长可能间接导致废物产生增加。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 提供企业社会责任（CSR）、环境、社会及治理（ESG）报告和可持续发展战略咨询，是直接鼓励企业采纳可持续实践的关键服务。
sdg_target_description: (Encourage companies... to adopt sustainable practices and to integrate sustainability information into their reporting cycle)

rationale: 国际管理顾问公司通过向发展中国家的企业和政府提供知识转移和能力建设，支持其向可持续模式转型。
sdg_target_description: (Support developing countries to strengthen their scientific and technological capacity to move towards more sustainable patterns of consumption and production)

rationale: 通过提供气候变化风险评估、低碳转型战略和绿色技术咨询，顾问可以帮助客户将气候行动纳入其核心战略。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)

rationale: 蕾丝制造通常需要消耗大量的水、能源和原材料（如棉花或化纤），其资源密集型特性与自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources)

rationale: 传统纺织染色和整理过程可能使用有害化学品，若管理不当，会导致对水、土壤和空气的污染，对人类健康和环境构成风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle... and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 制造过程中会产生边角料等固体废物，且最终产品（蕾丝）作为纺织品，其生命周期结束时可能成为废弃物，贡献于废物生成问题。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 纺织业是著名的耗水大户，蕾丝制造过程中的清洗、染色等环节需要大量淡水，对水资源利用效率和水资源可持续性构成压力。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater...)

rationale: 未经充分处理的含有染料和化学品的工业废水排放会严重污染水体，与改善水质的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials...)

sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men... and equal pay for work of equal value)

rationale: 如果该行业采用可持续实践（如节水技术、清洁生产），则可对目标做出积极贡献。但基于行业名称本身，这是一种潜在可能性而非必然联系，故相关性较低。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies...)

rationale: 理发和美容服务通过提升个人仪容和卫生，间接促进心理健康和福祉，但贡献较微弱，非核心医疗活动。

sdg_target_description: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life

rationale: 该行业可能无意中强化基于外表的性别刻板印象或美容标准，间接助长对女性的歧视性期望。
sdg_target_description: End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere

rationale: 理发美容业主要由中小企业和个体经营者构成，是服务业中创造体面就业和支持创业的重要领域。
sdg_target_description: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises

rationale: 该行业为不同背景的人群提供就业机会，但需要关注工作条件和同工同酬问题，以实现体面工作。

rationale: 行业运营会产生包装材料、一次性用具（如毛巾、围布）等固体废物，增加废物产生量。

sdg_target_description: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being

sdg_target_description: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

rationale: 该行业提供了制造业领域的就业机会，有助于实现充分和生产性就业的目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 眼镜制造涉及光学、材料科学等领域的技术应用和创新（如轻量化材料、防蓝光镜片），对产业技术升级有间接贡献。
sdg_target_description: Enhance scientific research, upgrade the technological capabilities of industrial sectors in all countries, in particular developing countries, including, by 2030, encouraging innovation and substantially increasing the number of research and development workers per 1 million people and public and private research and development spending

rationale: 眼镜制造过程可能消耗塑料、金属等自然资源，如果生产实践不注重资源效率，可能对自然资源的可持续管理构成压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 生产过程中的边角料、不合格品以及产品生命周期结束后的废弃眼镜若未得到有效管理（如回收再利用），可能导致废物增加。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 该行业通过改进加工技术（如提高能源效率、减少废料）和提供用于可持续建筑或基础设施的塑料部件，为工业的可持续升级做出贡献。但其本身并非高技术或清洁技术的前沿。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 通过优化加工工艺（如精确注塑减少原料浪费）或使用回收合成树脂作为原料，该行业可以促进资源的更有效利用。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 如果该行业积极整合回收树脂并进行废料再利用，可以为减少废物做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，该行业通过生产和加工活动贡献于经济生产力。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 该行业的核心产品（塑料制品）是固体废物的主要来源之一。如果缺乏有效的回收和循环系统，其产品会显著增加废物产生量，与减少废物的目标直接冲突。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 塑料制品，尤其是一次性塑料，是海洋垃圾和微塑料污染的主要贡献者。该行业生产的产品若管理不善，会加剧海洋污染。
sdg_target_description: By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution

sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果管理不当，例如在装修、维修过程中缺乏环保措施，房地产管理可能产生大量的建筑垃圾和日常运营废物。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

sdg_target_description: Strengthen the capacity of domestic financial institutions to encourage and expand access to banking, insurance and financial services for all

sdg_target_description: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums.

sdg_target_description: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries.

sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources.

sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 如果该行业批发节能设备、高效机械或其他清洁技术，则直接支持产业向资源高效和可持续方向升级。但由于产品范围不明确，相关性为中等。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 如果分销的资源高效型设备（如节能水泵、压缩机）被广泛采用，将促进自然资源的可持续管理和高效利用。但影响是间接且依赖于具体产品。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 该行业自身的运营（如包装材料、物流）可能产生废物。更重要的是，如果其分销的机械设备寿命短、不可回收或维修困难，会间接导致废物增加，与目标相悖。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 如果该行业主要分销高能耗、高碳排放的传统化石燃料机械，则其业务模式与将气候变化措施纳入主流的国家政策方向不一致，构成潜在的消极影响。
sdg_target_description: Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning

rationale: 作为制造业的一部分，毛纺业通过技术升级和生产羊毛纱线这一特定商品，为经济增长和生产力做出贡献。
sdg_target_description: Achieve higher levels of economic productivity through diversification, technological upgrading and innovation, including through a focus on high-value added and labour-intensive sectors

rationale: 该行业提供制造业就业岗位，但其工作环境（粉尘、化学品）是否符合'体面工作'标准取决于具体管理实践。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including for young people and persons with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

rationale: 毛纺业是工业化的组成部分，其可持续转型（如采用清洁技术）有助于可持续工业化。
sdg_target_description: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries

rationale: 行业升级（如废水处理、节能设备、绿色化学品使用）直接对应此目标，提高资源效率。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities

rationale: 如果实施可持续实践（如负责任的水、能源和羊毛原料使用），可贡献于此目标。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, achieve the sustainable management and efficient use of natural resources

rationale: 负责任地管理纺纱过程中使用的化学品（如染料、助剂）和废物，可产生积极影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

rationale: 通过回收利用生产过程中的废羊毛、减少原料浪费等措施，可贡献于减少废物产生。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse

rationale: 传统毛纺工艺（如洗毛、染色）消耗大量水并可能排放含有化学物质的废水，对水质构成威胁。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally

rationale: 该行业通常是高耗水行业，如果未采取节水措施，会加剧水资源压力。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

rationale: 生产过程中的化学物质暴露（如染料、整理剂）和空气粉尘（毛屑）可能对工人健康产生负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination

rationale: 如果羊毛原料来自不可持续的牧场，导致过度放牧和土地退化，则对此目标有潜在负面影响。
sdg_target_description: By 2030, combat desertification, restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods, and strive to achieve a land degradation-neutral world

rationale: 该行业通过建设和运营污水处理系统，直接提供环境卫生服务，是实现该目标的核心基础设施。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, achieve access to adequate and equitable sanitation and hygiene for all and end open defecation, paying special attention to the needs of women and girls and those in vulnerable situations)

rationale: 污水处理的核心功能是净化污水，减少水体污染，并可能通过再生水回用促进水的循环利用。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally)

rationale: 该行业的技术和经验是国际水资源与卫生合作中能力建设和技术转让的重要内容。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, expand international cooperation and capacity-building support to developing countries in water- and sanitation-related activities and programmes, including water harvesting, desalination, water efficiency, wastewater treatment, recycling and reuse technologies)

rationale: 作为公共服务提供者，该行业在运营和管理中需要与当地社区互动，支持社区参与水资源和卫生管理。
sdg_target_description: (Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management)

rationale: 通过妥善处理污水，有效切断霍乱、伤寒等水媒疾病的传播途径，保障公共健康。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases)

rationale: 减少未经处理或处理不当的污水中所含的危险化学品和病原体对水体和土壤的污染，从而降低相关疾病和死亡风险。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination)

rationale: 污水处理是城市居民应享有的基本服务之一，是建设可持续城市和社区的关键组成部分。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services)

rationale: 完善的下水道系统有助于城市防洪排涝，减少因内涝等水相关灾害造成的人员伤亡和经济损失。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations)

rationale: 有效处理污水能显著减少陆源污染物（如氮、磷等营养盐）排入河流并最终进入海洋，防止水体富营养化和海洋污染。
sdg_target_description: (By 2025, prevent and significantly reduce marine pollution of all kinds, in particular from land-based activities, including marine debris and nutrient pollution)

rationale: 下水道系统是支撑城市运行和居民生活质量的关键的、可持续的公共基础设施。
sdg_target_description: (Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and transborder infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all)

rationale: 污水处理厂通常是能源密集型设施，若其运行依赖化石燃料发电，则对增加可再生能源份额有消极影响。但若采用沼气发电等可再生能源则可能转为积极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix)

rationale: 若污水处理工艺能效低下，则对提高全球能效改善率有消极影响。采用高效设备和技术可缓解此影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, double the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency)

rationale: 污水处理过程中产生的污泥若未得到无害化、资源化处理（即环境无害化管理），可能造成二次污染，对该目标产生消极影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment)

rationale: 污水处理本身会产生大量污泥等固体废物，若仅以填埋等方式处置，则增加了废物产生量，与废物减量目标相悖。污泥的资源化利用可转变此影响。
sdg_target_description: (By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse)

rationale: 污水处理厂运行过程中可能排放温室气体（如CH4, N2O），若未采取减排措施，则对将气候变化措施纳入政策和行动有消极影响。
sdg_target_description: (Integrate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning)
